0831180610000005--.name: Sailing is always a breeze. Hee. See what I did there?

1101173110001798--.name: You want to go to $map:02000001$? Why are you asking me? You should go to the Chief.

1101173110001799--.name: I thought sea dogs were adventurous, and yet you won't even let a friendly stranger onto your boat?

1101173110001800--.name: You sail to $map:02000001$ by first going to $map:02000062$, and right now the water's too choppy for this boat. Besides, when conditions are like that, only the Chief can authorize the departure of a large ship.

0831180610000013--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180610000014--.name: Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?

0831180610000015--.name: You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.

0831180610000016--.name: Everyone gets sick now and then, you know.

0831180610000017--.name: When that happens, I can heal you.

0831180610000018--.name: My services are available for a modest fee.

0831180610000020--.name: Everyone wants to join the Royal Guard, but very few are actually qualified. It is imperative that Royal Guard members be strong in body and spirit, for we are the Empress's last line of defense. Hmm, I must admit, you do seem fairly strong.

0831180610000021--.name: We're always looking for great swordsmen with the strength to protect the Empress and her palace. How'd you like to join the Royal Guard?

0831180610000022--.name: In times like this, only we can protect Her Majesty and Minister $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$.  It's the most important job in the world. After you've grown a bit stronger, you should consider joining the Royal Guard.

0831180610000023--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0831180610000025--.name: We royal guards protect the palace under the command of Minister $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$. Even though the much-awaited court was canceled because of the earthquake, there is no price too high when it comes to keeping the empress safe. We must honor our oath to protect her from anything, or anyone, that would do her harm.

0831180610000026--.name: Don't tell me you've never heard of Minister $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$?

0831180610000027--.name: Hmm. I knew people had traveled far and wide to attend the royal court, but you must have come from very far away to be so ignorant of the recent happenings in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000028--.name: I'm quite busy at the moment, but I'm sure there are plenty of people in $map:02000001$ who would be happy to educate you.

1128171910001801--.name: Remember, no longer are you some aimless adventure wandering the land, but rather a proud Knight and defender of the realm! Now, are there any questions you'd like answered?

0831180610000033--.name: As it stands, you're too weak to fend for yourself, let alone protect the Empress.  $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ is a merchant of fine equipment, and probably has some excellent Knight gear for sale. Go get suited up, and commence your training beyond the walls of $map:02000001$!

0831180610000034--.name: As you train, you'll ascend to new levels, and become ready to learn new skills. To see the skills you can learn, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

0831180610000035--.name: Want to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>? Press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.

0831180610000036--.name: Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000038--.name: $itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

0831180610000039--.name: Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently.

0831180610000040--.name: As for $itemPlural:40100022$, I don't think you're quite ready.

0831180610000041--.name: You passed up your opportunity to join the Royal Guard to become a... Berserker? Well, I hope you don't regret your decision.

0831180610000042--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0831180610000044--.name: You passed up your opportunity to join the Royal Guard to become a... Wizard? Well, I hope you don't regret your decision.

0831180610000045--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0831180610000047--.name: You passed up your opportunity to join the Royal Guard to become a... Priest? I suppose they have their own role to play on the battlefield. Well, I hope you don't regret your decision.

0831180610000048--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0831180610000050--.name: You passed up your opportunity to join the Royal Guard to become an... Archer? Well, I hope you don't regret your decision.

0831180610000051--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0831180610000053--.name: You passed up your opportunity to join the Royal Guard to become a... Heavy Gunner? Well, I hope you don't regret your decision.

0831180610000054--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0831180610000056--.name: You passed up your opportunity to join the Royal Guard to become a... Thief? What a dishonorable profession. Perhaps you weren't cut out for the job in the first place.

0831180610000057--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0831180610000059--.name: You passed up your opportunity to join the Royal Guard to become an... Assassin? You'd better not be conducting any business in our fair city unless you want to spend the rest of your life rotting in the dungeon.

0831180610000060--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

1216124310001319--.name: If I'm not mistaken, you're a Runeblade—a warrior versed both in swordplay and runic magic. I'm skeptical on whether you can really master both, but it's noble of you to try. In any case, you're quite far from home. Did you have any questions I can answer?

1216124310001320--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0607163510001498-Striker-.name: Ah, yes, I've heard of you. Your methods are a bit unrefined, but you have a sense of determination paralleled by only the greatest Knights. It's too bad, we could use someone like you in the Royal Guard.

0607163510001499-Striker-.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0806014810001595-SoulBinder-.name: I'm sorry, but I don't believe you possess the necessary qualifications to join the Royal Guard. The job requires great stores of both fortitude and determination, and it's my assessment that you possess neither.

0806014810001596-SoulBinder-.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard.

0831180610000062--.name: Do you want to become a true warrior?

0831180610000063--.name: Argh, this place is so boring, it's driving me crazy! If it weren't for the War Chief's order, I would be cracking skulls on Vayar Mountain and having a blast! Hey, you look pretty tough. How are you in a fight?

0831180610000064--.name: With a greatsword in our hands, we're fearless in battle. We can be overzealous sometimes, but that's inevitable when you've got our passion for fighting. So, how'd you like to swear fealty to the War Chief and walk the path of the Berserker?

0831180610000065--.name: Argh, this place is so boring, it's driving me crazy! If it weren't for the War Chief's order, I would be cracking skulls on Vayar Mountain and having a blast! Hey, you look pretty tough. How are you in a fight?

0831180610000066--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0831180610000068--.name: We wouldn't be able to survive the sunbaked steppes of $map:02000051$ if it weren't for our War Chief. He's a great warrior and greater leader. Our trust in him is unwavering.

0831180610000069--.name: If you want to meet him, then go to $map:02000051$'s western plateau. But first, you'll have to get approval from his son and our vice chief, $npc:11000009[gender:0]$.

0831180610000070--.name: Oh, and when you see him, just be yourself and be honest. He can tell instantly when you're hiding something.

0831180610000071--.name: You must not get around much if you haven't heard of Vayar Mountain. It's south of $map:02000051$. We named it after the giant golems that lurk inside.

0831180610000072--.name: The golems, or Vayars, were created by the ancients to protect their sanctum. That was centuries ago, and the ancients are long gone. But the Vayars remain, protecting the mountain from any adventurers brave or foolish enough to enter.

0831180610000073--.name:
Speaking of which, I've heard rumors that someone evaded the 
Vayars' detection and snuck into the mountain. What was their name? I can't remember...

0831180610000074--.name: Sometimes in the heat of battle, I achieve inhuman feats simply because, in my rage, I forget fear and all my weaknesses. I wouldn't count that as a blessing, though... Some things are worth forgetting, but you must never forget who you are. Now, was there something you wanted to ask me?

0831180610000078--.name: First, arm yourself to the teeth. $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ is a merchant of fine equipment, and probably has some great Berserker equipment for sale. Gear up and head out to battle!

0831180610000079--.name: Crush all the foes who stand before you, and you will soon grow to new levels. Then you will find yourself ready to learn new skills. To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

0831180610000080--.name: Want to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>? Press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.

0831180610000081--.name: Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000083--.name: $itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

0831180610000084--.name: Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently.

0831180610000085--.name: There's also $itemPlural:40100022$, but I don't think you're ready for those just yet.

0831180610000086--.name: You've really chosen to become a Knight? I don't know what you'll accomplish waving a dinky sword like that around, but good luck surviving.

0831180610000087--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0831180610000089--.name: You've really chosen to become a Knight? I don't really see how shouting gibberish from musty old tomes is going to keep you alive in battle, but I won't tell you how to live what's left of your life.

0831180610000090--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0831180610000092--.name: A priest? You've chosen to be a Priest? A fat lot of good prayer is going to do you against a horde of charging Koborcs.

0831180610000093--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0831180610000095--.name: You've really chosen to become an Archer? Striking down hapless foes from a distance is great, until your quiver runs dry. When the enemy comes bearing down on you, you'll wish you'd gone with a blade.

0831180610000096--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0831180610000098--.name: You've chosen to become a Heavy Gunner, of all things? Guns are a crutch of the cowardly. A true warrior faces their opponent head on. Don't look to me when that cannon jams in the heat of battle.

0831180610000099--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0831180610000101--.name: You've chosen to become a Thief? Throwing your only weapons at the enemy seems like a foolhardy strategy, but who am I to stand in the way of a someone with a deathwish?

0831180610000102--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0831180610000104--.name: You've chosen to become an Assassin? Skulking around in the shadows, hoping to strike without being seen... There's no honor in that.

0831180610000105--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

1216124310001322--.name: You've chosen to become a Runeblade? To split one's focus between two completely different arts in the midst of battle seems like a reckless strategy. Perhaps you'll prove me wrong by not dying.

1216124310001323--.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0607163510001501-Striker-.name: I sense your fighting spirit is akin to the rage that fuels us Berserkers. A fire that burns within the soul and cannot be quenched! Some advice from one warrior to another: never let your anger get the better of you on the battlefield, or you might wind up dead.

0607163510001502-Striker-.name: Tell me about the War Chief.

0806014810001598-SoulBinder-.name: The rage that fuels us Berserkers is a hot and roiling one that scorches the soul. And I can see it's just not in you. You're just like everyone else... you'll never know what it feels like to be truly alive.

0806014810001599-SoulBinder-.name: Tell me about the war chief.

0831180610000107--.name: Ugh... I hate being bothered. What is it?

0831180610000108--.name: Honestly, I don't care about politics or the court. My time is much better spent reading books in $map:02000031$.

0831180610000109--.name: People don't understand the value to be found in dusty tomes and conversing with the fairies in $map:02000023$. But you have a certain inquisitiveness in your eyes, an intellectual spark. You might make a good Wizard. I'm not going to push, but if you're the arcane arts, I'd be willing to assist you.

0831180610000110--.name: Honestly, I don't care about politics or the court, and you shouldn't waste your time on things like that either. Come see me if you ever want to discuss what actually matters in this world. I've got plenty of wisdom to share.

0831180610000113--.name: It seems the simple minds of ordinary folk can't understand us Wizards. We're more interested in scholarly matters, like understanding the origin of this world and what caused the earthquake, than we are in whether the empress holds her court.

0831180610000114--.name: Some people think the earthquake was not a naturally occurring phenomenon, and I'm inclined to agree with them. There's evidence to support such a theory...

0831180610000115--.name: And you have to admit, it's suspicious that the palace canceled court, which would have been the first one in quite a long time, just because of a simple earthquake. Very suspicious indeed...

0607163510001504-Striker-.name: What could I possibly have to discuss with you? You and I have nothing in common. Are you looking for magical body-building tips or something? We of the arcane arts don't waste our time trying to enhance our physical forms, as we know that the font of our power lies within.

0607163510001505-Striker-.name: I'm simply pursuing my fullest potential, just like you're doing.

0607163510001506-Striker-.name: Ultimate potential? Suuuure, I can help. Unleash your "ultimate potential" with my patented brew of enchanted smoothies! They can be yours for the low, low price of 1,200 mesos! Pffft. You sound like you've been roped into some kind of scam.

0806014810001601-SoulBinder-.name: Are you still here? I'd suggest you stop wasting my time, before I make you a guinea pig for my magical studies.

0806014810001602-SoulBinder-.name: Do you know who I am?

0806014810001603-SoulBinder-.name: What, are you some kind of celebrity to the common-folk? Why would I know anything about— Woah... what's up with your aura?

0806014810001604-SoulBinder-.name:
I didn't notice it while I was busy trying to ignore you, but your aura is like nothing I've ever seen. I sense two opposing forces swirling within you.
It's like watching two stupid salamanders trying to swallow each others' tails.

0806014810001605-SoulBinder-.name: The first energy unlike anything ever described within the Encyclopedia Arcana... It almost resembles the energy of nature, but... it's so condensed. Incredible. I would never have believed a mortal could accumulate so much power in a single lifetime.

0806014810001606-SoulBinder-.name: And the second is something darker. It's almost feels like... No, that's not possible.

0806014810001607-SoulBinder-.name: I don't know what you're talking about.

0806014810001608-SoulBinder-.name: Just what in the world are you?

0806014810001609-SoulBinder-.name: I have no memory of my past.

0806014810001610-SoulBinder-.name: Huh? Really? Were you in some kind of accident...? Come closer. I know just the spell for reading memories.

0806014810001612-SoulBinder-.name:
Stay perfectly still.
<font color="#909090">(She places her hand on your head and begins to recite an incantation. A spark leaps from her finger tips, and your head starts to feel fuzzy.)</font>

0806014810001613-SoulBinder-.name: I can't see anything... There's a thick purple haze swirling around inside your head, it's obstructing my view.

0806014810001614-SoulBinder-.name: I don't believe it. Could you really be...!? No, it's better not to rush to any conclusions. I've got to consult with my colleagues. In the mean time, I'll be keeping an eye on you. Please leave now.

0831180610000116--.name: A Wizard's life is lonely and difficult. We can never stop studying until we reach the very zenith of magical knowledge. You've got quite a road ahead of you. Is there anything you want to ask a fellow scholar?

0831180610000120--.name: Before begin your journey, you should see that you're properly equipped. $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ is a purveyor of fine equipment, and probably has some adequate Wizard gear for sale. Buy whatever supplies are necessary, and venture out into that great, wide world to expand your knowledge!

0831180610000121--.name: As your studies progress, you will attain new levels. This will allow you to learn new skills. To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

0831180610000122--.name: When you're ready to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>, just press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.

0831180610000123--.name: Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000125--.name: $itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

0831180610000126--.name: Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently. It would be best to hunt such foes with a party.

0831180610000127--.name: And as for $itemPlural:40100022$—well, you can learn about those on your own.

0831180610000128--.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Knight.

0831180610000131--.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Berserker.

0831180610000134--.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Priest.

0831180610000137--.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Archer.

0831180610000140--.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Heavy Gunner.

0831180610000143--.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Thief.

0831180610000146--.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Assassin.

1216124310001325--.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Runeblade.

0607163510001507-Striker-.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court... nor do we care who you are. Our interests lie in more scholarly pursuits.

0607163510001508-Striker-.name: What do you care about, then?

0607163510001509-Striker-.name: Do you know what caused the earthquake?

0607163510001510-Striker-.name: There's another subject I'd like to ask you about.

0806014810001616-SoulBinder-.name: Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court... nor do we care who you are. Our interests lie in more scholarly pursuits.

0806014810001619-SoulBinder-.name: There's another subject I'd like to ask you about.

0831180610000150--.name: The recent earthquake has struck fear into the hearts of many. We restore the people's hope by spreading the goddess's teachings. Would you join us on our holy mission? You seem more than qualified to serve the goddess.

0831180610000151--.name:
Illuminate this world with your good heart and unshakable faith.
The goddess awaits with open arms all who you will shepherd into the light.

0831180610000152--.name: The recent earthquake has struck fear into the hearts of many. We restore the people's hope by spreading the goddess's teachings. Would you join us on our holy mission?

0831180610000155--.name: The road between $map:02000062$ and $map:02000001$ bore the brunt of the earthquake's damage. Fortunately, the road was nearly deserted when the shaking began.

0831180610000156--.name: I know that many are disappointed about the court's cancellation, but I think the can all agree that our current focus should be on supporting one another, and dealing with the damage of the quake.

0831180610000157--.name: Oh, what a silly question! She's the empress, of course. $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ was surely just as disappointed about the court as everyone else, but her safety is paramount to Maple World.

0831180610000158--.name: If you're here for an audience with the Empress, you might as well go home. She's too busy these days governing the realm. Since the incident, the people have relied on her strong leadership more than ever.

0607163510001511-Striker-.name: $MyPCName$, do you believe in... the Light?

0607163510001512-Striker-.name: I only believe in what I can see.

0607163510001513-Striker-.name: The Light shines on everyone, regardless of their belief or lack of belief.

0607163510001514-Striker-.name: What's the Light ever done for the poor of $map:02000100$?

0607163510001515-Striker-.name: I believe the ordeals we experience throughout life are ultimately blessings in disguise, arranged by the Light. Hardship happens for a reason. I shall pray for you and everyone else. May the Light's blessing be with you wherever you go.

0806014810001620-SoulBinder-.name: $MyPCName$, do you believe in... the Light?

0806014810001621-SoulBinder-.name: What do you mean by "the light"?

0806014810001622-SoulBinder-.name:
The Light <font color="#ffd200">shines on everyone</font>, regardless of their belief or lack of belief.
It <font color="#ffd200">guides</font> you through the darkness, keeping you from wandering astray.

0806014810001623-SoulBinder-.name: No light has ever guided me.

0806014810001624-SoulBinder-.name: You just haven't noticed it. I can see it all around you, though it is rather dim.

0806014810001625-SoulBinder-.name: You may not realize it, but that warm light is guiding you along your path. (You think that's a rich presumption. Doesn't this person know that this light has nothing to do with you? Your guide is the Lone Spirit and the Master's teachings.)

0831180610000159--.name: Don't forget, you're now an agent of the Empress and, by extension, an agent of the goddess. It is your duty to perform good deeds and help the weak. Now, do you have any questions?

0831180610000163--.name: To help the weak and needy, you yourself must be strong. $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ is a merchant of fine equipment, and probably has some excellent Priest gear for sale. Once you're properly equipped, you should venture forth and enact the will of the goddess.

0831180610000164--.name: In your service to the goddess, you'll inevitably reach new levels. When this happens you'll be able to learn new skills. To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

0831180610000165--.name: Press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.

0831180610000166--.name: Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000168--.name: $itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

0831180610000169--.name: Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently.

0831180610000170--.name: $itemPlural:40100022$, you are dangerous, and must be handled with care.

0831180610000171--.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Knight. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0831180610000174--.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Berserker. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0831180610000177--.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Wizard. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0831180610000180--.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Archer. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0831180610000183--.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Heavy Gunner. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0831180610000186--.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Thief. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0831180610000189--.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Assassin. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

1216124310001328--.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Runeblade. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0607163510001517-Striker-.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen your path. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0607163510001518-Striker-.name: Did the earthquake cause a lot of damage?

0806014810001627-SoulBinder-.name: I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen your path. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.

0806014810001630-SoulBinder-.name: Talk to $npcName:11000043[gender:1]$ about a different subject.

0831180610000192--.name: Whatever this is, please get to the point.

0831180610000193--.name: The Green Hoods are a militia group with a long, storied history. Right now, we're keeping an eye on the opportunists who might try to take advantage of the chaos of recent events. We want to prevent as much crime as possible, but that requires talent and mettle. And you... you look like you've got both of those.

0831180610000194--.name: Our sharp arrows never miss their targets. How would you like to join us on our mission to restore order to this world?

0831180610000195--.name: The Green Hoods are a militia group with a long, storied history. How'd you like to join us and punish those who would do the world harm?

0831180610000196--.name: Tell me about the Green Hoods.

0831180610000198--.name: The Green Hoods are a militia group founded by the legendary archer, Haster. The current commander is a firebrand named Oska. She's the fifth leader in the group's history, and some might say its greatest. If you want to meet her, you'll need to go to $map:02000076$.

0831180610000199--.name: Haven't you noticed? Petty crimes like theft and pickpocketing have skyrocketed since the earthquake. The guards are so busy trying to restore order that they can't keep eyes on everyone.

0831180610000200--.name: This couldn't be avoided. There's been such an enormous influx of people into the city from all over Maple World, there was bound to be more than a few bad apples. I just hope order will be restored soon.

0607163510001521-Striker-.name: $MyPCName$, you remind me of an arrow that's just been loosed from its bow.

0607163510001523-Striker-.name: Because... you seem like somebody that never looks back, someone who simply moves forward in spite of uncertainty.

0806014810001631-SoulBinder-.name:
People <font color="#ffd200">suffer</font> when their daily activities are threatened by crime.
We Green Hoods exist to ensure <font color="#ffd200">peace and safety</font>, even though that's a challenge without end.

0806014810001632-SoulBinder-.name:
What about you? Have you ever felt threatened by anything?
<font color="#909090">(Memories of Brother $npcName:11001715[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001706[gender:1]$ flash through your mind.)</font>

0806014810001633-SoulBinder-.name: I prefer not to think about such things.

0806014810001634-SoulBinder-.name: Fighting crime is only a means to an end. Our <font color="#ffd200">true mission</font> is to protect this whole world from all threats, so that everyone can live without fear. We won't stop until we achieve that.

0831180610000201--.name: Remember, you're not some aimless adventurer anymore. You're in the Green Hoods now, and that means you've got a mission and a creed. So, anything you'd like to ask?

0831180610000205--.name: You're of no use to the Green Hoods without suitable gear. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is a vendor of fine equipment, and probably has some great Archer gear for sale. After you're properly equipped, you should head beyond the city walls and dole out law to the lawless.

0831180610000206--.name: As you train, you'll ascend to new levels, and become ready to learn new skills. To see the skills you can learn, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

0831180610000207--.name: Want to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>? Press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.

0831180610000208--.name: Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000210--.name: $itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

0831180610000211--.name: Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently. So you know, keep that in mind.

0831180610000212--.name: As for $itemPlural:40100022$... Well, you won't just find them lying around.

0831180610000213--.name: It's too bad you've decided not to join the Green Hoods. Still, we'd greatly appreciate any assistance you're willing to offer punishing those who bear ill will for the people of these lands.

0831180610000214--.name: Tell me about the Green Hoods.

0831180610000216--.name: It's too bad you've decided not to join the Green Hoods. Still, we'd greatly appreciate any assistance you're willing to offer punishing those who bear ill will for the people of these lands.
