0607163510001525-Striker-.name: Tell me about the Green Hoods.

0806014810001636-SoulBinder-.name: You don't have to be a member of the Green Hoods to help protect this world. If you come across wrongdoers, please see to it they're punished.

0806014810001637-SoulBinder-.name: Tell me about the Green Hoods.

0806014810001639-SoulBinder-.name: Talk to $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ about a different subject.

0831180610000234--.name: Do you have something to say to me?

0831180610000235--.name: Everyone's so on edge right now, but not me... In fact, I can't wait to show the rest of the world what I can do! How about we forget about everything and go blow some stuff up? I'll even help you pick out your own cannon.

0831180610000236--.name: I'm not afraid of anything as long as I've got my giant cannon with me. Unlike people, it'll never disappoint me. What do you say, want to become a Heavy Gunner?

0831180610000237--.name: Everyone's so on edge right now, but not me... in fact, I can't wait to show the rest of the world what I can do!

0831180610000238--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0831180610000239--.name: What's there to do around here?

0831180610000240--.name: This is a cannon, and it's the greatest! It can tear things up from a zillion feet away. Here, wanna see?

0831180610000241--.name: Hahaha! Did you think I was serious? If I spun up my cannon right now, I'd send this whole place crumbling down.

0831180610000242--.name: Fun is in the eye of the beholder. If you want to live a happy life, then figure out what you really want to do, and do it for the rest of your life.

0831180610000243--.name: Just keep trying new things until you get to something that sticks! Anything goes, as long as you don't hurt anybody. Well, it's okay if they deserve it.

0831180610000244--.name: I became a mercenary because a boring traditional life wasn't for me. And now I get to lug this beauty everywhere I go and blow stuff up!

0831180610000245--.name: I came here as some doctor's bodyguard. But I got tired of escorting him to all his stuffy events. I'm actually pretty excited about all the recent chaos. I know some people are grumpy about it, but it's an opportunity for me to take on adversaries tougher than I ever dreamed. I'm stoked!

0607163510001528-Striker-.name: Look at my weapons, $MyPCName$. Heavy Gunners use firearms like these. Amazing, huh?

0607163510001529-Striker-.name: True warriors rely on more than their weapons.

0607163510001530-Striker-.name: You don't know what you're talking about. My cannon could blow you to pieces in a single second!

0607163510001531-Striker-.name: And I could break your cannon in a tenth of a second!

0607163510001532-Striker-.name: That's ridiculous! You know what, you're just no fun. Get lost.

0806014810001640-SoulBinder-.name: Look at my weapons, $MyPCName$. Heavy Gunners use firearms like these. Amazing, huh?

0806014810001642-SoulBinder-.name:
Let me tell you about this cannon. It's specially forged in Taliskar...
<font color="#909090">(You touch the cannon, and instantly feel cold and dizzy. Her voice sounds like it's miles away.)</font>

0806014810001643-SoulBinder-.name: Heh, I told them there was only person who could handle this cannon, and that person was standing right in front of them! Heh, heh. It was me, get it? Hey, I asked you a question! Are you even listening?

0806014810001644-SoulBinder-.name: Hey, what's going on? You look pale. And you're sweating like crazy. Ha, ha, is touching my cannon that exciting?

0806014810001645-SoulBinder-.name:
Hey. What's happening to you?
<font color="#909090">(Her cannon brings up images from the nightmare you used to have when you slept in Halo Mountain. You'd better leave.)</font>

0806014810001647-SoulBinder-.name: Oh. Well, fine. I was going to show you the awesome things my cannon does, but I guess not. What's wrong with you, anyway? Been traumatized by cannons or something? Wouldn't surprise me, since they're so powerful. They should only be handled by the fearless, anyway.

0831180610000246--.name: It'll be much more fun to travel around the world, looking for worthy opponents, than protecting grouchy old dudes.

0831180610000250--.name: If you want to take on tough serious, you need serious hardware. $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ can hook you up with some sweet Heavy Gunner equipment. Go gear up and introduce yourself to the world outside with a bang!

0831180610000251--.name: Keep shooting stuff, and eventually you'll reach a new level. Then it'll be time to learn new skills. To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

0831180610000252--.name: When you're ready to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>, just press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.

0831180610000253--.name: Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000255--.name: $itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

0831180610000256--.name: Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently.

0831180610000257--.name: And as for $itemPlural:40100022$... Hah, that's way out of your league.

0831180610000258--.name: Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner... you're already a Knight. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!

0831180610000259--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0831180610000260--.name: What's there to do around here?

0831180610000261--.name: Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner... you're already a Berserker. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!

0831180610000262--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0831180610000263--.name: What's there to do around here?

0831180610000264--.name: Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner... you're already a Wizard. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!

0831180610000265--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0831180610000266--.name: What's there to do around here?

0831180610000267--.name: Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner... you're already a Priest. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!

0831180610000268--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0831180610000269--.name: What's there to do around here?

0831180610000270--.name: Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner... you're already an Archer. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!

0831180610000271--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0831180610000272--.name: What's there to do around here?

0831180610000273--.name: Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner... you're already a Thief. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!

0831180610000274--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0831180610000275--.name: What's there to do around here?

0831180610000276--.name: Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner... you're already an Assassin. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!

0831180610000277--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0831180610000278--.name: What's there to do around here?

1216124310001334--.name: Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner... you're already a Runeblade. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!

1216124310001335--.name: What's that weapon on your back?

1216124310001336--.name: What's there to do around here?

0607163510001533-Striker-.name: Hm, you're not a Heavy Gunner, $MyPCName$. You know what that means? You don't know how to have fun!

0607163510001534-Striker-.name: Tell me about that weapon of yours.

0607163510001535-Striker-.name: What's there to do around here?

0607163510001536-Striker-.name: I want to ask you about something else.

0806014810001649-SoulBinder-.name:
Hm, you're not a Heavy Gunner, $MyPCName$.
You know what that means? You don't know how to <font color="#ffd200">have fun</font>!

0806014810001650-SoulBinder-.name: What's that weapon on your back?

0806014810001651-SoulBinder-.name: What's there to do around here?

0806014810001652-SoulBinder-.name: Talk to $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ about a different subject.

0831180610000281--.name: Have you got a new job? I certainly do.

0831180610000282--.name: Don't you think my skin has gotten a tad paler these days?

0831180610000284--.name: I'm having as much fun doing this as I did being an oarsman.

0831180610000285--.name: But staying indoors all day gives me cabin fever sometimes.

0831180610000287--.name: Justice is just an concept whose meaning no one can even agree on, so how important could it really be? Live free! Laws are for sheep. You've gotta take what you want, that's just the way the world works.

0831180610000288--.name: If you wanna win, you've gotta be strong. I can teach you how to be strong.

0831180610000289--.name: Justice is just an concept whose meaning no one can even agree on, so how important could it really be? Live free! Laws are for sheep. I can show you how to get what you want.

0831180610000291--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0831180610000292--.name: Are you serious? Have you really been so brainwashed by society that you don't know what it is anymore?

0831180610000293--.name: Do what you want and take what you want. That's what it means to be free. If you want it, all you need is the strength to take it.

0831180610000294--.name: Justice? Order? Hah! They're for sheep who can't hack it in the wild! If you want to make it in this world you've got to learn how it really works. The only path in life is the one you carve for yourself.

0831180610000295--.name: It's simple be a winner. This world is ruled by competition, it's eat or be eaten. Only the best win, so you've gotta try and make sure that's you.

0831180610000296--.name: But things don't always go the way you want. You have to know how to turn the tables on your enemy, by any means necessary.

0831180610000297--.name: We Thieves are the masters of anything-goes. We can move on our enemies in the blink of an eye, and we've got no problem with poison-coated knives. We do what we have to, and if someone has something we want, we take it. It's simple.

0831180610000298--.name: There's no such thing as right and wrong when it comes to winning. There's only you, or them.

0607163510001537-Striker-.name: Stop bothering me. The only people worth talking to are Thieves, and you're obviously not—wait! You... You're...

0607163510001539-Striker-.name: Of course! You're the Gray Wolf! Everyone in the back alleys of $map:02000100$ knows who you are. I didn't think you'd ever find your way onto the world stage. What made you change your mind?

0607163510001540-Striker-.name: You've got me mistaken for someone else.

0607163510001541-Striker-.name: Hm... You're a bad liar. Your eyes give you away. But still, it's interesting to know that major players like you have come out of hiding.

0806014810001653-SoulBinder-.name:
Blah, blah, blah. You're more talkative than you look.
Why are you babbling on like this? Curious about something?

0806014810001654-SoulBinder-.name: Do you know who I am?

0806014810001655-SoulBinder-.name: What? No. How would I know that? You some sort of celebrity? No, I didn't think so. The only way I could know who you are is if you were from $map:02000100$. Trust me, I know everyone from that place.

0806014810001656-SoulBinder-.name: How do you know everyone from there?

0806014810001657-SoulBinder-.name: Clearly, you should be asking who I am. I'm all over the back alleys of $map:02000100$. I know everything that happens there.

0806014810001658-SoulBinder-.name: Well, let's hear what you know, then!

0806014810001659-SoulBinder-.name: Right now, the talk of the town is the Gray Wolf, who decided to leave the shadows of society and duke it out with the Blackstars. Word is that the Gray Wolf singlehandedly razed the Blackstar stronghold.

0806014810001660-SoulBinder-.name: But that's not even the most interesting part. What's really amazing is the Gray Wolf took on the champion of $map:63000020$! Everyone knows the Champ can't be beaten, but the Gray Wolf went for it anyway! Dumb decision, really. The Warrior wiped the floor with them. There's a reason he's called the Monster, you know.

0806014810001661-SoulBinder-.name: Is the Champ really that tough?

0806014810001662-SoulBinder-.name:
Wow, you really don't know?
He's a champion who successfully defended his title 47 times out of 48 matches. And the one time he didn't win, it was a tie. For the 47 victories, he brought them all down with a single blow, if you can believe it.

0806014810001664-SoulBinder-.name: Oh, it was amazing! The Warrior couldn't land a blow, no matter how hard he tried, and neither could his opponent. They just kept trying until both were exhausted, and it was really tense to watch. Finally, at the end, they were both heaving with fatigue, barely able to stand. Without a word, the challenger turned and stumbled away.

0806014810001666-SoulBinder-.name: I don't know. No one does! See, as if it weren't dramatic enough, nobody could find out anything, except that the challenger was a were-eagle known to some people in $map:63000020$, who of course would admit nothing.

0806014810001667-SoulBinder-.name: And why would they? That would be admitting that the Champ isn't invincible.

0831180610000299--.name: Congratulations, $MyPCName$, and welcome to the seedy underbelly of society. Now it's time you learned our ways, from surprise attacks to poisoned blades.

0831180610000303--.name: To take down your enemies you've gotta be fast and precise. For that, you'll need a sharp dagger. $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ should have all kinds of Thief gear. So go get yourself a shiny new blade and use it to carve your own path in life.

0831180610000304--.name: Stab enough things, and eventually you'll reach a new level, and that means you get to learn new skills. To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

0831180610000305--.name: When you're ready to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>, just press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.

0831180610000306--.name: Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000308--.name: $itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

0831180610000309--.name: Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently. So yeah, getting hold of them is no easy feat.

0831180610000310--.name: And as for $itemPlural:40100022$—well, you can figure that out on your own time.

0831180610000311--.name: If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Knight here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.

0831180610000313--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0831180610000314--.name: If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Berserker here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.

0831180610000316--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0831180610000317--.name: If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Wizard here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.

0831180610000319--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0831180610000320--.name: If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Priest here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.

0831180610000322--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0831180610000323--.name: If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to an Archer here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.

0831180610000325--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0831180610000326--.name: If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Heavy Gunner here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.

0831180610000328--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0831180610000329--.name: If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to an Assassin here. Sure you've crossed some lines, but you're still just a cog in the machine. Just go on your merry way.

0831180610000331--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

1216124310001337--.name: If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Runeblade here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.

1216124310001339--.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0607163510001542-Striker-.name: $MyPCName$, I can tell you how to get what you want. Oh, wait... I see now you're not a Thief. Well, then you wouldn't even know what freedom is. Just go along your merry way.

0607163510001544-Striker-.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0607163510001545-Striker-.name: I don't want to talk about this anymore.

0806014810001669-SoulBinder-.name:
$MyPCName$, I can tell you <font color="#ffd200">how to get what you want</font>.
Oh, wait... I see now you're not a Thief. Well, then you wouldn't even know what <font color="#ffd200">freedom</font> is. Just go along your merry way.

0806014810001671-SoulBinder-.name: Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

0806014810001672-SoulBinder-.name: Talk to $npcName:11000050[gender:0]$ about a different subject.

0831180610000333--.name: Ugh. This place makes me so uncomfortable.  Hmm... Your eyes... I can see you're a kindred spirit... How would you like to join us and walk among the shadows?

0831180610000334--.name: Happiness, anger, sadness, forgiveness—emotions are just baggage that gets in the way. Your enemies don't deserve your mercy.

0831180610000335--.name: Ugh. This place makes me so uncomfortable.  Hmm... Your eyes... I can see you're a kindred spirit...  You would probably feel at home among the shadows, but you're still too weak to join us.

0831180610000338--.name: My kind is more comfortable in the shadows than in the light. In my line of work, standing around out in the open can get you killed.

0831180610000339--.name: Watching $npc:11000043[gender:1]$ over there trying to peddle her philosophy to anybody who makes eye contact... She's all about "doing good deeds and helping the weak." Hah. It makes me wanna hurl.

0831180610000340--.name: She's too soft. You help the somebody who can't take care of themselves once, and they'll become reliant on you. Unless they learn how to fend for themselves, they'll never survive in this world. And maybe they don't deserve to.

0607163510001546-Striker-.name: You're the famed Gray Wolf. Look, let me give you some advice: watch your back.

0607163510001548-Striker-.name: Think of it as a professional courtesy. Your name has been off and on our hit list for some time now.

0607163510001549-Striker-.name: Are you going to come after me, then?

0607163510001550-Striker-.name: Not me, no. I'm not foolish enough to tangle with the Gray Wolf. By the way, I never thought you'd come out of the shadows. That's a fascinating development.

0806014810001673-SoulBinder-.name: What, do you want to hire me?

0806014810001675-SoulBinder-.name: That depends. There are many things I need to consider, such as how much money you can afford.

0806014810001676-SoulBinder-.name:
You can't hire me for just any sum.
Whom do you want me to take care of, anyway? What's the <font color="#ffd200">name</font>?

0806014810001678-SoulBinder-.name: ...I'm going to pretend that I didn't hear that. He's one of the greats.

0831180610000341--.name: Ah, a fellow walker of the shadows. If you've made it this far, you should know there's no point helping those who can't help themselves. But you're not weak, are you? Well then, ask me your question.

0831180610000345--.name: If you want to survive in the shadows, you need to blend in $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ has some equipment that should work for you. Gear up, and never let them see you coming.

0831180610000346--.name:
Stay alive long enough, and eventually you'll reach a new level.
That's when you get to learn new skills.
To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> and open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

0831180610000347--.name: When you're ready to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>, just press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.

0831180610000348--.name: Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.

0831180610000350--.name: $itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

0831180610000351--.name: Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently.

0831180610000352--.name: And as for $itemPlural:40100022$... You're too weak to be worrying about those.

0831180610000353--.name: This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Knight...? I suppose that's not a bad choice.

0831180610000356--.name: This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Berserker...? I suppose that's not a bad choice.

0831180610000359--.name: This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Wizard...? I suppose that's not a bad choice.

0831180610000362--.name: This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Priest...? I suppose that's not a bad choice.

0831180610000365--.name: This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're an Archer...? I suppose that's not a bad choice.

0831180610000368--.name: This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Heavy Gunner...? I suppose that's not a bad choice.

0831180610000371--.name: This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Thief...? I suppose that's not a bad choice.

1216124310001340--.name: This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Runeblade...? I suppose that's not a bad choice.

0607163510001551-Striker-.name: This place is making me uncomfortable. I mean, it's interesting, but it's not what I like.

0806014810001680-SoulBinder-.name: This place is making me uncomfortable. I mean, it's interesting, but it's not what I like.

0806020710001684-SoulBinder-.name: Talk to $npcName:11000051[gender:1]$ about a different subject.

0831180610000375--.name: I'm always ready to operate at a moment's notice. Hee, hee.

0831180610000376--.name: I don't charge a lot for my operations. I can cut you a great deal after I cut you with my scalpel. Hah!

0831180610000377--.name:
You look a right mess! How about I treat you? It'll only be a measly $paneltyPrice$ mesos.
Don't worry, I'm a real doctor!

0831180610000378--.name: You don't look like you need my help right now, but you will eventually. Oh yes, trust me on this one. Bad things happen around here all the time.

0831180610000379--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180610000380--.name: Plastic surgery is a gift, I say!

0831180610000381--.name: I can transform your entire face!

0831180610000382--.name: Imagine your ideal face! I can make it happen...

0831180610000383--.name: Oooh, $MyPCName$, I'm so glad you found me. I can work miracles! Everyone says so. Now, what did you have in mind?

0831180610000386--.name: Beautiful skin is all the rage, and I can make yours positively glow!

0831180610000387--.name: Skin is marvelous! So soft, so fleshy...

0831180610000388--.name: Hey, do you want me to help make your skin more luminous?

0831180610000389--.name: Welcome, $MyPCName$. Thinking about spicing up your look? I can give you any skin tone you like. Care to take a peek?

0831180610000392--.name: Put your trust in me, my scissors, and the wild creature within.

0831180610000393--.name: Trust my inner beast to save your hairstyles down to the very last strand!

0831180610000394--.name: A wild beast sleeps within me... a beast with perfectly styled hair.

0831180610000395--.name: Prepare your hair for the unimaginable. The wild beast in my soul will possess these scissors and summon your desired hairstyle from your memories.

0831180610000398--.name: I'd like to personally thank you for your patronage.

0831180610000399--.name: Did you have a specific style in mind?

0831180610000400--.name: $MyPCName$, how shall we style your hair today? Anything you like, just say the word.

0831180610000401--.name: Anything? Really? Well, in that case...

0831180610000403--.name: Cosmetics will bring your look to the next level.

0831180610000404--.name: Some adventurers are too busy to make time for themselves. It's a real shame.

0831180610000405--.name: Well, no, I don't carry real tattoos. Do you know how much those hurt?

0831180610000406--.name: Nothing expresses the inner YOU like carefully-selected cosmetics. How'd you like to experiment with a new look?

0831180610000410--.name: Why'd they name pigments after pigs... when ducks are the real masters of color?!

0831180610000411--.name: What's the hot color on Maple Island these days? Is it still red?

0831180610000412--.name: Did y'know? Ducks have a sharp eye for color! Least this duck does.

0831180610000413--.name: Being strong is important, but looking fabulous while you fight is the true key to happiness, y'know. So... wanna spruce up your gear?

0831180610000414--.name: Yes! I need more color in my life!

0831180610000416--.name: But you won't be able to do anything, no matter how determined you are, when you're sick.

0831180610000417--.name: This is bad. More soldiers are getting wounded by the day.

0831180610000418--.name: This area is dangerous. Please be careful.

0831180610000419--.name: Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?

0831180610000420--.name: You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.

0831180610000423--.name: Hm, you don't look wounded or ill...

0831180610000424--.name: You might look fine. But do you FEEL fine?

0831180610000425--.name: Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?

0831180610000426--.name: You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.

0831180610000428--.name: You look like you've seen some rough days.

0831180610000429--.name: I treat my patients like family.

0831180610000430--.name: Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?

0831180610000431--.name: You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.

0831180610000433--.name: Ah! Are you in need of my services?

0831180610000434--.name: You ought to take care of yourself while you're still healthy. An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure!

0831180610000435--.name: Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?

0831180610000436--.name: You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.

0831180610000437--.name: Just look at that gorgeous reflection! Can you believe that's you?

0831180610000439--.name: I've been seeing more patients these days. I wonder why...

0831180610000441--.name: I can make it all go away.

0831180610000442--.name: Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?

0831180610000443--.name: You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.

0831180610000445--.name: I've been seeing more patients lately.

0831180610000446--.name: I miss having some spare time to myself.

0831180610000447--.name: I tell you, the stress of running a hospital is enough to kill you! And then your only hope for survival depends on how well you managed the hospital!

0831180610000448--.name: Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?

0831180610000449--.name: You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.

0831180610000450--.name: What kind of item would you like today?

0831180610000453--.name:
Welcome!
$npc:11000474$ is filled with <font color="#ffd200">wondrous items</font>!

0831180610000454--.name:
Spin $npc:11000474$ for your chance to win the wondrous items!
May luck be with you, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>!

0831180610000455--.name:
You get only <font color="#ffd200">one chance to spin $npc:11000474$</font>.
Want to spin $npc:11000474$ again? Then <font color="#ffd200">find another hat</font>!

0831180610000456--.name: This might sound crazy, but if you come across a hat in a field, don't hesitate to throw yourself inside of it! You heard me!

0831180610000457--.name: What kind of item would you like today?

0831180610000460--.name:
Congratulations, you're a winner!
You get to draw a <font color="#ffd200">wondrous item</font>!

0831180610000461--.name:
Come on, spin the roulette for your chance to win amazing items!
May luck be with you, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>!

0831180610000462--.name:
You get only <font color="#ffd200">one chance to spin $npc:11000475$</font>.
Want to spin again? Then you'll have to win again!

0831180610000463--.name:
I hope you come back and win again soon!
Have a lucky journey!

0831180610000464--.name: <font color="#909090">(The altar has faded letters written on it.)</font>

0831180610000466--.name: Shadow World is an angry land... Where no blessing upon anyone can make any difference.

0831180610000467--.name: Lo, if you are one who thirsts for blood, will you absorb the wrathful energy and rid yourself of $skill:70000029$?

0831180610000470--.name: The wrathful shadows have devoured every one of your blessings and taken over your mind. Now, you see that friendship is a myth, and everyone is your enemy!

0831180610000471--.name: In the end, nothing can truly shield you from reality.

0831180610000472--.name: <font color="#909090">(Reading the words on the altar, Turka's anger is almost palpable.)</font>

0831180610000473--.name: And... that's another sword fresh off the grinding stone! What a beaut. This will make for one happy customer... Oh hi there, can I help you?

0831180610000474--.name: Hm, I'm almost out of silica sand... I'll need to get more before doing this week's welds.

0831180610000475--.name: I've been standing all day over a hot forge!

0831180610000476--.name: You just leave the enchanting to me.

0831180610000477--.name: And... that's another sword fresh off the grinding stone! What a beaut. This will make for one happy customer... Oh hi there, can I help you?

0323154410001454--.name: Ah now, let me guess... You want to enchant your gear? Let's have a look, then!

0323154410001455--.name: How about we change some bonus attributes?

0831180610000480--.name: Isn't it obvious? I'm a blacksmith! The best one there is, too. Well, on this street.

0831180610000481--.name: The thing is that <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000076$</font> is absolutely lousy with craftsmen and women. This is the heart of the blacksmithing trade for Maple World, and that makes competition fierce. But that competition is inspiring for people like me. I learn a lot from my peers, and I relate to people who are willing to pour their heart and soul into their work.

0831180610000482--.name: You're not here to talk about me though, are you? You need your gear tuned up, I'm your woman. All I need are the right materials, and I'll work my magic. You know what I'm talking about, right? $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$, all produced in $map:2000051$, usually.

0831180610000483--.name: <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> come from <font color="#ffd200">dismantling</font> gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the <font color="#ffd200">Dismantle</font> button in your inventory window. As for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100024$</font>, you'll need to dismantle gear that is rated Epic or better.

0831180610000484--.name: People compete for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> in the <font color="#ffd200">Personal Arena</font>, so you could go there. If you think you can win, that is...

0831180610000485--.name: By the way, Elliana got ahold of yet another strange weapon, and she's been begging me to enchant it for her. I told her such flashy, impractical weapons like that can't be enchanted, but she doesn't listen. Why can't she just accept that only items marked as "Can be Enchanted" can, well, be enchanted?

0323154410001457--.name: That's not all! Aside from functioning as weaponry or armor, high-grade gear grants special abilities. But there's a catch: These abilities are completely random! If you would prefer gear that better suits your needs, I can help you modify it as you like.

0323154410001458--.name: This is a new service we blacksmiths provide, thanks to a breakthrough out of the research center in $map:02000270$. Those eggheads figured out how to refine meteoric ores into these $itemPlural:40100026$ that I can use to change the chemical properties in your gear.

0323154410001459--.name: Now, don't get your hopes all the way up. $itemPlural:40100026$ are tricky to work with, so I might not be able to get all the bonuses on your item to exactly what you want. I also need $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100002$, $itemPlural:40100003$, or $itemPlural:40100021$ to work with, and that's up to you to get.

0330140410001950-EnchantExpansion01-.name: Everyone knows I'm the best smith... on this street.

0330140410001951-EnchantExpansion01-.name: Great artisans are a dime-a-dozen in $map:2000076$. This is the place to be if you aim to make a living at crafting. It makes competition fierce, sure, but that only forces me to push myself harder. And it's kind of inspirational, being around all these people who live for their craft.

0330140410001952-EnchantExpansion01-.name: Anyway, if you want to strengthen your equipment, come to me. Just remember that you'll need to bring some special materials. You probably know which ones... the $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$ that $map:2000051$ is so famous for.

0330140410001953-EnchantExpansion01-.name: You can get $itemPlural:40100023$ by dismantling gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the Dismantle button in your inventory window. As for $itemPlural:40100024$, that comes at a much higher cost. It only comes from dismantling gear that is epic or better.

0330140410001954-EnchantExpansion01-.name: People compete for $itemPlural:40100023$ in the Personal Arena, so you could go there. If you think you can win, that is...

0330140410001955-EnchantExpansion01-.name: By the way, Elliana got ahold of yet another strange weapon, and she's been begging me to enchant it for her. I told her such flashy, impractical weapons like that can't be enchanted, but she doesn't listen. Why can't she just accept that only items marked as "Can be Enchanted" can, well, be enchanted?

0330140410001956-EnchantExpansion01-.name: That's not all! Aside from functioning as weaponry or armor, high-grade gear imparts special abilities. But there's a catch: these abilities are completely random! If you would prefer gear that better suits your needs, I can help you modify the gear.

0330140410001957-EnchantExpansion01-.name: Have you heard about $itemPlural:40100026$? They were invented by those eggheads in $map:02000270$. I hear they're made from real meteors! With a material like that, I can change the bonus attributes on a piece of gear.

0330140410001958-EnchantExpansion01-.name: It's not some magic bullet, of course. There's no telling what new attribute you'll wind up with. And don't forget, I also need $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100002$, $itemPlural:40100003$, or $itemPlural:40100021$ to go with the $itemPlural:40100026$.

0323154410001460--.name: Do you want to change the bonus attributes on your gear? Then pick an item to change! Just remember that it needs to be epic or better armor and accessories at level 50 and above.

0323154410001461--.name: So you want to change the bonus attributes on this gear, eh? Sounds good to me! Hey, why the anxious look on your face? If you don't like the new attributes, you can always keep the old ones, and then just try to change them again.

0323154410001462--.name:
I understand you want to change the bonus attributes on your gear, but I can't help you if you don't have the materials, Silly!
Come back when you've got the right stuff, yeah?

0323154410001463--.name:
Okay, then! See if you like any of these new attributes. 
You can choose anything you like. If you don't choose anything, then the new attributes will automatically overwrite the old ones. Choose carefully!

0323154410001464--.name: How do you feel about the change of attributes? Overjoyed? Devastated? Ready to sue me? I hope not, ha ha! But seriously, if you're not happy, you can always try to change the attributes again. I'll be here. Just bring the materials!

0323154410001465--.name: Oh, wow. This gear is a little above my pay grade. Could I help you with anything less advanced?

0831180610000486--.name: Okay, let's see the gear you want to enchant. I'm warning you now, it has to be marked with "Can be Enchanted."

0831180610000487--.name: Hm, it is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.

0831180610000488--.name:
You didn't forget that enchanting gear requires materials, did you? 
The <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is available for purchase from gear merchants and supply merchants. 
You can get the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> by <font color="#ffd200">dismantling</font> gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the <font color="#ffd200">Dismantle</font> button in your inventory window.
As for the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100024$</font>, that comes at a much higher cost. It only comes from dismantling gear that is epic or better.

0608143810002127--.name: Hey, now. If you want to enchant anything to +11 or better, you're going to need a spare piece of gear or two. Enchantments at this level take a little sacrifice. That said, I hear there's an item out there that will let you enchant without a sacrifice...

0608143810002126--.name: You're really going to try it? Remember, you can't increase your chances of success past 30% using the same gear.

0608190510002180--.name: You want to go for an even higher level? I understand you don't want to fail, but you need to face reality! With the current technology, it's impossible to increase the success rate more than this!

0608190510002181--.name: You want to go for an even higher level? I understand you don't want to fail, but you need to face reality! With the current technology, it's impossible to increase the success rate more than this!

0831180610000492--.name:
Wow! This is Legendary! Where did you get it?
I see gear from all over the world every day, but nothing like this. This is something truly special.

0831180610000493--.name:
Whoa, this is a legendary item.
I can't compensate you for anything that happens to such a valuable piece, so you need to be willing to assume all risk.

0608144010002126--.name: Ascendant gear?! Whoa! This is my chance to prove my skills!

0831180610000494--.name: This has never been enchanted, not even once. You'll be very happy when you see how much better I can make it.

0831180610000495--.name: You've never tried to enchant this gear? Just wait till you see what I can do with it!

0831180610000496--.name: Never-enchanted gear? That's great. It should be really easy to enchant this gear for the first time.

0831180610000497--.name:
This gear... Have I really failed in enchanting it 100 times?
Gee. This hurts my pride. But you know what a blacksmith with real grit would do? Not give up! So let's try it again, this time with more experience and wiser minds, yeah?

0831180610000498--.name:
But you've already tried to enchant this gear 100 times, and it's been a failure each and every time.
You're going to ask me to enchant it no matter what I say, aren't you? Wow, you're stubborner than I am. 
All right, no guarantees it'll work, but here goes!

0831180610000499--.name:
Have you really tried and failed to enchant this gear 1,000 times? I can't believe it! I thought I was stubborn, but I have nothing on you.
Maybe all of us craftspeople on this street should give you an award for Best Customer.

1016160210001162--.name: Hm, it is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.

0212164210001435--.name: Hm, it is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.

0831180610000524--.name:
I can't enchant this.
I could hone my enchanting skills for the next hundred years, and I still wouldn't be able to do it. This gear is just too strong. You should be satisfied with it as it is.

0831180610000525--.name: I know you're the type who likes to rise to any challenge, but even you and your gear have limits. And sometimes, it's wiser to quit than to try to push things past their natural limit.

1016160210001179--.name: I can't enchant this gear any further. It's so unstable that it could blow up the whole street if I fail. You'll need to find someone with more expertise.

1016160210001180--.name:
I understand you want to make your gear stronger.
But some things just can't be done.
It's already at a level that would scare away most blacksmiths.
Don't get greedy.

1016160210001181--.name: Yes, I remember how happy you were last time, totally ignoring all logic and tempting fate. It seemed insane, but I have to admit... it was an incredible day for me... But look, as glorious as that was, I can't enchant this item any further! By golly, I'd need another decade of practice, at the very least!

0831180610000501--.name: Put your mind at ease. Only another earthquake could make me fail at this simple of an enchantment.

0831180610000502--.name: Don't worry, I could do this with one hand tied behind my back. In fact, I could do a lot of smithing one-handed if I could just find someone to be my striker! Interested? Okay, okay, I can see you just want the enchantment... let's do this, then.

0831180610000503--.name: This enchantment will be so easy, it would actually be more difficult to fail than to succeed! You'd be foolish to pass up on those odds, I'd say.

0831180610000504--.name: There's very little chance of error when the enchantment is this simple. Want me to give it a try?

0831180610000505--.name: Enchanting this gear will be a little tricky, but certainly not impossible. It's up to you, but I'd say the risk is well worth the potential reward.

0831180610000506--.name:
This will be a piece of cake.
Just believe in me a little!

0831180610000507--.name: Let's see... this gear has only been enchanted a handful of times, so I shouldn't have too much trouble with it... as long as you don't distract me!

0831180610000508--.name: I should be able to enchant this gear safely, as long as you don't distract me with incessant chatting or stares, so find something to occupy yourself while I'm working.

0831180610000509--.name: Due to previous enchantments, there's some risk if you want me to enchant this gear. But still, there's a much greater chance that I will succeed. It's up to you.

0831180610000510--.name: Good news! Even though this item has been enchanted multiple times, it's still pretty stable. There's a chance that the new enchantment could go wrong, but that comes with the territory. It's your call.

0831180610000511--.name: There's an elevated chance of failure if I enchant this item, but it's not so high to really worry me. If it doesn't worry you either, go ahead and press the Enchant button.

0831180610000512--.name: I'm pretty confident about this. And don't worry; if it doesn't work, you can always try again!

0831180610000513--.name: I'm going to give it a go, now. And hey, if I mess up, you can always try again!

0831180610000514--.name: This is just too easy. Check it out!

0831180610000515--.name: To +7, huh? Shouldn't be too hard. Hand it over!

0831180610000516--.name: This gear is a little delicate, but I'll use some finesse, and it should be fine.

0831180610000517--.name: Peachy never fails because she goes hog-wild with the materials. I'm more reasonable about it, but it means I might fail from time to time. It's a trade-off, you see.

0831180610000518--.name: You know, the chances of successful enchantment for this piece are lower than I'd like, but I'll do it if you want me to.

0831180610000519--.name: This gear is within my ability to enchant, sure. But the chance of failure is a bit high, and I'm telling you that when other blacksmiths won't, because they're not as honest. So, do what you will with that information.

1016160210001165--.name:
Think carefully. Your chances at enchanting this gear are pretty low.
I mean, sure, you can always try again in the event of failure, but that'll cost another batch of materials.

1016160210001166--.name: Anything under +9 is easy. There's nothing to worry about at those levels.

0608144010002127--.name: You want to try a +10 enchant? Ooookay, but don't say I didn't warn you. The success rate is none too pretty, if you know what I mean.

0608144010002128--.name: Hey, +10 is already pretty snazzy. Are you sure you really want to push it?

0608144010002129--.name: +10 is decent. Do you really need to enchant this further? You're really gonna go for it, aren't you?

0608144010002130--.name: You've been lucky so far. To make it all the way to +11? Psh, I know so many folks who'd love to be in your shoes. But hey, you're the boss.

0608144010002131--.name: You're really going to try it? If it fails, you're going to lose all the material items. You get that, right?

0608144010002132--.name: +12 is already amazing, but you're pushing even further? You're braver than I am, that's for sure.

0608144010002133--.name: Whoa, are you sure you really want to keep pushing? +12 is already amazing!

0608144010002134--.name: Whoooooa, you're going for +14? I can't tell if you're a fool or an idiot. Hahaha, but sure, we can give it a shot.

0608144010002135--.name: Now let's just take a moment here, calm down, and think about this. Your chances of failure during the next enchantment are dangerously high. It would be absurd to keep going. Don't you realize a failure means you'll have to get the same equipment all over again? Think about this.

0608144010002136--.name: No, this is crazy. I'm not going to do it, no matter what you say. I'm a blacksmith, and I hate to see good gear wasted.

0608144010002137--.name: You want to try for +15... Have you completely lost your mind? No one with a shred of conscience would try this! To risk harming gear that's already so strong... Please take my advice and be satisfied with this gear as it is... which is fantastic, by the way!

0831180610000529--.name: The truth about enchanting gear is that it requires both skill and luck.

0831180610000530--.name:
Blacksmithing is tough, but fascinating.
When I look into the flames, I feel like I'm God.

1123232210001227-Peachy01-.name: Do you have all the materials? Just remember, you're spending extra materials for a guaranteed result! I hope that motivates you, hehe.

1123232210001228-Peachy01-.name: I require a lot of materials, true... but I also never fail.

1123232210001229-Peachy01-.name: You may need to invest extra time and effort to use my services, but I never ever fail.

1123232210001230-Peachy01-.name: For my method of enchanting, you get what you put in! It costs more materials, sure, but it's guaranteed success!

1123232210001231-Peachy01-.name: Don't be intimidated by the material requirements... Think about the end result: guaranteed enchantment!

1123232210001232-Peachy01-.name: True, I ask for a lot of materials, but isn't it worth it?

1123232210001233-Peachy01-.name: I can enchant your gear as many times as you like, as long as you have all the materials.

1123232210001234-Peachy01-.name: I know other blacksmiths don't require as many materials as I do, but they fail in their work sometimes. I don't.

1123232210001235-Peachy01-.name: I know I require a lot of materials, but that's the price of quality, hehe.

1123232210001236-Peachy01-.name: My service costs more, but you get that you pay for! Bad luck never gets in my way!

1123232210001237-Peachy01-.name: I know some folks enjoy the thrill of a good deal. Just remember: my method allows me to enchant your gear with guaranteed success.

1123232210001238-Peachy01-.name: It'll be worth the material cost, I promise!

1123232210001239-Peachy01-.name: From now on, I'll need even more materials. You might want to mentally prepare yourself, hehe.

1123232210001240-Peachy01-.name: Yes, I require a lot of materials, but remember... the enchantment I offer is fail-safe.

1123232210001241-Peachy01-.name: Don't try to max out your gear's enchantment level all at once. It'd be too overwhelming.

1123232210001242-Peachy01-.name: $MyPCName$, I know it takes a lot of time and effort to gather so many materials, but once you have them, I promise to successfully enchant your gear. Hehe.

1123232210001243-Peachy01-.name: You're going to try for +14? That will take a lot of materials! I can do it, sure, but it'll be quite a bit of work, hehe.

1123232210001244-Peachy01-.name: Do you think you'll be able to gather all the materials? It's really quite a lot!

1123232210001245-Peachy01-.name: I can enchant gear as many times as you want, as long as you have enough materials. But I have to say, enchanting to +15 requires many, many materials. +14 is already very strong, isn't it?

1123232210001246-Peachy01-.name: +15... now that makes me nervous. I mean, reaching +15 has always been my dream, but it requires so very many materials. You can't possibly have all of them, can you?

1123232210001247-Peachy01-.name: I could practice enchanting for the next hundred years and still wouldn't be able to enchant this piece of gear. It's already so strong!

1123232210001248-Peachy01-.name: Challenges are what make life interesting, but some challenges can't be overcome, and this is simply one of them.

1123232210001249-Peachy01-.name: I can't enchant this gear any further. It's so unstable that it could blow up the whole street if I fail.

1123232210001250-Peachy01-.name: +15 gear really exists! Amazing! Hehe, you realize that no blacksmith in the world can enchant this piece any further, don't you? I'd be happy to help you with other pieces of gear, though.

1123232210001251-Peachy01-.name: This piece of gear is already strong. I don't think I can make it any stronger...

1123232210001252-Peachy01-.name: Enchanting gear requires precise skill and tons of practice.

1123232210001253-Peachy01-.name: Blacksmithing makes me smile. Nothing beats working over a flame!

1123232210001254-Peachy01-.name:
Sure, it'd be great if enchantments never failed.
But then again, that would make us blacksmiths go broke! Ha, ha!

1123232210001255-Peachy01-.name: It worked! Hehe, it always works! But it still makes me so happy every single time.

1123232210001256-Peachy01-.name: Hehe, see? I told you the enchantment would go great!

1123232210001257-Peachy01-.name: Success! Yes! Hehe. I hope you enjoyed my services!

1123232210001258-Peachy01-.name: Success! You provided lovely materials. Nicely done!

1123232210001259-Peachy01-.name: Hehehe, I'm not bad,right? See you again soon!

1123232210001260-Peachy01-.name: Hehe, nice, right? I hope we can work together again soon!

1123232210001261-Peachy01-.name: Your gear has reached +10! Hey, you've earned it with your determination and courage in taking risks!

1123232210001262-Peachy01-.name: Thank you for all your hard work, $MyPCName$!

1123232210001263-Peachy01-.name: How did you gather so many materials? Incredible!

1123232210001264-Peachy01-.name: I can't believe you gathered all of these materials. Very impressive!

1123232210001265-Peachy01-.name: I will certainly remember you, $MyPCName$. Few people could have done what you did.

1123232210001266-Peachy01-.name: Am I dreaming? Is this really happening? I always thought +15 was impossible, but we really did it!

1123232210001267-Peachy01-.name: I hope you're happy with my service, hehe! Come again!

1123232210001268-Peachy01-.name: All in a day's work, hehe.

1123232210001269-Peachy01-.name: Uh-oh. It seems the ratio of $item:40100023$ was off, and it decreased your gear's enchantment level by one. I'm sorry; I misjudged the carbon content in your gear. I'll take responsibility for this one.

1123232210001270-Peachy01-.name: I knew the $item:40100023$ was unstable, but I never thought it would decrease the gear's enchantment level... I'mso, so sorry, but at least it only decreased by one.

1123232210001271-Peachy01-.name: Um... well, the bad news is the enchantment failed. The good news is it could have been much worse.

1123232210001272-Peachy01-.name: Oh, the enchantment failed. It's not our fault... Whoever made this gear didn't case-harden it enough, so it's random chance whether it can tolerate enchantments.

1123232210001273-Peachy01-.name: Oops, I thought this would be easy...

1123232210001274-Peachy01-.name: I promise, this only happens once in a blue moon, and it's just random bad luck that it was your gear it happened to.

0215183810001440-Peachy01-.name:
Oh, geez, I damaged your gear during the attempt! I'm... I'm sorry! Maybe I'm in the wrong line of work...
 Look, I managed to save this $item:40100025$. Please, take it. At least if you collect enough of those, you could find some use for them.

1123232210001275-Peachy01-.name:
Aww... I was full of dread when I started, and I was right to be so.
Your gear couldn't handle the pressure of the enchantment, and it got damaged. 
Its enchantment effects will reset in 10 days.
And I'm sorry, but now it can never be enchanted again.

0212164210001438-Peachy01-.name:
Ah, the enchantment failed! 
Well, at least your gear wasn't damaged. You got lucky this time, $MyPCName$. Please think carefully before you try another enchantment! It would be risky for your gear.

1123232210001277-Peachy01-.name: This item is... difficult for me. Is there a different piece I could help you with?

1123232210001278-Peachy01-.name: I'm so sorry! I'm swamped! Never been so busy in my life. I'm working on a special order, you see.

1123232210001282-Peachy01-.name: I love the work that I do. There's nothing more satisfying than using my wrench to tinker with gear or banging metal into shape in front of a hot forge.

1123232210001283-Peachy01-.name: If you need to strengthen your equipment, come to me! You'll have to gather the materials: $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$.

1123232210001284-Peachy01-.name: You can get $itemPlural:40100023$ by dismantling level 20 or higher gear. Just use the Dismantle button in your inventory window. As for $itemPlural:40100024$, they'll only come from dismantling gear that's epic or better.

1123232210001285-Peachy01-.name: People also compete for $itemPlural:40100023$ at the Maple Arena, if that's something you're interested in.

1123232210001286-Peachy01-.name: Some customers desire for me to enchant low level gear, but it's simply not worth the time. I only enchant items marked as "Can be Enchanted."

1123232210001287-Peachy01-.name: I'd love to help you, but for now I have to focus on this special order I've got. I'll take especially good care of you if you come back later, I promise.

0831180610000583--.name: One day, I'll be a hotshot adventurer, too.

0624180010002188-EnchantTransform01-.name: Do you have old enchanted equipment you don't need anymore? I'll turn it into a scroll so you can transfer the enchantment to your new gear!

0831180610000857--.name:
This <font color="#ffd200">Guild Lounge</font> is for members only.
Did you have a question?

0831180610000860--.name:
A guild is an alliance of like-minded heroes.
$npc:11000075[gender:1]$ encourages heroes to form guilds, so they can all benefit from each other's talents.

0831180610000861--.name: How does one create a guild?

0831180610000862--.name:
The Guild Lounge is a special space for members only. 
It <font color="#ffd200">sells a variety of items for guild members</font>.

0831180610000863--.name: But even if you're in a guild, you might not be able to buy items. For that, your particular guild has to have the right.

0831180610000864--.name: Whether a guild has the right depends on its number of Guild Trophies. Guild Trophies are the combined Hero Trophies of everyone in the guild.

0831180610000865--.name: Each item sold at the Guild Lounge <font color="#ffd200">requires a different number of Guild Trophies</font>. So it's beneficial to have as many Trophies as possible at all times.

0831180610000866--.name: How does one create a guild?

0831180610000867--.name:
Press <font color="#ffd200">G</font>, and a window will open where you can create a guild.
Each new guild requires approval from the palace, and that costs <font color="#ffd200">5,000 mesos</font>.

0831180610000868--.name: If you want to enter the <font color="#ffd200">Guild Lounge</font>, then please create or join a guild.

0831180610000869--.name:
Welcome, $MyPCName$.
It's an honor.
Would you like to enter the Guild Lounge?

0831180610000871--.name: Only members can use the Guild Lounge.

0831180610000872--.name:
I hope you enjoyed your stay.
Would you like to leave the Guild Lounge now?

0831180610000878--.name: You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
