<font color="#909090">(She stares at you for a long moment.)</font>
Please step aside. I have a mess to clean up.

0831180509000686--.name: Of course. Enjoy your visit with $OwnerName$.

0831180509000687--.name: I see. Then I'll let you get to it.

0831180509000688--.name: You didn't break it. I did. Don't worry about it.

0831180509000689--.name: It's all right. $OwnerName$ won't get upset over something so trivial.

0831180509000694--.name: I knew you had to return home soon.

0831180509000705--.name: Mm... How may I help you?

0831180509000707--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000708--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000710--.name: Very well. I was just taking a break.

0831180509000711--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000712--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000714--.name: Oh, I didn't see you there. I was just... thinking. What can I do for you?

0831180509000715--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000716--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000719--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000720--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000722--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000723--.name: Very well. I was just taking a break.

0831180509000724--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000725--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000727--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000728--.name: Oh, I didn't see you there. I was just... thinking. What can I do for you?

0831180509000729--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000730--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000732--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000733--.name: Hm, my paycheck, huh? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509000736--.name:
You're paying me early. $OwnerName$, you like to get things done efficiently, don't you. You're my favorite kind of boss.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles softly.)</font>

0831180509000737--.name:
Here I was, thinking our time together was about to come to an end. I guess not.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>

0831180509000738--.name:
I thought our contract had expired, though I suppose if you're that desperate to keep me, I can serve you for a little longer.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>

0831180509000739--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>
You've changed your mind? I won't say I'm happy, but I will agree to renew our contract. My own plans will be put on hold for a little longer.

0831180509000740--.name: It doesn't matter to me, but our contract expires soon. I just want you to know you'll have to pay me if you want me to continue working for you.

0831180509000741--.name: Our relationship is strictly business. We don't have to get emotional.

0831180509000742--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000743--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000745--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000747--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000748--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000750--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000751--.name: Keep bothering me, and I might just tie you to a pole.

0831180509000752--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000753--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000755--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000756--.name:
Why, aren't you mischievous, $OwnerName$!
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles softly.)</font>

0831180509000757--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000758--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000760--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000761--.name: This is not the amount we agreed upon. I know you're too smart to attempt to pull a fast one on me, $OwnerName$...

0831180509000762--.name:
Tsk, $OwnerName$. You've already paid me for the month. Perhaps I should've just accepted the mesos. It would have been delightful to see you in tears later. 
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles softly.)</font>

0831180509000763--.name: I don't think so. I'm no longer your servant, unless you've changed your mind...? Even so, I doubt you have the funds to pay me right now.

0831180509000764--.name: What have you done? I don't understand how this happened.

0831180509000765--.name: What are you doing? Don't you know that our contract has expired?

0831180509000766--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000767--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000769--.name: I have no more business with you.

0831180509000770--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000771--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000774--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000775--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000777--.name: We had a business arrangement. That does not make us friends. Our contract has expired. You can't expect me to work for you and get nothing in return.

0831180509000778--.name: We had a business arrangement. That does not make us friends. Our contract has expired. Get it? Then leave me alone.

0831180509000780--.name: I'd prefer not to share personal details of my life with you.

0831180509000781--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000782--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000784--.name: You're quite thick-headed sometimes, aren't you?

0831180509000785--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000786--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000788--.name: If you don't wish to employ me, why keep me around in your house? What are you up to?

0831180509000789--.name:
I'm not sure what you're thinking, but our contract has expired. Or... was there something besides your house that you wanted me to take care of? If so, I don't think you can handle it.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>

0831180509000790--.name: Now that our contract has expired, I'm no longer obligated to chat with you. Well, well. It's been a long time since someone has thrown me such a dirty look.

0831180509000793--.name: Knowing more about me won't change anything between us.

0831180509000794--.name: Please let me focus on my work.

0831180509000795--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000796--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000798--.name: Please let me focus on my work.

0831180509000799--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000800--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000802--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000803--.name: Tell me. I'm at your service... for now.

0831180509000805--.name: I don't feel so good. I'm sick.

0831180509000808--.name: I wasn't aware chit chat was part of my job description.

0831180509000810--.name: I don't feel so good. I'm sick.

0831180509000813--.name: Shouldn't you be talking to someone who actually cares?

0831180509000815--.name: I don't feel so good. I'm sick.

0831180509000819--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000820--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000822--.name: Keep bothering me, and I might just tie you to a pole.

0831180509000823--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000824--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000826--.name:
Why, aren't you mischievous, $OwnerName$!
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles softly.)</font>

0831180509000827--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000828--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000830--.name: A servant is here to take care of your house, not to be your personal slave.

0831180509000831--.name: Why are you giving me that look? It's all written clearly in the contract.

0831180509000832--.name: What did I do that was so bad?

0831180509000833--.name: I'm sorry. I'll stop. I promise.

0831180509000834--.name: You forgot your potions when you left the house last week and made me deliver them. All the way to $map:02000216$, no less!

0831180509000835--.name: Don't feign ignorance. You're not that dumb. Now, I have work the requires my complete focus, so please don't speak to me.

0831180509000836--.name:
That sheepish expression you're making right now... Surprisingly, I don't despise it.
<font color="#909090">(He gives a soft chuckle.)</font>

0831180509000837--.name: Hmm. A surprisingly sensible response. I didn't expect that from you.

0831180509000838--.name: Why are you furrowing your brows at me? Do you think I'm going to steal something?

0831180509000839--.name: That's something all my previous employers had in common. They always wanted to know what I was up to.

0831180509000840--.name: What about you, $OwnerName$? Do you think I'm hiding something?

0831180509000841--.name: You have to admit you give off a suspicious aura.

0831180509000843--.name: You're no better than the rest of them. If you don't trust me, you don't need to employ me.

0831180509000844--.name: Heh, but you'll never unravel the truth, no matter how much you try.

0831180509000845--.name: You sure about that? I doubt you'd say that if you knew who I really am...

0831180509000846--.name:
You say that, yet I see the doubt in your eyes. Speaking of which, $OwnerName$, I never knew your eyes had such sparkle. Oops, almost said something I'd regret later.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles softly.)</font>

0831180509000847--.name: Strangers barge into your home several times a day. It doesn't feel safe. We should install locks on the doors.

0831180509000848--.name: Don't give me that look, $OwnerName$. I'm not trying to do anything unsightly behind locked doors.

0831180509000849--.name: There's just... something I want to study in peace and quiet. It doesn't concern you.

0831180509000850--.name: We need some music to liven things up around here. What? I like listening to music, just like everyone else.

0831180509000851--.name: Let's see... Judging by how you've decorated your home, it seems you have quite elegant taste, $OwnerName$. Let's play some jazz.

0831180509000852--.name: That's also my favorite genre of music. Which reminds me, there's a pretty famous musician who hangs out in $map:02000076$. Maybe I should ask for an autograph.

0831180509000853--.name: You're sick? With what? ...You have no fever. Your heart rate is normal.

0831180509000854--.name: Ah, you're pretending, aren't you? All right, I'll feign ignorance just this once. Come over here and lie down.

0831180509000855--.name: You were bitten by a $npcName:21000023$? Come here. Let me take a look...

0831180509000856--.name: Ah, this is bad. It's hard to treat rabies. I'm sorry, but there's nothing I can do that will make a difference  at this point.

0831180509000857--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>
Look at you, about to burst into tears.

0831180509000858--.name: I was joking. Now, come over here. A little bit of iodine, and you'll be as good as new.

0831180509000859--.name: Where does it hurt? Show me.

0831180509000860--.name: ...Why would you lie about being sick? $OwnerName$, you're hopeless.

0831180509000861--.name: ...Again? Please stop acting like a child.

0831180509000862--.name: You shouldn't make things up and make others worry about you. It's not kind.

0831180509000863--.name: Am I going to have to scold you? Because if you pull this again, I will.

0831180509000864--.name: I don't like talking about myself. It's not a problem, because I have no friend to talk to anyway.

0831180509000865--.name: At least, not any more. My only friend passed away a long time ago.

0831180509000866--.name: He got into an accident... Actually, it's not of your business, really.

0831180509000867--.name: The story of how I learned alchemy is quite uninteresting.

0831180509000868--.name: I met a grungy old beggar in $map:02000051$. He was rather fastidious and pompous for a beggar.

0831180509000869--.name: But something about him seemed... powerful.

0831180509000870--.name: When there's something I want, nothing can get in my way. I told him I wanted to learn how to beg, and he taught me. In the meantime, I stood at his side and learned his alchemy secrets over his shoulder.

0831180509000871--.name: And look at me now. I'm as good an alchemist as he is.

0831180509000872--.name: Do you know what I fear the most? Death.

0831180509000873--.name: Everyone fears death, and just about everyone succumbs to death eventually.

0831180509000874--.name: But not me. I'm going to beat death, just like I've beaten everything else...

0831180509000875--.name: You've heard me mention my friend, have you not? He was the only person I could really talk to.

0831180509000876--.name: He's no longer here. He may not actually be dead. Instead, he's... in another world.

0831180509000877--.name: He and I ventured in the Shadow World when we were young. We got separated after a while.

0831180509000878--.name: We shouldn't have been there at all, but we were dumb and reckless. When I came to, he was gone. I wouldn't had made it at all if I hadn't met those merchants...

0831180509000879--.name: I may not be able to do much, but once in a while, I venture into the Shadow World to search for him. But I haven't heard a word, not even a rumor. Perhaps it's time to just let him go...

0831180509000880--.name: Who are you? You should leave while I'm still in a pleasant mood.

0831180509000881--.name: Yeah, okay, I'm out of here.

0831180509000882--.name: Oh, yeah? What happens when you're unpleasant?

0831180509000883--.name: What's your sign? Can I get your number?

0831180509000884--.name: Smart. The exit is that way.

0831180509000885--.name: Good... Now, to return to my task...

0831180509000886--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles darkly.)</font>
Do you really want to find out?

0831180509000887--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He smiles.)</font>
Simple. I don't let you leave.

0831180509000888--.name: Not funny. Now get out of here.

0831180509000889--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He smirk.)</font>
Sorry, $male:pal,female:lady$, you're not my type.

0831180509000891--.name: Don't ask for things I can't do.

0831180509000892--.name: We really need to get some locks...

0831180509000894--.name: Welcome back. I have your bath drawn and ready.

0831180509000896--.name: I have no more business here.

0831180509000897--.name: Please stop trying to talk to me.

0831180509000899--.name: I will play this role, at least until my contract is up.

0831180509000900--.name: My current boss is quite a handful...

0831180509000901--.name: I'd love some time away from everyone...

0831180509000903--.name: Did I just see a cockroach?

0831180509000904--.name: It's time to throw out the trash.

0831180509000906--.name: Do you need something? Just a moment.

0831180509000907--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000908--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000910--.name: I'll listen, but make it quick.

0831180509000911--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000912--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000914--.name: Welcome. What do you need this time?

0831180509000915--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000916--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000918--.name: Do you need something? Just a moment.

0831180509000919--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000920--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000922--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000923--.name: I'll listen, but make it quick.

0831180509000924--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000925--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000927--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000928--.name: Welcome. What do you need this time?

0831180509000929--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000930--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000932--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000933--.name: My paycheck? You want to pay me now? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509000934--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509000936--.name:
Yes! I love you! You're the best! Thanks for paying me on time.
<font color="#909090">(She winks at you.)</font>

0831180509000937--.name:
Omigosh, you're paying me? Thanks!
<font color="#909090">(She squeezes you in a big hug.)</font>

0831180509000938--.name: A little late, but at least you didn't forget. I like it when people keep their promises.

0831180509000939--.name: I knew it. You just couldn't let me go, could you, $OwnerName$? You had me tricked for a second there!

0831180509000942--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000943--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000945--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000946--.name: You're still talking? All right. I'm still listening.

0831180509000947--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000948--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000950--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000951--.name: Mm? What do you want to talk about now?

0831180509000952--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000953--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000955--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000956--.name: I've got nothing more to say.

0831180509000957--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000958--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000960--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000961--.name: Why did you hire me if you can't afford me? I'm disappointed in you. I deserve better than this.

0831180509000962--.name:
I'm touched, but you've already paid me this month, and I don't offer extra services.
<font color="#909090">(She winks.)</font>

0831180509000963--.name: I've never been treated so awfully in my life! I'm really, really upset! I can't believe you!

0831180509000964--.name: Huh? What's happening? Umm... I think you should try talking to me again later.

0831180509000965--.name: Hey, you're $MaidPassedDay$ behind on my pay!

0831180509000966--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000967--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000969--.name: Hmph, I don't talk to people who don't pay me on time.

0831180509000970--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000971--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000973--.name: I'm not in the mood to talk. You know why, don't you?

0831180509000974--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000975--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000977--.name: No pay, no service. Simple as that, hon.

0831180509000978--.name: You know very well I don't want to chit chat with you! You're $MaidPassedDay$ behind on my paycheck!

0831180509000979--.name: Now is not the time to be checking out my profile...

0831180509000980--.name: Do you even know owe me money?

0831180509000981--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000982--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000984--.name: Screw it. Do whatever you want.

0831180509000985--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000986--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000988--.name: Chat? Chaaaat? How about you pay me first?

0831180509000989--.name:
Oh, welcome home, $OwnerName$! What do you need? I'll do anything!! Like the good, unpaid slave that I am.
<font color="#909090">(She gives a loud snort.)</font>

0831180509000990--.name: Now that I know what you really think of me, I don't want to talk to you. Go away.

0831180509000991--.name: What? Oh, you want me to make you a necklace?

0831180509000992--.name: What do you think? I'm good, aren't I?

0831180509000994--.name: Don't think that you can probe the depths of my soul. Hmph.

0831180509000995--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000996--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000998--.name: Don't think that you can probe the depths of my soul. Hmph.

0831180509000999--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001000--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001002--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001003--.name: You have questions for me? Just a moment.

0831180509001008--.name: I'm kind of busy right now, but sure. Talk away.

0831180509001013--.name: What is it? You can be a real pest sometimes, you know.

0831180509001018--.name: You're still talking? All right. I'm still listening.

0831180509001019--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001020--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001022--.name: Mm? What do you want to talk about now?

0831180509001023--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001024--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001026--.name: I've got nothing more to say.

0831180509001027--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001028--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001030--.name: I craved sweets something fierce today. You know those macaroons that are crispy on the outside and moist inside? That's what I love. My favorite flavor is rose.

0831180509001031--.name: A famous bakery opened a branch in $map:02000001$. It's not cheap, but there's always a long line outside.

0831180509001032--.name: So, while you were out, I went and— Ooops, I mean, look at this spot on the ground. I should go find the mop!

0831180509001033--.name: M-macaroons? What? Never heard of them. No idea what they are!

0831180509001035--.name: I want to try a macaroon. Got any extra?

0831180509001036--.name: Who said that? Do you have proof? Pfft, without proof, you still have to pay me!

0831180509001037--.name: What? I finished everything you asked and more. Give me a break!

0831180509001038--.name: Huh? I had no idea you liked macaroons, $OwnerName$! Here, have some! I'm so glad I bought extra! Tasty, huh?

0831180509001039--.name: Heeheehee, I guess I got caught. Here, try one. I waited hours for it!

0831180509001040--.name: Not a thing. Actually, one thing happened today: you kept interrupting me from my work!

0831180509001041--.name: Something major and tragic happened today. I broke a nail! Do you know how much it costs to get my nails this cute?

0831180509001042--.name: Aw, are you worried? Then you should know that I keep breathing in dust when I clean. Won't this stuff make me sick or something?

0831180509001043--.name: I'm not complaining! I'm just not used to this type of thing.

0831180509001044--.name: You do tend to complain a lot...

0831180509001045--.name: Don't worry. I'm used to your complaining by now.

0831180509001046--.name: Um, are you deaf? I just said I'm not complaining! I'm just not used to working as a maid! Ugh, it upsets me that you think so little of me!

0831180509001047--.name: Um, hello, I don't complain that much! You know what, I don't care what you think. You're really ticking me off!

0831180509001048--.name: Awww, are you complaining about my complaining? That's kind of cute, $OwnerName$! You're like a grumpy old bear!

0831180509001051--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She bursts out laughing.)</font>
This is why we get along so well. You're so cute when you act goofy, $OwnerName$.

0831180509001052--.name: <font color="#909090">(She pretends she can't hear you.)</font>

0831180509001053--.name: Oh no! This is bad... Where did my o-ring band go? I can't make any jewelry without it!

0831180509001054--.name: Oh, hi $OwnerName$. I'm sorry, I'm a little busy right now. I lost something.

0831180509001055--.name: Can we talk later? I'm too distracted to focus right now.

0831180509001056--.name: Oooh, what'd you lose? Is it important?

0831180509001057--.name: I'll help you look for it.

0831180509001058--.name: $OwnerName$! I just said that I'm distracted! Will you leave me alone until I find it?

0831180509001059--.name: It's something that I need to craft necklaces. You know what? That's not important right now! You're bothering me. Go away!

0831180509001060--.name: <font color="#909090">(You get down on your hands and knees, searching the ground carefully. You find a small ring and hold it up triumphantly.)</font>

0831180509001061--.name: You found it! Thank you, thank you, $OwnerName$!

0831180509001062--.name: This ring is used to hope and close the small rings used in necklaces. I can't make necklaces without it!

0831180509001063--.name: <font color="#909090">(You carefully scan the floor, diligently searching, and then...)</font>

0831180509001066--.name:
Ouch!
<font color="#909090">(She rubs her head with her palm, surprised.)</font>

0831180509001067--.name:
<font color="#909090">(Suddenly, she bursts into laughter.)</font>
Oh, $OwnerName$! You don't have to search for it that hard! Thank you for helping me. I know it'll turn up soon!

0831180509001068--.name: I was strolling through $map:02000064$ today and ran into $npc:11000711[gender:1]$. Do you know what she told me? She said I had bags under my eyes! That I looked "tired"!

0831180509001069--.name: She looks even more ragged than I do. No matter what she does, she— ah, never mind.

0831180509001070--.name: What were you going to say?

0831180509001071--.name: You're always so full of life and energy. Not tired at all.

0831180509001072--.name: Forget it. It was unkind. I never thought you were into mean gossip, $OwnerName$. I don't think that's a good look on you.

0831180509001073--.name: Why do you care? Is it because it's about $npc:11000711[gender:1]$? Are you a fan of hers? Hmph!

0831180509001074--.name: Aw, thanks! I work hard to be that way, so thank you for noticing!

0831180509001075--.name: Awww, $OwnerName$. Are you trying to sweet talk me? That's totally unlike you!

0831180509001076--.name: I'm very busy at the moment. Please do not disturb me.

0831180509001078--.name: ...Are you mad? I'm sorry, but I really don't have time for you right now.

0831180509001079--.name: I wish something amazing would happen. The days get so boring.

0831180509001080--.name: Listening to $npc:11000406[gender:0]$ singing usually helps, but not today. I'm so bored.

0831180509001081--.name: Mm... Mm? Why are you staring at me? Please... stop...

0831180509001082--.name:
<font color="#909090">($MaidName$'s cheeks are turning red.)</font>
Oh, stop. You're making me blush!

0831180509001083--.name: Stop it, $OwnerName$! You're doing it again? Are you really that helpless to resist my good looks?

0831180509001084--.name: Hey, $OwnerName$, did you know your eyes sparkle when you stare at me?

0831180509001085--.name: Stop staring. Your puppy eyes lost their charm long ago. Come now, no need to pout.

0831180509001086--.name: Fine. Let's see who can go the longest without blinking. Ready, set, go!

0831180509001087--.name: Forget it. I'm not in the mood, so stop staring at me!

0831180509001088--.name: Ugh, why would you tell such an old joke? Nobody has laughed at that joke for years!

0831180509001089--.name: This explains why you have so few friends, $OwnerName$. Tsk.

0831180509001090--.name: I'll laugh to be nice. Haha. There.

0831180509001091--.name: Please stop with the lame jokes. I'll tell you some that are actually funny.

0831180509001092--.name: First up: How do you get a tissue to dance?

0831180509001093--.name: You put a little boogie in it! Hahaha, isn't that hilarious?

0831180509001094--.name: Next up: What did the zero say to the eight?

0831180509001095--.name: Stumped? Then I'll tell you: Nice belt! Hahaha, get it?

0831180509001096--.name: Here's the last one, and it's a stumper. Don't be mad if you can't figure it out. Here goes: Why did the tomato blush?

0831180509001097--.name: You don't know, do you? Hehehe, the answer is: Because he saw the salad dressing!

0831180509001098--.name: Now those are some funny jokes. Don't tell me any more jokes unless they're funnier that those ones!

0831180509001100--.name: It's not you, $OwnerName$. I'm just really not in the mood for jokes right now.

0831180509001101--.name: I was thinking of my sister. She's the one who taught me how to make jewelry.

0831180509001102--.name: But I haven't heard from her in a long time. I don't even know where she is. Whenever I think of her, I get a pang in my heart so sharp I want to cry.

0831180509001103--.name: I'm sorry. I don't know why I'm telling you this. Forget I said anything, okay?

0831180509001105--.name: Hah! Hah! Hah! That's the funniest joke I've ever heard in my life! You're so hilarious, $OwnerName$!

0831180509001107--.name: How many times do I have to tell you? Stop telling lame jokes or you'll lose the few friends you have left!

0831180509001108--.name: If you're reading lame joke books, why don't you go out and do something productive with your life? Like buying me treats or collecting necklace materials for me? Or helping the needy or something?

0831180509001109--.name: Please just— Yikes. Um, I just realized I'm nagging at you like you're a friend. I'm sorry if I crossed a line, $OwnerName$. I just want what's best for you. You know that, right?

0831180509001110--.name: Who are you? You can't just barge in here! Did you come to see me? Still, that doesn't make this okay!

0831180509001111--.name: I'm here to see your master.

0831180509001114--.name: Oh, you're a friend of $OwnerName$? Well, make yourself at home, and try not to bother me.

0831180509001115--.name: Are you for real? And here I thought $OwnerName$ had no friends! This is amazing!!

0831180509001116--.name: Well, if you have no business here, you'd better leave. I just mopped, and I don't need the floor getting all muddy again.

0831180509001117--.name: Suuuuure. Just be honest and say you're here to talk to me. It happens all the time. I'm used to it, really.

0831180509001118--.name: I don't think we've met. Are you a member of my fan club? I know you want to see me, but you shouldn't bother me at work, you know?

0831180509001119--.name: I'm too popular for my own good. Not a day goes by without someone wanting my attention. So what do you want? My autograph?

0831180509001120--.name: Well, everything is looking pretty clean.

0831180509001121--.name: So, this is where I'll work from now on, huh?

0831180509001122--.name: I don't think I've seen you before. How may I help you?

0831180509001123--.name: Do you even know whose house this is?!

0831180509001124--.name: Where have you been? I've been waiting for you all day!

0831180509001125--.name: You can come home late once in a while, but don't make it a habit. I get lonely!

0831180509001126--.name: This is a disappointment. A big disappointment...

0831180509001127--.name: I hate being treated like this!

0831180509001130--.name: Err? I didn't know this was here.

0831180509001132--.name: I'd better start working now. Wait, I haven't done my hair.

0831180509001133--.name: Do I smell... some sweet macaroons?

0831180509001134--.name: I'll just read a few pages of this magazine while no one's looking...

0831180509001137--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001138--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001141--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001142--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001145--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001146--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001149--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001150--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001152--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001154--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001155--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001157--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001159--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001160--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001162--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001163--.name: Oh, you're giving me my paycheck. (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509001164--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509001166--.name: Hah hah, thanks! I'm happy to work for you for this month!

0831180509001167--.name: Has it been so long already? Thanks for asking me before I had to ask. I hate asking for money.

0831180509001168--.name: Ah! You don't know how long I've been waiting for this! Finally, I've got some money to spend. Hah hah!

0831180509001169--.name: Whew, I was debating whether I should cancel my savings account because I'd have nothing to put in it. Thank goodness I won't have to!

0831180509001170--.name: $OwnerName$, I was looking at the calender today and saw that our contract is expiring soon. Just wanted to let you know. No pressure or anything!

0831180509001171--.name: Then again, maybe I'm worring for nothing. Hah hah.

0831180509001172--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001173--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001175--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001176--.name: Is there anything I can do for you?

0831180509001177--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001178--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001180--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001181--.name: I want to do something fun. Any suggestions?

0831180509001182--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001183--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001185--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001186--.name: I've got too much energy. Maybe I should work out.

0831180509001187--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001188--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001190--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001191--.name: Hey, you don't have to do this right now. If you're going through a hard time, I can wait. Don't worry about it.

0831180509001192--.name: A paycheck, again? You already paid me for this month. Hm, maybe I should take it as a bonus... Hah hah hah!

0831180509001193--.name: Ah, I told you it can wait. I'm all right for now. Did you forget? I've got two jobs. I'm more worried about you, to be honest.

0831180509001194--.name: Err? What's going on? I've never been in this situation before, so I don't know what to do. Give me some time to think.

0831180509001195--.name: I wonder what the fines are for canceling a bond before it matures...

0831180509001196--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001197--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001199--.name: Anything happen today, like winning a lottery or inheriting a massive fortune?

0831180509001200--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001201--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001204--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001205--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001207--.name: Aw, man, I'd love to, but my contract expired. Gotta set some boundaries or I'll go broke, ya know?

0831180509001208--.name: Aw, but our contract just expired.  I told you to extend it ahead of time. You forgot about it, didn't you?

0831180509001209--.name: The paycheck I get from $map:02000068$ barely covers my living expenses.

0831180509001211--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001212--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001214--.name: Do you have something more to say?

0831180509001215--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001216--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001218--.name: I don't know what to say. I opened a CD account with Goldus Bank to save money for a ship, but at this rate, I might have to cancel it before it matures.

0831180509001219--.name: I thought being a butler was a stable job. I'm starting to think I was wrong. Guess nothing in life is certain...

0831180509001220--.name: Do you even have enough money to feed yourself? I also get money from $map:02000068$, so I'm not completely broke. At least I can feed myself. I'm worried that you can't.

0831180509001221--.name: Oh, a drink? Sure, what kind were ya thinking?

0831180509001222--.name: Let me know what you need!

0831180509001223--.name: About me? Sure, what do you want to know?

0831180509001225--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001226--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001229--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001230--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001232--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001233--.name: What do you want me to tell you?

0831180509001238--.name: Sure, I can tell you whatever you wanna know.

0831180509001243--.name: $OwnerName$, you don't look well. Are you sure you don't need to rest?

0831180509001248--.name: Is there anything I can do for you?

0831180509001249--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001250--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001252--.name: I want to do something fun. Any suggestions?

0831180509001253--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001254--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001256--.name: I've got too much energy. Maybe I should work out.

0831180509001257--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001258--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001260--.name: Did you eat? Here, eat this. Wait. Why is your face so gaunt?

0831180509001261--.name: Have you lost weight? This is why you shouldn't skip meals! Here, eat this.

0831180509001264--.name: Hah hah, no. Why? Do you want me to? I stay away from the kitchen. The first dish I ever made was terrible, and that scared me off.

0831180509001265--.name: Oh, this? The young lady living across the way gave it to me for helping her hammer some nails. I think she lives by herself.

0831180509001266--.name: Why are you giving me that look? I didn't ask! I just sort of got that impression.

0831180509001267--.name: I know, right? I like it, too! I helped our next door neighbor move some furniture, and his wife gave it to me. She's a great cook.

0831180509001268--.name: The lady living across from us gave this to me for helping her hang some curtains, but it doesn't taste good to me. Try it. Maybe you'll like it.

0831180509001269--.name: You hungry, $OwnerName$? How about a snack?

0831180509001270--.name: Ah, I cooked this. I had some time to kill since today was my day off. I don't know if it tastes good.

0831180509001273--.name: Oh, it doesn't? But come on, $OwnerName$. I promise it won't make you sick and I cooked it just for you. Could you just try to finish it... for me?

0831180509001274--.name: What? That can't be right. I followed the recipe so carefully! Give it to me. Let me taste it.

0831180509001275--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He takes a bite and spits it out immediately.)</font>
Yuck!! Ugh... I'm sorry...

0831180509001276--.name: Oh, really? Here, let me take a bite! Hah hah, I cooked it, but I didn't taste it. My last attempt at cooking wasn't so great. Hah hah hah...

0831180509001277--.name: Hah hah... I think I've gotten better at cooking. Maybe I should try to cook something else. I'll let you taste it when I do!

0831180509001278--.name: I don't know if I'm exhausted or have a cold. Either way, I really don't feel good. Take this. I picked it up on my way here from $map:02000068$. I brought you one because I don't want you to catch what I have.

0831180509001279--.name: It's good for your health.  If you don't want to take it now, you can take it later.

0831180509001282--.name: You're welcome. You should stay away from me until I get better. I don't want you to get sick because of me.

0831180509001283--.name: Sure. You should eat well and get plenty of rest. Ugh, being sick is the worst. It always makes me miss my parents.

0831180509001284--.name: What, are you worried about me? Hah hah, it's no big deal. I'll be all right. I just need some rest.

0831180509001285--.name: Aww, I'm feeling a bit achy... and cold too. But don't worry. I took some medicine. I'll feel better soon.

0831180509001286--.name: I picked up some food on my way here from $map:02000069$. I was so hungry when I got off my other job, I just had to eat, so I ate mine there.

0831180509001287--.name: Mrs. $npc:11000453[gender:1]$ is the best cook I know. The dish I tried was so good, I had to bring you some, too!

0831180509001290--.name: Oh, you're not? I wouldn't have bought it if you told me...

0831180509001291--.name: Huh? Why not? Don't tell me you're on a diet, because you already look perfect!

0831180509001292--.name: I know you'll love it. Come on, take a bite!

0831180509001293--.name: Hah hah, you're welcome. Watching you eat it, I want to eat it again. Can I have a bite?

0831180509001294--.name: Hah hah! Do you know what this is? It's a prize I won in an event! It pays off to be strong, ya know!

0831180509001295--.name: I've participated in so many events that I know exactly what to do to win them.

0831180509001297--.name: What kind of event did you win?

0831180509001298--.name: But... it's mine. Get your own by winning your own event.

0831180509001299--.name: Huh? No. I want to sell this and save up the money.

0831180509001300--.name: It's called $map:61000006$. I can give you a tip.

0831180509001301--.name: When you're on the path, look around carefully. You'll find moving platforms. They're the key to winning the event. I'll show them to you later.

0831180509001302--.name: I won in $map:61000004$! Have you tried it? For me, moving from one disconnected ladder to another was the biggest challenge.

0831180509001303--.name: Our upstairs neighbor moved out today. He's been a pretty good neighbor, so I helped him move his furniture.

0831180509001304--.name: He left a lot of things behind. Some of it looked pretty good, so I brought this with me. What do you think?

0831180509001305--.name: Why did you bring home trash?

0831180509001307--.name: Trash? That's harsh. Just because he didn't want this doesn't mean it's trash.

0831180509001308--.name: Haven't you heard? One man's trash is another man's treasure. It'd cost quite a lot to buy this new.

0831180509001309--.name: All it needed was a bit of dusting, and it's just like new! Where do you want me to put it?

0831180509001310--.name: Actually, it was broken in a couple spots, but I fixed it right up, and now you can't even tell! Piece of cake.

0831180509001311--.name: Hey, I picked up this $item:90000001$ on my way here from $map:02000068$. You can have it. I know it's not much.

0831180509001312--.name: I live here, too, you know. And I don't pay rent, so...

0831180509001315--.name: Huh? More? That's all I got. Sorry. And hey, maybe I'll just keep all the $item:90000001$ I find from now on, if you're going to be so ungrateful.

0831180509001316--.name: You want more? But that's all I got today. Hey, I you bring stuff I find all the time.

0831180509001317--.name: You're welcome. I'm sorry I don't have more to give you. I want to help but you know my situation. Every spare meso goes towards my new ship.

0831180509001318--.name: Ah, it's no big deal. I've got a knack for finding dropped items. I'll bring you more later.

0831180509001319--.name: Welcome. Nothing much happened today. How are you? If you're tired, go get some rest. I'll take care of the housework.

0831180509001320--.name: Oh, I found some torn clothes while folding laundry. What did you do that shredded your clothes like that? Are you sure you're not bleeding somewhere?

0831180509001321--.name: If you're hurt, don't try to hide it. Just go to the hospital. You shouldn't worry about money when you're sick. All right?

0831180509001322--.name: Well, I cleaned the house and worked out as usual. I feel off if I don't work out every day.

0831180509001323--.name: Being the captain of a ship is not easy. I have to build up my strength to sail out to sea. Things will be especially tough when the waves are high.

0831180509001324--.name: Speaking of which, $OwnerName$, how'd you like to work out with me? Health is the most important thing, after all!

0831180509001325--.name: You want something to drink? Sure, I was just working out.

0831180509001326--.name: Huh? Do I smell? Sorry. I'll take a shower after you leave.

0831180509001327--.name: We're friends, but... I don't know, I don't want to make you uncomfortable.

0831180509001328--.name: $OwnerName$, you know how it's been really windy out at sea not far from $map:02000062$? Well, it turns out the weather has been strange all over the world.

0831180509001329--.name: I went to $map:02000069$ and met $npc:11000455[gender:0]$. He told me there was a blizzard in some temperate plains and that it poured in a desert where it hasn't rained for decades.

0831180509001330--.name: Wear warm layers when you go out, so you're prepared. Me? I'm all right. I mostly stay inside, plus I'm strong because I work out every day.

0831180509001331--.name: Anyway, sometimes when I think about what you do out there, I feel, you know, upset. You know what I mean, right?

0831180509001332--.name: Have I told you about $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$? I loved "$npcName:11000444[gender:0]$'s Travels" so much I read it until the pages wore out. He's my hero!

0831180509001333--.name: I just heard that he's on Victoria Island right now! He was apparently stranded by a mysterious storm. He must be getting ready to get back on his journey by now.

0831180509001334--.name: Mm... I thought about asking him to let me tag along. "$npcName:11000444[gender:0]$'s Travels" changed my life, you know.

0831180509001335--.name: But then I thought to myself, what I really want is to be the hero of "$MaidName$'s Travels." You get what I mean?

0831180509001336--.name: There's a guy named $npcName:11000022[gender:0]$ in $map:02000062$. He always says he wants to go on an adventure, but I'm not sure if he means it.

0831180509001337--.name: I don't think he's saving money to buy a ship like I am, either. I have a feeling he's all talk.

0831180509001338--.name: Why am I talking about $npcName:11000022[gender:0]$, you ask? Because I need your opinion. Should I accept him into my crew?

0831180509001339--.name: Sigh... I can't think about adventures right now. $OwnerName$, today...

0831180509001340--.name: I had just gotten out of the shower and was wearing nothing except a towel around my waist, when someone opened the door and barged in.

0831180509001341--.name: At first, I thought it was you, but it was actually the lady from next door. Something is not right with her. I'm grateful for the food she give me sometimes, but...

0831180509001342--.name: The way she looks at me makes my hair stand on end. $OwnerName$, can we move?

0831180509001343--.name: I expected this, but working two jobs is not easy. I like that I have enough money to save to buy a ship, but I'm so busy that I don't have time to actually plan the adventure. There's no end to the housework.

0831180509001344--.name: I washed the comforters today. Not with a washing machine, though. I just throw them into the bathtub and press them by foot.

0831180509001345--.name: It's a ton of fun, and also good exercise. $OwnerName$, you should try it with me next time.

0831180509001346--.name: I was reluctant about being a male housekeeper, but it turned out I'm really good at it. I mean it.

0831180509001347--.name: When you mop, you have to put a some real effort into it to get the floor sparkling clean, or else you're just spreading water around. Same with ironing. You have to press the iron hard to smooth all the wrinkles at once.

0831180509001348--.name: Cooking also requires the constant kneading of flour, and kneading is tough, even for strong men. That's why tough men are better at housework.

0831180509001349--.name: One day, I'm going to buy a ship and sail out to sea. Of course, I'll have a crew, too!

0831180509001350--.name: I'll be Captain $MaidName$. Doesn't that roll off the tongue nicely? Hah hah hah! I can't wait to go on an adventure like $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$!

0831180509001351--.name: Did you know there are many small islands around Victoria Island? Some are uninhabited, and who knows? Maybe they have treasures hidden on them!

0831180509001352--.name: If I find enough treasure, I can buy a bigger ship and have a bigger crew. Then I'll be able to sail farther out to the sea and experience all the wonderful things I read in "Colombo's Travels."

0831180509001353--.name: Merfolk are real, did you know that? Ooh, so are ghost ships hidden deep amidst heavy fog! And squid as tall as buildings! Those are real, too!

0831180509001354--.name: When I'm out on my adventures, I might discover a new continent. Then I'd have to name it. Oh, hmm, I'd better start thinking about names...

0831180509001355--.name: I don't have a hometown. It sounds strange, but I really don't, because I was born at sea.

0831180509001356--.name: My parents were international traders. They sailed to many different countries. I was born while they were sailing. That's why I don't have a hometown.

0831180509001357--.name: So I have no place to return to. I didn't feel like I belonged anywhere, until...

0831180509001358--.name: Until I came to live with you in this house. It's kind of nice having a place to call home. Just saying.

0831180509001359--.name: Since birth, I'd traveled the world with my parents. A few years ago, I decided to strike out on my own. Why? Because I was an adult!

0831180509001360--.name: I said goodbye and left them at the Victoria Island dock. I was itching to go on an adventure of my own, but I didn't have enough money to buy a ship.

0831180509001361--.name: Then I got to know about Helping Hands, so I took a training course. I took the guide course, and since I have experience in sailing, I was able to get a job with $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$.

0831180509001362--.name: Lately, the sea has been so rough. Not many ships are coming to $map:02000062$ and that slowed down my job considerably. That doesn't mean I get paid less, but still.

0831180509001363--.name: Since I had more time than before, I decided to take on another job. I needed money. Didn't I tell you? Ships are not cheap.

0831180509001364--.name: I thought housekeeping was something I could do. Although I didn't take the housekeeping course at Helping Hands, I was a graduate, so the company helped me get a job. The result? I couldn't ask for more!

0831180509001365--.name: Mm? Who are you? Are you here to see $OwnerName$?

0831180509001369--.name: Then do you think maybe you're talking to the wrong person?

0831180509001370--.name: Why didn't you say so? I don't have anything to give you, but make yourself at home.

0831180509001371--.name: Well, then did you come to look around the house? There's not much to see, but knock yourself out.

0831180509001372--.name: You don't even know $OwnerName$? Wow, you must have too much time on your hands. Well, stay as long as you want.

0831180509001373--.name: Call me $MaidName$. But don't ask me any other questions.

0831180509001374--.name: I'm $MaidName$. Haven't you seen a male servant before?

0831180509001378--.name: May I ask who you are?

0831180509001382--.name: I really don't want to cancel my CD account...

0831180509001383--.name: Ah! I forgot to hang the laundry!

0831180509001384--.name: I'm scared of the lady next door...

0831180509001385--.name: I don't have time to take a break.

0831180509001388--.name: Don't make me work too hard.

0831180509001389--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001390--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001393--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001394--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001397--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001398--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001400--.name: Don't make me work too hard.

0831180509001401--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001402--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001404--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001406--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001407--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001409--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001411--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001412--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001414--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001415--.name: Huh? You want to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509001416--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509001418--.name: Paying your employees on time is a good practice. Keep up the good work.

0831180509001419--.name: Now that I've been paid, I'm going to treat myself to a feast. I love to have food delivered to the house!

0831180509001420--.name: Remember not to get behind on paying me. Ugh, I thought I was going to starve to death. Now that I have my paycheck, I'm going to order some pizza.

0831180509001421--.name: I was going to leave if you didn't pay me by the end of the day. You're lucky you did.

0831180509001422--.name: $OwnerName$, you should check the calendar sometimes. Our contract expires soon. You can't always be so busy that forget.

0831180509001423--.name: Do I really have to remind you of this?

0831180509001424--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001425--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001427--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001428--.name: Aw man, that nap hit the spot.

0831180509001429--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001430--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001432--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001433--.name: Acting friendly isn't going to get you anything.

0831180509001434--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001435--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001437--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001438--.name: Don't talk to me. I don't want to do anything right now.

0831180509001439--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001440--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001442--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001443--.name: Oh no, don't you have money to pay me? This is not acceptable. $OwnerName$, you'd better go out and earn some money.

0831180509001444--.name: You already paid me for this month. And just because I look tough doesn't mean I'm a chat. Sheesh, $OwnerName$, who do you think I am?

0831180509001445--.name: I'm in no mood for games! Just give me my money! It's been day since you were supposed to pay me. I'm so hungry, I'm getting dizzy...

0831180509001446--.name: What? What's going on? $OwnerName$, I don't know what the problem is. You take care of it.

0831180509001448--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001449--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001452--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001453--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001455--.name: I told you, I'm not going to work unless you pay me.

0831180509001456--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001457--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001459--.name: Our contract expired, so I'm just going to take a nap, okay?

0831180509001460--.name: You're trying to get out of paying me, aren't you? Our contract has expired. You can't fool me. If you want something from me, pay up.

0831180509001461--.name: I haven't eaten for $MaidPassedDay$! My clothes are practically falling off!

0831180509001462--.name: $OwnerName$, why are you doing this to me?

0831180509001463--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001464--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001466--.name: It's not like I'm asking for a raise... Ugh.

0831180509001467--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001468--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001470--.name: I need a meal, a real meal. Not a snack, but a full on, three course meal!

0831180509001471--.name: Are you torturing me because I grumble sometimes? But I still clean and do everything you ask. Why aren't you paying me? If you don't pay me, why, I'll... I'll... I'll go on strike! I mean it!

0831180509001472--.name: You can't take home groceries until you've paid for them first, right? Same with my services. You have to pay for them first!

0831180509001473--.name: Nobody compares to me when it comes to alchemy!

0831180509001474--.name: You just let old $MaidName$ handle your potion-making.

0831180509001475--.name: Why are you asking so many personal questions?

0831180509001476--.name: Stop asking the same questions over and over.

0831180509001477--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001478--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001480--.name: Stop asking the same questions over and over.

0831180509001481--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001482--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001484--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001485--.name: When are you going to buy me some snacks?

0831180509001500--.name: Aw man, that nap hit the spot.

0831180509001501--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001502--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001504--.name: Acting friendly isn't going to get you anything.

0831180509001505--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001506--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001508--.name: Don't talk to me. I don't want to do anything right now.

0831180509001509--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001510--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001513--.name: I just had this delivered, and I don't like it. You can eat it if you want.

0831180509001514--.name: It's a bit cold by now, though.

0831180509001517--.name: If you don't want to eat it, then don't eat it! Ingrate.

0831180509001518--.name: Cold or hot, your belly doesn't know the difference. Just eat what I feed you.

0831180509001519--.name: Of course, it's delicious. It's a gift from me. Next time, I'm going to eat it all myself. Don't even think of asking for a bite.

0831180509001520--.name: It's exactly what you wanted, isn't it? Don't worry, I'll order from that restaurant again soon.

0831180509001521--.name: It's exhausting taking care of you...

0831180509001522--.name: $OwnerName$, I'd like to offer you my leftover snacks from yesterday. They're a bit stale, but you can eat them if you want.

0831180509001523--.name: If you eat even a bite, I expect you to get me more delicious snacks in return.

0831180509001526--.name: That was yesterday! A new day requires new snacks! What, are you really that stingy?

0831180509001527--.name: Are you calling me ungrateful? Forget it. I'll buy my own snacks!

0831180509001528--.name: Bwahahaha! Just the thought of new snakes makes my mouth water!

0831180509001529--.name: Why don't you go now, then? I want my snacks right now!

0831180509001530--.name: Whew, it's hot in here. Take this cool drink to refresh yourself.

0831180509001531--.name: Don't you think it's like an oven in here?

0831180509001532--.name: Thanks for the drink! Just what I needed.

0831180509001534--.name: If you're cold, you're dehydrated. That's what I always say!

0831180509001535--.name:
Pssh, I'm sweating! How can you be cold?
<font color="#909090">(He scratches at the patch of white fur on his neck.)</font>

0831180509001536--.name: I thought it was just me, because of my fur. But it seems like you're hot, too.

0831180509001537--.name: Am I hot because of my fur or because of the weather?

0831180509001538--.name: $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ gave me some of food he cooked, but I don't think I like it. Taste it.

0831180509001539--.name: How does it taste? Well? Well??

0831180509001542--.name: Why should I? $npc:11000002[gender:1]$ always gives me food.

0831180509001543--.name: $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ asked me the same question as she passed, but she wouldn't have dared if she knew I was older than her.

0831180509001544--.name: I love $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$'s food! It's my favorite!

0831180509001545--.name: ...I feel hungry all of a sudden. Come on, share with me!

0831180509001546--.name: $OwnerName$, I found this while napping inside the storage chest.

0831180509001548--.name: Never seen it before. Nooo idea whose it could be...

0831180509001550--.name: Then give it back! I'm going to keep it.

0831180509001551--.name: Strange. I thought I already swept this place for valuables... Where did this come from?

0831180509001552--.name: I would've kept it if I knew it belonged to you. Bah, I shouldn't have even asked.

0831180509001553--.name: I found something you lost. To pay me back, give me some snacks.

0831180509001554--.name: I found this while playing in $map:2000001$. Your house is too empty. Use it to decorate a bit more.

0831180509001555--.name: Make the house more comfortable for me, all right?

0831180509001558--.name: But there aren't enough comfy places for me to lie down! Come on, just use it!

0831180509001559--.name: Are you saying you don't want things from me? I brought it all the way home, and you don't even say thank you.

0831180509001560--.name: I want this place to feel more homey. Decorate for me, okay?

0831180509001561--.name: The more furniture you have, the less floor for me to mop. Fill your house up with stuff, okay?

0831180509001562--.name: I found this between the sheets of your bed.

0831180509001564--.name: What were you doing on my bed?

0831180509001566--.name: Searching for this item you lost! Obviously! Not taking a nap...

0831180509001567--.name: I got tired while cleaning, so I put my feet up for a minute. I'm entitled to breaks, you know.

0831180509001568--.name: I was going to keep it, but I changed my mind. Lucky you.

0831180509001569--.name: It was good I decided to take a break, wasn't it?

0831180509001570--.name: Stop trying to tell me how I do my job, and just go out there and... do whatever it is that you do!

0831180509001571--.name: The house is so dusty because you keep tracking in dirt!

0831180509001572--.name: I just don't understand why you're so dirty. Stop fooling around and take a shower!

0831180509001573--.name: One of your friends stopped by but left without giving me a name.

0831180509001574--.name: I didn't ask because... I didn't think of it, okay?

0831180509001575--.name: I don't feel like doing anything today. If you insist that I pick something to do, I choose to lie down and rest.

0831180509001576--.name: What do you mean resting isn't work? Of course it is! It involves thinking!

0831180509001577--.name: I have to think real hard about what snacks I should eat today, tomorrow, the rest of the week... That stuff is really important to me!

0831180509001578--.name: Okay, okay! I'll do it! I'll clean! Sheesh.

0831180509001579--.name: Why do you want me to clean all the time? The house will just end up getting dirty again. Why can't I just leave it dirty?

0831180509001580--.name: You know those rough-looking guys in $map:2000001$? Yeah, I'm their leader. Stop scolding or I'll tell them to make your life difficult.

0831180509001581--.name: What do you mean, you're not scared of my friends. They're level 10. Got that? Level 10!

0831180509001582--.name: Stop harassing me or I'll quit, I mean it!

0831180509001583--.name: If I quit, you won't have anyone to keep your house clean. It doesn't just clean itself, you know?

0831180509001585--.name: Argh! Why do you treat me like this? I just want to be happy and take naps. Is that too much to ask?

0831180509001586--.name: Why can't you just let me be happy?! Don't you think I deserve it?

0831180509001587--.name: I came to $map:2000001$ for $npc:11000075[gender:1]$'s event. I've always been in love with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$, ever since I was little. I even dream about her sometimes.

0831180509001588--.name: I fell in love with the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ because of a book. She was illustrated as a character in it, and the moment I saw the picture, that was it for me.

0831180509001589--.name: I came to $map:2000001$ to see the love of my life, $npc:11000075[gender:1]$, but then the ceremony was canceled.

0831180509001590--.name: I was so desperate to see her, I sprinted toward the palace. All I wanted was a glance. Instead, $npc:11000119[gender:0]$ appeared.

0831180509001591--.name: I tried to shove past him, but he tripped me. Can you believe that? Who is he to stop me from seeing her?

0831180509001592--.name: I accepted this job because it's the best! I get to live in someone else's house, eat their food, sleep in their bed, and I even get paid! All I have to do in return is a bit of cleaning.

0831180509001593--.name: But the cleaning part isn't as easy as you'd think.

0831180509001594--.name: Dust bunnies lurk in every corner. As soon as you sweep, the dust scatters.

0831180509001595--.name: And where do you think that dust goes? Your bed! The bathroom sink! Between the cracks of the living room floor! And the it's back to square one for me.

0831180509001596--.name: Now if I just leave the dust bunnies where they are, what do you think happens? They accumulate until they grow so big, you can just pluck them away. So you see, the less you clean, the better.

0831180509001597--.name: Ever wonder why I complain so much? I wasn't always like this, you know. The world has made me what I am.

0831180509001598--.name: Everyone I've met has been mean to me. I tried to be nice to them, but all I got back was bullying and name-calling.

0831180509001599--.name: You don't have to be nice to others, $OwnerName$. They'll only hurt you, no matter how nice you are to them.

0831180509001600--.name: Don't show the world your weaknesses. You'll always regret it.

0831180509001601--.name: Have you met $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$? I used to be good friends with him.

0831180509001602--.name: He's not the sharpest, but he's stronger than anyone else I know. Let me tell you a story about him and $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$.

0831180509001603--.name: $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ has loved cooking since she was young. She was always searching for ingredients. One day, she went to $map:2000043$ even though the grownups told her not to. She was climbing a hill, when suddenly the ground shook and a big rock came rolling straight toward her!

0831180509001604--.name: She was so scared that she fainted. $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ saw what was happening, leapt over, and shattered the rock with a single punch! He saved $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$. That's how strong $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ is.

0831180509001605--.name: $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ thinks $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$'s father saved her, but I saw it all. He used to be so nice when he was young. I don't know what changed him over the years.

0831180509001606--.name: Huh? What was I doing in $map:2000043$? That's none of your business!

0831180509001607--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He wipes crumbs away from his mouth.)</font>
Who are you? You friends with my boss?

0831180509001611--.name: If you've got business with the boss, what're you talking to me for? Sheesh.

0831180509001612--.name: Then sit down and stay quiet. We'll see what the boss has to say.

0831180509001613--.name: They what are you doing here? Get out, before I make you get out!

0831180509001614--.name: Great timing. I'm starving. Why don't you go get me something to eat?

0831180509001615--.name: I'm the glue that holds this household together. Name's $MaidName$. Night to meet you.

0831180509001616--.name: Why don't you tell me who you are first? Sheesh.

0831180509001617--.name: What? Where the heck am I?

0831180509001621--.name: Did you bring me some good snacks?

0831180509001622--.name: Such a mess. I'm tired of cleaning!

0831180509001624--.name: I'm not gonna do nothing today.

0831180509001626--.name: Why is this house so messy?

0831180509001627--.name: This place is so messy, it's taking forever to clean it.

0831180509001628--.name: I know I stashed a snack around here somewhere...

0831180509001631--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001632--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001635--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001636--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001639--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001640--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001643--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001644--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001646--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001648--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001649--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001651--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001653--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001654--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001656--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001657--.name: Mm? Are you going to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509001660--.name: Oh, I'm so glad you found me useful. Thank you for extending our contract. I'm happy to stay with you for another month.

0831180509001661--.name: Hah hah hah, it feels great to get paid for my work work. Thank you.

0831180509001662--.name: Ah, this explains your cheerful mood. What's good for you is good for me, and vice versa. That's what friends are for, right? To share in each other's happiness.

0831180509001663--.name: Ah, I know I said everything was fine, but it really wasn't. I didn't want to tell you the truth, because I knew it was harder on you than it was on me. I'm glad everything worked out! Hah hah!

0831180509001664--.name: In case you've forgotten, our contract expires soon. I know it's not easy keeping track of everything going on in your life.

0831180509001665--.name: But that's what I'm here for. Hah hah.

0831180509001666--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001667--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001669--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001671--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001672--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001674--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001675--.name: Sometimes, I feel lonely when I'm by myself.

0831180509001676--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001677--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001679--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001680--.name: Yikes... My back's killing me today...

0831180509001681--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001682--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001684--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001685--.name: Oh, aren't you a bit short on funds right now? Thank you for at least trying to pay me. I'm sure you'll get some mesos soon, so don't feel too bad. Hah hah hah.

0831180509001686--.name: You want to pay me? But you've already paid me for the month. You're as forgetful as I am sometimes.

0831180509001687--.name: You've got nothing but dust in your pockets. I kind of knew this was the case. It's all right. Don't you worry about this old man...

0831180509001688--.name: Hm, strange things happen all the time. Don't panic. Calm yourself and try again.

0831180509001689--.name: Aww... Why do you look so exhausted?

0831180509001690--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001691--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001693--.name: The older you get, the less food your body needs.

0831180509001694--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001695--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001697--.name: Having nothing to do is so dull. It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I've had a job.

0831180509001698--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001699--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001701--.name: Ah, if we could take a moment to talk about my contract... I believe it's expired.

0831180509001702--.name: Sure, but if we could take a moment to talk about my contract... I believe it's expired.

0831180509001703--.name: I told you not to worry about me. Everything will work out eventually.

0831180509001704--.name: The power of positive thinking, right? Hah hah.

0831180509001705--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001706--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001708--.name: I don't think I can go for a walk today. My knees are aching...

0831180509001709--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001710--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001712--.name: When the wind becomes overwhelming, mimic the reeds. Follow the wind without losing your footing. Hah hah hah, are you thinking I've finally lost my mind? I just thought you could use some encouragement.

0831180509001713--.name: I miss my wife. When things got tough for us, like they are for your now, Madelle helped me get through it. What I'm trying to say is, I may not be able to do much, but I'm here for you.

0831180509001714--.name: Everyone should experience poverty at least once. It gives you perspective. Once you've climbed a cliff, even the steepest hill is no longer intimidating.

0831180509001715--.name: Ask me for anything. I'll make it for you if I can.

0831180509001716--.name: Don't worry about it. I'm doing this to pass time.

0831180509001717--.name: Do you have questions for me?

0831180509001718--.name: Hm, it's not easy to describe oneself in just a few words.

0831180509001719--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001720--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001722--.name: Hm, it's not easy to describe oneself in just a few words.

0831180509001723--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001724--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001726--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001732--.name: Oh, you want to keep this old man company?

0831180509001737--.name: What kind of story? Is there something in particular you want to hear?

0831180509001743--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001744--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001746--.name: Sometimes, I feel lonely when I'm by myself.

0831180509001747--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001748--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001750--.name: Yikes... My back's killing me today...

0831180509001751--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001752--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001755--.name: It felt so strange cooking for the first time in decades. Worse, everything was so blurry I could hardly tell the difference between sugar and salt.

0831180509001756--.name: So I just used the first thing I grabbed. Turns out, it was the wrong one. But you looked hungry, so here it is!

0831180509001759--.name: Is it? Then please spit it out. This is your house and I'm your employee. You don't have to eat it if you don't want to.

0831180509001760--.name: Consuming too much salt makes you thirsty, which leads to drinking too much water, which leads to swelling in your face. So you should stop eating the food.

0831180509001761--.name: Hah hah hah, I know I'm not a good cook. Thank you for saying that.

0831180509001762--.name: When you're hungry, anything you eat tastes good. Hah hah hah, slow down. No one's going to fight you for that.

0831180509001763--.name: Guess what I have in my hand...?

0831180509001764--.name: Snacks! I thought you might be hungry.

0831180509001765--.name: It tastes better than it looks. I hope.

0831180509001766--.name: Great! I was feeling a little hungry!

0831180509001767--.name: I'll pass. I'm, um, trying to lose weight. Yeah.

0831180509001768--.name: Why? You're nothing but skin and bone. You look like you could blow away in the wind. Come on, just eat it.

0831180509001769--.name: Are you? Being overweight can cause diabetes, high blood pressure, hardening of the arteries, and other chronic diseases. Hm, should I be worried?

0831180509001770--.name: Hah hah hah, that's why I've made this! When you're my age, you get to read people more easily.

0831180509001771--.name: Do you get always get hungry around this time? Because I do.

0831180509001772--.name: I was visiting the senior center today, and someone gave me this drink. I thought you might like it.

0831180509001773--.name: When you get to be my age, you already know what you like and don't want to try new things.

0831180509001774--.name: Aw, you should try it. You might like it.

0831180509001776--.name: No, thank you. New food stopped tasting good to me some time ago. At first, it all tasted disgusting, but now it just doesn't taste like anything.

0831180509001777--.name: I'll be happy just to watch you drink it. Go on, take it.

0831180509001778--.name: The person who gave it to me said it's very nutritious. If you like it, let me know. I can ask him for more.

0831180509001779--.name: I'm so glad you accepted it. I would've felt awkward if you said refused.

0831180509001780--.name: I cooked some food my wife used to make. I never watched her cook, though.

0831180509001781--.name: It tastes like its missing something, but I can't quite put my finger on it... What do you think?

0831180509001782--.name: Hmm, not bad, but could use a sprinkle of MSG.

0831180509001783--.name: It's pretty delicious just the way it is.

0831180509001784--.name: Hmm? MSG? I'll just use a pinch, and... Mm, mm! Yes, now it tastes perfect!

0831180509001785--.name: Hmmm, why don't you try tasting it again in a little bit and let me know what you think then?

0831180509001786--.name: I'm glad you're not a picky eater, $OwnerName$. Thank you for eating everything I cook for you.

0831180509001787--.name: You may think so, but I can tell something is missing. I should've asked my wife when I could... It's just another one of the many, many things I miss about her.

0831180509001788--.name: Tsk, you should be more careful. I found this by the front door on my way out.

0831180509001789--.name: Usually, I can't see far enough to notice an item on the ground, but lucky for you, I had to adjust my shoes.

0831180509001792--.name: It's not? Some stranger barged into the house the other day. Maybe he dropped it. I'd better keep it in case he comes back.

0831180509001793--.name: Then how did it get here? Anyway, since this is your house, the item belongs to you now, so you take it.
