0831180509002874--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002875--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002877--.name: I have to look in the mirror once in a while, or else I forget what I look like.

0831180509002878--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002879--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002881--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002882--.name: We can talk for as long as you want. I needed a break, anyway.

0831180509002887--.name: Ah, good conversation is always welcome, and I always enjoy talking to you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509002892--.name: The truth of the universe breathes inside every one of us.

0831180509002897--.name: Is there something you want to say?

0831180509002898--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002899--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002901--.name: You wanna chat? Was there something you wanted to ask me? Or maybe... you're also drawn to the same mysterious power...

0831180509002902--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002903--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002905--.name: Haven't we been talking this whole time? Or is my memory playing tricks on me again...

0831180509002906--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002907--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002909--.name: I've decided that today is the combination of sensitivity and specialty.

0831180509002910--.name: More intense than yesterday, and more thrilling than tomorrow. Or just possible, the opposite.

0831180509002911--.name: (Say that you feel the same way sometimes.)

0831180509002913--.name: From the look on your face... Mm, I'm not going to ask. I can feel the intensity radiating off of you.

0831180509002914--.name: Why does it feel as if you're so far away when you're right in front of me? Every time we talk, I feel so alone.

0831180509002915--.name: I can be honest when I'm with you. You make me feel like a child without a care in the world. It's been a long time since I felt this way...

0831180509002916--.name: It's not easy to be who you are. For some reason, I feel better now. Will you tell me more about yourself?

0831180509002917--.name: I entrusted my soul to music a while back, in a desperate attempt to forget the anguish of life.

0831180509002918--.name: You should try to face your inner self sometimes. Here, take this earphone and put it in your ear.

0831180509002919--.name: Now, close your eyes and get lost in the darkness. There! Our souls resonated with each other! Did you feel that?

0831180509002922--.name: It's not your fault. It just means our relationship is not as deep as I thought it was.

0831180509002923--.name: Heh. You did? So did I.

0831180509002924--.name: Heh. Feels kind of strange, but I like it. Let's just stay like this for a while.

0831180509002925--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He nods his head to the beat.)</font>
Yeah this is it.

0831180509002926--.name: This was such an amazing moment. Not sure if you'd agree...?

0831180509002927--.name: Today it drizzled, just a bit, but it was enough to quench my heart's thirst.

0831180509002928--.name: I haven't felt this way for a long time... Maybe I still have some warmth left in me. I feel... hopeful.

0831180509002929--.name: I saw the guy next door come home in a helicopter, and that changed my whole perception of him. Interesting, huh?

0831180509002930--.name: Sure, I'd love to ride in a helicopter someday. Maybe my tired soul can finally take a breath, hundreds of miles above the world.

0831180509002931--.name: Today, I met a girl who lives in the neighborhood. She inspired me to pick up scissors for the first time in a long time. Not many folks "get" my art style, you know?

0831180509002932--.name: I wonder if the tears I shed after that last snip were were of joy or yearning...

0831180509002933--.name: That look on your face... Mm, you still don't understand me, do you? It's cool. An appreciation of true art isn't something that can be acquired. It's something you've got to be born with.

0831180509002934--.name: How's it going? You look like you're about to burst with excitement. What's the news?

0831180509002935--.name: Don't know why, but I've got a hunch today is going to be an exciting day for me, too.

0831180509002936--.name: Thank you for your kindness, but I don't know if I have a place for it in my heart.

0831180509002937--.name: Don't be upset, $OwnerName$. It's not your fault. This is a problem that only I can solve.

0831180509002938--.name: I appreciate that, but you don't have to keep telling me. Sometimes words mean more when they're not spoken, you hear me?

0831180509002939--.name: I get if you don't get it. I'm a deep guy with so many layers. Don't force yourself. We'll solve this puzzle together.

0831180509002940--.name: I don't mind feeling this way. I assume this is how ordinary people feel all the time.

0831180509002941--.name: But for me... Let's just say it'll take a while to get used to this.

0831180509002942--.name: When it's sunny and there's not much to do, I go out for a walk. Not to take a break, but just to look normal, like everyone else.

0831180509002943--.name: $OwnerName$, how does taking a walk make you feel? For me, let's just say it calms the darkness inside me.

0831180509002944--.name: Don't take it personally, but... I don't want to take a walk with you. I've reserved that time to spend with me, you know? So I can't share it with anybody else.

0831180509002945--.name: Why do I use left-handed scissors with my right hand? I'm surprised you even noticed.

0831180509002946--.name: You may not understand this, but I'm not the one who chooses that. When I touch someone's hair, I get a feeling deep inside, and that feeling determines which hand I use to cut with.

0831180509002947--.name: Come to think of it, I haven't held these scissors with my left hand for a long time. Only fate knows when I'll do that again. To be honest, right now, I'm just too tired to think about it.

0831180509002948--.name: Sometimes, I just like wearing earphones, without listening to anything.

0831180509002949--.name: I do it when I want to be left alone, so I can have some time with myself.

0831180509002950--.name: You don't get it, do you, $OwnerName$? It's okay. I'm used to not being understood.

0831180509002951--.name: Of course, I have my favorites when it comes to music. I'll play some for you when I have a chance. It'll help you understand where I get my inspiration.

0831180509002952--.name: $OwnerName$, do you have any siblings? I've never told anyone but... I actually have an older brother.

0831180509002953--.name: I left home when I was pretty young. He used to send me letters, but it's been a long, long time since the last one.

0831180509002954--.name: I picked this place partly because it's bustling with activity and partly because my brother mailed his last letter from somewhere around here.

0831180509002955--.name: Recently, I met an adventurer who I think traveled with my brother for a while. I couldn't be sure, though.

0831180509002956--.name: According to him, my brother is doing fine. I don't know what happened to him, but I'm hoping to rn into here one day.

0831180509002957--.name: Weren't you just here yesterday? You looking for the owner?

0831180509002961--.name: Well, then, look around. See what you can find.

0831180509002962--.name: Not many people come to visit. You must be really close.

0831180509002963--.name: Then did you come to see me? I wanted to stay on the down low, but I know it's impossible when I'm so popular.

0831180509002964--.name: If you want, you can stay for a little while. Just don't be alarmed if your energy starts to resonate with mine.

0831180509002965--.name: If you want, I can tell you, but if we're connected by the red string of fate, knowing each other's name is meaningless.

0831180509002966--.name: I can tell you my name. It's $MaidName$. Nothing else about me can be described in words.

0831180509002967--.name: Nice to meet you... should do for now.

0831180509002969--.name: Are you also a wandering soul?

0831180509002970--.name: I'm sorry, but I don't think we have anything in common.

0831180509002972--.name: Don't say a thing if you don't want to.

0831180509002976--.name: Good. With this, I'm complete once again.

0831180509002977--.name: Not now.  Go back inside and sleep for a little longer.

0831180509002978--.name: Is this the power granted to me?

0831180509002980--.name: I need time to refresh and recharge.

0831180509002983--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002984--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002987--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002988--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002990--.name: Meow? How long have you been standing there?

0831180509002991--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002992--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002995--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002996--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002998--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003000--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003001--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003003--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003004--.name: Meow? How long have you been standing there?

0831180509003005--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003006--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003008--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003009--.name: Are you going to give me those shiny blue things? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509003012--.name: I'll take it! So pretty, meow!

0831180509003013--.name: $npcName:11000708$ said it's important to trust my servant, but that doesn't happen overnight. Keep paying me early, and I'll grow to trust you.

0831180509003014--.name: I'd like to think that you were too busy saving the world from utter catastrophe to pay me on time, meow. I'm glad you eventually remembered your priorities.

0831180509003015--.name: I was just thinking that perhaps I should fire you and search for a better servant, but it seems you've realized the error of your ways. I'll show you some grace... this time...

0831180509003016--.name: $OwnerName$, our contract expires soon. Do I really have to remind you of things like this, meow?

0831180509003017--.name: You might be more work than you're worth...

0831180509003018--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003019--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003021--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003023--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003024--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003026--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003027--.name: $OwnerName$, what took so long? Servants shouldn't neglect their masters, meow.

0831180509003028--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003029--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003031--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003033--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003034--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003036--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003037--.name: Don't you have any more of those shiny blue things? I feel so unmotivated if I don't get some once every month or so.

0831180509003038--.name: Did you already give me your monthly tribute? You're as forgetful as $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$.

0831180509003039--.name: Don't you have any more of those shiny blue things? I feel so unmotivated if I don't get some once every month or so.

0831180509003040--.name: Meow... I'm sleepy... Let's do it later... Zzz...

0831180509003041--.name: I must... have more... of those shiny... blue... things!

0831180509003042--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003043--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003045--.name: No longer interested in me? Hm! Bad servant! Bad!

0831180509003046--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003047--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003050--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003051--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003053--.name: I don't feel like it. Hey, if you give me some of those pretty blue things, I might change my mind.

0831180509003054--.name: Mew...  I want to go back to $map:02000025$. I should've never left the castle, meow...

0831180509003055--.name: I haven't eaten for$MaidPassedDay$! Must get more shiny blue thingies!

0831180509003056--.name: Can't you see the circles under my eyes?

0831180509003057--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003058--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003060--.name: You really are oblivious, aren't you?

0831180509003061--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003062--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003064--.name:
...Meow...  
<font color="#909090">(She peers at you for 3 seconds, and then turns around and moves away.)</font>

0831180509003065--.name: I'm going to find myself another servant, meow.

0831180509003066--.name:
Meow.
<font color="#909090">(She circles around you, rubs her face against your leg, and then softly walks away.)</font>

0831180509003067--.name: Want some shiny blue things, meow? Want me to go pick some up?

0831180509003068--.name: Finding shiny things is my favorite, meow.

0831180509003069--.name: Meow, are you curious about me?

0831180509003071--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003072--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003075--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003076--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003078--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003079--.name: Cats can't talk... Is that what you think?

0831180509003084--.name: I'm bored, meow. Play with me.

0831180509003095--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003096--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003098--.name: $OwnerName$, what took so long? Servants shouldn't neglect their masters, meow.

0831180509003099--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003100--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003103--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003104--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003106--.name: Take this food, meow. I went out for a stroll and picked it up next door. No one was home. It was sitting out on the kitchen counter waiting for me.

0831180509003107--.name: I started eating it but then remembered you, $OwnerName$. You should be thankful. I don't always share.

0831180509003110--.name: Stolen? Do you forget who I am? Everything I see is rightfully mine. The minister never understood that...

0831180509003111--.name: If that bothers you, why are you eating it? It's a little dirty because I had to drag it all this way, but you seem content enough.

0831180509003112--.name: You're welcome, meow. I'll bring you something tomorrow, too.

0831180509003113--.name: Of course. I take care of my minions, when the mood strikes. Tomorrow, I'll take my walk through the palace.

0831180509003115--.name: We can snack together, meow. Go on, take some. Mm? You want to know where I get this?

0831180509003116--.name: When you're not home, $OwnerName$, a girl stops by to play with me and give me treats. I wasn't hungry earlier, so I saved this for you.

0831180509003118--.name: You let a stranger into the house?!

0831180509003119--.name: Are you deaf, servant? She's not a stranger, she's my friend. Now go away for a while.

0831180509003120--.name: Well, you weren't here to screen our guest. What do I hire you for anyway, servant?

0831180509003121--.name: I never asked her name, meow. She's from Carimia Island, where she lives with grandpa. She works around here, though. She's cute, but not as cute as me!

0831180509003122--.name: I'm not sure. I think she also lives with a servant, like I do. She seems lonely because her servant is rarely home, too.

0831180509003123--.name: She visits me when she's lonely, meow. Between you and me, I don't think she's much of a cook...

0831180509003124--.name: You've been looking a bit ragged, so I got this for you. You don't want to know where I got it.

0831180509003125--.name: It's a health drink. It should perk you right up.

0831180509003126--.name: No, no, you take it. I insist.

0831180509003128--.name: You're gonna regret asking... I nabbed it from $map:2000065$ while I was in $map:2000025$. The minister drinks it, so it's got to be good.

0831180509003129--.name: I picked it up in $map:2000025$ $map:2000065$. Hey, my minions deserve the best.

0831180509003130--.name: No thank you. I had a sip and did not enjoy the flavor. But it's good for your health, so you should drink every last drop.

0831180509003131--.name: I'm touched, meow. Servant, I had no idea you cared so much!

0831180509003132--.name: But you should take it. You're the peon who pays the rent, so I need you in good health.

0831180509003133--.name: Meow. $OwnerName$, I've got something to tell you.

0831180509003134--.name: You must be hungry. Eat this, meow. I must be the only cat who worries about her minions this much.

0831180509003135--.name: Meow? Why are you looking at me like that?

0831180509003138--.name: Don't be silly, meow. Have you ever seen a cat cooking?

0831180509003139--.name: I didn't cook it, meow. I picked it up next door.

0831180509003140--.name: Aww, you're easy. I'll bring stuff more often, then.

0831180509003141--.name: It's just leftovers. Don't read too much into it.

0831180509003142--.name: Look at this, meow. I found it under the bed while playing with some ants.

0831180509003143--.name: Weren't you looking for this, meow?

0831180509003146--.name: Don't make it a habit. It's your job to look after me, not the other way around.

0831180509003147--.name: You're welcome. There are other things under the bed, but I forbid you to look.

0831180509003148--.name: We were enjoying our time together when they suddenly stopped moving. Maybe they were sleepy after being tossed into the air and stomped on. Should I be worried about them?

0831180509003149--.name: They went back home, meow. It's all right. Their family is so big that I see them everywhere.

0831180509003150--.name: Look at this, meow! It looks like new, doesn't it? I think we can use it!

0831180509003151--.name: Want to know where I got it? There's a girl who drops by when you're not home. She left it here as a gift, looking totally bummed out about it.

0831180509003152--.name: I know just the spot for it!

0831180509003154--.name: Where? Where? Oooh, I can't wait to see!

0831180509003155--.name: That's right. It's ours now! Let's do what we want with it!

0831180509003156--.name: She lives with her servant, just like I do. She's pretty cute, even with her glasses. I don't know her name, though.

0831180509003157--.name: Her servant must have been displeased she picked something up from the street. How rude!

0831180509003158--.name: She lives in the neighborhood. I only knows that she's from an island, meow.

0831180509003159--.name: She looked upset. I think her servant yelled at her. She said the servant called the item trash! I told her she should fire her servant, but then she started crying.

0831180509003160--.name: I was taking a stroll when I found something shiny, so I brought it home with me. I almost didn't see it because it was covered in dirt, meow.

0831180509003161--.name: It doesn't look like it's good for anything, but you can have it if you want, meow.

0831180509003162--.name: Thanks! I'd love more if you find more!

0831180509003164--.name: That's all I've got. Why are your eyes gleaming like a crazy person's?

0831180509003165--.name: I don't have any more. But if it's that great, I'm going to keep the next one I find.

0831180509003166--.name: Meow? You like it? It's not even edible... But I can bring you more next time.

0831180509003167--.name: $map:2000025$ is full of shiny things, meow. I'll bring more if I go there next time.

0831180509003168--.name: Nothing at all, meow. What could possibly happen in such a tiny house?

0831180509003169--.name: Unless you're interested in the cockroaches. I played with them all day.

0831180509003170--.name: But they suddenly stopped playing with me! If they didn't like me pulling off their legs, they should've said so.

0831180509003171--.name: Strange people keep barging into the house. Do you owe them money or something?

0831180509003172--.name: It's okay if you do. I've got it under control. I just look at them with large sparkly eyes, and they leave with a dreamy look on their faces.

0831180509003173--.name: Yes, I was bored! So, so bored! It's not nice to leave me alone for so long!

0831180509003174--.name: A friend visited today. $npcName:11000367$ from Barrota Harbor.

0831180509003175--.name: He brought his girlfriend, and they were all lovey dovey. Say, $OwnerName$, do you have someone you love? Why don't you introduce me sometime?

0831180509003176--.name: ...! Did you see that? Look!! A red dot! It's moving there... and there... and back there...!

0831180509003177--.name: I'm gonna catch it! Catch it! Yes, come here, come to me, gotcha!

0831180509003178--.name: ...A feather rod? I'm going to pluck out all the feathers!

0831180509003179--.name: Kyaah! I was so close to catching it! Servant, you're getting better at snapping your wrist! Good!

0831180509003180--.name: What are we playing today, meow? A ball? It's... flyinnnngggg! Come to meeeeee!

0831180509003181--.name: Kyaah! I got it, meow! Meow? You want me to fetch it. No! It's mine now, and I'm going to toy with it all day long!

0831180509003182--.name: What's this? What's inside? Let me in, let me in, let me in... I will get in!

0831180509003183--.name: It's a... bit snug, but it's okay. Meow, so comfy! I'm sleepy... meow... Zzz...

0831180509003184--.name: $OwnerName$, as my servant, there are a few things you should know about me.

0831180509003185--.name: First, I like dark, tight places where I can curl up. I hate open spaces and the cold. You shouldn't disturb me when I sleep inside your sock drawer.

0831180509003186--.name: Second, I hate loud noises, such as vacuum cleaners. Those are forbidden in this house!

0831180509003187--.name: Third, I love grooming myself, meow. I love to lick my hair and nails clean, but I don't like bathing.

0831180509003188--.name: Huh? You want to tell me a few thing about yourself too? I can already tell you'll be trouble. We've got time. You can tell me all about you later.

0831180509003189--.name: Haven't you heard it's rude to pry? But, if you insist on knowing more about me...

0831180509003190--.name: I'm from $map:2000025$. $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ loves cats. Have you ever been in the presence of her fine cat, $npc:11000708$?

0831180509003191--.name: $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ loves $npc:11000708$ like her own child. That's probably why it became a trend among the nobility to raise cats. Cats like me.

0831180509003192--.name: Life at the palace was peaceful, but $npc:11000708$ said something to me that was life-changing. She said, "$MaidName$, you should find someone who loves you as much as the Empress loves me." So I set out to do just that.

0831180509003193--.name: Oh, I'm not saying that person is you, $OwnerName$. Oh, no no. Let's not jump to conclusions.

0831180509003194--.name: $npc:11000708$ is the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$'s favorite cat. A slender body, beautiful golden hair, a shiny ribbon... And I've descended from an equally noble bloodline.

0831180509003195--.name: But $npc:11000708$'s beauty isn't what makes her so great, meow. The $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ relies on her for comfort. I don't want to imagine what Maple World would be like if $npc:11000708$ didn't exist...

0831180509003196--.name: Want to know how important $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ is to her owner? Being the Empress of Maple World is not easy, meow. $npc:11000708$ once didn't go to the bathroom for three days to stay with the Empress while she was in deep anguish.

0831180509003197--.name: I want to be as loyal as $npc:11000708$, but I can't not go to the bathroom for three days, mew. $OwnerName$, please make sure I never have to choose between you and the bathroom.

0831180509003198--.name: When I lived in the Palace, I used to look forward to the Cat Assembly. It's a meeting among the courtiers who love cats, meow. It's hosted by the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$, and the guests of honor are us cats.

0831180509003199--.name: At the meeting, everyone from the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ to $npc:11000601[gender:1]$ and even the guards laugh and chat regardless of station, meow. No one mentions serious subjects like the Lapentas or the Shadow World.

0831180509003200--.name: It was always fun to hear what was going on in the palace. Oh, speaking of which, I remember something $npc:11000708$ told me, meow.

0831180509003201--.name: Everyone thinks the Empress stays in the palace all the time, working, but she goes out sometimes, meow. When she does, she disguises herself and crawls through a hole in a corner of the castle wall.

0831180509003202--.name: One time, she went to her hair salon in $map:52000008$... and got caught by $npcName:11000702[gender:0]$, meow!

0831180509003203--.name: The Empress quickly used $skill:20000011$ to scale the castle wall and run away from him, meow. Who knew she was good at $skill:20000011$? I'd love to see her use it one day.

0831180509003204--.name: You're a stranger, meow.  I hate strangers...

0831180509003208--.name: How dare you touch me, lowly human?!

0831180509003209--.name: Everyone who visits the house wants to touch me, meow. But do they think to ask first? Noooo.

0831180509003210--.name: Kyaawwoonngghh! Not there! Get away from me!!

0831180509003214--.name: Oh jeez, this place isn't even as big as the smallest palace bathroom

0831180509003218--.name: Thank you for not disturbing me, meow.

0831180509003219--.name: You should knock before you enter, meow.

0831180509003226--.name: I'm taking a walk. Don't worry about me, meow.

0831180509003227--.name: I need to file my nails... Ooh, that wall looks perfect, meow!

0831180509003228--.name: I love stretching. Love, love, love it.

0831180509003229--.name: Mm? Are you here to see little old me?

0831180509003230--.name: Awww, you're here to see me.

0831180509003231--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003232--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003234--.name: I knew you couldn't stay away. Heehee!

0831180509003235--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003236--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003238--.name: Do you have something to say to little old me?

0831180509003239--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003240--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003242--.name: Awww, you're here to see me.

0831180509003243--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003244--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003246--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003247--.name: I knew you couldn't stay away. Heehee!

0831180509003248--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003249--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003251--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003252--.name: Do you have something to say to little old me?

0831180509003253--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003254--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003256--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003257--.name: You're giving me a paycheck? Really? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509003258--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509003260--.name: Yippee! You kept your promise on time! I love people like you!!

0831180509003261--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She stares at you for a while, and then speaks in a sniffling voice.)</font>
Th-thanks. I don't know why I'm getting so emotional. Maybe it's because I've earned this money.

0831180509003262--.name: Yes, Yes! This is what I like! You can keep doing this, right? I'll be counting on you!

0831180509003263--.name: I thought you were testing my patience. What's taking you so long? Don't let it happen again, all right?

0831180509003264--.name: Now, this is important. Do you know what day it is today? Then you know what you've got to do, right?

0831180509003265--.name: You'd better not forget it, or else!

0831180509003266--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003267--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003269--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003270--.name: $OwnerName$, talking to you makes me feel good.

0831180509003271--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003272--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003274--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003275--.name: Sometimes, I think we can get even closer.

0831180509003276--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003277--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003279--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003280--.name: Hmm? What could you possibly have to ask little old me?

0831180509003281--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003282--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003284--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003285--.name: My head says, "I should be more understanding," but my heart says, "Why should I care?" I can't believe you don't have enough money to pay me.

0831180509003286--.name: Oh, did you forget? Or were you too busy stealing glances at me? You already paid me for this month!

0831180509003287--.name: My head says, "I should be more understanding," but my heart says, "Why should I care?" You're already behind the schedule, and you don't have the money to pay me!

0831180509003288--.name: Ah! I don't know what happened, but it's not good! Please talk to me again later.

0831180509003289--.name: I like that I don't have to work, but I don't like that you haven't paid me.

0831180509003290--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003291--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003293--.name: Are you really going to keep neglecting me?

0831180509003294--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003295--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003297--.name: I'm so disappointed. So, so disappointed in you.

0831180509003298--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003299--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003301--.name: I can't, not after my contract expires. Not because I don't want to... Those are the rules!

0831180509003302--.name: I'd like to think you won't treat me like this forever. I'd like to have faith in you.

0831180509003303--.name: You're still curious about me, aren't you?

0831180509003304--.name: I wish I could turn back time...

0831180509003305--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003306--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003308--.name: I miss the good old days... When you cared...

0831180509003309--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003310--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003312--.name: Rules are merciless things. I'm sorry, but I can't do any work for you right now.

0831180509003313--.name: I believe in you! You can make things back the way they were!

0831180509003314--.name: I'm so tired of worrying about money, worrying about whether you care. But I have no choice but to wait for you to sort things out.

0831180509003315--.name: What kind of potion do you need? Just say the word!

0831180509003316--.name: Let me know if I can help!

0831180509003317--.name: What do you want to know about me? I'll tell you anything!

0831180509003319--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003320--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003323--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003324--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003326--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003327--.name: What do you want to talk about? I love interesting stories.

0831180509003332--.name: Is there something you want to ask me?

0831180509003337--.name: Sure, why not? I love chatting!

0831180509003342--.name: $OwnerName$, talking to you makes me feel good.

0831180509003343--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003344--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003346--.name: Sometimes, I think we can get even closer.

0831180509003347--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003348--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003350--.name: Hmm? What could you possibly have to ask little old me?

0831180509003351--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003352--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003354--.name: That's because I am happy, silly. I'm only going to live once, might as well live happily. Don't you agree, $OwnerName$?

0831180509003355--.name: Besides, something really great happened to me today. You wanna know? Hehe, what's it worth to you?

0831180509003356--.name: Hehe, so, what happened today was... Hehehe, let's see, um... None of your business! Teehee!

0831180509003358--.name: C'mon! Stop teasing me or I'll... I'll cut your pay!

0831180509003359--.name: Aww, $OwnerName$, are you upset? I was just messing with you. Hmph, now I'm upset, too.

0831180509003360--.name: Heehee, so what happened was... Wait. Did you just say you don't care?! What?! Now you've made me mad!

0831180509003361--.name: Aw, $OwnerName$, you care that much? Hehe, don't cut my pay. I'll tell you!

0831180509003362--.name: I was strolling through $map:02000001$ when I bumped into $npcName:11000764[gender:1]$. She was leaving the macaroon shop. It's insane how she eats so many sweets yet stays so tiny. Anyway...

0831180509003363--.name: A guy approached us, gushing about he's a huge fan of the Bunnies, but then... he only asked me for an autograph! That proves it, right? I'm more popular than $npcName:11000764[gender:1]$! Teehee!

0831180509003364--.name: You should've seen the look on her face. It was priceless! Now you know what I'm so happy today, heehee.

0831180509003365--.name: Who's teasing who, huh? Cut my pay! Teehee! Yeah, right! You're so funny, $OwnerName$!

0831180509003366--.name: I had no idea you had such a playful side, $OwnerName$. I like it!!

0831180509003367--.name: Actually, something incredible happened... But it's a secret. Don't tell a soul! Promise?

0831180509003368--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She leans in close and whispers.)</font>
You know how Goldus started selling lottery tickets? The grand prize is a billion mesos! Well, I bought one and... I won!!

0831180509003369--.name: Can you believe it?! I won fifth place! Isn't that incredible??

0831180509003370--.name: What's the prize for fifth place?

0831180509003372--.name: I don't know! I mean, it's got to be a lot, right? Isn't it exciting? I've never gotten fifth in anything in my life, not even when I was in school!

0831180509003373--.name: Anyway, the prize amount is, umm... it says here that it's 500 mesos. But that's how much the ticket cost...

0831180509003374--.name: Does that mean anyone can win fifth place? Ah, I knew it was too good to be true. But the last few days, I've been walking on a cloud, so I guess that counts for something.

0831180509003375--.name: Oh, I hadn't even checked. Do you want me to share some of my riches with you, heehee? Well, it says here the prize is...

0831180509003376--.name: Huh? 500 mesos? That's not even a fraction of what I hoped! Ugh... And here I was, planning how I would turn in my resignation... Huh? What? Forget I said anything!

0831180509003377--.name: Thank you, heehee! I'm so excited! There are so many things I want to buy. Oh, but what if I go overboard and it won't all fit in the house?

0831180509003378--.name: Aren't you worried, $OwnerName$? Once I'm rich, I won't need a job, which means I can quit and leave you all by yourself!

0831180509003379--.name: But don't worry, I'm not going anywhere. I'll stay with you forever and always, $OwnerName$. Heehee.

0831180509003380--.name: Ahhh, I feel great today! On a day like this, I can get all my dance moves perfect!

0831180509003381--.name: I'm going to take advantage of that to put in some extra dance practice today. You wanna watch?

0831180509003384--.name: Dusting? You have a chance to see my amazing dance skills and you're talking about dusting?

0831180509003385--.name: Wow! I don't think I've ever been so insulted in my life!

0831180509003386--.name: Mmm, this is a problem. I have to practice my moves, but you want me to dust...

0831180509003387--.name: I guess I have no choice. I have to do what you say, so I'll give up dance practice for today...

0831180509003388--.name: Aw, shucks. Do you mean it? Actually, people love watching me dance. They say it makes them happy.

0831180509003389--.name: $OwnerName$, I haven't told this to anyone, but actually... I have a fan club! Surprised?

0831180509003390--.name: Actually, I changed my mind. I can't dance in front of you. I haven't practiced enough! But I promise you'll be the first to see when I can put on a perfect show!

0831180509003391--.name: $OwnerName$, now that you say you want to watch me dance... I don't want to! Does that make me a flirt? Heehee.

0831180509003392--.name: But thank you for saying that. It really made my day!

0831180509003393--.name: Today is amazing!! I can't believe it! I've hit the jackpot, $OwnerName$!

0831180509003394--.name: I don't know if you remember, but I told you a while back that I'm collecting the stickers found inside Maple Bread and you laughed at me. Well...

0831180509003395--.name: I've been trying and trying to get the $npcName:21000302$ sticker to complete my collection! I ate sooooo many bags of bread searching for it, and today I found it!!

0831180509003396--.name: I'm so happy! Finally, my collection is complete!

0831180509003398--.name: Oh, that? I have like three duplicates of that one.

0831180509003399--.name: What?!? $OwnerName$!!! Do you know how much bread I ate... how many pounds I gained... to try to find that sticker?! And you had it all along and didn't tell me?!

0831180509003400--.name: I hate you so much right now, $OwnerName$. You've totally ruined my mood.

0831180509003401--.name: What?! But you made fun of me when I told you I was collecting the stickers! And you were secretly collecting them, too?

0831180509003402--.name: What a hypocrite! I can't stand that kind of behavior!

0831180509003403--.name: I know! I can do anything when I put my mind to it. Heehee! What should I collect next?

0831180509003404--.name: That's right! You should feel lucky to have a servant as great as me in your life, hee hee!

0831180509003405--.name: Now, where should I hang my completed collection? Hmm, maybe here. I never liked that painting anyway, never mind that it cost a million mesos...

0831180509003406--.name: Or maybe here, so it's the first thing you see when you enter the front door. I'd just have to throw out that vase. Hmm...

0831180509003407--.name: Of course I'm always happy! $OwnerName$, sing with me! It'll make you happy, too.

0831180509003408--.name:
You are my Maple leaf...
My only Maple leaf!
You make me happy...
When skies are gray!

0831180509003409--.name: <font color="#909090">(Wow, the girl is tone deaf! You can barely recognize the song, the way she sings it.)</font>

0831180509003410--.name: Whenever I feel even a tiny bit gloomy, I play rock paper scissors with myself. My right hand versus my left hand.

0831180509003411--.name: That way, no matter what happens, I win! And then I feel happy. Perfectly simple, right?

0831180509003412--.name: Yes! How did you know I didn't feel like working today, $OwnerName$? You know me so well!

0831180509003413--.name: I love how much you love playing with me, $OwnerName$! I love playing with you, too!

0831180509003414--.name: I'm so lucky to have such a great boss. It makes every day the best day, heehee!

0831180509003415--.name: Nooooo! I wish I could, but I'm swamped! Drats, I could really use a break, but I can't...

0831180509003416--.name: Ahh, I'm so busy, but maybe I can take a small break. How about a game of word chain?

0831180509003417--.name: I'll go first... "Fix"! Can you think of a word that starts with "X"? Oops, too slow! So fun! Okay, break's over!

0831180509003418--.name: The Bunnies are the most famous troupe in all of Maple World!

0831180509003419--.name: We travel all around, and thousands of people come to our shows. I feel so lucky to be a part of them!

0831180509003420--.name: I knew I wanted to be a Bunny since I was little. They just bring so much joy everywhere they go, and I wanted to be a part of that! It wasn't easy, but I found a way to make my dream come true, heehee.

0831180509003421--.name: It's not easy to join the Bunnies. We're really exclusive.

0831180509003422--.name: Hundreds of girls line up at our management offices each day, begging for the chance to participate in our trainee program.

0831180509003423--.name: If they're accepted, they have to train hard to prove themselves, and if they pass all the tests, they finally become official Bunnies. Ah, I remember those days. I was the first in my program!

0831180509003424--.name: Remember how I said I'd always wanted to be a Bunny? Well, I had to jump through a lot of hurdles to get to where I am today.

0831180509003425--.name: You see, when I was little, I was sick a lot. I could barely stay in school because I was so fatigued, and I was severely underweight.

0831180509003426--.name: The other kids used to make fun of me. They called me "grasshopper ghost" because my arms were so gangly and I was so pale. They would run away when they saw me, shrieking about how I was contagious.

0831180509003427--.name: I was nowhere near strong enough to become a Bunny. It takes a lot of stamina to perform those dances, you know. But I never gave up. I talked to a trainer to learn how to build muscle strength and to a nutritionist to learn how to eat to make my body strong. I practiced every single day.

0831180509003428--.name: I will never have a "perfect" body, but I have a strong body, and I've worked hard to get here. I've learned how to take of myself.

0831180509003429--.name: Whenever I see kids making fun of each other for being too skinny or fat or tall or short, I tell them that nobody has the perfect body and that anyone can succeed if they set their mind to it. They listen to me, because I'm a Bunny.

0831180509003430--.name: There's something about my past that I haven't shared with you yet. Something that happened a long time ago...

0831180509003431--.name: Remember how I told you I was sickly when I was younger? I found out that it wasn't natural. I had been cursed by a witch.

0831180509003432--.name: To this day, I still don't know why. I almost died from that curse!

0831180509003433--.name: But curse or no curse, I worked hard and overcame it! I'm so proud of myself for that! I heard later that maybe some hero had lifted the curse, but...

0831180509003434--.name: Hero or no hero, I would've broke the curse myself eventually out of sheer determination. Still, I wouldn't mind meeting that hero someday.

0831180509003435--.name: Hello. Hi! Who are you? What brings you here?

0831180509003436--.name: I'm here to see your master.

0831180509003437--.name: I came to check out the house.

0831180509003439--.name: Oh! In that case, welcome! Make yourself at home. So glad you're here!

0831180509003440--.name: Oh, goodness! Why didn't you say so earlier? Here I was, thinking you were some run-of-the-mill creep!

0831180509003441--.name: Isn't the house pretty? It's all thanks to my hard work! Heehee!

0831180509003442--.name: It's nice, but not nice enough to warrant a visit... Still, I do work really hard!

0831180509003443--.name: Excuse me? I asked first! How rude!

0831180509003444--.name: My name is $MaidName$! Nice to meet —what am I saying? Wh-who are you?!

0831180509003446--.name: Tada! Here I come! All eyes on me!

0831180509003447--.name: Who are you? What brings you?

0831180509003448--.name: I'd like to know... who are you?

0831180509003449--.name: Welcome home! Do you know how long I've been waiting for you?

0831180509003451--.name: I like that I don't have to work, but I don't like this tension between us.

0831180509003452--.name: We could go back to how things used to be, if you would just pay me.

0831180509003459--.name: No, no. That move was wrong. From the top!

0831180509003460--.name: Maybe I can take a break while no one's looking! Heehee!

0831180509003462--.name: $OwnerName$, let's go over your schedule for the day...

0831180509003463--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003464--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003467--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003468--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003471--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003472--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003474--.name: $OwnerName$, let's go over your schedule for the day...

0831180509003475--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003476--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003478--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003480--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003481--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003483--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003485--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003486--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003488--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003489--.name: Would you like to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509003490--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509003492--.name: Absolutely. I'll extend our employment contract. You'll want to read through all the fine print yourself on this one, $OwnerName$.

0831180509003493--.name: Agreed. This arrangement is mutually beneficial, so this extension was expected. Here's to a long and prosperous relationship.

0831180509003494--.name: Very well. I accept your terms. I hope you weren't expecting any thanks... I'm sure I've earned this.

0831180509003495--.name: Confirmed. I accept the position. We have a great working relationship, as long as you continue to maintain a professional distance.

0831180509003496--.name: $OwnerName$, our contract expires soon. No need to thank me. Managing your schedule is part of my job.

0831180509003497--.name: Just don't make me repeat myself.

0831180509003498--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003499--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003501--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003503--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003504--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003506--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003507--.name: $OwnerName$, let's go over your schedule for the day...

0831180509003508--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003509--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003511--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003513--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003514--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003516--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003517--.name: Ah, I expected this. Anyone can see that you're pretty wasteful.

0831180509003518--.name: You're even more financially inept than I anticipated. What I mean is, you've already paid me this month.

0831180509003519--.name: Yes, I already knew this would happen. I keep tabs on your bank account, you know. Please don't waste my time on this again. Now, I have some documents to sort through...

0831180509003520--.name: This is hardly ideal. Please don't allow this to happen again.

0831180509003522--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003523--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003525--.name: Time is money, and... aren't your broke? Make this quick.

0831180509003526--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003527--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003529--.name: Our contract has expired. What else is there to discuss?

0831180509003530--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003531--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003533--.name: My contract has expired, and I live and breath by contracts. I can't work until you sign a new one.

0831180509003534--.name: I'm stunned. Did you realize our contract expired, even after I reminded you? So let's talk about that. How could you let this happen?

0831180509003535--.name: It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since our contract expired. You don't need to give me any excuses.

0831180509003537--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003538--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003540--.name: If you don't have anything important to say, I'd like to go. Do you mind?

0831180509003541--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003542--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003544--.name: I don't have time to look after you unless you rehire me, but I'm not leaving either. My desk here is set up just the way I like it. So don't mind me. Just do whatever it is you need to do.

0831180509003545--.name: You've been acting so strange lately, not at all like yourself. What are you up to?

0831180509003546--.name: You want a drink? Really? Do you realize our contract remains unsigned? Now, excuse me. I have business to take care of.

0831180509003549--.name: Please, let's not mix business with pleasure.

0831180509003551--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003552--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003555--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003556--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003558--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003559--.name: I'm rather busy, so make this quick.

0831180509003575--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003576--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003578--.name: $OwnerName$, let's go over your schedule for the day...

0831180509003579--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003580--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003583--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003584--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003586--.name: Be straight with me for a minute.

0831180509003587--.name: You know I'm not working for you because I like you...

0831180509003588--.name: So... why don't you just let me go?

0831180509003589--.name: Hey, your skills are top notch.

0831180509003591--.name: Talking to you makes me feel like I'm losing brain cells.

0831180509003592--.name: Am I really stuck with you?

0831180509003593--.name: Ah, perfect. That's just the way I like it.

0831180509003594--.name: I appreciate your honesty. I may have been wrong about you.

0831180509003595--.name: Why are you staring at me?

0831180509003596--.name: I'm used to people glaring at me at the Black Market, sure, but...

0831180509003597--.name: I don't enjoy being gawked at by you. Please try to stop.

0831180509003600--.name: Perhaps there is such a thing as too much honesty, after all...

0831180509003601--.name: ... Does that mean you're not going to stop?

0831180509003602--.name: Oh. Well, you don't have to go that far. Now things are uncomfortable...

0831180509003603--.name: So you won't do it anymore? Good.

0831180509003605--.name: Some men in masks barged into the house, demanding I hand over everything of value.

0831180509003607--.name: Even in my pencil skirt, I was able to bruise them up pretty good. I'm a certified instructor in several forms of martial arts.

0831180509003608--.name: No need to look so shocked. In my line of work, self-defense is essential. Money makes people desperate, which can lead to crazy behavior, and I have to be able to make decisions without worrying about that.

0831180509003609--.name: $OwnerName$, while you were out, $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ called once and $npcName:11000096[gender:0]$ called twice.

0831180509003610--.name: $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ stated that he received new product, which he thought you might be interested in.

0831180509003611--.name: $npcName:11000096[gender:0]$ called because he can't get a hold of $npcName:11000106[gender:1]$ and was wondering if you knew where she was.

0831180509003612--.name: Later, he called back to ask my name. I guess that part isn't really relevant.

0831180509003613--.name: Now, excuse me. I have some goods to oversee.

0831180509003615--.name: It's a good thing I just made this special juice. Drink it. It'll give you an energy boost.

0831180509003616--.name: I whipped it up myself. Maybe we should name it.

0831180509003617--.name: It has a whole $npcName:21000001$ in it. How about we call it... Power Mush?

0831180509003618--.name: Most of the objects traded at the $map:02000216$ are rare and expensive.

0831180509003619--.name: Why is the $map:02000216$ such a popular place to sell? It should be obvious.

0831180509003620--.name: The $map:02000216$ is the only place you can trade valuable items quickly and safely.

0831180509003621--.name: More importantly, you can remain anonymous. We don't ask questions about where you obtained your item at the $map:02000216$. All we care about is how much it's worth.

0831180509003622--.name: Today was exhausting. Funny how all it takes is a little ignorance to ruin your day, isn't it? We had a new customer show up at the $map:02000216$.

0831180509003623--.name: He paid an exorbitant price for a cheap item without researching what he was buying.

0831180509003624--.name: After he realized it, he raised a real ruckus, screaming that he'd been scammed, we'd hear from his lawyer, yadda yadda.

0831180509003625--.name: It's not our fault he made a poor purchase. Even if we wanted to help, our policy at the $map:02000216$ is to never release the personal information of our sellers.

0831180509003626--.name: Even you aren't above that policy, $OwnerName$, so be careful what you purchase and sell at the $map:02000216$.

0831180509003627--.name: Are you trying to ask about Blackstar? I had no idea you were even aware of that organization.

0831180509003628--.name: Does this mean you've also heard of $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$? What exactly is it that you want to know?

0831180509003629--.name: $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$ is one of the $map:02000216$'s many sponsors. He was instrumental in the establishment of the market.

0831180509003630--.name: Do I hear suspicion in your tone? Are you trying to ruin our business relationship?

0831180509003631--.name: I'm perfectly aware that not everyone has a positive opinion of our business...

0831180509003632--.name: But no one can deny that the $map:02000216$ has helped revitalize the economy in the area.

0831180509003633--.name: Most of the citizens of $map:02000100$, including Mayor $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$, support us. We've made ourselves vital, and now we're unstoppable.

0831180509003634--.name: Ah, this is specifically covered in our contract.

0831180509003635--.name: You'll see in Section IV, Article 17, that for the duration of my period in your employ, you are not to pry into my personal business.

0831180509003636--.name: Now, if you're done trying to break the rules of our contract, I'd like to return to work.

0831180509003637--.name: Such persistence, $OwnerName$! What exactly do you want to know so terribly much?

0831180509003638--.name: My work history? My childhood? My relationship with my family?

0831180509003639--.name: None of that makes a bit of difference. I know who I am: one of the top traders at the $map:02000216$ and your personal secretary. Does the rest matter?

0831180509003640--.name: I do have a hypothetical quandary to discuss with you. I'm interested in your opinion.

0831180509003641--.name: Say there was a girl who grew up in the slums of $map:02000100$. An orphan, with no memory of her parents, begging and stealing and trying to survive.

0831180509003642--.name: Let's say one day she tried to steal a man's wallet and was caught.

0831180509003643--.name: To her surprise, instead of throwing her in jail, the man made a joke, admired her cleverness, then took her to his home, where he gave her clean clothes, a delicious meal, and a safe place to sleep, away from the vultures at the $map:02000100$

0831180509003644--.name: She was so grateful for his kindness, she became determined to pay him back in any way she could. He had changed her life.

0831180509003645--.name: For the next few decades, she worked tirelessly for that man. But then, one day, she learned that was he was doing was... morally abhorrent.

0831180509003646--.name: Since then, she's been torn, unsure whether to follow her moral inclinations or remain loyal to the man who had saved her from a life on the streets. What would you do, if you were her? Remember, I'm asking for a friend.

0831180509003647--.name: You seem awfully curious to find out why I took on secretarial duties.

0831180509003648--.name: Let's just say... I'm doing it as a favor for someone who's been like a father to me since I was a child.

0831180509003649--.name: I'm here to track your every move. That's all I can tell you.

0831180509003650--.name: As for who this man is... Heh. I don't know, why don't you try to find out? It could be someone you know.

0831180509003652--.name: I'm here to see the owner.

0831180509003655--.name: Did you? Strange. I don't have you in the schedule...

0831180509003656--.name: If that's the case, please call me to schedule an appointment first.

0831180509003657--.name: Interesting. If you have business with me, please come see me at the $map:02000216$ instead.

0831180509003658--.name: Do I look like I have time for games?

0831180509003659--.name: I am $MaidName$, $OwnerName$'s personal secretary. And you are...?

0831180509003660--.name: I am the secretary of the owner of this house. Now, care to explain why you barged in uninvited?

0831180509003661--.name: Hello. My name is $MaidName$. From this moment on, I am your secretary.

0831180509003662--.name: Please refrain from asking personal questions.

0831180509003663--.name: May I ask who you are?

0831180509003666--.name: I hope you'll let me know if you're going to be late.

0831180509003670--.name: Yes? Why are you staring at me?

0831180509003671--.name: I'll adjust your schedule for the day.

0831180509003672--.name: Let me give you a briefing of your day.

0831180509003676--.name: Do you have business with me?

0831180509003678--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003679--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003682--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003683--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003686--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003687--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003690--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003691--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003693--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003695--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003696--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003698--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003700--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003701--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003703--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003704--.name: You want to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509003705--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509003707--.name:
Time passes so quickly. Perhaps it's because I'm with you, $OwnerName$.
<font color="#909090">(He smirks.)</font>

0831180509003708--.name: You're paying me already? Hey, that makes you my favorite person today.

0831180509003709--.name: You've been neglecting me, $OwnerName$. I don't like it. Not one bit. If it's because I haven't had time to hang out with you, well, I suppose that makes us even. Let's make up.

0831180509003710--.name: And here I thought you were a lost cause. Things have been tough lately, haven't they? Here, how about a pat on the back? Haha.

0831180509003711--.name: $OwnerName$, did you know our contract expires soon?

0831180509003712--.name: I know you're busy, but you need to pay attention to me sometimes.

0831180509003713--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003714--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003716--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003717--.name: $OwnerName$, things have been so boring here without you.

0831180509003718--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003719--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003721--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003722--.name: Come on, loosen up a bit. Aren't we friends?

0831180509003723--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003724--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003726--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003727--.name: I'm tired. Maybe I should take a nap...

0831180509003728--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003729--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003731--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003732--.name: Aw, $OwnerName$. This is just like when you tell your friends you'll treat them to dinner and the restaurant tells you your card's been declined. It's okay. I understand. Don't worry about me.

0831180509003733--.name: You feeling all right? You've already paid me this month. Let me feel your forehead.

0831180509003734--.name: This is really not the time to make jokes, $OwnerName$. I'm not in the mood. I'm serious!

0831180509003735--.name: Can't believe this is happening to me. Never in my life... Just, give me a minute, okay?

0831180509003736--.name: Okay. It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I was supposed to be paid. Please tell me you have good news.

0831180509003737--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003738--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003740--.name: Can't eat... Can't sleep... My mind just keeps spinning and spinning...

0831180509003741--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003742--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003744--.name: Before I got my big break, things were tough. Real tough. Been thinking about that a lot lately.

0831180509003745--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003746--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003748--.name: Wait, my alarm went off, but I don't have a shoot scheduled... Oh, right. $OwnerName$, my contract expired.

0831180509003749--.name: Why are we talking about that when you let my contract expire. $OwnerName$, give it to my straight. You don't want me around any more?

0831180509003750--.name: Honestly, I don't even understand what's going on any more. I'm not used to rejection. I'll be strong, though.

0831180509003751--.name: But that doesn't mean you should stop worrying about me.

0831180509003752--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003753--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003755--.name: $OwnerName$, just tell me. Don't you want me around any more?

0831180509003756--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003757--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003759--.name: $OwnerName$, I enjoy being around you. But I guess the feeling's not mutual.

0831180509003760--.name: I cook for for you, clean for you, make healthy smoothies for you, give you gifts I got from my fans... Wait, is that what this is about? Because I gave you gifts from my fans?

0831180509003761--.name: $OwnerName$, maybe you should give me control of your accounts in the future. I mean, what are you doing with your money that you can't even pay me?

0831180509003762--.name: Sure, sure. Just say the word.

0831180509003763--.name: I don't mind doing stuff for you.

0831180509003764--.name: I don't mind being stared at, but it makes me blush. Heh.

0831180509003765--.name: Don't worry about me too much.

0831180509003766--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003767--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003769--.name: Don't worry about me too much.

0831180509003770--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003771--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003773--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003784--.name: All right, what do you want to talk about?

0831180509003789--.name: $OwnerName$, things have been so boring here without you.

0831180509003790--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003791--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003793--.name: Come on, loosen up a bit. Aren't we friends?

0831180509003794--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003795--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003797--.name: I'm tired. Maybe I should take a nap...

0831180509003798--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003799--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003801--.name: It's been a while since I had to cook. And I've never really cooked for, you know, someone special. Feels kind of nice.

0831180509003802--.name: Instead of MSG, I put in an extra dose of awesome. Because I'm awesome, get it?

0831180509003803--.name: I can't really tell what flavor you're going for.

0831180509003805--.name: Yeah, everyone tells me my tastes are unique. Might take you some time to get used to it. Not bad, though, right?

0831180509003806--.name: Heh, sorry. Like I said, I don't cook much. Next time, I'll just have something delivered.

0831180509003807--.name: Eat up! I can always make more if you want. I mean, it might take me a while, but I don't mind.

0831180509003808--.name: Uh, yeah? I mean, I made it, didn't I? Of course it's good. I mean, after my last performance, I'm pretty much an artist and cooking is an art, so, you know... the math works.

0831180509003809--.name: I whipped this up just to see if I enjoy cooking. Have a bite?

0831180509003810--.name: Don't give me that look. You know I can't eat it with you. I've got gigs coming up. I've got to watch my weight.

0831180509003812--.name: But you can just do a few extra sit-ups later!

0831180509003813--.name: Hey, my exercise regimen is a delicate balance. Besides, my trainer would kill me.

0831180509003814--.name: I know you can't see through my clothes, but you don't get as cut as I do eating whatever you want. It takes discipline.

0831180509003815--.name:
I do, don't I? I inherited some amazing genes.
<font color="#909090">(He smirks.)</font>

0831180509003816--.name: Can't stop checking me out, can you? I get it. My good looks outshine even my singing and acting skills.

0831180509003817--.name: My company sent me this juicer...

0831180509003818--.name: It's supposed to be able to juice up anything you throw in it. I had to test it out. Here, $OwnerName$, have a taste.

0831180509003821--.name: What? You're rejecting me? Somewhere, some of my fans are about to riot.

0831180509003822--.name: C'mon, I didn't put anything bad in it. At least, smell it! C'mere...

0831180509003823--.name: How is it? Tasty? This is such a great way to clear the fridge of old veggies.

0831180509003824--.name: Hey, you look good when you drink. Have another sip. Yeah, that's it. Now, hold it right there. Amazing!

0831180509003825--.name: Did I tell you I was on a cooking show a while back, $OwnerName$? I thought you might like one of the dishes, so I had them send me the recipe.

0831180509003826--.name: Just think! The exquisiteness of fine cuisine from the comfort of your own home. Let me feed you a bite. And... how is it?

0831180509003829--.name: Ah, yeah. To be expected from a plebeian unaccustomed to the finer things in life. Don't worry, I'll teach you how to enjoy fine dining.

0831180509003830--.name: Oops. Now that I think about it, I may have skipped a step or two of the recipe...

0831180509003831--.name: Of course it is! It's a great recipe prepared by a great guy!

0831180509003832--.name: I'm glad you enjoyed it. Maybe I should have them send me all their best and most secret recipes. Wouldn't you like to try them?

0831180509003833--.name: I got this from a fan, but I'm not quite sure of its purpose...

0831180509003834--.name: Anyway, I have no use for it. Maybe you do, $OwnerName$?

0831180509003835--.name: Oh, no, it's too much. I can't accept that.

0831180509003837--.name: Suit yourself. I'll just keep it.

0831180509003838--.name: Did you just reject me, $OwnerName$? Hah, that's not really something I'm used to...

0831180509003839--.name: Do you even know what it is? Can you... explain how it works?

0831180509003840--.name: Right-o. Just don't tell anyone. I wouldn't want to upset my fans.

0831180509003841--.name: My agent forwarded this to me. It's from the Moms Who Love $MaidName$ fan club.

0831180509003842--.name: Hey, I'm just really lovable, okay? Anyway, I don't need it. You can keep it if you want.

0831180509003844--.name: Gross. This was meant for you.

0831180509003845--.name: Hey, I'm just trying to spread the love. Why is that a problem?

0831180509003846--.name: You don't want it? But it's nice. I'll donate it to a charity auction, I guess.

0831180509003847--.name: Great! I'm glad it's going to a good home. I love all my fans but I've already got too much stuff like that.

0831180509003848--.name: Thanks to my fans, you're getting all kinds of free goodies for your house, $OwnerName$.

0831180509003849--.name: I was using the vacuum to practices some poses when something strange got sucked into it. My curiosity got the best of me, so I opened it up and found this.

0831180509003850--.name: You shouldn't leave stuff like this just sitting around, you know.

0831180509003854--.name: If the vacuum did break, why don't you just get a robot vacuum?

0831180509003855--.name: Remember how I had to spot you for the food delivery guy last time? Well, maybe you should keep your mesos somewhere you can find it for next time.

0831180509003856--.name: Keep your mesos close and your $MaidName$ closer, you know. Hahaha.

0831180509003858--.name: Oh, I got a commercial proposal.

0831180509003859--.name: For an anti-dandruff shampoo, I think.

0831180509003860--.name: There is nothing more special than this moment right here, right now with you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509003861--.name: Just soak it in, $OwnerName$. This moment, free from the raving masses of fans, free to do whatever I want.

0831180509003862--.name: Whew, close one. Even wearing a hat, sunglasses, and even a mask, someone recognized me.

0831180509003863--.name: He kept following me with his camera. I had to circle the neighborhood several times before I snuck away.

0831180509003864--.name: Fame is stressful. You hear me, $OwnerName$?

0831180509003865--.name: A single word of encouragement from you, $OwnerName$, gives me more strength than the support of all the rest of my fans added together.

0831180509003866--.name: Let's not fight and be good to each other always.

0831180509003867--.name: Sometimes my heart races, and I think there's gotta be cameras hidden around the house somewhere. I just get so used to them, you know?

0831180509003868--.name:
Why am I so fearful of a hidden camera? I'll let you figure that one out.
<font color="#909090">(He smirks.)</font>

0831180509003869--.name: You wanna hear my secret, how I captivate my audience?

0831180509003870--.name: I pick one girl and stare at her throughout my performance. I tell myself, "doesn't matter if I'm the handsomest guy here tonight or not, I will make that one girl mine."

0831180509003871--.name: You should see the dreamy look those girls get. Because, let's face it, I'm always the handsomest guy around.

0831180509003872--.name: Why are you giving me that look? You know it's true!

0831180509003873--.name: I'm surprised you even care. Do you want to become a singer, $OwnerName$? Or do you just want to know about me?

0831180509003874--.name: When the going gets tough, the tough come home.

0831180509003875--.name: You know I'll always be here to welcome you home, don't you, $OwnerName$?

0831180509003876--.name: Why are you smiling? What's the good news? Then again, everyone who looks at me can't help but smile.

0831180509003877--.name: Some of them even forget to close their mouths and start to drool. Might be a cute look on you, $OwnerName$. Hahaha.

0831180509003878--.name: Don't believe the news! It's not true!

0831180509003879--.name: We only had dinner together once! And I haven't seen her since!

0831180509003880--.name: Oh. You haven't seen the news. And you don't care. Well, then.

0831180509003881--.name: A while back, I was practicing my singing when someone banged at the door. I guess I was a little too loud.

0831180509003882--.name: Still, even if it was just practice, I mean, it was me. It should've sounded amazing.

0831180509003883--.name: Maybe that's why she didn't yell. She just glanced around the house one time, then left.

0831180509003884--.name: Before I got my big break, there was this girl I liked. She wanted to be a singer, too, and we practiced together.

0831180509003885--.name: We were both broke, but we'd share what little food we had, practice all night, and wait for the first bus of the day together. But then, right before our debut...

0831180509003886--.name: She fainted in the middle of practice. They rushed her to the hospital, and we found out she was really, really sick. It was her lifelong dream to sing in front of a huge audience, but...

0831180509003887--.name: She died before her dream could come true. What was supposed to be our debut just became my solo debut...

0831180509003888--.name: Why are you giving me that suspicious look? Do you know?!

0831180509003890--.name: I'm a fraud! A big stinkin' liar!

0831180509003891--.name: Of course you figured it out, $OwnerName$. I mean, we live together!

0831180509003892--.name: I just want you to know, I'm going to tell my fans soon, I swear. But I'll say it out loud to your first.

0831180509003893--.name: Ugh, this is tough! Okay... so... the height listed in my profile... it includes the two inches of the heel of my shoes, plus two thick layers of inner soles! Aah, please don't look at me differently now!!

0831180509003894--.name: How can I help you? Oh, let me put on my mask. That's better. Now, are you here to see the owner of this house?

0831180509003898--.name: Really? You're not here for... me? Are you sure? Didn't we meet once at the subway station? Or maybe it was a convenience store? You wanted my autograph, right?

0831180509003899--.name: Whew! I'm so, so, so glad you didn't recognize me! Huh? What? I didn't say anything!

0831180509003900--.name: Ah, so you're a fan? How did you find me? Haha, I can give you an autograph, but please, no pictures. I don't have my make-up on.

0831180509003901--.name: If you're not here for that then... Wait, wait. I got it. You're from a hidden camera show, aren't you? Hah hah, good one. All right, where's the camera?

0831180509003902--.name: That's a secret. It's better if you don't know. I'm sorry I sang so loudly and excellently that you couldn't help but barge in to see my beautiful face, but... well... okay, one autograph won't hurt.

0831180509003903--.name: Excuse me?! You... don't know? Do you live under a rock or something? Hmph.

0831180509003908--.name: You're home awfully late, aren't you?

0831180509003910--.name: I'm feeling a little under the weather...

0831180509003912--.name: The lips, the teeth, the tip of the tongue. Ah ah ahhhh.

0831180509003913--.name: Feeling a bit starstruck, are we?

0831180509003914--.name: My ears itch. Someone must be talking about me.

0831180509003916--.name: If I do it like this...

0831180509003917--.name: I might be a little tired.

0831180509003918--.name: Spider!! ...Oh, it's just a dust ball.

0831180509003921--.name: Hi, $OwnerName$, what can I do for you?

0831180509003922--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003923--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003925--.name: Today is quite wonderful, isn't it?

0831180509003926--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003927--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003929--.name: Hmm... This might be a problem... Maybe?

0831180509003930--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003931--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003933--.name: Hi, $OwnerName$, what can I do for you?

0831180509003934--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003935--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003937--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003938--.name: Today is quite wonderful, isn't it?

0831180509003939--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003940--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003942--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003943--.name: Hmm... This might be a problem... Maybe?

0831180509003944--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003945--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003947--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003948--.name: You want to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509003949--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509003951--.name: Are you sure you want to pay me already? I won't stop you if you insist, but please make sure people know I didn't request it.

0831180509003952--.name: I got paid! Hmm, should I ask $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ out for lunch? What do you think?

0831180509003953--.name: Where did you get so much money? Well, I'm not complaining...

0831180509003954--.name: Er, last I checked, you didn't have enough money. You d-didn't do anything illegal to get this money, did you? Please let it be known that I never once nagged you for my paycheck, $OwnerName$.

0831180509003955--.name: Excuse me, $OwnerName$. Our employment contract expires in a few days. Just wanted you to know.

0831180509003957--.name: I need you to craft something.
