0831180509006026--.name: I mean it! I know I'm not the timid fairfolk he thinks I am! I'm bold... and I'm magnanimous and forgiving! That's right, I'm pretty amazing!

0831180509006027--.name: A s-stranger...?! D-did you come for me?!

0831180509006031--.name: B-but wh-what for? I-I didn't do anything wrong!

0831180509006032--.name: Wh-what kind of business do you have with me? I'm one of the fairfolk! I c-can illusion you!! I can!!

0831180509006033--.name: Whew! ...Then why are you in this house?

0831180509006034--.name: Really? You scared me for a moment.

0831180509006035--.name: My name is $MaidName$. I'm one of the good fairies.

0831180509006036--.name: A fairfolk can stay in a human's house.  There's nothing wrong with that!

0831180509006037--.name: I've never lived with a human before!

0831180509006038--.name: This is going to be fun!

0831180509006045--.name: I might as well cast some illusions...

0831180509006046--.name: This place is filled with wonderful things!

0831180509006048--.name: I'm so good at cleaning now.

0831180509006049--.name: I like laundry the best. I can take a bubble bath at the same time!

0831180408000009--.name: It's time to clean my helmet! Oink-oink!

0831180408000010--.name: Who are you? Who are you?

0831180408000015--.name: Baa, I only eat the red herbs, baa!

0831180408000016--.name: I'm not just any sheep, baaa!

0831180408000032--.name: Flies... I want to eat them...

0831180408000033--.name: Mosquitoes... I want to eat them...

0831180408000034--.name: Cockroaches... I want to eat them...

0831180408000035--.name: Crabby corn dog? Is that... good?

0831180408000040--.name: This is the power of Lapenta!

0831180408000044--.name: We'll show you an awesome dance!

0831180408000046--.name: Caw! Have you seen my husband?

0831180408000047--.name: Caw, caw! My wife nags so much!

0831180408000051--.name: Did you know that fairy water works as an antidote?

0831180408000055--.name: That thing around your neck... Not bad...

0831180408000064--.name: Hm... Are you a black belt?

0831180408000065--.name: Best not to loiter around Golden Tower.

0831180408000066--.name: If you find something suspicious, take it to Golden Tower.

0831180408000067--.name: Heeey... When does the calibration end?

0831180408000080--.name: The voices of the dead cannot be silenced...

0831180408000082--.name: I want to find... eternal rest...

0831180408000086--.name: Looks like you found something tasty... Stop staring!

0831180408000087--.name: An egg has arrived! An egg!

0831180408000088--.name: These days I'm too stopped up... quack quack!

0831180408000089--.name: So many darn flies! Quack quack!

0831180408000090--.name: Call me if your toilet gets clogged, quack quack!

0831180408000093--.name: My head hurts so much... I can't remember...

0831180408000094--.name: Ahhhh... My head is killing me...

0831180408000099--.name: Kee-aak! This strength...! What is it?

0831180408000103--.name: I am the lord of this castle.

0831180408000104--.name: Is this strangeness the will of the gods?

0831180408000108--.name: Oh, my! I heard of something delicious... Was it called rib eye?

0831180408000109--.name: Calling me a stupid animal... I hear everything.

0831180408000110--.name: Vandalism? What are you talking about?

0831180408000111--.name: Mother said not to play with your food.

0831180408000112--.name: I picked up a hat on the road today.

0831180408000113--.name: I dream of becoming a dancer someday.

0831180408000123--.name: Shoes? Shoes? Have you seen? Have you?

0831180408000124--.name: What? Who is it? What's going on?

0831180408000129--.name: Some call me... the onion knight.

0831180408000130--.name: The seeds of the world tree gave me strength.

0831180408000135--.name: All we have to do is follow their orders.

0831180408000136--.name: What is happening to the world?

0831180408000145--.name: I got lost in the Temporal Crevice...

0831180408000146--.name: How interesting... To be talking to a human...

0831180408000147--.name: Human... I suggest you not get ahead of yourself.

0831180408000148--.name: I'll train as hard as I can, and then take revenge... Ow, owww!

0831180408000150--.name: Hey, you! You wanna join the Jawbreakers?

0831180408000151--.name: Kreee, kreeee! We await our prince!

0831180408000152--.name: I was thrown out of Helping Hands! Kreee, kreeee!

0831180408000153--.name: Shall I bring a cup of warm tea? Oh, right, I finished it all. Kreee, kreeee!

0831180408000155--.name: These are surely the tricks of the unknown.

0831180408000157--.name: These are surely the tricks of the unknown.

0831180408000159--.name: These are surely the tricks of the unknown.

0831180408000160--.name: I just want to live here with my friends in peace...

0831180408000161--.name: Haven't you heard? Great things come in small packages!

0831180408000162--.name: A warm, damp area... This must be heaven!

0831180408000163--.name: Grave robbing? There's no such thing.

0831180408000165--.name: Such a sweet smell! I think it's somewhere around here...

0831180408000166--.name: Lapenta has unified us! We are one!

0831180408000167--.name: Hiding here will ensure our safety.

0831180408000186--.name: I'm not a weak bunny anymore!

0831180408000191--.name: You know that fairies dislike humans, right? That means you!

0831180408000193--.name: Constant exercise is the key to a healthy body.

0831180408000194--.name: Hey, you! Get out of the way!

0831180408000196--.name: No one is allowed inside Vayar Mountain...

0831180408000197--.name: Do not covet the ancient treasure...

1228151408000495--.name: Move! You're in the way of the healing!

0831180408000203--.name: Kee... This strength... I can't handle it...

0831180408000210--.name: Ack! Should I back off for now?

0831180408000212--.name: It's... It's probably best to back away!

0831180408000215--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180408000217--.name: I won't let you get away!

0831180408000218--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180408000221--.name: I want to increase my job rank already! I want to get on with it!

0831180408000222--.name: When can I get a new rank…?

0831180408000223--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180408000228--.name: Just hold out a bit longer!

1011145608000510--.name: The Green Hoods are here to help!

1011145608000511--.name: This crossbow can pierce his armor.

1011145608000513--.name: The Green Hoods are here to help!

0831180408000235--.name: The prisoners are waiting for us!

1211110708000471--.name: The ultimate paradise is here, just for you!

1215172808000473--.name: You can earn everything here with talent alone.

1215172808000474--.name: This is no fantasy. It's real!

1215172808000475--.name: Where's that place you mentioned before?

1215172808000476--.name: You said to meet on the second floor. Where are you?

1215172808000477--.name: If you get to the second floor, you can earn a lot of money.

1215172808000478--.name: Hello. How can I help you?

0831180408000238--.name: Eee hee hee! I'm gonna hit you!

0831180408000239--.name: Looks like meat's back on the menu!

0831180408000240--.name: I'll never be able to forget that day...

0831180408000244--.name: Alberto is dead...? It can't be...

0831180408000249--.name: Roanna... I'm a bit... I'm a bit sorry.

0831180408000251--.name: I know how to control the winds! And it's a seeeecret!

0831180408000252--.name: The strength of dark magic is amazing...

0831180408000253--.name: Aaaaaah... My head... Who am I?

0831180408000254--.name: Darn buzzies... What's wrong with sharing a little?

0831180408000255--.name: Doctor Kernel... An unforgettable name... Heh heh...

0831180408000256--.name: The path of a master is long and rough!

0831180408000262--.name: Do you wish to join the dead?

0831180408000263--.name: Do you wish to join the dead?

0831180408000264--.name: Do you wish to join the dead?

0831180408000265--.name: This flower on my back will never wither.

0831180408000266--.name: I know all there is to know in this world.

0831180408000267--.name: I've already lived 1438 years. It's not unusual for one to get tired of living after so long...

0831180408000269--.name: My house is my house. Your house is your house!

0831180408000270--.name: A man with a bamboo hat?

0831180408000271--.name: The person that gave me strength when I fell to a trap... Who was it?

0831180408000272--.name: Ack... My head hurts... Who... Who am I...? What am I...?

0831180408000273--.name: Watch your manners in front of the king.

0831180408000275--.name: Want to play with me? Heh heh...

0831180408000280--.name: I don't want to be left behind again...

0831180408000282--.name: Heh... I'm no longer a weakling!

0831180408000284--.name: Why do you keep hanging around?

0831180408000285--.name: You want a taste of my bat?

0831180408000291--.name: Keeee... This is the power of Lapenta!

0831180408000296--.name: Vayar is a soulless existence... right?

0831180408000297--.name: Keeek! The shadow's strength is getting weaker...

0831180408000298--.name: Commander... We should retreat for now!

0831180408000299--.name: Water is the source of life... Don't mistreat it...

0831180408000300--.name: Water is the source of life... Don't mistreat it...

0831180408000301--.name: Once, I lived in peace with my family...

0831180408000302--.name: My egg! I won't forgive the thief...

0831180408000311--.name: The shadow's strength is getting weaker...

0831180408000316--.name: Booboo! The human! Attack the human!

0831180408000317--.name: So the thing is... Um... What was our plan, Booboo...?

0831180408000318--.name: Googoo! The human! Attack the human!

0831180408000319--.name: So the thing is... Um... What was our plan, Googoo...?

0831180408000320--.name: Moomoo! The human! Attack the human!

0831180408000321--.name: So the thing is... Um... What was our plan, Moomoo...?

0831180408000326--.name: A long time ago, the ancients created us...

0831180408000327--.name: Complete the mission to protect Vayar Mountain...

1219115008000482--.name: Vayar is a soulless existence... right?

1219115008000483--.name: Keeek! The shadow's strength is getting weaker...

1219115008000487--.name: The shadow's strength is getting weaker...

1219115008000488--.name: Booboo! The human! Attack the human!

1219115008000489--.name: So the thing is... Um... What was our plan, Booboo...?

1219115008000492--.name: Complete the mission to protect Vayar Mountain...

1219115008000493--.name: Keeek! The shadow's strength is getting weaker...

0831180408000329--.name: Hands where I can see them!

0831180408000331--.name: These mines will be the last thing you ever see, slave!

0816084808000505--.name: Come closer. I'll show you the way.

0831180408000388--.name: The power of darkness is waning...

0831180408000393--.name: Kkyak! Apple, apple! It's mine! Kkyak!!

0831180408000398--.name: Eh... I just want to sleep...

0831180408000401--.name: I'll sleep first and deal with it later...

0831180408000402--.name: I feel like I've awoken from a dream...

0831180408000407--.name: How dare you touch the safe... Fearless, aren't you?

0831180408000409--.name: How dare they rob Ralph's safe!

0623101708000497--.name: Ugh... So much for taking on the Champ.

0623101708000498--.name:
Y-you just watch! 
I'll be back!

0623101708000499--.name: My nunchaku skills... failed me?! Impossible...

0831180408000415--.name: I thought when you died... That was the end.

0831180408000425--.name: A man with a bamboo hat?

0831180408000426--.name: Watch your manners in front of the king.

0831180408000429--.name: I was created for the mission...

0831180408000432--.name: Who are you? Who are you?

0831180408000434--.name: There aren't many of my people left...

0831180407000003--.name: ...And this knucklehead, where in the world is he?

0831180407000005--.name: My son is a bit... no, he's very hard-headed. I lost my patience with him, and well... He stormed out of the house and hasn't returned yet.

0831180407000006--.name: Sigh... People are right when they say parenting is the world's hardest job.

0831180407000007--.name: It's a beautiful day today. Hopefully it'll stay that way...

0831180407000008--.name: As the elder of this village, I'm doing my best to keep its residents safe. But there's little I could do about the seal of the Land of Darkness breaking, and now something terrible seems to happen every day.

0831180407000009--.name: The only wish I have now is for peace. $MyPCName$, I'm relying on you for that.

0831180407000011--.name: Now that the court's been canceled, everyone has been clearing out of here. I used to pray for this day to come, but now the city feels so empty.

0831180407000012--.name: Welcome, $MyPCName$. I was just about done with this batch of cookies. Would you like to wait for them? My fresh-baked cookies are famous here in $map:02000001$, you know.

0831180407000013--.name: That $npc:11000055[gender:0]$, where did he go this time?

0831180407000014--.name: What should I make for dinner tonight?

0831180407000016--.name: Did you really think you could hide that? Hmph!

0831180407000018--.name: I don't care why the court was canceled anymore. I've heard every rumor under the sun, and now they're saying it was an earthquake? Ridiculous! All I want now is to kick back.

0831180407000019--.name: Bah, everyone acts like they're the busiest person in the world. Everyone here in $map:02000001$ spends their day rushing around like fools. Seriously!

1215102407009688--.name: Have you heard the rumors going around?

1215102407009689--.name: For the last time, I'm not adopted! Mom says its normal for babies to come out giant and furry sometimes. If you want a real rumor, you should hear about the giant demons zipping around the sky.

1215102407009691--.name: You didn't know? It's all anyone's talking about lately. I've heard talk that they've been kidnapping people.

1215102407009692--.name: Do you actually know of any victims?

1215102407009693--.name: Yeah, the appear like a flash of lightning. In the blink of an eye, the person next to you is gone. Just like that!

1215102407009694--.name: Err... No. I'm just telling you what I heard!

0831180407000020--.name: Let's see... So, this book goes...

0831180407000021--.name: Ahh, it's going to take forever to organize these books!

0831180407000023--.name: Please, try not to step on the books on the floor.

0831180407000024--.name: $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ has a bad habit of returning books late.

0105003907007665-NPCPortal01-.name: Keep your eyes open. I don't like this.

0116174407009791--.name: Is there anything that you can't learn in a book?

0116174407009792--.name: Here's a familiar face. Have you finally decided to focus on higher education? I knew you'd come around eventually.

0116174407009793--.name: Actually, I'm here to do some research on Orbis.

0116174407009794--.name: Ah, the floating city. It was world-famous for its astonishing vistas. Unfortunately, it was destroyed in the war.

0116174407009795--.name: Even though the city is in ruins, the city center still burns to this day. Not a very pleasant place to live these days.

0116174407009796--.name: What else can you tell me about it?

0116174407009797--.name: That depends. What, specifically, do you want to know?

0116174407009798--.name: If Orbis is still on fire, where is the heat coming from?

0116174407009799--.name: Ah, now that is a curious question! I think I read something about that once...

0116174407009800--.name: In Orbis, the floating city, a very special cave exists. A cave where magma flows endlessly.

0116174407009801--.name: Do you know where the cave is?

0116174407009802--.name: No, but it shouldn't be too hard for me to find out. Actually getting to Orbis, however, is a fool's errand. I doubt anybody could survive there for long.

0116174407009803--.name: It's a good thing I'm not just anybody.

0116174407009804--.name: Hopelessly reckless, as usual. I'll tell you where to go, but that's it. I'll have nothing more to do with this.

0116174407009806--.name: Don't mention it. Please. You'll forgive me for not seeing you off...

0504174607009860--.name: Is there nothing you can't learn from a book?

0831180407000028--.name: I wonder how Captain $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is doing...

0831180407000029--.name: Platoon leader of the Green Hoods, at your service. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ sent me here to watch over $map:02000146$.

0831180407000030--.name: There's one person whom I admire more than $npc:11000015[gender:1]$, and it's my father. He died of illness when I was young, but the bow he carved for me was my inspiration to join this militia.

0831180407000031--.name: I'll do my best to become a good militia member, so I can believe my father would be proud of me.

0831180407000033--.name: We'll follow Captain $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ to the end!

0831180407000035--.name: We must train harder in trying times.

0831180407000036--.name: If you want to join the Green Hoods, then head to $npc:11000045[gender:0]$.

0831180407000037--.name: Welcome to $map:02000076$. How may I help you?

0831180407000039--.name: What happened to the empress's celebration?

0831180407000040--.name: Hey there. I'm new in town.

0831180407000042--.name: $map:02000076$ used to be the home of archers and craftsmen, all living in a collective. They produced many great works and great hunters, generation after generation.

0831180407000043--.name: The Green Hoods formed to protect the village from outside threats to their peace. Their current leader is their fifth, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$.

0831180407000044--.name: Is $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ the chief of this village? Ha ha, no. Henesys's chief is $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s father and $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were young.

0831180407000045--.name: That's why $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ takes care of $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ like his own. You know, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ doesn't like people talking about her. So, maybe don't tell her about this conversation?

0831180407000046--.name: I've heard a great earthquake occurred near $map:02000001$, and the empress's court was canceled as a result. I hope the damage isn't too serious. That disaster might also keep $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ from returning anytime soon.

0831180407000047--.name: $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ won't tolerate anyone trying to take advantage of a chaotic situation. I hope he'll be back soon. We need him more than ever.

0831180407000048--.name: You've probably noticed that the Green Hoods are all archers. We're renowned throughout Victoria Island for our marksmanship, and even $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$, the master archer of $map:02000001$, is a Green Hood.

0831180407000049--.name: In fact, she taught me everything I know about loosing a bow. If you're interested in archery yourself, I'd suggest paying her a visit next time you're in the capital.

0831180407000050--.name: Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a house of their own. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is doing what he can to manage the housing lots around the village, but there's only so much land.

0831180407000051--.name: If you don't have a house yet, you could settle down in $map:02000076$. $map:02000105$ is also quite nice, and is famous for its beautiful maple trees. There might be some empty lots still available in $map:02000104$ or $map:02000143$ as well. If you're looking for more affordable options, then you can check out the apartments in $map:02000105$ or $map:02000104$.

0831180407000052--.name: There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling the ant tunnels.

0831180407000053--.name: And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

0831180407000054--.name: If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000076$ first.

0831180407000056--.name: So, the time has come for me to intervene.

0831180407000058--.name: Have you heard of $map:02000051$? The cliffs there are so treacherous that most people wouldn't dare climb it.

0831180407000059--.name: If you have the chance, you should visit $map:02000051$ and visit my dad. Tell him you're $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$'s friend and you'll be like one of the family.

0831180407000061--.name: Oh, don't worry. You'll know him when you see him.

0831180407000062--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407000063--.name: The open court is canceled, but I'm still as busy as ever.

0831180407000064--.name: I deliver every package that comes to $map:02000001$.

0831180407000066--.name: If I keep working like this, exhaustion's going to get me. And what's worse is that $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$ still won't appreciate all my hard work! You know, it's so hard to take care of $map:02000001$ by myself.

0105003907007666-NPCPortal01-.name: Give me a moment, I'll open up a portal for you to take.

0831180407000068--.name: Maybe I'll find something valuable if I search hard enough...

0831180407000069--.name: W-who are you? You better not be here to steal anything. This is my spot!

0831180407000072--.name: Hey, no! Get out! If we take too much stuff, they'll notice for sure!

0831180407000073--.name: Oh, okay. Good. You'd better get out of here then, before someone sees you. And don't tell anyone you saw me in here!

0831180407000075--.name: Don't let your guard down, even for a second.

0831180407000076--.name: I'm worried about the elder's health.

0831180407000077--.name: What brings you to this place?

0831180407000079--.name: I came to $map:02000076$ to see the elder.

0831180407000082--.name: Do you have a reason for coming to see me?

0831180407000083--.name: I just thought I'd say hi.

0831180407000086--.name: Well, you're just being ridiculous. I've no time for that. Excuse me.

0831180407000087--.name: $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$'s house is on the hill behind the clock tower in the center of the village. He's always there, keeping an eye on everyone.

0831180407000088--.name: I see. All I'll say then is that if you need help, the militia is always here.

0831180407000089--.name: I hope I didn't upset you. You certainly don't have to explain yourself. But if you do, the rest of the militia and I may be able to help.

0105003907007667-NPCPortal01-.name: Let me open up a portal so you can get there quickly.

0831180407000090--.name: Hm hm hmmm, hm! Those marching songs always get stuck in my head.

0831180407000091--.name: If there isn't a path, I'll carve one out myself!

0831180407000092--.name: If only there were a safer way to $map:02000001$...

0831180407000095--.name: Well, if you're trying to get to $map:02000001$, I've got some bad news for you.. We just had a big earthquake that split the road there in half. No one can make the journey now.

0831180407000096--.name: As if that weren't bad enough, rough seas are preventing ships from entering or leaving the harbor. We're all stuck here!

0831180407000097--.name: Is there no other way to get to $map:02000001$?

0831180407000099--.name: I've heard there's a wilderness path that connects $map:02000115$ and $map:02000116$, but no one's been taking it. Supposedly it's a bit... dangerous.

0831180407000100--.name: Uhh... Lith isn't that kind of port, buddy.

1111011407007374--.name: It's through a mountain path northwest of $map:02000062$. The path's been closed for ages, though. Too treacherous for most folks. I'd forget about it if I were you.

0831180407000102--.name: The road has been cut off. I wonder if the porters are safe.

0831180407000103--.name: By the way, what caused that earthquake all of a sudden?

0831180407000104--.name: I still can't believe that the road to $map:02000001$ is out. All the supplies for the empress's court have been sent along that road. Do you think anyone fell in when the ground opened up? Yeesh.

0831180407000105--.name: The open court of the empress is just around the corner, and yet bad things are happening constantly around here. First the supply carriage was robbed, and then the earthquake happened. All I wanted was for all this to go smoothly.

0831180407000107--.name: My grandson is so rebellious that he's going to give me a heart attack. I miss the days when he would just listen.

0831180407000108--.name: The whole world is excited about the empress finally holding court again.

0831180407000109--.name: I don't know what to do to get through to $npcName:11000054[gender:0]$.

0831180407000110--.name: $npcName:11000054[gender:0]$ is as stubborn as a mule. Please find him before he leaves $map:63000001$.

0831180407000113--.name: Why do people keep coming to the harbor? Don't they know the routes are blocked?

0831180407000114--.name: Are you heading to $map:02000001$. You know that the way is blocked, right?

0831180407000117--.name: Good, I don't have to explain it to you. So... if you can't get to $map:02000001$, what are you going to do?

0831180407000120--.name: What are you gonna do, fly? The road is gone! It has ceased to be! You need to be realistic about this.

0831180407000121--.name: Seriously, have a look at $map:02000115$. Let me know what you think of the terrible, yawning chasm of doom in your way. I'll wait.

0831180407000122--.name: That's understandable. $map:02000001$ has it all, and all we've got is... fish. Might as well head home once you've got your fill of fish, huh?

0831180407000123--.name: It sure is. The Royal Road is the main route from this harbor to $map:02000001$, and it was cracked open by the earthquake that happened the other day. Now no one can get to $map:02000001$.

0831180407000124--.name: If you don't believe me, go to $map:02000115$ and see for yourself.

0831180407000126--.name: Are you also trying to attend the court? I was on my way there... stopping to sample some delicious food along the way, of course... and had my plans dashed by this wretched rift! I suppose I could try the forest, but it's fairly frightening.

0831180407000127--.name: Wait, can you get around the rift through the forest?

0831180407000128--.name: That's what I heard! Follow the path between the trees over there to $map:02000116$, and then keep on until you get to $map:02000001$.

0831180407000129--.name: I wouldn't try it if I were you, though. A few folks have faced the forest... but none have returned from $map:02000116$.

0831180407000130--.name: Welp, so much for my plans!

0831180407000131--.name: I bet the food at the court festival is so good...

0831180407000132--.name: Ah, it's time to eat! Mom must be looking for me.

0831180407000134--.name: Now we're having earthquakes out of the blue?

0831180407000135--.name: I can't believe we're reopening this road...

0831180407000136--.name: Have you seen the Royal Road? Or rather, what's left of it? A huge earthquake tore right through it! Everyone who wants to get to $map:02000001$ is stuck here now.

0831180407000137--.name: $map:02000001$ is so close, and yet so far. Those who came by ship to attend the court are beyond disappointed. That's why we've decided to open the mountain path. To those who are authorized to use it, of course.

1215093407009645--.name: Hm? How may I help you?

1215093407009646--.name: What can you tell me about trading airships?

1215093407009647--.name: Oh! Well, there was some kind of new-old technological development that recently opened the skies to trade. Flying boats, what a concept!

1215093407009648--.name: But, from what I've heard, only a fraction of the airships going out ever come back...

1215093407009649--.name: What do you mean by that?

1215093407009650--.name: The airships vanish into... well, thin air! Once they set off for the skies, they just don't come back.

1215093407009651--.name: Does anyone know what happens to them?

1215093407009652--.name: I haven't the faintest idea. Anyway, that's all I know.

0831180407000139--.name: You don't look like you're from around here. Did you come to see the court?

0831180407000142--.name: Oh, cool! I was planning on attending myself.

0831180407000143--.name: I asked my brother to see the court with me, but he was more interested in catching some kind of fish while they were in season. I suppose it's good that he didn't come, now that the road to $map:02000001$ is out.

0831180407000145--.name: How could you not have heard? The Royal Road leading to $map:02000001$ was torn up by the earthquake the other day. Can't be good for holding court, y'know?

0831180407000146--.name: Hey, now. No need to be like that. I was just making conversation.

0831180407000147--.name: That $npc:11000023[gender:0]$, where in the world is he?

0831180407000148--.name: Why is this happening when the court is set to open in just a few days?

0831180407000150--.name: I've got halibut, rockfish, turbot, mackerel, stingray, you name it!

1215100607009653--.name: Fresh fish! We catch 'em, you buy 'em!

1215100607009654--.name: I have something to ask you.

1215100607009655--.name: Oh, all right. How can I help you, dear?

1215100607009656--.name: What can you tell me about trading airships?

1215100607009657--.name: You mean those new-fangled boats with wings? They show up in $map:02000062$ from time to time. I've gotta tell you, that's not a sight you'll soon forget.

1215100607009658--.name: Have you heard anything about them... disappearing?

1215100607009659--.name: Disappearing? Hm... The ones passing through $map:02000062$ never seem to have any trouble...

1215100607009661--.name: Well no, I've never actually seen one in flight. But I can't imagine why they'd have wings if they didn't fly!

1215100607009663--.name: Let me know if you ever see one fly.

1215100607009664--.name: It seems like the airships traveling by sea are fine...

1215100607009665--.name: Uhh. Good? Now are you sure you don't want any fish?

0831180407000152--.name: We'll follow Captain $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ to the end!

0831180407000153--.name: I hope this peace will last forever.

0831180407000155--.name: We must preserve the order of Maple World.

0831180407000156--.name: Welcome to $map:02000076$. How may I help you?

0831180407000158--.name: What happened to the empress's celebration?

0831180407000159--.name: Hey there. I'm new in town.

0831180407000161--.name: $map:02000076$ used to be the home of archers and craftsmen, all living in a collective. They produced many great works and great hunters, generation after generation.

0831180407000162--.name: The Green Hoods formed to protect the village from outside threats to their peace. Their current leader is their fifth, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$.

0831180407000163--.name: Is $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ the chief of this village? Ha ha, no. The chief of $map:02000076$ is $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s father and $npc:11000001[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were young.

0831180407000164--.name: That's why $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ takes care of $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ like his own. You know, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ doesn't like people talking about her. So, maybe don't tell her about this conversation?

0831180407000165--.name: I've heard a great earthquake occurred near $map:02000001$, and the empress's court was canceled as a result. I hope the damage isn't too serious. That disaster might also keep $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ from returning anytime soon.

0831180407000166--.name: $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ won't tolerate anyone trying to take advantage of a chaotic situation. I hope he'll be back soon. We need him more than ever.

0831180407000167--.name: You've probably noticed that the Green Hoods are all archers. We're renowned throughout Victoria Island for our marksmanship, and even $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$, the master archer of $map:02000001$, is a Green Hood.

0831180407000168--.name: In fact, she taught me everything I know about loosing a bow. If you're interested in archery yourself, I'd suggest paying her a visit next time you're in the capital.

0831180407000169--.name: Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a house of their own. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is doing what he can to manage the housing lots around the village, but there's only so much land.

0831180407000170--.name: If you don't have a house yet, you could settle down in $map:02000076$. $map:02000105$ is also quite nice, and is famous for its beautiful maple trees. There might be some empty lots still available in $map:02000104$ or $map:02000143$ as well. If you're looking for more affordable options, then you can check out the apartments in $map:02000105$ or $map:02000104$.

0831180407000171--.name: There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling the ant tunnels.

0831180407000172--.name: And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

0831180407000173--.name: If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000076$ first.

0831180407000174--.name: I hope I'll make lots of new allies.

0831180407000175--.name: Yes? Yes? What do you need? How can I help?

0831180407000176--.name: This is my fault. All my fault!

0831180407000177--.name: I messed up. I messed it all up. Woe is meee!

0831180407000179--.name: There's no package the teeth can't carry!

0831180407000180--.name: Bullies are the worst. How can anyone pick on someone weaker than themselves?

0831180407000182--.name: The power of the Green Lapenta is especially strong here in $map:02000023$. That vital force protects this place from darkness.

0105003907007668-NPCPortal01-.name: Your pure energy is forming a new portal!

0831180407000184--.name: We should let $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ know his identity and ask for advice. Meet me in $map:02000035$.

0831180407000186--.name: I've got plenty of books I want to read, but not enough time to do it.

0831180407000187--.name: I'll never get tired of this book, no matter how many times I read it.

0831180407000188--.name: Ancient tomes containing stories of this world must be handled with care. They can teach us many important lessons.

0530154307008539--.name: Are you lost? Why are you bothering me?

0530154307008541--.name: Just thought I'd pay you a social visit.

0530154307008542--.name: $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ says you're all right, so fine. Off you go.

0530154307008543--.name: All right, then. I hope you're enjoying $map:02000023$.

0530154307008544--.name: The ancient records of our history must be handled with care. They teach us many important lessons.

0831180407000191--.name: Nothing's more important than peace of mind. I find mine snuggled up safe in bed.

0831180407000193--.name: What kind of fun should I have today?

0831180407000194--.name: I can't wait to see Mom!

0831180407000195--.name: The world is so scary sometimes. Be careful, $MyPCName$!

0831180407000197--.name: Don't forget to appreciate the little things.

0831180407000198--.name: The flowers and trees seem so lively today!

0831180407000199--.name: Love the flowers and trees as you love yourself. Without them, you wouldn't exist.

0831180407000203--.name: One day, I'm going to go out and explore the world! You'll join me when I do, right $MyPCName$?

1130105307004657--.name: I see you've brought me some $itemPlural:30000435$.

1130105307004659--.name: Well... You see, that needs some special purging magic... $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ and the fairies think I'm too young to learn that kind of magic. They won't even let me gather $itemPlural:30000435$.

1130105307004660--.name: Even if I can't cast neat purifying spells, at least I can collect $itemPlural:30000435$ from adventurers like you. If I get enough flowers, maybe $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ will finally let me do the fun stuff. When he does, bring me more flowers, okay?

0831180407000205--.name: Nothing in this world lasts forever.

0831180407000206--.name: May the ancestors keep you safe.

0831180407000208--.name: Sometimes you get what you want. Sometimes you must settle.

0831180407000210--.name: I've gotten a little too lenient...

0831180407000212--.name: I'll admit, not everyone in Dark Wind was happy when I took over. Many were loyal to Captain Winn, not the organization. After he passed away, $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ took some of our best agents and left.

0831180407000213--.name: But I have my own principles to follow and I intend to lead Dark Wind in my own way. Winn Stilton was a great man, but we won't live in his shadow.

0831180407000214--.name: The others may not be on board yet, but they'll come around. Eventually.

0105003907007669-NPCPortal01-.name: Give me a moment for me to open a portal for you.

0831180407000217--.name: Hm... What should I cook for dinner tonight?

0831180407000218--.name: I used to love hearing the sound of bow craftsmen carving wood. The most talented of them all was Freeman.

0831180407000219--.name: He was $npcName:11000007[gender:1]$'s father. It's a shame an illness took him so early, but he would surely approve of the woman his daughter grew to be.

0831180407000221--.name: I'm going to let the rest of the world know what a great place $map:63000001$ is!

0831180407000222--.name: $MyPCName$, do you know what the pride of $map:63000001$ is?

0831180407000225--.name: That's right. The air is clean, the water is pure, and there are plenty of unique plants and animals to see. It's a wonderful place to live, and I want the rest of the world to know that. That's why I'm sending a special envoy to $map:02000001$ for the court.

0831180407000226--.name: That's right. The people of this place take care of each other like their own family. It's a wonderful place to live, and I want the rest of the world to know that. That's why I'm sending a special envoy to $map:02000001$ for the court.

0831180407000228--.name: There's much more delicious food to be had on the mainland, right?

0831180407000230--.name: $MyPCName$! Are you here to make some money? The court festival must be great for business. Everywhere I look, folks are out doing something for it.

0831180407000231--.name: The priciest thing to come out of all this is $itemPlural:20000013$, and you can only get them from Turtle Hill, where $npcName:22300149$ is.

0831180407000234--.name: I want to go see the court too!

0831180407000235--.name: Bah! $npcName:11000062[gender:1]$ said she would go attend the court with her dad. Why isn't my gramps saying anything? I want to go to see the empress too!

0831180407000236--.name: $npcName:11000056[gender:0]$ knows about a lot of things. If you have questions, you should ask him!

0831180407000240--.name: $MyPCName$, if you're hungry you should come inside. This is my house right here, and my mom is baking cookies.

0831180407000239--.name: I wonder if Mom finished baking the cookies...

0831180407000243--.name: Treasure chests are hidden all over the place.

0831180407000244--.name: Hmph, the oarsman at $map:63000002$ is so greedy. He charges a huge fee just to take you to $map:02000062$. Isn't that crazy?

0831180407000247--.name: Seriously! Some people stay in $map:63000002$ for ages just to make enough money to get on his boat!

0831180407000248--.name: What do people do to make money?

0831180407000251--.name: Really? Well, I guess the fare would be nothing if I could win $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$'s prize money.

0831180407000252--.name: Wait, what's this about $npc:11000441[gender:0]$'s prize money?

0831180407000249--.name: Oh, they hunt monsters or pick up junk that washes up on the shore. Some of it is pretty valuable.

0831180407000250--.name: But I'll never go there. I don't want to be trampled by $npcName:22300149$ before I get to the mainland.

0831180407000253--.name: I told you. Enter $map:61000005$ behind me and survive until the end, and $npc:11000441[gender:0]$ will shower you with money.

0831180407000257--.name: If I could turn back time...

0831180407000258--.name: If I had stayed with Bella that day...

0831180407000259--.name: I used to live here with my family, but... I'm the only one living in this house now. I miss them so much...

0831180407000260--.name: Sometimes I sit by the window, watching the stars fade away one by one, reminiscing about the good old days. I try not to recall the sad memories, but only the good, happy ones.

0105003907007670-NPCPortal01-.name: I'll help you get there quick.

0831180407000262--.name: Good grief! Are all cities this big?

0831180407000267--.name: I knew it! I can tell you're from the city by your looks. How much money do you have to make to live in a neighborhood like this?

0831180407000268--.name: Oh, no. You look so pale, I-I thought you lived here. I've never been to such a big place before, and everything is so amazing here. And I think I've seen more people today than I've ever seen in my hometown.

0831180407000270--.name: The island hasn't been this crowded for a long time.

0831180407000271--.name: The mainland must be busy preparing for the empress's court right now.

0831180407000272--.name: $MyPCName$, are you also going to the mainland?

0831180407000275--.name: You've made a good decision. I've stayed on this small island my whole life, but I want you to go see more of the this world.

0831180407000276--.name: While you're there at the court, you might as well explore the rest of the mainland. I'd love for you to come back with tales of the things you saw.

0831180407000277--.name: Cross the sea to the mainland to experience more of what this world can offer.Go on, don't be afraid.

0831180407000280--.name: Oh geez, why is this place so dirty?

0831180407000281--.name: It'll take forever to clean this place up.

0831180407000282--.name: If you came to see $npcName:11000016[gender:0]$, you can find him in $map:63000003$. The chief called him to talk about the ship for the court.

0831180407000285--.name: I can finally meet $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ in person... Oh, I'm so nervous!

0831180407000286--.name: $MyPCName$, did you hear that? Ordinary people can attend the empress's court this time! I'll be able to meet the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ in person. Oh, I'm so nervous!

0831180407000287--.name: $MyPCName$, you're also coming to the court, right? Come on, come with us! Dad said he'd take me with him.

0831180407000288--.name: Where will the court be held?

0831180407000289--.name: Why are you so interested in the court?

0831180407000290--.name: In $map:02000001$! It's the biggest city on the mainland, far across the ocean. We'll have to take a ship to $map:02000062$ first, though.

0831180407000291--.name: Where can I board the ship?

0831180407000292--.name: Because it's a once-in-a-lifetime chance to see $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$! Oarsman $npcName:11000016[gender:0]$ said that just seeing her would bring honor to my family.

0831180407000293--.name: Go to the dock and talk to the oarsman. Come to think of it, I haven't seen him lately. I wonder where he is...

0831180407000295--.name: I wanna be a great Heavy Gunner like $npc:11000046[gender:1]$ when I grow up!

0831180407000296--.name: What was that big gun she's carrying called?

0831180407000298--.name: I want to become a great Heavy Gunner like $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ when I grow up! Pew pew!

0831180407000300--.name: Well, yesterday I was out playing by the castle and I tripped on a stone. It really hurt and I cried a whole lot! Then $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ saw me crying and asked why, because she's a HERO.

0831180407000301--.name: I told her all about tripping over the stone, and how I hate stones now! So $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ took her giant gun... and BLEW UP the stone! Ka-BOOOOSH!

0831180407000302--.name: $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ said that if something hurts her, she'll hurt it ten times worse! Now those are words to live by, right? Right?

0831180407000305--.name: Hooray, you get it! You know, $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ and I have a secret now.

0831180407000307--.name: Well, it's a secret... Can you keep it secret?

0831180407000309--.name: I'll decide after you tell me.

0831180407000310--.name: This really is a secret... Alright, I'll tell you because you're $MyPCName$.

0831180407000311--.name: When $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ blew up the stone, she also blew up a bunch of hay and firewood that was lying around.

0831180407000312--.name: No one knows she did it except me. And her. And now you! So $MyPCName$, you'll keep this a secret, right? $npc:11000046[gender:1]$ made me pinky-swear not to tell, so you have to pinky-swear to me.

0831180407000313--.name: No! Then I'm not going to tell you! Hmph!

0831180407000318--.name: I couldn't have returned to my old life if it weren't for the people who believed in me.

0831180407000319--.name: $MyPCName$, you've helped me so much. Thank you.

0831180407000320--.name: When I was a fugitive, you gave me a run for my money a few times.

0831180407000321--.name: Really? That's not how I remember it.

0831180407000322--.name: You have no idea. There were a few times that you were only a few feet away from me. If you'd looked around the wrong corner...

0831180407000323--.name: Luckily, in the end, you decided to trust $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$ instead of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. If you'd gone the other way, who knows how things would have turned out?

0831180407000324--.name: You were doing pretty well on your own.

0831180407000325--.name: Maybe it looked like that from the outside, but I was backed into a corner. Bella forced my hand at Katramus. Without you and Blackeye, I'd probably be dead now.

0831180407000326--.name: In those early days, I didn't think much of you. But no matter how many false leads I planted, you were always back on my tail within a matter of hours.

0831180407000327--.name: I was sure you'd give up after our fight in that abandoned townhouse. But you kept on growing stronger after that. If I had to fight you now...

0831180407000328--.name: Let's just say that I'm glad we're on the same side.

0831180407000329--.name: We used to be best friends, Katvan, Eve, and I. We got into all kinds of mischief when we were kids...

0831180407000330--.name: But that just makes me hate him more. We had bonds that were thicker than blood, and he betrayed us. For what? A fancy title and a little bit of power?

0831180407000331--.name: Eve thinks that he might come around again. But I know better. I know Katvan's true colors.

0831180407000332--.name: Surely there's more to the story.

0831180407000333--.name: Of course there's more to the story. There's the part that's still coming up. The part where I put Katvan in the ground once and for all.

0831180407000334--.name: He killed my mentor–Eve's father! There's nothing left to talk about.

0831180407000335--.name: He had me on the ropes before, but things are different now. And I know I can count on you to help me take him out.

0831180407000337--.name: I've devoted myself to the betterment of my city!

0831180407000338--.name: As the mayor, I have a serious dilemma. Should I make the city great again, or is it already great?

0831180407000341--.name: Yes? How may I help you?

0831180407000346--.name: Ever since I was appointed minister, the most important person in my life has become $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$. I live to protect her and assist her in all her affairs.

0831180407000347--.name: Your eyes tell me what kind of person you are, $MyPCName$, and so I believe I can trust you. Please continue to protect the peace of this world.

0831180407000348--.name: The Land of Darkness is but a stop on the way to the Shadow World. The only way to lock that terrible place away again is to restore the Blue Lapenta.

1215110407009728--.name: I've heard some unsettling rumors about $map:02000001$ lately.

1215110407009729--.name: Bah, you don't listen to rumor and hearsay, do you?

1215110407009730--.name: Well, I also have a photo...

1215110407009732--.name: What can you tell me about the photo?

1215110407009733--.name: Hard to say, with the photograph being as blurry as it is. But I think I've seen a similar creature depicted in a tome from my family's library.

1215110407009735--.name: Long ago, the goddess of light did battle with a dark being, but she was unable to destroy him. The shapes in this picture are similar to its minions.

1215110407009736--.name: But that's impossible. That evil was banished from this world long ago.

1215110407009737--.name: What else can you tell me about this "being?"

1215110407009738--.name: I've told you all I know. Hopefully I've answered your question. Now, if you don't mind, I have matters of state to attend to.

0831180407000350--.name: We must gather the $itemPlural:30000181$ as soon as possible. They are all that stand between our world and utter darkness.

0831180407000351--.name: I've asked much of you, but there is still so much more left to do.

0831180407000352--.name: I owe a debt of gratitude to the minister. I hope he returns soon.

0831180407000353--.name: It was $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ who suggested I hold an open court for the people. I suppose it was part of his plan all along...

0105003907007671-NPCPortal01-.name: Let me open up a portal you can take if you want.

0831180407000356--.name: I must go back to the empress... Hm...

0831180407000358--.name: I command the Royal Knights of Empress $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$. Our sacred duty is to keep her safe.

0831180407000359--.name: But after that shadow gate to the Land of Darkness appeared, the empress sent us here to guard the border between worlds.

0831180407000360--.name: The minister is with the empress, but that doesn't reassure me much. I've been here for too long. I want this battle done and over with so I can go back to her.

0831180407000361--.name: I lead the Lumiknights, the defenders of the empress, and yet I was completely oblivious of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s true nature. It's disgraceful.

0105003907007672-NPCPortal01-.name: You must move quickly. I shall open a portal for you.

0831180407000362--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407000364--.name: I wonder when I'll be called back to HQ...

0831180407000365--.name: How are your journeys treating you? Deployments can be exciting, but I get homesick if I'm away for too long.

0831180407000367--.name: The wolves of the Vayar Mountains protect the tribes that worship the wolf god. We gray wolves are the guardians of the Murpagoths. The red wolves are the guardians of the Yamarchas.

0831180407000369--.name: I hope we can get to $map:02000001$ quickly.

0831180407000370--.name: What's taking Dad so long? Is the bathroom crowded?

0831180407000371--.name: This place is connected to $map:02000001$ by the great Royal Road. Just stay on it, and you'll be there in no time.

0831180407000374--.name: I like making shoes for my friends. Be my friend, and I'll give you a pair of shoes.

0831180407000376--.name: $npcName:11000151[gender:1]$ got off first. Did she leave me here...?

0831180407000377--.name: Hm hm! Even the air smells different on the mainland!

0831180407000378--.name: I sailed here with my girlfriend, $npc:11000151[gender:1]$. We're going to check out the Empress's court.

0831180407000380--.name: I'm sure she's around here somewhere. She got off before I did. Man, she was so excited, she pushed through the crowd and ran ashore. Guess she didn't notice she left me behind! Ha, ha...

1219181807005430--.name: We finally made it to $map:02000062$! My lady and I are gonna have so much fun!

0809153207007162-SoulBinder-.name: We finally made it to $map:02000062$! My lady and I are gonna have so much fun!

0831180407000381--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407000382--.name: The Barrota Trading Company is Maple World's biggest mercantile organization. Its hawkers go everywhere in the world, no matter how steep or dangerous.

0105003907007673-NPCPortal01-.name: Do you know how the hawkers could move so quickly? It's because of this!

0831180407000384--.name: Ugh... I must be exhausted. My arms feel like jelly.

0831180407000385--.name: It's not easy to make money.

0831180407000386--.name: I'm finding way more $itemPlural:30000011$ here than I did in town. I've almost reached my goal!

0831180407000387--.name:
When I have enough money, $npc:11000151[gender:1]$ and I will go attend the court, hand in hand.
It'll be great if we can meet again there, won't it?

0809153207007163--.name: I'm finding way more $itemPlural:30000011$ here than I did in town. I've almost reached my goal!

0831180407000389--.name: My bag is getting heavy. It's time to seel some of this stuff!

0831180407000391--.name: Hey, $MyPCName$! Have you heard about the hero who collected over 1,000 mesos just by hunting monsters? That's me!

0831180407000392--.name: I think I was born to be a hunter. You should find something that you can be good at and have fun doing.

0831180407000394--.name: Yo, man! Put your hands up! Say hey-yo!

0831180407000395--.name: Can't touch this! Na na na... Um, is that one still popular?

0831180407000398--.name: Hey yo, do you know what hip-hop represents?

0831180407000400--.name: Oh, hello! How do you like $map:02000064$ so far?

0831180407000402--.name: What events does the palace sponsor?

0831180407000403--.name: How can I participate in mini-games?

0831180407000404--.name: What do I get for winning mini-games?

0831180407000405--.name: What am I doing?  Can't you see? I'm dancing for everyone who came to $map:02000064$. Some folks have said I should stop because of the earthquake, but I don't get it.

0831180407000406--.name: Come on, don't be so serious. Don't wallow in disappointment. We should cheer up and stay optimistic. Even $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ said so!

0831180407000407--.name: And don't push yourself too hard. Sometimes you need to take a break and collect yourself. Maple World has all kinds of fun and exciting events to keep you busy. You can meet new people and win fabulous prizes, too!

0831180407000408--.name: Oh man, I thought everybody knew about those! The palace advertises them everywhere. Okay, well, I can still tell you about it.

0831180407000409--.name: The palace sponsors many events all across Maple World. A decade ago, when Maple World faced one of the greatest challenges in its history, $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ decided to do something to help distract the people from their worries.

0831180407000410--.name: She said that Maple World needs something to bring people together. Since then, we've held all sorts of games on a regular basis for the benefit of the people.

0831180407000411--.name: Of course, Maple World is still not completely safe. The recent earthquake, for instance... Oops, I shouldn't have mentioned that. A-anyway, these events are important just in how much they help the morale of the populace.

0831180407000412--.name: Participating in mini-games is easy! $npcName:11001899$ will make an announcement anytime a game goes live. All you have to do is play!

0831180407000413--.name: And even if you're feeling lazy and not up for traveling, there's no need to worry! You can teleport to mini-games from anywhere in the universe! When the Event Notification window appears, just press Enter next to the event you want to join!

0831180407000414--.name: Well, what are you standing around here for? Go play some mini-games!

0831180407000415--.name: Win palace-sponsored events to receive the blessing of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$. It's a great honor, you know!

0831180407000416--.name: And that's not all! You'll earn mesos, nice skins, and useful potions, too. A lot of people come to this place, dreaming of wealth and fame.

0831180407000417--.name: Oh, right. When you join $map:61000001$ or $map:61000002$ games, keep an eye out for the merchants who sell interesting items! That should make your time in $map:02000064$ even more worthwhile!

0831180407000426--.name: I can't believe this is happening to me...

0831180407000427--.name: I should never have left home...

0831180407000428--.name: Well aren't you a sight for sore eyes. It's been a while since I've seen anybody that wasn't a skeleton or an angry octo-thing looking to bludgeon me to death.

0831180407000430--.name: Well, I thought this place would be a lot bigger than my island. It's not.

0831180407000431--.name: I'd better get to $map:02000001$ before the court festival begins.

0831180407000432--.name: Honey, if you're looking to make a splash in $map:02000001$'s social scene, you're gonna need to do something about that outfit.

1215101207009668--.name: What can you tell me about trading airships?

1215101207009669--.name: Airships? I don't know anything about that.

1215101207009670--.name: Are you sure you haven't heard ANYTHING?

1215101207009671--.name: Ugh, how annoying. That weird guy from earlier was asking the same questions.

1215101207009672--.name: I'm going to keep bothering you until you talk to me...

1215101207009673--.name: Ugh! Fine! There are some rumors flying around about airships going missing, but I don't remember any of the details because they were boring.

1215101207009674--.name: I don't even know if they're the same airships you're talking about, just that some have supposedly gone missing. There, are you happy?

1215101207009676--.name: Don't act like we're friends now.

0831180407000441--.name: The Royal Road is blocked, and the forest path is too dangerous. I can't even go back home since the sea routes are messed up now too. I don't know what to do.

0831180407000443--.name: I didn't come all the way here for this!

0831180407000444--.name: Where are all the merchants? I heard there would be merchants!

0831180407000445--.name: I heard $map:02000001$ is filled with beautiful ladies, so I came here, all decked out. What a waste of time. And now I'm stuck here!

0831180407000447--.name: I want to go see the court too...

0831180407000448--.name: Aren't you scared to be here? It's too high up for my liking...

0831180407000450--.name: I trust $npcName:11000113[gender:0]$ will look after the storage in my stead.

0831180407000451--.name: I really want to get to the court before it begins.

0831180407000452--.name: At least it's good to be on this big lump of land instead of that small island. I felt so trapped there.

0831180407000453--.name: Hey, did you see that $npcName:22300149$ over there? I thought they only had those in my hometown. I had no idea!

0831180407000454--.name: Anything that reminds me of my hometown makes me happy. Like that $npcName:22300149$... I guess this is what it's like to be homesick.

0831180407000455--.name: I never expected to see $npcName:22300149$ here too.

0831180407000457--.name: Aww, I really don't think I can enter $map:02000116$.

0831180407000459--.name: A while back, I followed my uncle who works as a royal porter to the entrance of the forest. I couldn't see more than a few feet in front of me, the underbrush was so thick. Plus it was raining... I never want to go through that again.

0831180407000460--.name: Things are really crazy right now.

0831180407000461--.name: I wonder if the porters arrived safely...

0831180407000462--.name: You'd have to be suicidal to enter that abominable forest.

0831180407000464--.name: Look at this. Terrible, isn't it? Geez, I've never seen such a big fissure.

0831180407000468--.name: How can I make some quick money?

0831180407000469--.name: I would love to go to $map:02000062$...

0831180407000470--.name: $MyPCName$, are you here to make a buck too?

0831180407000471--.name: Why would I want to make money?

0831180407000472--.name: How can I make money here?

0831180407000473--.name: Oh, you didn't hear? The empress has called for an open court. If you want to get to the mainland to see it, you'll need a lot of money.

0831180407000474--.name: Well, I usually check the boxes and jars laying around the village. You can find all kinds of cash or stuff to sell in 'em.

0831180407000475--.name: If you want to make money quickly, you can always gather clams at $map:63000002$ over there. I've heard some of them hide expensive pearls and starfish.

0831180407000476--.name: Be careful, though. Monsters are milling about the beach. I'd rather make money slowly than be beaten up by those things.

0831180407000478--.name: What if $map:02000062$ and $map:02000001$ and everything else in the world collapses?

0831180407000480--.name: Really, $MyPCName$? Looking into this giant pit of doom doesn't fill you with the least little bit of doubt?

0831180407000482--.name: There have to be some scary monsters down there!

0831180407000485--.name: Stay with the empress and don't come back! Hmph!

0831180407000487--.name: Hmph! Just as well. I hope the road stays destroyed forever.

0831180407000489--.name: Smith left for $map:02000001$ to see the court instead of staying with me for my birthday. I don't need a boyfriend who cares more about the empress than me. I hope he'll never come back. Hmph!

0831180407000492--.name: A rift must have opened up somewhere.

0831180407000493--.name: $MyPCName$, do you think this is just a simple earthquake?

0831180407000497--.name: All right. Fine. Just keep thinking that way.

0831180407000498--.name: I don't have proof yet, but I'm certain this wasn't a simple earthquake. I suspect a massive shadow gate has opened somewhere, causing this upheaval.

0831180407000500--.name: You've never seen a shadow gate? Lucky you. They're doorways to the Land of Darkness. The empress herself has forbidden anyone from using such gates.

0831180407000501--.name: Our forces have the Shadow Gate blockaded and guarded to ensure nothing escapes. There are rumored to be unguarded passages hidden around Maple World, and some shady types use those to pass through to the Land of Darkness.

0831180407000502--.name: I was told that those who dare enter the Land of Darkness would have both their bodies and souls devoured by demons. However, that sounds like something made up to keep people from exploring. My plan is to find a shadow gate and travel to the Land of Darkness myself, so don't tell anyone.

0831180407000504--.name: I had no idea there were so many people on this island.

0831180407000505--.name: The news of the empress's court has brightened the whole island.

0831180407000506--.name: Usually this place is not so crowded. I didn't expect so many people to be so eager to make money.

0831180407000507--.name: $MyPCName$, you looking to scare up some cash too? It's not as dangerous as I expected. Give it a try!

0831180407000509--.name: Hm... I don't know if we'll be okay...

0831180407000510--.name: I'd better order the guards to tighten security.

0831180407000511--.name: $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$... Now that he's gone, I might actually start to miss him.

0831180407000512--.name: The Royal Guard protects $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and all of $map:02000001$. So long as there are threats to peace in this world, we will not rest.

0831180407000513--.name: Maybe it's time I told you the truth about why the court was canceled. Just before it was scheduled to start, the leadership met to discuss the details of the proceedings. Suddenly, a bloodied guard stumbled into the meeting and said that the court must be canceled.

0831180407000514--.name: We were shocked, as you might imagine. And before we could question him further, a dagger flew in from a nearby window and took his life. There, before our very eyes...

0831180407000515--.name: Everyone rushed to find the assailant, but we could find nothing. Our conclusion was that there must be a spy in the palace. The servants of the demon king were plotting something in time for the court. We had to cancel it.

0831180407000516--.name: Why didn't you tell anyone what happened?

0831180407000517--.name: You expect us to tell the public that someone was murdered, right in the middle of a meeting like that? People have only just started to calm down after the loss of the Blue Lapenta, we don't need to be riling them back up so soon.

0105003907007674-NPCPortal01-.name: Hold on, I'll open up a portal for you.

1215105107009697--.name: After all this time as the Guard Captain, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$ still treats me like a child.

1215105107009698--.name: You go and tell $npcName:11003534$ that I'll do whatever's necessary to protect $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$. I swore an oath, and on my life I intend to keep it.

1215105107009699--.name: Uh, I'm actually here to ask about the rumors going around $map:02000001$.

1215105107009700--.name: Ugh, not you too. These rumors are giving me a headache. I've upped security and tripled patrols to reassure the public, yet the rumors continue to spread.

1215105107009701--.name: And what about the truth behind the rumors?

1215105107009702--.name: I'll tell you the same thing I told the former captain of the Knights when he stopped by. I don't know anything! If we had any insight into the circumstances behind the rumors, the alliance would be the first to know.

1215105107009704--.name: Ah, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.

1215105107009706--.name: I'm sorry I couldn't be of more help.

0831180407000518--.name: Some people are curious about my relationship with $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$. It's... quite complicated. I'd rather not get into it.

0831180407000520--.name:
This road is fraught with danger. You will need to make a detour.

- Voice of experience

0831180407000522--.name: Ah... The monsters represent a growing threat.

0831180407000525--.name: I must identify the fundamental cause.

0831180407000526--.name: Each of the monsters from the Land of Darkness has unique genetic material. By analyzing a wide range of material, I'm hoping to determine the rules that differentiate them from Maple World's monsters.

0831180407000528--.name: I'm running out of antidotes faster than I expected.

0831180407000529--.name: I see you're curious about $itemPlural:20000016$. Well... After the Blue Lapenta was destroyed, hundreds of Defenders fell to the shadow toxin that spread from the Land of Darkness.

0831180407000530--.name: I tried everything reagent I could get my hands on to cure it, and the one that did it was the $item:20000045$, growing right here at the $map:02000146$. It took time to perfect the compounding process, but now my $itemPlural:20000016$ are key to the struggle against the darkness.

0831180407000531--.name: Watch out for the shadow toxin.

0831180407000532--.name: The shadow forces are growing strong...

0831180407000535--.name: Ugh... The drug... I must find the drug...

0831180407000536--.name: I didn't know this would happen. I thought I would be set once I created the new drug... Then they came after me... Ugh...

0831180407000539--.name: Ah... Is this the end for me?

0831180407000540--.name: How did it come to this?

0831180407000542--.name: I've got to determine whether the mutated DNA strand was an outside contaminant, or was somehow mistakenly synthesized inside our test subjects...

0831180407000546--.name: I ventured outside the village, but... I'm too scared to go any further.

0831180407000547--.name: Do you think I could hunt monsters?

0831180407000548--.name: I mustered up the courage to come here, but now I'm too scared to move. I have to hunt monsters, or get the treasure from the cliff. I need the money...

0831180407000549--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407000551--.name: I heard this path was dangerous. I didn't know it was this bad. You'd better be careful.

0831180407000552--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407000554--.name: Argh, I'm never coming this way again!

0831180407000555--.name: I took the Royal Road for granted. I've never been on a path so dangerous before.

0831180407000556--.name: And even if you get through this awful forest, there's a treacherous valley to cross. The cliffs of $map:02000051$ are nothing compared to what's ahead! Ahh, I'm never getting out of here alive...

0831180407000558--.name: Once a year, the Murpagoth warriors go on a pilgrimage through the Vayar Mountains. By the time they return, they've grown much stronger than they were before.

0105003907007675-NPCPortal01-.name: I'll open up a portal so you can head right over.

0831180407000563--.name: This wolf's name is Buka. He's my friend.

0831180407000569--.name: Hmph, this used to be a really nice place to live before that gigantic hotel dropped from the sky. It's been attracting all kinds of things and making our lives miserable.

0831180407000570--.name: Well, I'm not fighting those monsters. It's not that they're too scary... I just don't want to be bothered.

0831180407000572--.name: Argh, I don't know what to do. What do I do?

0831180407000573--.name: I can't do this alone... Argh, I don't know what to do!

0831180407000574--.name: Whoever you are, please help me! My... My boss was taken by them. Please save him!

0831180407000576--.name: Thank you so much! I'm here alone and I didn't know what to do until you came along. I've been watching them, and there's a few things you need to know.

0831180407000577--.name: First, don't step on the floor sensors marked red. They'll trip the alarm and you'll be in a world of hurt. I think if I hack into their security system, I should be able to turn off the alarm. Hm...

0831180407000578--.name: If you beat up a Blackdrake gang foot soldier, they're sure to call a superior for help. I suggest tossing an Energy Bomb at them, and then finishing them off quickly while they're stunned.

0831180407000582--.name: Mm... This place used to be peaceful...

0831180407000584--.name: Sigh... See that big hotel on the cliff? It dropped from the sky one day, literally out of the blue. Since then, monsters have been swarming the area. It's getting impossible to do anything.

0831180407000585--.name: Huh? You think my name is funny. I disagree.

0831180407000586--.name: Boen is easy to remember and rolls off the tongue beautifully. Go to the top of that cliff and shout my name. It'll echo for a long time.

0831180407000589--.name: How did you make it this far?

0831180407000594--.name: You know that's not the answer I wanted. You think this is all a big joke, don't you? Well, let me give you some advice.

0831180407000595--.name: Go back to where you came from. You're too young to die like a rat out here.

0831180407000596--.name: Then turn around and leave. It's too dangerous for you to hang around here.

0831180407000597--.name: Somewhere in this dark, damp place... He lurks.

0831180407000598--.name: Mm? Are you here to find the $map:02000037$ where $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ is sealed?

0831180407000601--.name: What is your purpose? Is there someone that you want to protect? Or do you covet $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s treasure?

0831180407000602--.name: I'm here to protect all of Maple World.

0831180407000604--.name: The whole world, eh? What a ridiculous goal...

0831180407000605--.name: But goals like that keep a $male:man,female:woman$ going against impossible odds. I can respect that. Don't you dare fail!

0831180407000606--.name: I'm jealous, actually. Jealous that you can still have a bold dream like that. I've seen too many battles to even comprehend a dream like that...

0831180407000607--.name: Ah, to be young and foolish again.

0831180407000610--.name: Not that it's my place to judge, mind. Your life is yours to throw away as you please.

0831180407000609--.name: The treasure is great, to be certain. But is it worth risking your life over?

1026170307004301--.name: If $item:30000419$ is what you're after, you should talk to $npcName:11001210[gender:0]$ in $map:02000023$. I'm sure he can help you.

0831180407000612--.name: I must find a way to go back...

0831180407000617--.name: $MyPCName$? That sounds familiar... Was that when I lost my pocket watch?

0831180407000619--.name: Oh, no. Your name just sounds familiar to me. I've been to so many places that sometimes I get names mixed up. Being here in the past is really...

0831180407000620--.name: Ahh, never mind. I'm talking nonsense now. Sigh... If you'll excuse me, I have things to do...

0831180407000621--.name: I'm sorry, but there's nothing more I can tell you about $npcName:22000322[gender:0]$ or the strange man wearing a $item:11300119$. Or, wait, have you asked yet?

0831180407000624--.name: Nothing seems to be going my way.

0831180407000625--.name: I'm getting tired of ending up in unfamiliar places!

0831180407000626--.name: I want out of this jungle the first chance I get. I can't wait to go back home.

0831180407000627--.name: Sigh, I'm tired of traveling through time. I always end up in places that I don't want to be

0831180407000629--.name: I'd love to buy passage on the next ship to the mainland!

0831180407000630--.name: When will I ever have another chance to see the empress in person? I really want to go see the court!

0831180407000634--.name: If I wasn't charged with $map:63000004$, I could've joined the delegation. I hate that no one else can fill in for me!

0831180407000637--.name: Have you seen a puppy around here?

0831180407000639--.name: Ahhh... Whitey, where are you? I should never have taken him outside.

0831180407000643--.name: People spend their days scrambling around, trying to have it all. That's no way to live. Just enjoy the moment.

0321130807008115--.name: Unless this is extremely important, I'm in no mood to chat.

0321130807008116--.name: Did you see a guard get dragged away?

0321130807008117--.name: Now that you mention it, there was an especially pitiful-looking soldier... He was dragged off in the direction of $map:52000119$, to the northeast.

0831180407000649--.name: Everyone's in a festive mood because of the court, and they're not even on the mainland where the court is being held. I wonder how excited the mainlanders must be!

0831180407000654--.name: I've heard walking is the best way to lose weight.

0831180407000656--.name: I can't get rid of these chubby cheeks, no matter how hard I try.

0831180407000657--.name: Mm... I haven't been looking good lately, no matter what I wear.

0831180407000658--.name: $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ hasn't brought me anything nice lately. Is he not interested in me anymore?

0831180407000659--.name: Goodness, just LOOK at those clothes! Did you dig them out of some ancient ruins? Might be nice to wear something made in the last decade.

0831180407000661--.name: How do I get these packages to $map:02000001$? Maybe catapult...

0831180407000662--.name: What do I do? I've got piles of packages, and the Royal Road to $map:02000001$ is all busted up.

0831180407000663--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407000665--.name: I don't know what caused the recent earthquake. It was so strong, it tore the Royal Road in half. This could be a serious problem.

0116162507009762--.name: It's really you! $MyPCName$, in the flesh!

0116162507009763--.name: It's an honor to meet you!

0116162507009765--.name: You're the hero of the Siege of $map:02000001$. Of course I know you! You're a hero to all of us here.

0116162507009766--.name: I was just doing my duty.

0116162507009767--.name: You're so humble. Wow! Listen, if there's anything I can do to help you, just say the word.

0116162507009768--.name: I'm looking into rumors about hot places. Like, super hot.

0116162507009769--.name: Hot places, huh? Like unseasonably hot places?

0116162507009771--.name: Now that you mention it, I did hear a rumor from one of the merchants with the Barrota Trading Company. You heard about their new air trade routes, didn't you?

0116162507009772--.name: I may have heard a thing or two.

0116162507009773--.name: Well, a few of their routes pass over the ruins of Orbis. They say that the airships passing through the area get so hot, you can fry an egg on their decks.

0116162507009776--.name: I can't believe I am getting to talk to you about real important official business! Don't worry, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, I'll do my best to keep $map:02000001$ safe, too!

0831180407000666--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407000667--.name: My energy reserves are being depleted...

0831180407000668--.name: This is bad. The monsters are growing stronger by the day.

0831180407000669--.name: If you're looking for $itemPlural:20000014$, the monsters around here are running around with them.

0116162507009778--.name: Are you really working with $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$? Do you think you could put in a good word?

0116162507009780--.name: Becoming his apprentice! He says that I'm still a rookie, but in just ten years under his tutelage, I could become one of the greatest guards of all time!

0116162507009783--.name: I'm looking into rumors about places affected by extreme heat.

0116170407009790--.name: I don't know anything about that!

0116162507009785--.name: They say $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ knows just about everything. You could head to $map:02000031$ and ask her.

0116162507009787--.name: It was my pleasure! Please tell $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$ I said hello.

0831180407000670--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0831180407000671--.name: What if a shadow gate really has opened up nearby?

0831180407000672--.name: This place is extremely dangerous. Be careful not to fall.

0831180407000673--.name: The others must be quite anxious, since they don't know what's going on.

0831180407000674--.name: Yes? How may I help you?

0831180407000676--.name: You can ask me anything you want.

0831180407000678--.name: How can I increase my job rank?

0831180407000679--.name: I don't know where I am.

0831180407000680--.name: You can talk to the Job Instructors for assistance. They've gathered in $map:02000188$, which you can reach through the entrance right behind me.

0831180407000681--.name: Oh! Well, that's an easy fix. Just press M to see all of Maple World at a glance in your World Map.

0831180407000682--.name: Adventurers, I hope today will bring you all great fortune!

0831180407000683--.name: If you have questions, you can also ask the nearest Royal Guard.

0303111207007964--.name: I don't know where I am.

0303111207007966--.name: Oh! Well, that's an easy fix. Just press M to see all of Maple World at a glance in your World Map.

0303111207007967--.name: Oh, I'm sorry. Hmm... how'd you like to make some friends? I know it can be awkward, but you'll never know what kind of cool people you can meet until you try it. You can also visit houses and leave a message in their Guestbook.
