0911192907003873--.name: You look like seasoned adventurer. I'm sure you've seen worse weather than this. So suck it up! Bahaha.

0911192907003875--.name: Do you have business with me?

0911192907003876--.name: Ugh. I can't believe I came all this way.

0911192907003877--.name: I wonder if the everyone made it out okay...

0911192907003878--.name: I'm trapped here! There are monsters everywhere. I knew this place was dangerous, but...

0911192907003879--.name: Then why did you come here?

0911192907003882--.name: When can we get out of this place?

0911192907003885--.name: Home... I want to go home...

0911192907003886--.name: I can't lost count of how many days I've been here...

0911192907003888--.name: Why didn't I listen to my mother before it was too late?

0911192907003891--.name: I'm scared that if I leave this place, I'll die.

0911192907003892--.name: Monsters! This is all because of those blasted monsters!

0911192907003893--.name: Have you seen any monsters outside?

0911192907003894--.name: This situation has been hard on everyone. I wish there was more I could do to help...

0911192907003895--.name: <font size="20">Don't lose hope, Neroa. You have to stay strong!</font>

0911192907003896--.name: As long as I don't give up hope, all this will be behind me one day... I really wish I could believe that...

0911192907003897--.name: I'm selling these fine leather jackets.

0911192907003898--.name: The rarer the hide, the more beautiful the work!

0911192907003899--.name: Hmm... Where can I find some customers around here?

0911192907003900--.name: Hey, I've seen you hunting monsters around here before, haven't I?

0911192907003903--.name: Haha! I could tell just by looking at you! A great adventurer, surely in need of Lavoy's fine leather goods!

0911192907003905--.name: Don't be silly, I know a famous adventurer when I see one! A great adventurer deserves a great outfit. How many leather jackets can I put you down for?

0911192907003907--.name: Hahaha! You say that now, but you'll find no finer leatherwork around. Return to me once you've changed your mind.

0911192907003909--.name: I believe in always being prepared.

0911192907003910--.name: Hm... Let's see what the safety handbook says...

0911192907003911--.name: There's nothing more important than safety. Wouldn't you agree?

0911192907003913--.name: I know, right? But nobody else seems to get it! I see people come to work without their hard hats or work boots every day. Your goal should be to earn a living without killing yourself in the process!

0914192507003917--.name: If I weren't here, who else would take care of this property?

0914192507003918--.name: Land needs tending, just like a delicate flower.

0914192507003919--.name: Hello, and welcome to the Andrea Family estate. As its caretaker I would love to give you a tour, but I'm afraid I have some eggs to collect.

0914192507003921--.name: I realize that this is no longer a good place to live, but...

0914192507003922--.name: I'm not leaving, even if all my friends do.

0914192507003923--.name: First the monsters start taking over the forest, and now my friends are all leaving in droves... Hmph. What do I care? I like being alone, anyway!

0915171007003946--.name: I've never seen anything more impressive than these ruins.

0915171007003947--.name: Preserving them is my greatest priority!

0915171007003948--.name: Plenty of archaeologists would kill for the chance to see Ellin Ruins with their own eyes. Are you here to see the ruins yourself?

0915171007003949--.name: I'm not that interested in this old junk.

0915171007003950--.name: Oh yeah, I'm super into this stuff.

0915171007003951--.name: Not really. I was just wandering aimlessly.

0915171007003952--.name: Really? Not interested in all this history? Oh... Then maybe you've come to hunt monsters? Just look around, this place is teeming with them.

0915171007003953--.name: Really? You don't look like an archaeologist. Well, it's just nice to see someone interested in history. Stay as long as you like!

0915171007003954--.name: Ah! A classic case of wanderlust, have we? Well, regardless, please be careful not to damage the ruins... And also, try not to get horribly mauled by monsters.

0915220707003955--.name: Come closer! Yes, you my child.

0915220707003956--.name: The all-seeing eye sees all! I can tell you your destiny!

0915220707003957--.name: My readings are equally accurate from one day to the next!

0915220707003958--.name: To picture the future clearly, I must make myself one with nature. Focus your senses. The breeze carries with it the scent of flowers. The waterfall quietly roars.

0915222107003979--.name: For an accurate reading, I must focus my mind and keep disruptive thoughts at bay.

0915220707003961--.name: Mmm... Where did she she come up with the idea  for $item:30000395$?

0915220707003963--.name: No. I hate candy, because I am a monster.

0915220707003964--.name: Whaaaat? I'm sure you'd change your mind if you tried my Mom's $item:30000395$. It's awesome!

0915220707003966--.name: (He whines pitifully) Just try a piece! I promise you'll love it. My mom also bakes cakes and pies that are crazy good. She's like a witch!

0915220707003968--.name: Not like my mom! When I grow up, I'm going to be a culinary wizard, and make snacks just as good as hers.

0916043407003981--.name: $item:30000395$ Recipe 1. Squeeze $item:30000390$ from $npcNamePlural:21000031$ 2. Harvest $item:30000392$ from $npcNamePlural:21000009$

0916043407003982--.name: 3. Acquire $itemPlural:30000391$ from the Hot Cocoa Springs 4. Pick $itemPlural:30000393$ from the red trees *Note: Use only locally sourced ingredients!

0916043407003983--.name: $item:30000395$ Recipe 1. Squeeze $item:30000390$ from $npcNamePlural:21000031$ 2. Harvest $item:30000392$ from $npcNamePlural:21000009$

0916043407003984--.name: 3. Acquire $itemPlural:30000391$ from the Hot Cocoa Springs 4. Pick $itemPlural:30000393$ from the red trees *Note: Use only locally sourced ingredients!

0916043407003987--.name: $item:30000395$ Recipe 1. Squeeze $item:30000390$ from $npcNamePlural:21000031$ 2. Harvest $item:30000392$ from $npcNamePlural:21000009$

0916043407003988--.name: 3. Acquire $itemPlural:30000391$ from the Hot Cocoa Springs 4. Pick $itemPlural:30000393$ from the red trees *Note: Use only locally sourced ingredients!

0916043407003989--.name: Cooking the $item:30000395$ 1. While stirring, gradually add the following ingredients to the $npcName:11001147$: 8 $itemPlural:30000390$, 10 $itemPlural:30000392$, 7 $itemPlural:30000391$, and 9 $itemPlural:30000393$

0916043407003990--.name: 2. Cook over low heat for 5 minutes, stirring until uniform in consistency. 3. Pour and let harden *Note: $npcName:11001147$ is finicky. Remove cooked candy immediately.

0916060407004044--.name: $item:30000395$ Recipe 1. Squeeze $item:30000390$ from $npcNamePlural:21000031$ 2. Harvest $item:30000392$ from $npcNamePlural:21000009$

0916060407004045--.name: 3. Acquire $itemPlural:30000391$ from the Hot Cocoa Springs 4. Pick $itemPlural:30000393$ from the red trees *Note: Use only locally sourced ingredients!

0916043407003992--.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001145[gender:0]$ brought this $npcName:11001147$ from home without telling his mom.)</font>

0916043407003993--.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001145[gender:0]$ brought this $npcName:11001147$ from home without telling his mom.)</font>

0916043407004020--.name:
<font color="#909090">(The syrupy candy crystallizes into a $item:30000395$ with a pop. 
Quickly, remove the candy from the $npcName:11001147$!)</font>

0916061207004048--.name: <font color="#909090">(The candy syrup looks ready to collect, but all too late you realize your bag is full. The mixture inside the pot begins to boil, before inexplicably exploding into its original components. You collect the ingredients and place them in your bag.)</font>

1027182707004383--.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001145[gender:0]$ brought this $npcName:11001147$ from home without telling his mom.)</font>

0916043407004041--.name: (The $npcName:11001147$ spits out the ingredients with an angry hiss. Did you make a mistake? You'd better read the $npcName:11001146$ again.)

0915221607003971--.name: What? If it's not urgent, come back later.

0915221607003972--.name: I go wherever quality weapons are found.

0915221607003974--.name: See the fortress over there? It's got to be full of all kinds of amazing stuff worth collecting. Say, would you be interested in checking it out?

0915221607003975--.name: I don't think there's much of value left in that abandoned fortress.

0915221607003976--.name: I'm a little more worried about the monsters guarding it.

0915221607003977--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>
Well I do! It's gotta be chock full of treasure. I can tell, just by the look of it. I guess we'll see which of us is right.

0915221607003978--.name: No kidding. Why do you think I haven't gone inside? I wish someone would take care of them for me...

1008163207004067--.name: I have to help my friends!

1008163207004070--.name: Agh... I have to find my friends.

1008163207004071--.name: Shh! Please, keep your voice down! That mage can't know I'm here!

1008163207004079--.name: Where in the world is he?

1008163207004081--.name: Where is that boy? He'd better not have gotten himself in trouble.

1008163207004082--.name: Have you seen my brother? He must be somewhere around here.

1008163207004087--.name: Wanna split a nice glass of milk?

1008163207004089--.name: Where am I? Who am I?

1008163207004091--.name: Whew, I can finally breathe easy.

1012113807004093--.name: I've got to stay vigilant. I'm on duty right now.

1012113807004094--.name: I haven't seen anyone suspicious so far.

1012113807004095--.name: I'm fairly new to the Green Hoods, but I've been stationed here long enough to get the lay of the land. If something happens in $map:02000057$, I'll be the first to know. But, ah, let me know if you see anything suspicious anyway.

1012113807004096--.name: How do you like being a member of the militia?

1012113807004097--.name: Well, I've learned a lot of things. Like how being a guard means learning how to think on your feet. I'm not so great at that now, but I try hard.

1012113807004098--.name: You rotten swine, I won't let you get away with this!

1012113807004099--.name: I've spent my whole life tending my farm, and those pigs managed to wreck it in a single night!

1012113807004100--.name: Argh! Those dastardly porkers wrecked my farm!

1012113807004101--.name: Do you know what it's like to see your life's work destroyed in a single day? Well I do! <b>I've lost my farm<b>! Gah! I'm so mad I can't even sleep at night.

1012113807004103--.name: At first I saw them in the distance, like a tidal wave. Before I knew it, my farm was blanketed by a horde of pigs! They crashed through my farm, trampling everything, leaving only ruin! I couldn't believe my eyes...

1014150507004105--.name: This place is peaceful. Too peaceful. I'm getting the itch to hit something.

1014150507004106--.name: I wonder how dangerous the monsters here are...

1014150507004107--.name:
<font color="#ffd200">Yalario!</font> 
I love talking to new people and visiting new places. It's a pleasure to meet you.

1014154907004140--.name: Ah, an adventurer! Know of any famous monsters around here? I may be a merchant, but I'm just as interested in fighting monsters as selling things. Hahaha!

1014150507004109--.name: That doesn't sound so great for business...

1014150507004111--.name: Oh! Forgive me. Sometimes I forget that I am in a foreign land. Where I come from, 'Yalario' is the term we use when meeting someone for the first time. It means "new friend".

1014150507004112--.name: Hahaha! Perhaps not. Truthfully, I am interested in both. Encountering new monsters inspires me to create new products! Mine is a dangerous business, ahahaha!

1014150507004113--.name: I've sailed around the globe doing battle with all kinds of monsters. You'll find I am as shrewd a warrior as a merchant!

1014150507004115--.name: Far, far across the sea. I haven't seen a single map here which includes my homeland. I have spent half my life sailing around the world, but I had never heard of this 'Wictoria Isslind' until I set foot upon it.

1014150507004116--.name: Not at all. The people here make a big deal about how dangerous monsters are. But compared to back home, they are as cuddly as teddy bears. I am still hopeful that I will find a worthy challenge.

1026143107004286--.name: Yalario! How may I help you? If merchandise is what you seek, please browse at your leisure.

1026143107004287--.name: Do you know anything about Cynodia ore?

1026143107004288--.name: Ah, I know of Cynodia ore. It is filled with mystical power and said to be able to bring balance to unstable magic.

1026143107004289--.name: Do you know where I can find Cynodia ore?

1026143107004290--.name: Hmm... I'm sorry, but they aren't something we carry. Come to think of it, $npcName:11001180[gender:1]$ or $npcName:11001181[gender:0]$ might know where to find some. Why don't you try speaking with them?

1014150507004129--.name: Ah, I should update my travel journal!

1014150507004130--.name: This place looks so different from home.

1014150507004131--.name: Now where did I put that journal?

1014150507004132--.name: Ah, a local! <font color="#ffd200">Yalario!</font> It always been my dream to explore strange new worlds, and seek out new life and new civilizations! Traveling this land has been an awesome experience.

1014150507004133--.name: ...Ah, but I'm sure these sights seem so plain to you. Well, I hope I'll get to keep visiting new places and writing about them in my travel journal.

1014150507004135--.name: I take it you like to travel?

1014150507004137--.name: New friend! This is how we greet strangers who we want to be our friends. $npcName:11001179[gender:0]$ shouted it out when we first arrived in $map:02000064$, so I guess it can also be used for villages. Well, at least it can be by our captain.

1014150507004138--.name: Of course! Setting foot in a new land, leaving proof of your journey... There's nothing more exciting! I bet everyone in the Allicari Merchant Society would agree.

1014150507004139--.name: I'm from a place far, far away! On the other side of the sea. To get there from here you have to go north... no wait, south... Err, east? We sort of stumbled upon this land by accident. My homeland is beautiful, although it's much different than here.

1026143107004294--.name: Ah, yalario! What can I do for you?

1026143107004296--.name: Ah, those. The smuggler called $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$ sells them, but I wouldn't do business with him if I were you.

1026143107004298--.name: He snuck onto our vessel because he did not want to pay a simple fare. No one who does such a thing could be considered trustworthy.

1026143107004300--.name: Captain $npcName:11001179[gender:0]$ kicked him off the ship. Last I saw, he was running off toward $map:03000014$.

1015162707004152--.name: I-I can't believe... we were so easily beaten...

1015162707004153--.name: Betrayal is the quickest path to death.

1015162707004154--.name: Hmpf, you riffraff are no match for me.

1015162707004156--.name:
So what, they stole one of our trains? Quit whining.
I haven't survived the criminal underworld this long by panicking every time someone came after me!

1015162707004158--.name: Y-you're not going to tell Wei Hong, are you?

1015162707004159--.name:
<font color="#909090"> (Sighs)</font>
I can only imagine how I'd be punished on my return.

1015162707004160--.name: Trying to steal a Blackstar train? They've got to be crazy!

1016202007004164--.name: I wish I could cast my worries into the wind...

1016202007004166--.name: I don't know if I can keep going like this...

1016202007004167--.name: I wish it would all just be over...

1016202007004170--.name: It's been one disaster after another, and I'm just too tired to fight anymore. Money is ruining my life. If I could live without it, I would've quit already.

1016202007004171--.name: I got transferred to another department because of an argument with the head of the broadcasting station over my program. Journalism used to be about integrity! It was about telling the truth, not just covering what makes money! I just can't do it anymore.

1022192907004266--.name: I soldier on and cover what they tell me, acting like there's nothing wrong. But every day I die a little inside. Someone's got to stand up to them, I know that! But if I do, they'll just replace me with another yes-man...

1016202007004172--.name: Grah! Writer's block, my mortal enemy!

1016202007004173--.name: My mind is a complete blank...

1016202007004175--.name:
<font color="#909090"> (He sighs.)</font>
Am I really qualified to be a TV writer...? Hey, you there! Can I ask you a question?

1016210507004209--.name: Do you think people should pursue jobs they want to do, or just ones they're good at?

1016210507004210--.name: I'm not sure... What do you think?

1016210507004211--.name: Why? Do you not like your job?

1016202007004178--.name: What I want to do, of course! I would give anything to be good at what I want to be doing...

1016202007004179--.name:
That's not it. This has been my dream job for as long as I can remember. It's just... not the job I expected.
<font color="#909090">(He sighs.)</font>

1016202007004180--.name: I wish I could find a story my colleague $npcName:11001191[gender:1]$ would be excited to cover.

1016202007004181--.name: Maybe if I just smile long enough, I'll actually feel happy!

1016202007004182--.name: I should get some sun. I'm sure that will make me feel better.

1016202007004183--.name:
Hehehe! This is so much fun! <font color="#C66455" size="22">Pfft... Are you kidding me? This is awful.</font> 
No, no. Don't say that.
<font color="#909090">(...Is she arguing with herself?)</font>

1016210507004212--.name: ...?! Ahh! How long have you been standing there? You didn't hear what I said, did you?

1016210507004213--.name: Uhh... Were you just talking to yourself?

1016202007004186--.name:
W-what? I'm not crazy, you're crazy! <font color="#C66455" size="22">I didn't say anything, got it?</font>
<font color="#909090">(After an awkward silence, Illuna sighs in resignation.)</font>

1016202007004188--.name:
Sigh...
I want to go home...

1016202007004189--.name: I should've stayed in the News department. Why did I ever move to the team for Educational programming?

1016202007004190--.name: I just want to go home...

1016202007004191--.name:
This is no good. I can't get a good shot!
What should I do?

1016202007004193--.name:
It's may be bright out here, but our cameras our set up inside that cave, where it's much darker. I doubt we can get any usable footage as it stands.
I should've brought $npcName:11001193[gender:1]$, my supervisor...

1016202007004194--.name: This place is dry, hot, and unbearably loud. It is absolutely the worst.

1016202007004195--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He makes an exaggerated show of coughing.)</font>
Gah! I can't stand this smog!

1016202007004196--.name: My wise little owl Joanna, I miss you...

1016202007004197--.name: I must've been out of my mind when I agreed to come here. Hmm? And just who are you supposed to be? Wait, did my wise little owl send here?

1016202007004200--.name: I'm talking about my beautiful muse! The brains behind our Educational programming, Joanna, of course. Whooo~ else?

1016210507004215--.name: But what was that with the owl thing?

1016202007004201--.name: Owls are smart. It's just a cute nickname, honey. Get over yourself.

1016202007004202--.name: Let's have a look at the requisition form... Are you kidding me? I'm not dealing with this right now.

1016202007004203--.name: Ugh... I hate remote shoots in places like this.

1016202007004204--.name: The Educational programming team is so demanding.

1016202007004205--.name:
Mm.. What? 
Is there something you need?

1016202007004206--.name: Show me what you have to sell.

1016202007004207--.name: All right, have a looksie in my bag...

1016202007004208--.name: ...Wait, what am I doing? I'm not some blasted shopkeep! I support the employees of the broadcasting station. Coffee, snacks, transportation, unsolicited advice. I get them whatever they need. I'm a key member of the team, so don't you forget it!

1016103807004162--.name: I'm impressed you've made it this far!

1024031007004281--.name: <font color="#909090">(Sniffs)</font> I want to go home...

1024031007004283--.name: The bridge vanished as soon as I crossed, and now I'm stuck here!

1024031007004284--.name: Please... Let me make it out of this place...

1017225707004220--.name: Please don't interrupt me while I am praying.

1017225707004222--.name: Shalua le mashalua... I am conducting an important rite. Please be quiet.

1017225707004223--.name: What's the deal with this rite?

1017225707004224--.name: All around the world, there exist forces of darkness which threaten the peace. Few are brave enough to confront them. And so those who do are branded heroes.

1017225707004225--.name: $npcName:11001201$, having attained enlightenment and seen the truth of the world, wants to help such heroes through prayer. And so, she and her successor, $npcName:11001202$, have embarked on a holy pilgrimage.

1019105307004236--.name: It would be naïve to think that prayer will miraculously vanquish all of the evil in the world. But there is no denying the restorative power of prayer. Such is the purpose of their pilgrimage, to empower heroes to resist evil.

1019105307004237--.name: I've never heard of good Inakimos.

1017225707004227--.name:
Sadly, your prejudice is not entirely unfounded.
We too have heard many stories of evil Inakimos.
But me, and the rest of $npcName:11001201$'s followers are not like them. Our people follow a different faith. We have walked a different path.

1017225707004228--.name: We understand why the rest of the world looks at us with some suspicion, but we want nothing more than to do good for the world, and to make up for the wrongs of other Inakimos.

1017225707004229--.name: That's great and all, but how does that help with the bad Inakimos?

1017225707004230--.name: We're deeply ashamed of our malevolent kin. We wish to stop their wrongdoing as badly as you. But ever since $npcName:11001201$ was exiled from their order for confronting Myuteka Rabo, they have treated us as enemies.

1017225707004231--.name: Besides, we cannot raise a hand against our own kind. We must help them to understand the error of their ways and guide them to righteous path. Even if it is a hopeless endeavor, we must at least try.

1017225707004232--.name: Exiled? What's the deal with Inakimo Karr?

1017225707004233--.name: $npcName:11001201$ was once the most trusted priest of Myuteka Rabo's cult. But he was not blind. He began to question Myuteka's evil ambitions, and was summarily exiled from Myuteka's order.

1017225707004234--.name: With a few loyal followers in tow, he set off upon a journey to learn about the world as it really was, and not as Myuteka preached. It was a perilous journey was perilous, but <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001201$</font> persisted. In the end, he found enlightenment wrote a<font color="#ffd200">new doctrine</font> entirely of his own.

1017225707004235--.name: $npcName:11001201$ was devastated to learn of the evil done in the name of Myuteka Rabo's faith. And thus began our pilgrimage. We may unable to confront our kin, but we hope by atoning for their sins to one day redeem ourselves in the eyes of the world.

1027205907004386--.name: Now I just need to save $npcName:11001172[gender:1]$...

1027205907004391--.name: How much longer do I need to lay here...?

1027205907004405--.name: It was fun... Then it wasn't...

1022122107004245--.name: Everything begins from nature and returns to nature.

1022122107004246--.name: The cycle of life goes on and on.

1022122107004247--.name: There is a <font color="#ffd200">lifeforce</font> all around us. It's in the leaves and the breeze, the water, and the very earth we tread. I've always wondered from where life originates.

1022122107004249--.name: Well, I don't know about a direct source... But there is clearly a natural order to things. A cycle of life.

1022122107004251--.name: Flowers, monsters, and people alike. Everything is born from nature, and returns to nature when its time is at an end. There is an endless cycle of life that keeps this world balanced.

1023213007004272--.name:
Oh, you've brought me more $item:30000419$. 
Allow me to extract the $item:30000420$ that lies within. Give me a moment.

1023213007004276--.name: Primordial Nature, Mother of Earth, I beseech thee! Make me your conduit and return this tainted spirit to the source of all life! Aniriel zu spiritalis... Ritana vitalitas!

1023213007004277--.name: It worked! Here, this $item:30000420$ was inside it. I hope you'll use it for good.

1023213007004274--.name: Give me the $item:30000419$. I'm not sure if this will work, but it's worth a shot.

1023213007004278--.name: Primordial Nature, Mother of Earth, I beseech thee! Make me your conduit and return this tainted spirit to the source of all life! Aniriel zu spiritalis... Ritana vitalitas!

1023223707004280--.name: (You wait for Lileaf to finish chanting.)

1023213007004279--.name: It worked! Here, this $item:30000420$ was inside it. I hope you'll use it for good.

1022122107004255--.name: There's one weapon I'd love to create, but I don't have the right materials.

1022122107004256--.name: I could forge a weapon unlike anything this world has ever seen!

1022122107004257--.name: With the right materials, I can make anything.

1022122107004258--.name: My dream is to forge a weapon unlike anything the world has ever seen. Of course, the same could be said for any other Blacksmith on $map:2000203$. But none among them have the skill to create what I have in mind.

1022122107004259--.name: What makes you so confident in your craft?

1022122107004260--.name: The quality of any weapon is determined by the materials used for its creation. But having superior materials is not enough on its own. The true test of a blacksmith is knowing how to best make use of these materials.

1022122107004261--.name: I happen to have mastered my family's secret technique for creating weapons of the highest caliber. I can't help but be confident! However, without the right materials, all of that is moot.

1022122107004262--.name: What sort of materials do you need?

1022122107004263--.name: I intend to imbue the weapon with magical power, such that it will never grow dull, and grant strength to its wielder. Finding a material with those kinds of properties hasn't been easy...

1022122107004264--.name: I've tried all kinds of crystals and objects of power, but none of them could match up to the material that I envisioned in my mind's eye. Besides, those materials had a limit to their power. They didn't last long and they were pathetically weak.

1022122107004265--.name: Perhaps the material I seek doesn't even exist. But it must exist somewhere... Something that generates an endless supply of power...

1127105607004523--.name: I want a sealed Balrog's weapon.

1127105607004525--.name: Right. You're the one who wanted to take one of $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s weapons and imbue it with his power. Give me a minute. If you have the spoils of your victory, I can imbue the weapon for you.

1127105607004528--.name: It looks like your bag is full. Make some room, if you'd be so kind.

1127105607004529--.name: Well, this is awkward. You do know that you need 36 $itemPlural:30000420$ and 5 $itemPlural:30000421$, don't you? Come back when you have them.

1127105607004530--.name: I've asked around everywhere, but I haven't heard anything. I'll find a solution, though. It's just a matter of time. Say... do you happen to know a man named $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$? I hear he deals in $itemPlural:30000421$. You might ask him to see if he knows anything.

1125194807004469--.name: We've got nothing but problems here.

1125194807004470--.name: Why have the Baaz shoveled this ordeal on my shoulders?

1125194807004471--.name: Acting Elder Blade... What a hassle.

1125194807004472--.name: This is all that old coot Arazaad's fault. He's giving me work to do from beyond the grave!

1205185107004717--.name: Was there bad blood between you and Arazard?

1205185107004718--.name: More like resentment. He was always bossing me around. "Practice your rune magic. Practice with your blade. Behave like a leader and set an example for the other Runeblades. Blah blah blah!" Even when $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ were there, the old man always singled me out.

1205185107004719--.name: Sounds like you were Arazaad's most trusted student.

1205185107004720--.name: W-what? No way. He was just a mean old man looking for an easy mark to pick on. Trust me, his favorite student was that jerk $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, and boy did that one come back to bite him.

1125194807004473--.name: There can be no progress without sacrifice.

1125194807004474--.name: Even with the draft in effect, we still don't have enough soldiers.

1125194807004476--.name: $npc:11001231[gender:0]$, that rat! I'll make him pay!

1125194807004477--.name: $MyPCName$, if I'm not mistaken? You're that reckless student of $npc:11001244[gender:0]$'s I've heard so much about.

1205185107004722--.name: You'll be hard-pressed to find a Runeblade within Terrun Calibre that hasn't heard of you. Though lately, your name has been cropping up more and more.

1205185107004723--.name: What do you mean by that?

1205185107004724--.name: You don't know? Your teacher, $npc:11001246[gender:0]$, is one of the Eight Blades, the most magnificent warriors in all of Terrun Calibre. Learning from him is an honor, yet your approach to your studies have been a bit... unconventional. It's no wonder why there are many Runeblades who are jealous and resentful of you.

1125194807004480--.name: We couldn't have known there'd be traps...

1125194807004481--.name: Ugh... I was injured by a trap, and $npc:11001244[gender:0]$ ran on ahead on his own.

1205222707004733--.name: We tracked $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ and his Jibricia followers here, but they had already filled the passage with traps. I'm worried $npcName:11001244[gender:0]$ might be in danger.

1125194807004482--.name: Have you seen anyone out of place?

1125194807004483--.name: Everyone's counting on me, I can't miss even the tiniest detail.

1125194807004484--.name: There's something suspicious about this place...

1125194807004485--.name: $npc:11001231[gender:0]$ hurt dozens of us when he escaped last night. We all knew we didn't stand a chance, but what else could we do? I'm in no shape to help bring him in, but at least I can keep a lookout.

1125194807004486--.name: How foolish, to fear change so much.

1123154807004428--.name: I have a feeling something interesting is about to happen.

1123154807004430--.name: Come, come, tell me what you need. You won't be leaving empty-handed, heh heh heh...

1123154807004431--.name: I bet you get lots of customers.

1123154807004433--.name: I bet you have all kinds of weird stories.

1123154807004434--.name: Of course, of course! I do not know why they come here, but I do so enjoy watching them skitter here and there.

1123154807004435--.name: Don't worry your little soul about that. You'll learn soon enough... even if you don't want to.

1123154807004436--.name: Enough to spend all night in the telling, and then some! So, what would you like to hear? The tale of a young monster slayer and his buxom mage companion? The story of how I've kept my youthful looks? Or... something else?

1123154807004438--.name: Ahhh, yes... I know just the tale for a squirmy adventurer like you. Listen close, dearie...

1123154807004439--.name: Legend has it that when the Shadow Seed takes root, a new son will be born unto the Demon King and darkness shall swallow the world. A lovely little tale, don't you think?

1123154807004440--.name: You and I have different definitions of 'lovely.'

1123154807004441--.name: Blind little child! Lovely is in the eye of the beholder.

1125183507007502--.name: Even when it is too dark to see, keep your eyes wide open. You'll find your way... eventually.

1125183507007504--.name: What I am trying to say is that you shouldn't be here right now. I will send you to where you should be.

1125183507007506--.name: I've created a portal for you down there. It will take you to $map:52000076$. Next time, use the portal instead of bothering me, all right?

1125185807007507--.name: You've come here empty-handed. What are you talking about?

1214150707007552--.name: Do you not realize that you should be somewhere else?

1214150707007554--.name: Heh heh heh... Off with you!

1214150707007556--.name: Come, come, tell me what you need. You won't be leaving empty-handed, heh heh heh...

1214150707007557--.name: I bet you get lots of customers.

1214150707007559--.name: I bet you have all kinds of weird stories.

1214150707007560--.name: Of course, of course! I do not know why they come here, but I do so enjoy watching them skitter here and there.

1214150707007561--.name: Don't worry your little soul about that. You'll learn soon enough... even if you don't want to.

1214150707007562--.name: Enough to spend all night in the telling, and then some! So, what would you like to hear? The tale of a young monster slayer and his buxom mage companion? The story of how I've kept my youthful looks? Or... something else?

1214150707007564--.name: Ahhh, yes... I know just the tale for a squirmy adventurer like you. Listen close, dearie...

1214150707007565--.name: Legend has it that when the Shadow Seed takes root, a new son will be born unto the Demon King and darkness shall swallow the world. A lovely little tale, don't you think?

1214150707007566--.name: You and I have different definitions of 'lovely.'

1214150707007567--.name: Blind little child! Lovely is in the eye of the beholder.

1123154807004444--.name: The grownups told me not to do it...

1123154807004445--.name: The grownups said not to leave the forest. But why not? What's out there? I gotta know!

1123154807004446--.name: You should listen to the grownups, kid.

1123154807004447--.name: But they never let me do anything fun! I bet there's all kinds of toys and games beyond the forest, and the grownups are keeping it all to themselves!

1123154807004449--.name: Then maybe there's... there's just groves and groves of sweet fruit! There's got to be something out there! And I wanna see it!

1123214707004452--.name: Why is this darkness so persistent?

1123214707004453--.name: Agh... I'm so disappointed in myself! I can barely get anywhere in the $map:2000350$... and it's all because of those stupid $item:90000014$.

1123214707004454--.name: Why are you so eager to be here?

1123214707004455--.name: Because everything is... wrong! This spreading darkness is turning our world cold and evil. So many fairies have already fallen trying to stem the tide, and I have to do my part too!

1123214707004456--.name: You should leave this work to someone else.

1123214707004457--.name: What? You think I can't do it just 'cause I'm fairfolk? What makes you so special? Typical human arrogance!

1123214707004458--.name: The fairies have kept the darkness from touching Maple World since before you were in diapers. We never ask for anything in return, either. And what do we get for our troubles? The disdain of humans. Pah!

1124183307004460--.name: What is this strange energy flow?

1124183307004461--.name: I think I can figure it out... Just need to...

1124183307004462--.name: Excuse me, but I'm a bit busy. Can you come back later?

1124183307004464--.name: I'll leave you to it, then.

1124183307004465--.name:
What am I doing...?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001242[gender:0]$ stares at you blankly.)</font>

1124183307004466--.name: I doubt you could comprehend what I'm doing. My research extends far beyond the senses of ordinary people like you.

1124183307004467--.name: Good. For a moment there, I thought you were going to ask me some obvious questions. Now shoo! I have work to do!

1127160707004576--.name: Hmph. Unless you have something interesting to show me, just leave me alone.

1127160707004577--.name: I need a glimmering Balrog's weapon.

1127160707004578--.name: How goes your research on power wavelengths?

1127160707004579--.name: I'm a scientist, not a magician. I can't just whisk such things out of thin air. I don't suppose you actually brought me the materials?

1127160707004580--.name: As it happens, I did! So, can you make it?

1127160707004581--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He grumbles under his breath and puts together your new weapon.)</font>
Here you go. I only made it because you asked so nicely. If you want it polished up, I suggest you get it to a smith right away.

1127160707004582--.name: What's this? Your bag's full! Why are you wasting my time when you don't even have space for a new weapon?

1127160707004583--.name: I need raw materials for a job like this! Say, 30 $itemPlural:30000437$ or so. And don't forget the $item:30000432$ and $item:30000433$!

1127160707004584--.name: It's keeping me busy. Real busy. As in, "Don't bother me if you're just want to chat" busy. So, unless you've got something real exciting for me, I don't have time for chitchat.

1201232607004666--.name: I don't actually know what $itemPlural:30000437$ are.

1130105307004663--.name: I wish I could tell you for sure, but all I've heard are unsubstantiated rumors. I'm not even sure if I need them or not. Would you mind holding onto them for now?

1130105307004664--.name: They may be related to the dark powers I've been studying. I'll let you know when I need $itemPlural:30000437$ to study. In the meantime, don't throw them away, okay?

1201232607004667--.name: How disappointing! You can leave now. I'm busy, anyway.

1201233507004668--.name: You have questions? Bring me some $itemPlural:30000437$, and maybe we can talk.
