0629205207006508-Striker-.name: If you got something to say, say it.

0629205207006509-Striker-.name: I should've taught $npcName:11001631[gender:0]$ a lesson in respect when I had the chance...

0629205207006510-Striker-.name: I don't care what $npcName:11001631[gender:0]$ says. I call the shots around here, and don't you forget it.

0630212007006534-Striker-.name: Remember, that guy's all talk and no action. I can beat him with one hand tied behind my back.

0701143507006535-Striker-.name: <font color="#909090">(Something illegible has been etched on the surface.)</font>

0727223007006901-SoulBinder-.name: I feel like I just got here and I already need a nap...

0727223007006902-SoulBinder-.name: Someone needs to teach $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ about the power of napping.

0727223007006905-SoulBinder-.name: You don't need to tell me that. He's the reason some of our old students left!

0727223007006906-SoulBinder-.name: $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ cares about only one thing, and that's training. He expects everyone to keep up with him, and the problem with that should be obvious.

0727223007006907-SoulBinder-.name: I will say, he has a talent for crushing confidence, and that's important when you get arrogant students. His heart's in the right place, it's just... cold and unfeeling, you know?

0727223007006908-SoulBinder-.name: If you ask him why all those students left, he'd tell you they were too soft. Even if he's right, he's not helping them by driving them away!

0727223007006909-SoulBinder-.name: Ugh... I may have overdone it...

0727223007006910-SoulBinder-.name: I don't think this is over...

0727223007006911-SoulBinder-.name: If $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ had gotten here a minute later...

0728024507006978-SoulBinder-.name: Foolish bird... He'd better recover quickly.

0728024507006979-SoulBinder-.name: I'll make sure he's on his feet again soon.

0728024507006980-SoulBinder-.name: It's good to see you, $MyPCName$. Is there something I can get for you?

0804030507007003-SoulBinder-.name: What is this artifact we're after?

0804030507007004-SoulBinder-.name: Should we be looking for the master?

0804030507007005-SoulBinder-.name: I don't know exactly what it is, but supposedly Lone Spirit, the founder of Guidance, left behind a treasure that would grant enlightenment to his true heir. It was passed down through generations... until the eleventh Munakra vanished with it.

0804030507007006-SoulBinder-.name: Some people think it was destroyed. Others think that all of its power was drained, and it's been placed in hiding until it can recharge. Others say that Lone Spirit reincarnated and claimed it for himself. Who knows which theory, if any, is true?

0804030507007007-SoulBinder-.name: The only reliable information on the artifact is told through word-of-mouth, so the only one who would really know is the master. What if... what if $npcName:11001559[gender:0]$ came to Halo Mountain for the artifact?

0804030507007008-SoulBinder-.name:
That must be it. I'm sure he said something about an artifact when he attacked us...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001706[gender:1]$ is lost in thought.)</font>

0804030507007010-SoulBinder-.name:
The master can fend for himself. Don't worry, all right?
<font color="#909090">(Even as she comforts you, worry is etched in her face.)</font>

0728024507006982-SoulBinder-.name: Now that $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ is better, I can finally get some rest.

0728024507006983-SoulBinder-.name: Hello again. Is there something you need?

0804030507007014-SoulBinder-.name: You aren't actually worried about him, are you? He'll be soooo happy to hear that!

0804030507007016-SoulBinder-.name: Well, he'll appreciate your concern, anyway. I'm keeping a close eye on him, so you just leave him to me.

0804030507007017-SoulBinder-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001707[gender:1]$ stops talking suddenly. She hesitates for a moment, then speaks.)</font>
$MyPCName$... Thank you.

0804030507007019-SoulBinder-.name: $npcName:11001715[gender:0]$ has always been very hard on you. But you've stood by us through this crisis, when other students abandoned us for far less.

0804030507007020-SoulBinder-.name: Now Halo Mountain has been burned to the ground and the master is gone. Guidance exists in name only. You have no real obligation to us. Why don't you wash your hands of this whole mess?

0804030507007021-SoulBinder-.name: I owe the master my life.

0804030507007022-SoulBinder-.name: Maybe... But I want to thank you anyway. That's all.

0804030507007024-SoulBinder-.name: This place is amazing! I've never seen such a big city before. It's loud and crowded and crazy, but I think I see why humans like it here.

0804030507007025-SoulBinder-.name: I also get why students who completed their training came to live here. It's about as different from life on Halo Mountain as you can get.

0804030507007026-SoulBinder-.name: So, you think you'll be a city slicker from now on?

0804030507007027-SoulBinder-.name:
No, I don't think so. This place is amazing, but I'll always choose a peaceful life on Halo Mountain...
<font color="#909090">(There's a far-off look in her eyes.)</font>

0804030507007028-SoulBinder-.name: N-no need to dwell on the past, I guess! Let's talk about something else.

0728024507006985-SoulBinder-.name: Yawn! I could use a nap.

0805021607007081-SoulBinder-.name: Do you know how long it's been since I had a good nap? Ever since we got here, I've been so busy that I haven't had time to train, let alone get my beauty sleep.

0805021607007083-SoulBinder-.name:
It wouldn't do any good. I have to get myself good and tired from training, or I can't doze off. So it'll just have to wait!
<font color="#909090">(She gives a cheerful laugh.)</font>

0728022507006961-SoulBinder-.name: Mm? Do you have something to say?

0728024507006988-SoulBinder-.name: It's hard to focus without a good night's rest, you know?

0728024507006989-SoulBinder-.name: I think there's more going on here than we realize. It's at times like this we have to keep a clear head. Got it?

0728024507006990-SoulBinder-.name: Come to think of it... Did I take a nap today?

0728024507006991-SoulBinder-.name: It's so dusty. $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ really should clean more.

0728024507006992-SoulBinder-.name: Were your contacts any good this time?

0805021607007086-SoulBinder-.name: I suppose they are! Don't judge them by their looks, though. They've got a knack for gathering information.

0805021607007088-SoulBinder-.name: I can't think of any reason it wouldn't be. If you're worried, I'll vouch for them personally. They've never failed me in the past.

0728024507006994-SoulBinder-.name: Perhaps this is the energy of the earth...

0728024507006995-SoulBinder-.name: The more I look at this place, the more mystified I am. Almost as if... it yearns for something...

0728024507006996-SoulBinder-.name: There's a strange energy about this place.

0728024507006998-SoulBinder-.name: The artifact must be hidden somewhere nearby. Or something related to it, at the very least.

0728024507007003-SoulBinder-.name: Do you mind? I don't want to think right now...

0805021607007090-SoulBinder-.name: None of us are okay right now. All the more reason to stay strong.

0805021607007092-SoulBinder-.name:
You know, I... Oh, never mind.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001714[gender:1]$ looks you in the eye, but stops herself from saying more.)</font>

0728024507007007-SoulBinder-.name: If you have something to say, just say it.

0804030507007032-SoulBinder-.name: The best victory is a half-victory. The second best is an easy victory. The worst is a complete victory. Do you know why?

0804030507007034-SoulBinder-.name: Victory and defeat are meaningless concepts.

0804030507007035-SoulBinder-.name: I like the victories where I crush my foes.

0804030507007036-SoulBinder-.name: An easy victory makes you lazy. A complete victory makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.

0804030507007037-SoulBinder-.name: I may have been defeated on Halo Mountain, but my small victories gave me the courage—no, a reason—to try again.

0804030507007038-SoulBinder-.name:
Defeat is just another part of training. The master said that every mistake is a chance to better yourself. Do you understand now?
<font color="#909090">(Junta grins at you.)</font>

0804030507007040-SoulBinder-.name: Don't get philosophical on me. A real philosopher once said, "Do not let what you think you know get in the way of what you have yet to learn."

0804030507007041-SoulBinder-.name: Every concept, no matter how insignificant, has some value. I suggest you listen carefully.

0804030507007042-SoulBinder-.name: An easy victory makes you lazy. A complete victory makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.

0804030507007043-SoulBinder-.name:
Defeat is just another part of training. The master said that every mistake is a chance to better yourself. Do you understand now?
<font color="#909090">(Junta watches you closely.)</font>

0804030507007044-SoulBinder-.name: A victory like that makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.

0804030507007045-SoulBinder-.name: Was Halo Mountain your first half-victory?

0804030507007046-SoulBinder-.name: The world is larger than you think. Even outside of Guidance, there are great warriors to rival my own abilities. There is one in particular that I remember to this day... a champion of a place called $map:02000100$.

0804030507007047-SoulBinder-.name: An outsider beat you? They must have been a great beast.

0804030507007048-SoulBinder-.name: Not a beast... a man. And who said I lost?! I'm insulted that you'd think I would lose to a human... Still, this one was my match.

0804030507007050-SoulBinder-.name: It doesn't matter. I don't even remember his name. All I recall is his long red hair, and the scars that covered his body.

0804030507007051-SoulBinder-.name: He was too fast and strong to be a normal human. His punches... It was as if he somehow had command of animus. I wonder what sort of training makes a man like that...

0804030507007052-SoulBinder-.name: Well? Do you have anything to say?

0804030507007053-SoulBinder-.name: It sounds like he had real strength.

0804030507007054-SoulBinder-.name: He did. And he got that strength on his own, through hard work. You, on the other hand, are only strong because of the master's animus, and you still faint from time to time! So you'd better train just as hard, understand?

0804030507007056-SoulBinder-.name: We're threatened by the strongest enemy we've ever met. We can lay low for now, but eventually we will need to unite our power and take him down. Will you be strong enough to do your part when the time comes?

0728022507006968-SoulBinder-.name: You'd better have a good reason for interrupting my training.

0728024507007008-SoulBinder-.name: I do not care for this $map:02000001$.

0728024507007009-SoulBinder-.name: Maybe I needed more time to heal...

0805021607007093-SoulBinder-.name: I've given it some thought, but I still don't understand why some of us would leave the master's guidance to live in human cities like $map:02000001$. $MyPCName$, do you like this place?

0805021607007096-SoulBinder-.name: Hmph. If you have time to enjoy the sights, then you have time to train!

0805021607007098-SoulBinder-.name: Yes... Yes, it is, isn't it? It hasn't escaped my notice that you've been training hard lately. Don't strain yourself.

0728022507006969-SoulBinder-.name: You have something to say to me?

0805021607007100-SoulBinder-.name: Not all questions require an answer. Some mysteries are better left unsolved. But even I have trouble when to seek the truth, and when to let an issue lie...

0805021607007102-SoulBinder-.name: Never mind. I've just had much on my mind lately...

0728022507006970-SoulBinder-.name: You have something to say to me?

0728024507007016-SoulBinder-.name: If things are to return to normal, then we must stay united. Don't forget that.

0728022507006971-SoulBinder-.name: You have something to say to me?

0728024507007017-SoulBinder-.name: I can sense animus in this place.

0728024507007019-SoulBinder-.name: Lava and ice... an unlikely, but breathtaking, view. It reminds me of you, $npcName:11001711[gender:1]$, and myself.

0728022507006972-SoulBinder-.name: You have something to say to me?

0728024507007022-SoulBinder-.name: Enough talk. We must focus on finding the artifact.

0728024507007024-SoulBinder-.name: I couldn't do it... I'm sorry...

0728024507007025-SoulBinder-.name: I'm not telling you a thing. It's better that way.

0804173107007076-SoulBinder-.name: Tell me what you have to say.

0804173107007077-SoulBinder-.name: Who are those two behind you?

0804173107007078-SoulBinder-.name: These are my companions. Don't worry, they aren't nearly as violent or nasty as they look.

0804172407007063-SoulBinder-.name: Heh heh... Most humans can't comprehend the importance of my work here. Don't look down on me just 'cause I'm small!

0804172407007064-SoulBinder-.name: But I can tell that you're more sensible then the other humans. You value meerkat ingenuity, yes? Not a thing happens here that we don't see.

0804172407007065-SoulBinder-.name: So, what have you seen lately?

0804172407007066-SoulBinder-.name: All kinds of people come through here, raising all sorts of ruckus. Sometimes they make angry noises at us because they can't get their security deposits back. Once time, I saw the guards drag away a human male because he wouldn't leave the pretty human female.

0804172407007068-SoulBinder-.name: $male:Lessee...,female:Nuh-uh!$ $npcName:11000515[gender:1]$. You know her? You better steer clear. She's pretty, but she's got thorns!

0804172907007069-SoulBinder-.name: You see me? You have exceptionally sharp senses.

0804172907007071-SoulBinder-.name: Where's it written I've got to tell you anything?

0804172907007074-SoulBinder-.name: You may have enough free time to bug strangers, but I don't. Scram.

0728024607006978-SoulBinder-.name: Security systems will be put online if you do not verify your credentials. Failure to connect will require you to re-verify your credentials at the front gate.

1018104207007262--.name: Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!

1018104207007266--.name: Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!

1018104207007270--.name: Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!

1018104207007274--.name: Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!

1018104207007276--.name: I don't know what to say...

1018104207007277--.name: I never thought I'd be free again...

1018104207007278--.name: Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!

1018104207007282--.name: Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!

1111015907007377--.name: Ah, I have to go back now...

1111015907007378--.name: I thought everything'd work out if I could just get into the army. Now I'm not sure I'm cut out for this...

1111015907007381--.name: Th-thank you! I'll do my best.

1020165907007299--.name: Its eggs must be up in there.

1020165907007300--.name: I can't wait to become a full-fledged guard.

1020165907007301--.name: Did you run into any mushrooms on the way here?

1020165907007302--.name:
M-mushrooms? Are there mushrooms here? Oh no... 
<font color="#909090">(All the color drains from $npcName:11001839[gender:0]$'s face. What terrible happening has made him so afraid of something as innocuous as mushrooms?)</font>

1020165907007304--.name:
H-how could you do that to me, $MyPCName$? I... I thought we were friends. Have you just been pretending to like me all this time?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001839[gender:0]$'s eyes begin to water.)</font>

1020165907007307--.name: Aw man. I really don't think that went super great. Why can't I be more like you?

1111015907007384--.name: Maybe you need to take a break.

1020165907007308--.name: Jeez, you think so? See, here I was thinking I gotta train harder. Otherwise, I'll never get strong enough to help you...

1020165907007310--.name: My head... My shoulders... My spleen...

1020165907007311--.name: The room's spinning. Who knows when I'll be ready for active duty?

1020165907007314--.name: I think my arms are going to fall off.

1020165907007322--.name: I'm glad you've made a quick recovery.  Come and see me whenever you're hurt. You can pop in for a checkup in the hospital lobby, just outside the patient rooms.

1213150207007551--.name: This mine is run by the Nerman Guild. We've got all the materials a blacksmith might need.

1101100307007348--.name: Geez! Why's this machine rattling so much?

1101100307007354--.name: It's like I'm on a water bed!

1101100307007358--.name: There's only one path for me...

1101100307007364--.name: I better enjoy this before it starts raining.

1101100307007367--.name: Outta my way. Outta my way!

1027193507007341--.name: The filming went smoothly, thanks to you. Anyway, it's getting late, so I'm heading back to the station. I'll see you in $map:02000164$.

1027193507007343--.name: Thanks for all the hard work, $MyPCName$.

1109185407007370--.name: Ladies and gentlemen! Are you ready for some action-packed racing?

1109185407007371--.name: Today's rally has me on the edge of my seat!

1109185407007373--.name: Are you joining today's race? Good luck!

1122193107007459--.name: Eve and I will have a long talk after this.

1122193107007460--.name: We must protect Tria at all costs.

1122193107007461--.name: We've got to hold out long enough for Eve to get reinforcements.

1115191007007387--.name: Only the strongest of the strong can face the challenge of the Chaotic Raid Battle Sim.

1115191007007388--.name: Welcome to the $map:63000047$. How may I help you?

1115191007007392--.name: The $map:63000047$ is home of the Chaotic Raid Battle Sim, where you can experience the most realistic virtual battles in Maple World. All the great heroes come here sooner or later.

1116121707007396--.name: Do you have any more questions?

1115191007007393--.name: The Chaotic Raid Battle Sim is a full-immersion virtual combat simulator that Dr. Gelimer created after decades of collecting combat data. You can use it to prepare for any kind of conflict situation.

1115191007007394--.name: The simulations are so good, they're more dangerous than the real thing! On that note, you should definitely make sure you and your group are prepared before trying it out.

1116121707007400--.name: Do you have any more questions?

1115191007007395--.name: This place was created by my teacher, the great Dr. Gelimer. It is a masterpiece containing combat data taken from monsters throughout Maple World.

1116121707007404--.name: Do you have any more questions?

1116121707007408--.name: If you have any more questions, you know where to find me.

1116181807007411--.name: We need to track down Katvan's accomplices before they do any more damage.

0105051007007699-NPCPortal01-.name: Please move as quickly as you can.

1116181807007412--.name: <font color="#909090">(Raymon is lying on the ground. You should check on him.)</font>

1116181807007415--.name: Katvan and I will meet again.

0105051007007700-NPCPortal01-.name: Hold on! I'll summon a portal for you.

1116181807007419--.name: <font color="#909090">(Lennon was here not too long ago.)</font>

1121184207007429--.name: Peace and quiet... This is the life!

1121184207007430--.name: Do you mind? I'm trying to enjoy some "me" time.

1121184207007431--.name: Come on... Have a nibble of that tasty bait...

1121184207007432--.name: I'll catch the most fish today!

1121184207007434--.name: I'll catch a fish big enough to feed me all day long.

1121184207007436--.name: AHH! I had a fish on the line, and it got away... thanks to you!

1121184207007438--.name: Come out, fishy fishy! It's dinnertime!

1121184207007439--.name: I coated my hook with chocolate. Who doesn't like chocolate?

1121184207007440--.name: The nerve of these fish! If they're going to eat my bait, they should have the decency to get caught!

1121184207007441--.name: There... There it is! I've got one!

1121184207007442--.name: Another one got away...! This is ticking me off!

1122214707007462--.name: I'll master the skill, and then I'll make wonderful things!

1122214707007463--.name: I'll make you something no one else can!

1122214707007465--.name: I worked on it so hard...

1122214707007467--.name: Do you also want me to make something for you?

1122214707007468--.name: They're pretty, but they don't fit my hands.

1122214707007469--.name: Maybe I should ask him to make them larger...

1122214707007470--.name: I wish the materials weren't so expensive...

1122214707007471--.name: I wonder if I can get a discount?

1122214707007472--.name: I can't afford these materials. I'll just have to get some on my own...

1122214707007473--.name: Hmph... Being single is better, anyway!

1122214707007474--.name: Well, I don't have anyone to give gifts...

1122214707007475--.name: Handicrafts are so fun that I often lose track of the time. I just wish I had someone to actually give this stuff to...

1122214707007476--.name: I could try engraving my name in it...

1122214707007479--.name: Welp, so much for my plans!

1122214707007481--.name: Sorry, but I'm not in the mood to chat.

1208184307007512--.name: Have I gained weight? My clothes aren't fitting right.

1208184307007513--.name: Sigh... If only this place didn't have such good designs.

1208184307007514--.name: Only the finest quality fabric for me.

1208184307007515--.name: What do you think will be in this year?

1208184307007517--.name: It's been quite the busy day today.

1208184307007518--.name: How many hours until my shift ends...?

1208184307007520--.name: You're welcome to try something on.

1208184307007521--.name: Have you checked out our clearance aisle?

1208184307007523--.name: This season's fashions are so uninspired, don't you think?

1208184307007525--.name: Do they have this in my size...?

1208184307007526--.name: I don't know if I can afford to shop here. Can you?

1208184307007527--.name: Lazy designers! These are the exact same clothes they had here yesterday. Where are the new designs?

1208184307007528--.name: And... Hmm... Did I forget to tune my guitar?

1208184307007530--.name: I hear there's a lot of top talent here for the audition. I'm a little worried...

1208184307007532--.name: Ugh... I can't feel my lips...

1208184307007533--.name:
Toot too-toot!
<font color="#909090">(He mumbles something into his clarinet.)</font>

1208184307007535--.name: This is great. This is the best I've ever played!

1208184307007536--.name: Finally, I'm in my element. Don't bother me while I'm in the zone.

1208184307007537--.name: Why do I keep messing this part up...?

1208184307007539--.name: Are you here for the audition? You better grab your instrument and start practicing while you still can.

1208184307007540--.name: What instrument should I get for my darling children? Hmm...

1208184307007541--.name: They're more expensive than I expected...

1208184307007542--.name: My darling children are practically virtuosos. That's why I think it's time they learned how to play.

1208184307007545--.name: But I don't want to be a musician!

1208184307007548--.name: First, I'll learn how to play the harp. Then I'll let my hair down, and wear a flowing white gown, and spend all day plucking on the strings. I'll look so pretty!

0105051007007701-NPCPortal01-.name: Wait... Ugh...! Use this portal to get there right away.

0201161807007916--.name: $MyPCName$, I'm looking forward to hearing more great stories of your heroism.

0109143707007703--.name: Everything is going just as I envisioned it!

0109143707007704--.name: Things are going just as I planned.

0109143707007705--.name: You're here for work? Great! Let's get started.

0109143707007706--.name: What's this new business of yours?

0109143707007709--.name: Hehe. It really is a novel business model, isn't it? I guess I can tell you, if you're going to be working here.

0109143707007710--.name: Maple World's a pretty big place, but as we've developed newer, faster ways to travel, our systems of trade haven't really kept up.

0109143707007711--.name: People want things they can't get locally. Some people in $map:02000023$ might be starved for electronics from $map:02000100$, or others in $map:02010002$  might want handicrafts from Nerman artists.

0109143707007712--.name: The thing is, not everybody can afford to trot around the globe shopping for things they want. That's where my shop comes in.

0109143707007713--.name: Customers place their orders online for an item, and I acquire it for them. Then all they have to do is come in and pick up their merchandise. No muss, no fuss!

0109143707007714--.name: I've spent a long time building this business, and I've pretty much cornered the market. To do what I do, you need all kinds of connections and a shrewd business acumen. Luckily, I've got that in spades!

0109143707007715--.name: You will be working as a team with your three friends. One of you will work the cash register, the rest of you will work in the warehouse.

0109143707007716--.name: Customers come to the store to pick up their orders. All you have to do is find their items in the warehouse and ring them up at the counter. Easy, right?

0109143707007717--.name: When a customer comes to the counter, the cashier must greet them. The customer will tell you which item they've come to pick up, and the cashier relays that information to the warehouse workers.

0109143707007718--.name: The warehouse workers will need to find and bring the item to the cashier. Cathy Mart prides itself in its service, so the faster the better.

0109143707007719--.name: Also, keep in mind that the store has an automatic cleaning system to keep the place nice and tidy.

0109143707007720--.name: That means that any item from the warehouse you leave lying around will be removed very soon after. That's why it's crucial you give the item to the customer directly.

0109143707007721--.name: Do you have two or more grasping appendages? Can you lift things? You're hired! I don't care about your age, job, level, or any of that nonsense. All I need you to do is work together to fulfill customers' orders with blinding speed.

0109143707007722--.name: The four of you must work together from the moment the store opens until it closes. No quitting, and no breaks!

0109143707007723--.name: Wait, what happens if someone quits?

0109143707007724--.name: For your own sake, let's hope that doesn't happen.

0102155907007618--.name: If we could only find something...

0102155907007620--.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. I've been waiting for you.

0102155907007627--.name: It's not easy, getting used to this cold.

0102155907007628--.name: What kind of secrets are hidden in the ice?

0102155907007631--.name: What does the supply crew do around here?

0102155907007632--.name: I came here with the supply crew, of course. We're here to keep the guards out here from turning into popsicles. But me... I'm here for another reason.

0102155907007633--.name: So, why are you REALLY here?

0102155907007634--.name: We keep the guards fed and clothed so they don't freeze or complain too much. Veterans like me handle supplies since we've learned what kind of gear we'll need. Honestly though, there's another reason I'm here.

0102155907007635--.name: So, why are you REALLY here?

0102155907007636--.name: I'm here to study a kingdom that once stood in this snowfield. It was a peaceful kingdom, but no one knows why it vanished into history. The survivors scattered, and none of them will talk to me, so I came here myself.

0206154107007917--.name: I've heard there's a shrine hidden somewhere in the snowfield kingdom. It was meant only for their kings and queens, to hold their most precious treasure. That means if I can get in there, I'll be rich!

0206154107007918--.name: Hey, this is all completely grounded in fact! That's what my gut tells me, anyway. You look like you can handle a little adventure. If you come across the shrine, you gotta let me know!

0102155907007638--.name: Hmm, I must say, I think I've seen you before.

0102155907007639--.name: Yeah, we met back in Tria.

0102155907007640--.name: Ah! Now I remember you, $MyPCName$! It's been awhile, hasn't it? Good to see you again, very good.

0102155907007641--.name: My kingdom... Ahhh, it was so very beautiful. You may hear stories about it, but I tell you the truth.

0102155907007642--.name:
Our king... I told him to be strong...
<font color="#909090">(He does his best to hide his despair, but it runs too deep.)</font>

0102155907007643--.name: <font color="#909090">(A chilling wind blows through the gap in the ice wall behind the frozen tree.)</font>

0102155907007644--.name: <font color="#909090">(Something must be hidden behind this tree.)</font>

0102155907007647--.name: You must conserve your energy in the cold. That's why I don't talk much. Just so you know.

0207083707007919--.name: Oh look, it's $MyPCName$ the worrywart. What do you want?

0207083707007921--.name: Why are you so much smaller than the other snowfolks?

0207083707007922--.name: There you go. This is because you got those materials for me, you know. Helping others pays off!

0207083707007923--.name:
Excuse me? Hey, that's none of your business! And I'm not small... the others are just really big!

<font color="#909090">(He's gotten sulky. I don't think he'll want to talk to me anymore.)</font>

0102155907007651--.name: I was told humans were selfish, foul creatures... but in the end, a human saved me.

0102155907007653--.name: I'll live, thanks to you. We snowcubs are strong. That's all.

0102155907007656--.name: There are a great many things left to do. We should leave, for our next destination will be challenging.

0113143107007757--.name: Ahhh, I want to get better soon so I can go on adventures again!

0113143107007758--.name: I want to get better soon so I can go on adventures again!

0113143107007760--.name: How soon until I can sail again? Cough, cough! I want to be well so I can set off to find the wonders of the world.

0113143107007761--.name: $MyPCName$, thank you for telling me about your adventures! I hope I can get better so I can have my own adventures, too.

0113143107007762--.name: <font color="#909090">(You see a wooden cabin weathered by wind and sea.)</font>

0113143107007763--.name: <font color="#909090">(Is someone inside this cabin? You can hear voices.)</font>

0113143107007764--.name: Sniff, sniff... Chorrie is scared... Too many evil people out there.

0113143107007766--.name: I hate pirates... I hate them!

0113143107007767--.name: No, no. Don't. I don't know anything. I really don't.

0113143107007768--.name: Aww, it's okay. Take it easy.

0113143107007769--.name: Sob... No one knows how I feel. Why can't I be left alone? Sob...

0113143107007771--.name: $MyPCName$, I'm sorry you came all the way here for nothing.

0207122607007930--.name: Who would have thought places like this would still exist in Maple World?

0207122607007931--.name: I'd love to jump into that hot spring... just not when you're watching me, $MyPCName$.

0207122607007932--.name: It's hot! Too hot! Even the air-conditioning spell isn't helping.

0207122607007933--.name: Going from cold to hot so quick is not good for your health. Messes up your skin! And our skin is important for mages... helps us sense mana better.

0207122607007934--.name: I guess field duty isn't that bad...

0207122607007935--.name: It's hard to keep the Shadow Gate staffed with enough soldiers. If any more rifts like this open up, Maple World could be in serious trouble.

0207122607007937--.name: I've learned so much about the world thanks to you, $MyPCName$. Thank you so much.

0113173307007775--.name: Hello, how may I help you?

0113173307007776--.name: If you want to know about playing music in $map:02000064$, I'm here to help.

0113173307007777--.name: If you want to know how to perform, I can help.

0113173307007778--.name: Hello, how may I help you?

0113173307007779--.name: How can I play music in $map:02000064$?

0113173307007780--.name: How can I get to the stage?

0113173307007781--.name: How can I cheer during a performance?

0113173307007782--.name: All you have to do to perform in $map:02000064$ is apply! Just press the request button. If someone else has already applied, you'll need to wait 10 minutes and then apply again when they're done.

0113173307007783--.name: How can I play as a group?

0113173307007784--.name: For ensemble performances, form a party with someone who has applied to perform. After that you can all take the stage together.

0113173307007785--.name: It's super easy to perform in a group! So, is there anything else you want to know?

0113173307007786--.name: How can I get to the stage?

0113173307007787--.name: How can I cheer during a performance?

0113173307007789--.name: We'll let you up on stage if you're going to perform. Just hit the apply button and we'll let you know when it's time.

0113173307007790--.name: If you want to leave the stage, just hit the same button you used to get up there. That was an easy one. Anything else?

0113173307007791--.name: How can I play music in $map:02000064$?

0113173307007792--.name: How can I cheer during a performance?

0113173307007794--.name: Everyone in $map:02000064$ can hear performances from the stage. Show your appreciation by lighting firecrackers, waving glowsticks, or just clapping!

0113173307007795--.name: Cheers and applause encourage the performers, so let 'em have it! Anything else you want to know?

0113173307007796--.name: How can I play music in $map:02000064$?

0113173307007797--.name: How can I get to the stage?

0113173307007799--.name: Great! Come on back if you have any more questions about performing in $map:02000064$.

0207122607007939--.name: I'll tell you more of the Lumiknights when the time is right.

0207122607007941--.name: Dark Wind is changing. It's not the same organization you once knew.

0207122607007943--.name: The Green Hood will always protect you.

0207122607007944--.name: The Lumiknights are always watching you, $MyPCName$.

0207122607007945--.name: I'll tell you more of the Lumiknights when the time is right.

0119135307007816--.name: This right here is my jam.

0119135307007817--.name: Gotta keep it going, keep it going full speed!

0119135307007818--.name: Yo, you looking for a guild? This is the Swag Wagon, a crew of hip-hop dancers.

0119135307007819--.name: I totally want to join your guild!

0119135307007820--.name: Not really my scene, but thanks.

0119135307007821--.name: I bet you do, but we're full up. You might be able to find another crew, or start your own. Don't expect to compete with us though, heh.

0119135307007827--.name: Do you even know what hip-hop is?

0119135307007828--.name: I said a hip, hop, hippy...

0119135307007833--.name: I gotta be true to myself, you know?

0119135307007835--.name: Hm, you look like you could use some exercise.

0119135307007836--.name: I'll show you how beautiful muscles can be.

0119135307007837--.name: My body is steel covered in velvet.

0119135307007838--.name: Isn't it time you got buff? I'd invite you to my SwolePatrol guild but we don't have any openings.

0119135307007839--.name: I totally want to join your guild!

0119135307007840--.name: Not really my scene, but thanks.

0119135307007841--.name: What's wrong, got fries in your ears? Just kidding, but for real we're full. You're gonna have to find another guild to pump you up.

0119135307007842--.name: Oh, really? I have a feeling you'll be changing your mind sometime soon.

0119135307007844--.name: All right, it's time to burn that belly fat!

0119135307007847--.name: Working out sure used to be easier when I was younger...

0119135307007848--.name: I'd better not hurt my joints doing this.

0119135307007851--.name: Ah! I forgot how many reps I did.

0119135307007853--.name: What's next? Squats? Chin-ups? Something hard!

0119135307007854--.name: Better warm up my hips first.

0119135307007855--.name: There's nothing like a glass of something sweet to drink away your stress.

0119135307007856--.name: Something sweet is the cure for what ails ya.

0119135307007857--.name: You can't really relax until you relax YOUR way.

0119135307007858--.name: Are you stressed out? I formed the QuietMinds guild to help people escape from the many stresses of life.

0119135307007859--.name: I totally want to join your guild!

0119135307007860--.name: Not really my scene, but thanks.

0119135307007861--.name: Oh! I'm sorry, but my guild is already full. Hm... Well, I'm sure I'm not the only one who formed a guild to relax. There has to be another chill guild somewhere. Or you could start your own.

0119135307007862--.name: Ah, you must be quite content with your life. You're always welcome to visit if you need a place to rest and escape from reality.

0119135307007864--.name: From now on, I'm going to take things slow.

0119135307007865--.name: I had no idea the world was so large and beautiful...

0119135307007867--.name: It's nice and breezy here. Mm, I feel like I can breathe now...

0119135307007868--.name: It's good to take some time off now and then.

0119135307007871--.name: I think I'll try not to think at all. I'll focus on breathing...

0119135307007872--.name: Sometimes I just gaze off into the distance...

0119135307007873--.name: It's time to rest. I shall clear my mind.

0119135307007874--.name: Ah, I love how peaceful this is...

0119135307007876--.name: The wind smells of fresh grass.

0119135307007877--.name: I adore this scent! Ahhh, the smell of fresh grass and soft soil...

0119135307007878--.name: Hello, and welcome to this gathering of the Sproutlanders guild. We come together to garden and tend to the wonderful greenery of Maple World.

0119135307007879--.name: I totally want to join your guild!

0119135307007880--.name: Not really my scene, but thanks.

0119135307007881--.name: I'm so sorry, but my guild is already full. You could always form your own guild for loving and caring for the natural world. I think everyone would benefit!

0119135307007882--.name: Oh, I see. Well, to each their own, right? Just try not to harm any trees in your journeys. Or flowers. Or grass.

0119135307007885--.name: Do they need more water or sunlight?

0119135307007887--.name: You're growing well, my little friends.

0119135307007894--.name: The carrots they grow around here are so sweet!

0321141707008118--.name: I don't have time for small potatoes.

0321141707008119--.name: How can I get anything done with these idiots?

0321141707008120--.name: It's been too long since Blackstar faced a real challenge. I'd better call a meeting...

0321141707008121--.name: I don't know you, so I'll warn you once: Don't cross me.

0131151207007898--.name: A new land for creating just opened up, and everyone's invited!

0131151207007899--.name: Head over to Builder's Park and have fun decorating it with others.

0131151207007900--.name: Hey there, $MyPCName$. How would you like to decorate and share your creations to your heart's content? There's a place for that, and it's called Builder's Park!

0131151207007902--.name: I like the sound of that!

0131151207007903--.name: Hmm, maybe you should let me explain first. It all started with a freak waterspout in the middle of the open sea. When the water finally calmed, a new island appeared in its wake.

0131151207007904--.name: The palace officially named the land Vanica, but designated it a place for anyone to come and build whatever they want. People started calling it Builder's Park, since they could just build houses and decorate the land with no limits. $MyPCName$, how'd you like to check it out and meet some new friends?

0131151207007905--.name: How can I get to Vanica?

0131151207007906--.name: Easy! Just enter this oh-so-convenient portal next to me, and next thing you know you'll be in $map:02000407$, right in the heart of Vanica.

0131151207007907--.name: Oh, really? So, you've already built and decorated to your hear's content?

0131151207007910--.name: Wow $MyPCName$, you get around! It really is more fun to build with others than to do it on your own, right? Be sure to head back to Vanica whenever you want to make some new memories together.

0131151207007911--.name: Well then, let me explain how to get there! Are you ready? Okay, step one is to enter this portal next to me. That's it! It'll take you straight to $map:02000407$, in the heart of Vanica.

0207122607007946--.name: I don't know how big the Lumiknights' organization is, but our numbers in Tria are just a fraction of the whole.

0208220907007948--.name: I've learned so much about the world thanks to you, $MyPCName$. Thank you so much.

0222124707007952--.name: Hm... This herb must have left at least one seed...

0224093607007961--.name: Don't you just love the smell of my garden? My greatest joy is when I manage to reproduce extinct medicinal flowers. Heh...

0222124707007954--.name: Mm, the air smells of fresh herbs.

0224093607007962--.name: Cooking in the kitchen is fine, but I'll always prefer cooking outdoors for how liberating it feels.

0222103907007949--.name: Many things shine, not all of them valuable.

0324141007008128--.name: Of course you didn't. I don't know what I expected.

0306155707008037--.name: Everywhere I look, I see pretty flowers!

0306155707008038--.name: $MyPCName$, did you come to enjoy the flowers? So did I!

0306155707008040--.name: Flowers make me feel so calm.

0306155707008042--.name: If you're troubled, come look at these flowers. It helps. Really!

0306155707008044--.name: Can you find me among these flowers?

0306155707008045--.name: Which one's prettier, me or this flower?

0306155707008046--.name: My sisters say I'm prettier than any flower. I agree.

0306155707008049--.name: I know, right? All three of us are pretty, but the prettiest one is... oh, you were talking about the flowers. Sure, they're pretty too! Ah, forget what I said earlier.

0306155707008053--.name: You want to know the secret to a beautiful garden? Take care of your plants with love, and they'll repay you by growing.

0306155707008055--.name: La, la, la! I feel so good!

0306155707008056--.name: Fresh air, beautiful flowers... I can't ask for more!

0306155707008058--.name: This is my favorite place. It's beautiful and smells even better. And, you might not know this, but I can also eat delicious food here!

0306155707008061--.name: I'm going to make something lovely with these flowers.

0306155707008062--.name: I filled my backpack with flowers, and now I can smell them all the time! Oh, don't worry. They're not heavy at all.

0306155707008064--.name: What kinds of flowers make good gifts?

0306155707008065--.name: I'm going to make a cute little bouquet with all kinds of flowers.

0306155707008066--.name: I don't think anyone hates flowers, right? Everyone has to have a favorite flower or two.

0306155707008068--.name: I didn't come to look at these flowers because they're pretty.

0306155707008069--.name: If you love flowers so much, then go pick them yourself. These aren't for you.

0306155707008071--.name: I can make supplements and scented candles with these. Amazing!

0306155707008072--.name: I don't like pretty things. I like USEFUL things.

0306155707008073--.name: Everyone likes flowers because they're pretty. I don't care about that, because I use them to make supplements, scented candles, and potions.

0310134607008074--.name: Welcome to the $map:52000116$. I am $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$. If you have any questions regarding the caravans, feel free to ask.

0310134607008075--.name: Man, I never seem to have time to rest.

0310134607008076--.name: I wonder if Mother is doing well... I should visit her...

0310134607008077--.name: My job is to make sure $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the other members of the royal family have everything they desire. I'm always busy, but I take pride in my position and my service to $map:02000025$.

0310134607008078--.name: These matters are not normally my responsibility, of course, but $npcName:11003165[gender:0]$ asked for me personally due to the... sensitive nature.

0310134607008079--.name: Have you been to $map:02000076$? My mother lives there. I really should visit her, but I've been so busy that I haven't had the time since preparations began.

0310134607008080--.name: Once my work here is done, I'll go and visit her first thing! I've been sending her letters, it's just... she can't see. A disease took her eyesight. Sigh...

0310134607008081--.name: Whew! That was a close one.

0310134607008082--.name: I'm not so sure about this mission...

0310134607008083--.name: I'm so nervous! I need to use the bathroom!

0310134607008084--.name: You really pulled me out of the fire.

0310134607008087--.name: You drove off that big, bad doggy! If it weren't for you... Jeez, I'd really be in a pickle.

0310134607008088--.name: You... do know how to fight, don't you?

0310134607008089--.name: Sure do! I even fought a rogue $npcName:21000001$ once! I mean, I lost, but I sure gave it my best!

0310134607008090--.name: Aw, jeez. I don't know about that look you're giving me...

0310134607008091--.name: You really know a thing or two about being a hero, don't you? Wow!

0310134607008093--.name: Yeah, a real, live hero! One day I'll be just like you. Just you wait!

0314104907008095--.name: We were ambushed so close to the palace.

0314104907008096--.name: I never expected we'd be attacked there... did someone leak our information?

0314104907008097--.name: $npc:11001853[gender:0]$ says there's nothing wrong with you, but I need to be sure. How do you feel?

0314104907008101--.name: Really? We should look into that. I'll have $npc:11001853[gender:0]$ schedule you for some exploratory surgery.

0314104907008103--.name: It's no trouble. After all you did out on the field, this is the least we can do.

0314104907008104--.name: You were glowing when we found you. How did you do that?

0314104907008106--.name: I see. So it wasn't intentional.

0516084007008466--.name: I sure hope $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ comes back soon.

0516084007008467--.name: I'm surprised $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ doesn't live in a mansion...

0516084007008468--.name: One day, I hope I'm rich enough to have a house!

0516084007008469--.name: I hear $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ is one of the most dutiful, most devoted, most loving sons in all of Maple World.

0516084007008471--.name: Yeah! He's always off visiting his sick ma, who lives really far away. When I finally graduate, I'm gonna be a good son, too!

0516084007008473--.name: If my mom and dad saw me the way I am now, they'd die of shame. Gotta prove myself, first!

0516084007008474--.name: This place is dark. And wet. Just the sort of place I'd do crimes if I was a bad guy.

0516084007008475--.name: You saved me. Again. Jeez, I can't do anything right...

0516084007008476--.name: You'll get the hang of it.

0516084007008478--.name: Y-yeah! Next time, it's my turn to save you!

0516084007008480--.name: If I was stronger, you wouldn't have to go through so much trouble. I'm sorry I'm such a burden...

0516084007008481--.name: How'd you get to be so strong, $MyPCName$?

0516084007008483--.name: What can I say? I was born this good.

0516084007008484--.name: Hard work! I can do that. I'll start tomorrow! Or maybe next week...

0516084007008485--.name: It's all natural talent? Oh man. I guess there's no hope for me...

0316101907008108--.name: I'm pretty nervous about my first time in the field.

0316101907008109--.name: I'm lucky to work in such a beautiful place.

0323170507008126--.name: You don't look like the usual beach bums we get around here. What do you want?

0426090007008442--.name: I'm part of the caravan escort.

0426090007008444--.name: You're just in time! Check in with the others in the $map:52000116$ behind me.

0426090007008445--.name: You're a tourist? Oh, okay. In that case, enjoy your stay. I'm new to this whole guardsman thing, so I wasn't sure what you were up to. Now I know you're cool, so... cool!

0426090007008447--.name: Just doing my job, $male:sir,female:ma'am$! But it does feel good to be thanked. I wish more folk were like you.

0510145607008462--.name: Tremble before the way of the shadow.

0404083307008225--.name: I won't give up until $npcName:11003216[gender:0]$ pays for his crimes. I just wish $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would understand that I'm doing this for her...

0516084007008486--.name: I told you! As long as $npcName:11003216[gender:0]$ is alive, $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ isn't safe.

0404083307008226--.name: A fight between siblings can be even more fearsome than a duel between sworn enemies. I wouldn't stand a chance if $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ were my sister.

0404083307008227--.name: A fight between siblings can be even more fearsome than a duel between sworn enemies. I wouldn't stand a chance if $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ were my sister.

0404083307008230--.name: Jeez, who knew being a guard would be so tough?

0404083307008231--.name: I'm learning so much just from standing in the same room as you, $MyPCName$.

0518141907008520--.name: Training to be a guard is tough.

0518141907008521--.name: Huh...? Who is this small friend?

0404083307008232--.name: Please! Help! My people's princess is in danger!

0404083307008233--.name: We'll be lost if we don't save the princess!

0404083307008234--.name: Thank you for your help. I'll never forget this.

0404083307008235--.name: If it weren't for you, those thugs would have got me. I owe you.

0404083307008236--.name: I'd be a goner if you hadn't shown up.

0404083307008237--.name: Thank you for saving my brother!

0404083307008238--.name: I thought my bro was a goner... until you came along, that is.

0404083307008239--.name: I came to repay you for saving my brother. Now we're even.

0404083307008240--.name: Don't say I never did nothing for you.

0404083307008242--.name: I can tell you aren't one of $npcName:11000044$'s men.

0404083307008243--.name: You gave me a big scare.

0404083307008245--.name: And now we're fighting literal devils...

0404083307008246--.name: I never thought I'd miss my drill sergeant...

0403155707008131--.name: I hope things settle down soon.

0403155707008135--.name: Hmph! I didn't do anything wrong.

0403155707008146--.name: I understand what $npcName:11003240[gender:0]$ is going through, but it's past time for him to grow up.

0403155707008149--.name:
Not this... Anything but this...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003240[gender:0]$ lowers his head, his shoulders trembling ever so slightly.)</font>

0403155707008153--.name: In times like this, you need to keep your wits about you.

0403155707008157--.name: Long time, no see. You did great, as usual.

0403155707008158--.name: I'm no hero like you, but I'm sure trying!

0403155707008160--.name: I hope there are no dogs or mushrooms this time.

0403155707008161--.name: $map:02000087$. It's not far from $map:02000001$. The people there need help, and I'm going to do my best to give it to them.

0403155707008162--.name: C'mon! I'm not afraid of dogs or mushrooms anymore. I'm a real guard, almost!

0403155707008163--.name: <font color="#909090">(You feel a chill from behind the waterfall.)</font>

0403155707008164--.name: <font color="#909090">(Maybe there's something there... or maybe not.)</font>

0403155707008166--.name: We must uncover the secret of darkness before it claims any more lives.

0403155707008170--.name: We must uncover the secret of darkness before it claims any more lives.

0526174607008530--.name: Do you have any $itemPlural:20000045$ for me?

0526174607008531--.name: How do I make the crystal react?

0526174607008532--.name: Here you go. The crystal should react to this.

0530154407008539--.name: Take the $item:20000045$ to the crystal, then press space.

0530154407008540--.name: One $item:20000045$ is enough, I think. You don't need any more.

0530154407008541--.name: We must uncover the secret of darkness before it claims any more lives.

0404104807008252--.name: I'm gonna be just as awesome as you when I grow up!

0404104807008254--.name: I'm gonna be just as awesome as you when I grow up!

0403155707008176--.name: I don't know what you did to impress $npcName:11003250[gender:0]$, but I'm not convinced. So, how are you going to prove that you're worth my time?

0403155707008177--.name:
<font color="#909090">($npc:11003254[gender:1]$'s voice drops to a whisper.)</font>
<font size='20'>This is all for Professor $npc:11003148[gender:0]$...</font>

0403155707008179--.name: There's no shame in asking for my help. I am, after all, the smartest person you know.

0403155707008180--.name: When you're done here, go ahead and help Professor $npcName:11003148[gender:0]$ with his research. He's been on edge lately thanks to his migraines. Don't do anything to make them worse, will you?

0403155707008181--.name:
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003254[gender:1]$ whispers to herself.) </font>
<font size='20'>I wish he wore glasses. He's so intelligent and sensitive... It would be perfect...</font>

0403155707008182--.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11003254[gender:1]$'s name is signed on this note.)</font>

0403155707008183--.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11003254[gender:1]$ has left this scrawled note in a hurry.)</font>

0403155707008185--.name: What're you staring at? Never see a talking cat before?

0403155707008188--.name: Meheh! You're an old-fashioned one, talking animals are all the rage these days! I forgive your ignorance, though... so long as you bring me snacks next time.

0403155707008189--.name: Yep! A magical kitty for a magical place. This is $map:02000023$ after all, land of wonder and imagination. Welcome!

0530154407008545--.name: I'm trying! Close your eyes. It'll work for sure this time!

0530154407008546--.name: There's something... dark blocking my magic. There's no way to get to Ellinel right now.

0808122107008797--.name: On to the next portal! Since you've passed through the gate to $map:02000023$, the portal there will open new paths to you. But if there's nowhere to go, the portal won't work.

0808122107008798--.name: You look worried. Go ahead, put your feet up and tell me your troubles.

0403155707008192--.name: This is why I don't like kids. They want to be heroes, but they can't even tie their shoes on their own.

0403155707008193--.name: But don't you think Professor $npcName:11003251[gender:0]$ is looking especially good lately? His skin has taken on a beautiful pasty sheen from all his hard work. I could stare at him all day...

0403155707008197--.name: Everyone's safe, thanks to you. I hope you won't mind if we call on your help again in the future.

0403155707008199--.name: What in the world is going on here?

0403155707008201--.name: I've never seen Professor $npc:11003251[gender:0]$ in such a state before. I can't believe this has happened...

0403155707008203--.name: Where is he? I have to find him. He isn't himself!

0403155707008204--.name: What do you know about this?

0403155707008205--.name:
N-nothing! I... I don't know anything...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ shakes her head in frustration.)</font>

0403155707008207--.name: The path to Ellinel is still blocked, but we'll find a way back.

0403155707008208--.name: I can't believe this happened to $map:02000023$.

0403155707008209--.name: We should have been ready for this. It was naive to think Ellinel was safe...

0403155707008210--.name: <font color="#909090">(This log was tucked away in an inconspicuous corner.)</font>

0403155707008211--.name: <font color="#909090">(It looks like this was abandoned, and yet it's suspiciously free of dust.)</font>

0403155707008213--.name: My head is throbbing. Shoulder, knees, and toes, too. Mark my words, there's a storm brewing.

0403155707008217--.name: I am captain of the Royal Guard. Each and every one of my men would lay down his life in service to Empress $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$.

0403155707008219--.name: After the Blue Lapenta broke, top scholars from across the world descended on $map:02000026$. Ultimately, I am confident that it will be an alchemist to uncover the secrets of the Land of Darkness and the Shadow World.

0403155707008221--.name: Platoon leader of the Green Hoods, at your service. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ sent me here to watch over $map:02000146$.

0403155707008223--.name: If only Captain Stilton were still alive...

0405160907008262--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0405160907008264--.name: I've got to feed my granddaughter, but...

0405160907008266--.name: Who goes there? My eyes aren't what they used to be.

0404102807008250--.name: We must uncover the secret of darkness before it claims any more lives.

0523132707008526--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0523132707008527--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0523132707008528--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0621181107008562--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0621181107008563--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0621181107008564--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0424104307008423--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0424104307008424--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0424104307008425--.name: What seems to be the problem?

0424104307008426--.name: The enemy is up to something.

0426090007008449--.name: Can't a petty crime boss enjoy a moment of peace?

0426090007008450--.name: I won't let you get away!

0426090007008453--.name: I gave you what you wanted. Why are you bugging me?

0426090007008454--.name: Did a blond man run through here?

0426090007008455--.name: Yeah. He was headed for $map:02000138$. Now leave me alone!

0426090007008457--.name: Why would I ever want to see you again?!

0510145607008463--.name: You'll get nothing out of me!

0510143807008461--.name: I will protect the lives of my men... No matter what...

0510145607008465--.name: Dark Wind doesn't give up so easily!

0517164307008490--.name: I've never met someone as strong as you.

0517164307008493--.name: I can take you to the boss if you're lost.

0517164307008496--.name: This place has really transformed, thanks to you!

0517164307008498--.name: We're all serious now. You just wait and see. The boss'll make you pay!

0517164307008499--.name: Taking down the boss... You're something else, you know that?

0517164307008502--.name: The big guy's been training hard for days now. You really lit a fire under his butt, I'll tell you that.

0517164307008505--.name: This time, the big guy'll mop the floor with you! No way he'll lose twice.

0517164307008506--.name: It won't be so easy next time.

0517164307008508--.name: You better get ready. The big guy'll knock your teeth out!

0517164307008509--.name: Get away from me. I really don't want to talk to you.

0817044507008803-GuildRaid01-.name: The boss's word is good. What more do you need?

0817044507008805-GuildRaid01-.name: Humans can't do anything alone. If you can't figure it out, ask someone to help you.

0817044507008810-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the five auras.

0817044507008811-GuildRaid01-.name: The Vayar live in the mountains to the northeast. Break a Vayar apart, and you'll get some Steadfast Will. It isn't easy...

0817044507008813-GuildRaid01-.name: They're solid. And tough. Magic doesn't work on them, either. You've got to fight them up close!

0817044507008818-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the five auras.

0817044507008819-GuildRaid01-.name: The singewings live on Bahram Mountain to the north. They protect their eggs on the mountaintop. You can get Blazing Courage by stealing those eggs...

0817044507008822-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the dragon eggs.

0817044507008823-GuildRaid01-.name: It's actually a burning volcano. I wouldn't climb it without the right gear. Unless you're lava resistant...?

0817044507008824-GuildRaid01-.name: I need to ask something else.

0817044507008825-GuildRaid01-.name: The singewings are fire-breathers. Their breath is even hotter than lava...

0817133807008875-GuildRaid01-.name: I need to ask something else.

0817044507008826-GuildRaid01-.name: Dragon eggs don't tend to wander off on their own. What the singewings will do when they notice their eggs are missing... I can't say.

0817133807008876-GuildRaid01-.name: I need to ask something else.

0817044507008830-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the dragon eggs.

0817044507008835-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the five auras.

0817044507008836-GuildRaid01-.name: The placas live in the desert to the southeast. If you defeat them while they're dancing, you can obtain their Essences of Dance.

0817044507008838-GuildRaid01-.name: They look gentle, but I wouldn't touch them. Their thorns are sharp!

0817044507008839-GuildRaid01-.name: They're supposed to be good dancers, but I haven't seen it myself. They're not dancing all the time, you see. Do you think they prefer upbeat music?

0817044507008844-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the five auras.

0817044507008845-GuildRaid01-.name: Lycaos live in the wastelands to the southwest. You can capture them to get their Enduring Health.

0817044507008847-GuildRaid01-.name: They're not easy to capture. If you don't tie them up or stun them, they'll slip away.

0817044507008852-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the five auras.

0817044507008853-GuildRaid01-.name: Aur-what? Look, I just want to finish my exam and grab some grub.

0817044507008858-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the five auras.

0817044507008859-GuildRaid01-.name: Kiyos live in Zulu Canyon to the northwest. If you capture a kiyo, you can take its Free Spirit.

0817044507008862-GuildRaid01-.name: There are peaks upon peaks at Zulu Canyon. If you don't have wings, you won't be able to cross it.

0817044507008863-GuildRaid01-.name: I need to ask something else.

0817044507008864-GuildRaid01-.name: The kiyos are agile. They don't like it when anyone gets close.

0817044507008865-GuildRaid01-.name: I need to ask something else.

0817044507008870-GuildRaid01-.name: Nothing in this world is impossible.

0817044507008872-GuildRaid01-.name: Tell me about the five auras.

0817044507008873-GuildRaid01-.name: An aura has no physical form. It's intangible. Still, if you focus hard on one thing, you're bound to reach your peak.

0817044507008874-GuildRaid01-.name: When you focus one gathering one type of aura, you'll feel it build up. Once it's full, it can be placed in a bowl, like water.

0907171907008959-GuildRaid01-.name: Thank you for participating in our study.

0824002407008894-GuildRaid01-.name: Welcome to the Xenon Systems Research Lab. I want to thank you for joining our study. It wasn't easy finding a guild to participate in our experiment, but I suspect you just might enjoy it!

0906182007008916-GuildRaid01-.name: Why do you need guild members for your test?

0906182007008918-GuildRaid01-.name: I'm ready to get my VR on!

0906182007008919-GuildRaid01-.name: The Xenon System is a combat simulation conducted in virtual reality based on the premise of psychic resonance. In layman's terms, it's an array of minds working in harmony with a computer to create a virtual world.

0906182007008920-GuildRaid01-.name: Essentially, the computer draws on the memories of everyone connected to create a simulated world that is almost indistinguishable from reality. This simulation is the perfect place to safely run all manner of tests.

0906182007008921-GuildRaid01-.name: You may already be familiar with our technology's predecessor. Have you ever participated in a Chaos Raid?

0906182007008924-GuildRaid01-.name: I see! Yes, you carry yourself like someone who has overcome great trials.

0906182007008925-GuildRaid01-.name: It wasn't that big of a deal.

0906182007008927-GuildRaid01-.name: Ah, is that so? If I was still young and lithe like you, I'd be running headfirst into danger at every opportunity. You really should take on the challenge, at least once.

0906182007008928-GuildRaid01-.name: Maybe I'll give it a go.

0906182007008930-GuildRaid01-.name: Ermm... In any case, we've learned a great deal by analyzing data about individuals participating in Chaos Raids, such as how shared hardships lead to team bonding, which in turn lead to greater cooperation, and greater success in battle.

0906182007008931-GuildRaid01-.name: However, as scientific tools, the Chaos Raid simulations are inferior. They are little more than a glorified entertainment system, if I'm being honest.

0906182007008932-GuildRaid01-.name: But now with the Xenon System, we can expose our guinea pi–errm, volunteers, to all sorts of situations, and conduct studies of real scientific value! It truly is a technological marvel.

0906182007008933-GuildRaid01-.name: The possibilities are endless! Everyone from the Royal Guard to the fire brigade can train in real-world situation without risk. Adventurers can visit places they never dreamed of. And I can finally take a vacation without ever leaving the lab! Of course, none of this would be possible without the support of our generous benefactor $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$.

0906182007008934-GuildRaid01-.name: Do you have any more questions?

0906182007008935-GuildRaid01-.name: Why do you need guild members for your test?

0906182007008937-GuildRaid01-.name: I'm ready to get my VR on!

0906182007008938-GuildRaid01-.name: I wanted to put together a group study with a shared history, one conducive to cooperation.

0906182007008939-GuildRaid01-.name: After all, the greatest achievements in history come when a group of likeminded individuals unite behind a common cause.

0906182007008940-GuildRaid01-.name: There's no better example of this in everyday life than the communal efforts of guilds. I thought them a fitting subject of my test.

0906182007008941-GuildRaid01-.name: I hear we're offering an excellent compensation package for the study, although payroll is not my department. Personally, I think it's reward enough have contributed to the advancement of science, and to try out our amazing simulation. But whatever your motives, thank you for participating!

0906182007008942-GuildRaid01-.name: Do you have any more questions?

0906182007008945-GuildRaid01-.name: I'm ready to get my VR on!

0906182007008946-GuildRaid01-.name: Virtual reality is a simulated experience designed to believably replicate the real world. Each curated scenario is run on a separate computer server or "Link."

0906182007008947-GuildRaid01-.name: Each Link consists of a unique environment with its own hand-tailored objective.

0906182007008948-GuildRaid01-.name: Your goal, for the purposes of the study, is to cooperate with your guild members and complete the assigned objective.

0906182007008949-GuildRaid01-.name: I have to warn you, our simulations still have some kinks that need working out... You may run into situations or foes that are impossible to overcome, even with your substantial abilities. At such times, you'll need to input override codes provided by the lab.

0906182007008950-GuildRaid01-.name: <font color="#ffd200">Override Code</font> items are sold by your <font color="#ffd200">Guild Supply Merchant</font>. I wish we could give them away for free, but these little technological wonders are incredibly sophisticated and costly to produce.

0906182007008951-GuildRaid01-.name: As I've said, the various Links are all still under active development. As you proceed to complete the objectives of each simulation in order, we will analyze the data we collect, and use it to fine-tune the subsequent Links.

0906182007008952-GuildRaid01-.name: There's still a great deal of science to be done. I hope we can depend on your ongoing contribution!

0906182007008953-GuildRaid01-.name: Do you have any more questions?

0906182007008955-GuildRaid01-.name: Why do you need guild members for your test?

0906182007008956-GuildRaid01-.name: I'm ready to get my VR on!

0906182007008957-GuildRaid01-.name: Wonderful. I've already booted up the system. When you're ready to access the Link, please enter one of the simulation pods.

0906182007008958-GuildRaid01-.name: There's no need to be nervous. Nothing in this simulation can inflict any permanent harm. That said, the study will be meaningless unless you take the scenario seriously!

1113181007009241-FameContents-.name: The future is in our hands.

1126155107011958-FameContents-NA.name: The future is in our hands.

1127231007009328-FameContents-.name: After all this time, you haven't seen the famous navy of Tria?

1127231007009329-FameContents-.name: I suppose that's not unreasonable. Tria's navy isn't in Tria at the moment, after all.

1127231007009330-FameContents-.name: A few months before the empress's grand court, the main fleet was dispatched to an island far away. Not even I know where the command came from.

1127231007009331-FameContents-.name: Fa—I mean, Admiral Martini didn't even take the time to tell me about the mission. They simply set sail, leaving myself and a few petty officers to command a skeleton fleet.

1127231007009332-FameContents-.name: They don't appear on Sky Fortress's radar, either. I'm not sure what to make of the bulk of our military vanishing at a time like this...

1127231007009333-FameContents-.name: I wonder if he's even still alive...

1127231007009334-FameContents-.name: I've said too much. You can trust in Tria's naval forces. The entire empire is under my personal protection.

1127231007009344-FameContents-.name: How may I help you today, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$?

1126150707011936-FameContents-NA.name: How may I help you today, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$?

1127231007009346-FameContents-.name: That's a good question! Most people think we're simple rangers and woodswomen, wandering the forests of Henesys with our bows.

1127231007009347-FameContents-.name: But we're so much more than that! We know all about helping people and making sure they have everything they need.

1127231007009348-FameContents-.name: There's more to keeping the peace than simply being a good fighter. You need to know how to treat a wound and provide a shoulder to cry on.

1127231007009349-FameContents-.name: That's why we've been entrusted with support operations on Sky Fortress.

1127231007009350-FameContents-.name: Of course, you know firsthand how good we are in a fight. Even though I'm stationed up here on the bridge, I'm just as good with my bow as Eka!

1127231007009354-FameContents-.name: The existence of the Lumiknights may no longer be a secret, but that doesn't mean I may speak freely of what we do. In accordance to the Pact of Dantalion, my tongue is bound.

1126150707011946-FameContents-NA.name: The existence of the Lumiknights may no longer be a secret, but that doesn't mean I may speak freely of what we do. In accordance to the Pact of Dantalion, my tongue is bound.

1127231007009356-FameContents-.name: Of course, if you apply the Third Law of the Equinox, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to let slip a word or two. So long as you remember your Rites of Obfuscation, of course.

1127231007009358-FameContents-.name: You can't take these things too lightly. I once spoke the Three Devastating Truths to an insuitably prepared koborc, and it inverted into a quasi-nonsubstantiated autoform. Ha-ha!
