0905163707008897--.name: The lake on Harang is so much clearer than this...

0905163707008898--.name: I wonder how the weather on $map:63000044$ is today...

0905163707008900--.name: I want to see $map:63000044$ at its most pristine.

0905163707008902--.name: Bring me to $map:52000059$ during an eruption!

0905163707008903--.name: If you've ever been to $map:63000044$, then you know that it was once a peaceful haven. The water was clean and clear, the fish flourished... My beloved hometown...

0905163707008904--.name: I'm not sure why, but the water's become muddy and poisonous, and weird fish have started showing up. There was nothing we could do...

0905163707008905--.name: Then, a little later, $map:63000044$ erupted into a giant volcano! Some folks thought it was a mermaid's curse, and others claimed that it was a government plot. Personally, I think the volcano was always there, sleeping... Waiting...

0905163707008906--.name: Anyway, I can send you to any version of $map:63000044$ that you like. Whether you seek the pristine lake or a sea of molten lava... How can I do that? It's simple.

0905163707008907--.name: But it's nearly time for my nap, so I won't go into the details now. Besides, what's the point of life without a bit of mystery?

0905163707008908--.name: When it was clean and peaceful, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!

0905163707008909--.name: When it was mysteriously contaminated, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!

0905163707008910--.name: When it was covered in hot lava, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!

0905163707008911--.name: Have you ever been to $map:63000044$? It's quiet and empty... the perfect fishing spot!

0905163707008913--.name: You can go there after you finish the fishing quest in the Maple Guide. Every fisher should visit that place at least once in their life.

0907171907008961-GuildRaid01-.name: The simulation has exceeded my wildest expectations!

0907171907008962-GuildRaid01-.name: Feel that heat? You can't beat this level of detail!

0907171907008963-GuildRaid01-.name: Hello in there. The simulation is stable, and it appears the test is proceeding nicely. You look a bit singed around the edges, but otherwise in good spirits.

0907171907008966-GuildRaid01-.name: I came to check on your progress. What do you think of my hologram? With my current avatar settings, I can observe the test without interfering.

0907171907008967-GuildRaid01-.name: Interfering with the results of my own test would invalidate all of the data I've collected, after all. Which would be quite silly after all the trouble I went through selecting test subjects.

0907171907008968-GuildRaid01-.name: Don't mind me. I'll be here observing. Just go about your business as if I weren't even here.

0907173207008999-GuildRaid01-.name: <font color="#909090" size="20">Should I tell them? I suppose they'll figure it out sooner or later... I'll just consider this a minor acceleration in the test plan.</font>

0907173207009000-GuildRaid01-.name: So... What am I supposed to do again?

0907171907008972-GuildRaid01-.name: Well, I suspect I've already told you that if you hit a roadblock in the simulation, you'll need a special override code to proceed. Do you have <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font> in your possession?

0907171907008975-GuildRaid01-.name:
Well now... That's a bit disappointing. I'm afraid if you want to climb any higher, you'll need <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font>.
You can purchase it from your Guild Supply Merchant.

0907171907008976-GuildRaid01-.name: It's a bit unfortunate, but unless one of your party members has the code in their possession, it might be prudent to restart this test at a later date.

0907171907008977-GuildRaid01-.name: Ah, excellent. Well now is the time to put it to work. Using the <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font> should alter your avatar's biometric data, transforming you—as you might have guessed—into a $npc:34000100$, which will allow you to safely reach the summit.

0907171907008978-GuildRaid01-.name: Once you've transformed into a $npc:34000100$, you'll be virtually impervious to the heat of the lava. However, $npc:34000100$ aren't very strong flyers, so your best recourse will be climbing from ledge to ledge. Oh! And tapping the <font color="#ffd200">X key</font> will give you a nice boost of speed.

0907171907008979-GuildRaid01-.name: $npcPlural:34000100$ are not overly protective of their young, so you should have no difficulty collecting their eggs. However, they are particularly ornery and aggressive in general, so I wouldn't recommend getting too close to the adults.

0907171907008980-GuildRaid01-.name: See that glowing circle around them? It represents their natural threat response. Step foot inside, and you'll be met with their terrible fire breath, which burns far hotter than the lava pools they call home.

0907171907008981-GuildRaid01-.name: The volcano's summit is their breeding ground. Your task is to reach it, and collect five eggs. Good luck up there!

0907171907008982-GuildRaid01-.name: I can't wait to see what will happen!

0907171907008983-GuildRaid01-.name: It's a wonder why this practice was banned...

0907171907008984-GuildRaid01-.name: The simulation is stable. Brainwaves look good. All right, let's get the ball rolling on this test!

0907171907008986-GuildRaid01-.name: Got any advice for completing this test?

0907171907008987-GuildRaid01-.name: I must admit I have a particular interest in this simulation. You see... An anonymous author from bygone days once wrote about the majesty of the $npcName:99990021$ which occurs so rarely in nature. However, the process if artificially mixing slimes to create them was legally prohibited some time ago.

0907171907008989-GuildRaid01-.name: Doesn't that just make your mind race? Why? What was so dangerous or terrible about trying to artificially create a $npcName:99990021$? That fabled splendor... I'd love to see it with my own two eyes.

0907171907008990-GuildRaid01-.name: Sooo... What should I be doing?

0907171907008991-GuildRaid01-.name: Come now, you know I'm not supposed to interfere with the test.

0907171907008992-GuildRaid01-.name: Am I supposed to make a $npcName:99990021$?

0907171907008993-GuildRaid01-.name: Err...!<font color="#909090"> <font size="20">Should I tell them? I can't interfere with the test... Of course they're bound to try mixing them sooner or later...</font>

0907171907008994-GuildRaid01-.name: ...Ahem. I suppose it would be all right if I simply explain how the machinery works.

0907171907008995-GuildRaid01-.name: The <font color="#ffd200">color meter</font> represents how many of each color of slime have been added to the machine. If the meter for any color reaches the red, that means you've exceeded the appropriate amount of slime.

0907171907008996-GuildRaid01-.name: As the mass production of artificial slimes has been outlawed for some time, the blueprints for the related machinery is quite dated and they are likely a bit imprecise. This means that being a single unit over or short of the meter's limit should not impact your success.

0907171907008997-GuildRaid01-.name: To achieve the perfect slime ratio, you'll need to get the five color meters as close to 100% as possible.

0907171907008998-GuildRaid01-.name: Ah, but there's one important thing to be aware of. The slimes come in three different sizes. The larger the slime you squash, the faster the gauge fills up! Good luck achieving the perfect color ratio!

1113181007009223-FameContents-.name: It must have been a long journey.

1113181007009235-FameContents-.name: It must have been a long journey.

1116181907009256-FameContents-.name: The future is in our hands.

1127103307011969-FameContents-.name: The future is in our hands.

1116181907009259-FameContents-.name: Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!

1116181907009262-FameContents-.name: I am the shadow that evil fears.

1116181907009265-FameContents-.name: Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?

1116181907009268-FameContents-.name: We've stood idly by for long enough. Now is the time to act.

1109121007009025-FameContents-.name: Goods for sale! Get your goods at various prices!

1109121007009026-FameContents-.name: Knick-knacks for sale! I've also got paddywhacks!

1109121007009029-FameContents-.name: Heh! That was a test, $MyPCName$. And you failed.

1109121007009031-FameContents-.name: Our mutual friend sent you, didn't she? Tell her, "the cuckoo bird goes caw caw."

1109121007009033-FameContents-.name: Ahem! Pardon me, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, but if you're not buying anything, please make way for paying customers.

1109121007009034-FameContents-.name: I'm a man on a mission.

1109121007009037-FameContents-.name: Yeah, likely story. How do I know I can trust you?

1109121007009038-FameContents-.name: There's got to be a way to prove myself.

1109121007009039-FameContents-.name: If $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ really sent you, then you should know Dark Wind's motto.

1109121007009045-FameContents-.name: You think I'm stupid? There's no way $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ would send an idiot like you.

1109121007009047-FameContents-.name: Ah, so $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ did send you, after all. Good. Tell her, "Ducky. Purple slime. Cerbe."

1109121007009053-FameContents-.name: Don't leave anything out! Tell her exactly what I said!

1109121007009055-FameContents-.name: Ah, greetings, fellow scientist! Are you here to discuss the latest theories in electromathography?

1109121007009057-FameContents-.name: In that case, you've found the right person, $MyPCName$.

1109121007009059-FameContents-.name: Everyone in Dark Wind knows you.

1109121007009060-FameContents-.name: Then you must have a message for $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$.

1109121007009062-FameContents-.name: If I give you pancakes, will you tell me the message?

1109121007009063-FameContents-.name: That is the message. Now, about those theories...

1109121007009065-FameContents-.name: Initiating light banter protocol. I am just passing through town, stranger.

1109121007009067-FameContents-.name: Rhetorical question detected. Response: Can I help you with something?

1109121007009069-FameContents-.name: Detecting trace amounts of $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ pheromones... Special encoders enabled. Message: "Code EK-LOVE."

1109121007009071-FameContents-.name: Resuming normal operations. Have a nice day.

1109121007009074-FameContents-.name: That agent's got to be around here somewhere...

1109121007009075-FameContents-.name: Hmph. Where does the she get off, sending me a novice like you?

1109121007009077-FameContents-.name: If you can't recognize one of your fellow agents in disguise, then you really are hopeless.

1109121007009079-FameContents-.name: I have nothing more to say to you, dullard. Go back to $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ and tell her that you've failed.

1109121007009081-FameContents-.name: No need to shout! I'll give you one more chance—let's call it a test. If you're really a bonafide agent, then you surely know where $map:02000153$ is.

1109121007009082-FameContents-.name: It's in $map:02000001$, the heart of the empire!

1109121007009084-FameContents-.name: Dark Wind isn't a place. It's a feeling you carry in your heart.

1109121007009087-FameContents-.name: I suppose you aren't a complete fool. Very well. The message is "Apple, snake, dinosaur."

1109121007009092-FameContents-.name: It's in $map:02000001$, the heart of the empire!

1127144607009321-FameContents-.name: Dark Wind isn't a place. It's a feeling you carry in your heart.

1109121007009096-FameContents-.name: Excuse me! Would you mind taking my picture?

1109121007009097-FameContents-.name: Sure, I'll take one for you.

1109121007009098-FameContents-.name: Okay, great! Now, I'll just pose like this and you pretend you're taking a snapshot like that... And let $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ know that I say, "Nya-nyah-nya-nya-nyah!"

1109121007009100-FameContents-.name: Act natural! And be sure to let $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ know my exact words. Mess this up and the whole operation is done for.

1109121007009102-FameContents-.name: Wow! The picture came out great. Thank you.

1109121007009103-FameContents-.name: Retiring here is the best choice I ever made!

1109121007009104-FameContents-.name: You here to see the fight? I never miss a match. I even brought my own binoculars so I can see every drop of sweat and every knocked-out tooth!

1109121007009105-FameContents-.name: Nah, I'm not into blood sports.

1109121007009106-FameContents-.name: Sure am! I'm a huge fan.

1109121007009107-FameContents-.name: Really? Huh. Never thought $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ would recruit an agent with such a weak stomach.

1109121007009108-FameContents-.name: Ah, so you're with Dark Wind.

1109121007009109-FameContents-.name: I knew I liked you the moment I saw you! $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$'s got great taste in agents.

1109121007009110-FameContents-.name: Ah, so you're with Dark Wind.

1109121007009111-FameContents-.name: Anyway, you're here for my special message, right? "Mask. Duck butt. Beast."

1109121007009113-FameContents-.name: Shush! The fight's about to start!

1109121007009114-FameContents-.name: When she asked if I like it hot, I had no idea she meant THIS...

1109121007009115-FameContents-.name: How can people live like this! At least they could turn on the AC... Are you on vacation here, too?

1109121007009117-FameContents-.name: You liar. You've got $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$'s fingerprints all over you.

1109121007009119-FameContents-.name: Don't look so surprised. Any trained Dark Wind agent knows the signs. Anyway, I'm guessing you're here for my message?

1109121007009123-FameContents-.name: Oh, please. Anyway, I need some space, so shoo. This heat is killing me...

1109121007009125-FameContents-.name: You here to jam, my friend? Let your inner songbird free!

1109121007009126-FameContents-.name: ♬There's someone that I seek! And I don't have all week! ♬

1109121007009127-FameContents-.name: Ow ow ow, my ears! Did someone hit your songbird with a hammer?

1109121007009128-FameContents-.name: I... I think I'm gonna cry...

1109121007009129-FameContents-.name: Don't be like that, $male:man,female:lady$. Here, I know something what'll cheer you right up.

1109121007009131-FameContents-.name: I've got a message for our fabulous friend, $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$. "The unbreakable link between heart and song!"

1109121007009133-FameContents-.name: Cheer up. You probably just had a frog in your throat, friend.

1109121007009134-FameContents-.name: I feel like a diamond in a toilet...

1109121007009136-FameContents-.name: Um... What are you doing up here?

1109121007009137-FameContents-.name: Yes, yes, I know. A beauty like mine doesn't belong in a disgusting place like this.

1109121007009138-FameContents-.name: That's not quite what I meant...

1109121007009139-FameContents-.name: Still, I have a job to do. Tell the boss that I said, "Twinkle, twinkle, little star."

1109121007009141-FameContents-.name: I understand why you're so confused. I'm way too gorgeous for this kind of work! I should've become a model or an actress. Even waitressing would be better than this.

1109121007009143-FameContents-.name: You must be the new grad student.

1109121007009145-FameContents-.name: No? Then you must be one of $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$'s $male:men,female:women$. There aren't many other reasons to come to this pit...

1109121007009146-FameContents-.name: This can't be an easy posting.

1109121007009147-FameContents-.name: It is what it is. Anyway, you're here for a coded message, right? "Queen. Ace of Spades. Ten of Clovers."

1109121007009149-FameContents-.name: I really need to take some leave when this is all over.

1109121007009150-FameContents-.name: This data just doesn't add up...

1109121007009151-FameContents-.name: Intern? You the intern? I've been waiting!

1109121007009152-FameContents-.name: I think you've got the wrong person.

1109121007009153-FameContents-.name: The heck I do! I'm too busy trying to making sense of this data to deal with your shenanigans.

1109121007009155-FameContents-.name: I do, indeed! Now, intern, the first thing you'll want to do is memorize a very special phrase.

1109121007009159-FameContents-.name: That's all for now, intern. But before you go...

1109121007009161-FameContents-.name: Would you tell our mutual friend that I need a new assignment? This place is driving me mad.

1109121007009167-FameContents-.name: Based on your past travel patterns, current wind pressure readings, and my horoscope for today, I predicted a 96.9% chance that you would drop by.

1109121007009169-FameContents-.name: Anyway, how do you like my disguise?

1109121007009171-FameContents-.name: I see. This is perhaps the greatest disguise I've ever designed, and you say such things...

1109121007009172-FameContents-.name: Um... Do you have a message for me?

1109121007009173-FameContents-.name: Oh, yes, good point. Let's see... "Sunshine. Ocean. Wind."

1109121007009175-FameContents-.name: According to my research, you will indeed see me again. But it will be sooner than you think...

1109121007009179-FameContents-.name: Ahem. Youse the mug Schatten sent? Here's the code phrase: "The square looks at the flower twice."

1109121007009183-FameContents-.name: I didn't say anything, you silly goose! Run along now!

1109121007009186-FameContents-.name: So much to do, so much mortal danger...

1109121007009187-FameContents-.name: What's have we here? A foreigner, in a place like this?

1109121007009189-FameContents-.name: In that case, $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ must have sent you. I see she can't be bothered to visit me in person... as usual.

1109121007009190-FameContents-.name: Uh, she tells me that you're doing very important work.

1109121007009191-FameContents-.name: That's kind of you to say, but I know the truth. Anyway, please tell her that I said, "Parrot. Shoes. Perfume."

1109121007009192-FameContents-.name: I'll make sure she gets the messsage.

1109121007009193-FameContents-.name: Please remind her that us agents get lonely sometimes, would you?

1109121007009197-FameContents-.name: You wound me. We've talked at length, my friend! Of course, I was wearing a different face at the time...

1109121007009198-FameContents-.name: I honestly have no idea who you are.

1109121007009199-FameContents-.name: A pity. Anyway, you must be here about the dragon-man.

1109121007009200-FameContents-.name: Who said anything about a dragon-man?

1109121007009201-FameContents-.name: Don't be so transparent, my friend. I already knew why you were here from the beginning.

1109121007009203-FameContents-.name: Then please pass my message along to her: "Torch. Jar. Treasure chest."

1109121007009205-FameContents-.name: I would advise you leave this place as soon as you can. It's most eerie here...

1109121007009207-FameContents-.name: And what brings a youngster like you here, hm?

1109121007009209-FameContents-.name: Looking for someone, eh? Well, you're in luck! I know everybody here. So, who is it you're after, hm?

1109121007009210-FameContents-.name: Oh, I think I can find them on my own.

1109121007009211-FameContents-.name: Being tight-lipped about it, are you? $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ trains her people well.

1109121007009213-FameContents-.name: Eh heh heh! Surprised? Even us old timers can help out sometimes. Anyway, you run along and tell her, "Eyes. Alpha. Blonde hair."

1127164207009323--.name: Hi there, $MyPCName$. I'm Zakum, but little. You can call me Little Zakum.

1127164207009325--.name: Not happy with Little Zakum? That's fine. You can find the real deal at the Mirror Gate. Just check your Challenge Map!

1130102607009374--.name: Hey there! It's me, Little Zakum. You know, Zakum, but little. I have a gift for you!

1130104707009377--.name: You've got to open it to find out! I hope you like this gift to you from me, Little Zakum.

1204155907009629--.name: You've got to open it to find out! But, uh, it looks like you don't have enough room in your bag. Come back when you're ready for a gift from yours truly, Little Zakum!

1130102607009375--.name: Hey there! It's me, Little Zakum. You know, Zakum, but little. I have a gift for you, and... Hey, I already gave you a gift! You cheeky hero, you.

1213192607009639-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: The future is in our hands.

0131125107009815-FameContents_EP1_02-.name:
It seems you came up to keep us supplied.
There's no time to waste. Head to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52010063$</font> right away.

0131125107009817-FameContents_EP1_02-.name: I'll arrange a transport for you.

0131125107009816-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: The future is in our hands.

1213192607009641-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: In my day, we protected the world just fine without these fancy gadgets.

1213192607009644-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: I am the shadow that evil fears.

1213192607009647-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: How may I help you today, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$?

0117175907009810-FameContents_EP1_02-.name: Hey there. Did you miss me?

0117175907009812-FameContents_EP1_02-.name: In my day, we protected the world just fine without these fancy gadgets.

0201021007009820--.name: We're here to help supply all the heroes who are taking the fight to Infernog. Did you bring any $itemPlural:30001092$?

0201021007009824--.name: We minted a bunch of $itemPlural:30001092$ in honor of the expedition. While the event is going on, you can spend them at our shop here in $map:02000064$.

0201021007009825--.name: You can get $itemPlural:30001092$ by logging in and staying online for 60 minutes. You also have a chance at getting one by clearing adventure, raid, and chaos raid dungeons, and from foraging, mining, gathering, and crafting.

0205153507009847--.name: Now, you won't be able to obtain extra Expedition Anniversary Coins when you're using Instant-Gathering Vouchers or Dungeon Reward Boosters.

0201021007009826--.name: Spend $itemPlural:30001092$ for items at our shop. Remember: the shop is only open until the event is over!

0417135107009858-Mastery05-.name: Are you supposed to be here?

0417135107009860-Mastery05-.name: What's more important? The process? Or the results?

0417135107009861-Mastery05-.name: I guess you need good process and solid results.

0417135107009864-Mastery05-.name: All this hard work is for my lovely wife and kid! Just wait a little longer, family!

0417135107009865-Mastery05-.name: Daddy's got to put food on the table.

0417135107009870-Mastery05-.name: The waves are calm today! It's a nice day to go sailing.

0417135107009871-Mastery05-.name: The waves are calm today! It's a nice day to go sailing.

0417135107009872-Mastery05-.name: Welcome to $map:02000425$, the beautiful island of alchemy.

0417135107009873-Mastery05-.name: Welcome to $map:02000425$, the beautiful island of alchemy.

0419172107009857-Mastery05-.name: Welcome to $map:02000425$, the beautiful island of alchemy.

0417135107009874-Mastery05-.name: Hm. Those weeds are an eyesore...

0417135107009875-Mastery05-.name: Hm. Those weeds are an eyesore...

0419172107009858-Mastery05-.name: I think you forgot to take the lunch box. Here is an empty one.

0417135107009876-Mastery05-.name: Doesn't this flower look like me?

0417135107009877-Mastery05-.name: Doesn't this flower look like me?

0417135107009878-Mastery05-.name: Whenever a new herb is discovered, I plant it here.

0515102507009917-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Prove that I made the right decision, $MyPCName$.

0515102507009918-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
Hmm...
My duty is to look after lady $npcName:11003883[gender:0]$.

0515102507009919-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I will not forgive those who would dishonor my lady!

0515102507009920-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This is the first time I've seen $npcName:11003883[gender:0]$ so active. Whether or not this goes on depends on $MyPCName$'s role.

0515102507009923-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Thank you. I think I've started to unravel the truth.

0515102507009926-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You seem pretty handy, considering how you handled those tasks. If only Terrun Calibre had more people like you.

0515102507009927-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you have something to say to me?

0515102507009928-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you have something to say to me?

0515102507009929-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name:
Not bad.
On behalf of Terrun Calibre, please accept my thanks.

0515102507009930-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Listen closely to the waves. Can you hear the voice of the ocean?

0515102507009931-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Listen closely to the waves. Can you hear the voice of the ocean?

0515102507009932-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm sure you can quiet the angry seas.

0515102507009933-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Those looking to harm the ocean, or my $npc:11003888[gender:1]$, have another thing coming!

0515102507009934-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Those looking to harm the ocean, or my $npc:11003888[gender:1]$, have another thing coming!

0515102507009935-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll punish any who threaten the seas. Even you.

0515102507009936-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's been a while, Red Cape.

0515102507009937-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's been a while, Red Cape.

0515102507009938-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I would give my life for the $npc:11003891[gender:0]$. He is the only reason I still live.

0515102507009941-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Even though the request came from the $npc:11003894[gender:0]$, I'm not interested.

0515102507009943-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hehehe... So you've come to me. Does that mean you're finally ready to accept my terms?

0515102507009944-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Who are you to give me orders?

0515102507009945-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why is the $npc:11003894[gender:0]$ constantly calling meetings? What a chore!

0515102507009946-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Why is the $npc:11003894[gender:0]$ constantly calling meetings? What a chore!

0515102507009947-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Gah, I'm so bored. I want to head back to the castle soon.

0614143707010002-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: So you're an adventurer? You seem pretty strong. Nice to meet you.

0614143707010003-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you believe in the power of the light?

0614143707010004-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This Frontier Foundation is a beautiful place. I look forward to working with such capable individuals.

0614143707010006-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are you here casing the joint? I've got dibs, alright?!

0614143707010007-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: ...What business do you have with me?

0614143707010010-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You look pretty tough! Up for a sparring match?

0614143707010011-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: They have so many tasty foods here!

0614143707010012-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey... Do you have more Orange Mushroom cookies...? I ate all of mine, hehe.

0614143707010014-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you want me to teach you about the immense power of the lapenshards? ...No? Pfft.

0614143707010016-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey. Are you any good at tracking people down?

0614143707010017-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are you versed in the way of the blade?

0614143707010018-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'd be grateful for the opportunity to speak with a peer...

0614143707010019-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You seem like you're pretty tough too.

0614143707010020-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: You ever heard of the Gray Wolf? Well you're looking at him! The man, the myth, the legend! What do you mean you've never heard of me...

0614143707010022-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: This place is beautiful. Don't you agree?

0614185307010023-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Hey! I've seen you around Tria!

0614185307010024-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm Surnuny, Tria's best weapons merchant. I came here to trade.

0614185307010025-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Something's wrong... My fur's standing on end.

0614185307010026-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Something's wrong... My fur's standing on end.

0614185307010027-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To think I'd be stuck here, useless...

0614185307010028-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: To think I'd be stuck here, useless...

0614185307010029-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I really hope Brother Junta and the expedition members get better soon.

0614185307010030-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I really hope Brother Junta and the expedition members get better soon.

0614185307010045-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you have something to tell me?

0614185307010046-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Do you have something to tell me?

0614185307010047-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are lapenshards really the cause of all this? Just what are they?

0614185307010048-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Are lapenshards really the cause of all this? Just what are they?

0614185307010049-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What is it, kid? You want to know about lapenshards?

0614185307010050-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: What is it, kid? You want to know about lapenshards?

0614185307010053-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... How did I end up with that one again? We have unfinished business.

0614185307010054-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Sigh... This one is useless without me. That's why I'm always busy cleaning up the mess. Can't really say whether or not I like it at this point.

0614185307010055-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's not like I want to be here. But I've got a debt to repay.

0614185307010056-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's not like I want to be here. But I've got a debt to repay.

0614185307010059-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Even though everything's going crazy right now, it's reassuring to have you around.

0614185307010060-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Even though everything's going crazy right now, it's reassuring to have you around.

0614185307010061-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah, you're here. It's thanks to you that we were all able to find common ground and work as one. Terrun Calibre will do whatever it can to help you with the matter of Madrakan.

0614185307010062-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Ah, you're here. It's thanks to you that we were all able to find common ground and work as one. Terrun Calibre will do whatever it can to help you with the matter of Madrakan.

0614185307010065-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The king will come back... He just has to!

0614185307010066-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The king will come back... He just has to!

0614185307010067-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll do my best to help the queen.

0614185307010068-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'll do my best to help the queen.

0614185307010069-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's a long walk to the Frontier Foundation. Why not take a carriage?

0614185307010070-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: It's a long walk to the Frontier Foundation. Why not take a carriage?

0614185307010071-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Would you like a carriage back to Tria?

0614185307010072-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Would you like a carriage back to Tria?

0614185307010073-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Since none of Terrun Calibre elders are in a position to leave the island, I decided to come and help out.

0614185307010074-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Since none of Terrun Calibre elders are in a position to leave the island, I decided to come and help out.

0614185307010075-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Green Hoods will do their part to purge the forces of darkness from Maple World.

0614185307010076-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Green Hoods will do their part to purge the forces of darkness from Maple World.

0614185307010077-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The full might of the empire stands behind the Frontier Foundation. We too will stand against the darkness.

0614185307010078-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The full might of the empire stands behind the Frontier Foundation. We too will stand against the darkness.

0614185307010079-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We are ready to head out at a moment's notice.

0614185307010080-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We are ready to head out at a moment's notice.

0614185307010081-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My master and the leaders of Terrun Calibre will definitely return. Until then, I'll carry out their will.

0614185307010082-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My master and the leaders of Terrun Calibre will definitely return. Until then, I'll carry out their will.

0614185307010083-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The siege on Madrakan was successful, but it cost us a great deal.

0614185307010084-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The siege on Madrakan was successful, but it cost us a great deal.

0614185307010085-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Losing the leadership of Terrun Calibre was too great a loss.

0614185307010086-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Losing the leadership of Terrun Calibre was too great a loss.

0614185307010087-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: We will aid you with your search.

0614185307010088-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Talk to me whenever you need assistance.

0614185307010089-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm... sorry about what happened to the leaders of Terrun Calibre.

0614185307010090-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: I'm... sorry about what happened to the leaders of Terrun Calibre.

0614185307010091-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The Alemani family will devote all of their resources to aid in the recovery effort.

0614185307010092-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: My other half... You have forged a blood oath. I expect you to aid me til the very end.

0614185307010093-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: The lady is heartbroken. She needs to pull herself together quickly...

0614185307010094-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: As the current crisis threatens all of Maple World, the Alemani family will spare no expense in addressing it.

0614185307010097-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just let us know if there's anything we can do to help.

0614185307010098-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Just let us know if there's anything we can do to help.

0619202207010099--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(The lava is eerily silent, but the heat is blistering. There's an inscription on this statue.)</font>

0619202207010100--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(The lava is eerily silent, but the heat is blistering. There's an inscription on this statue.)</font>

0619202207010101--NA.name: Fifteen hundred years ago, a great earthquake gave birth to this volcano. The nearby forests were destroyed, and in the hot springs gave rise to a new and exotic ecosystem.

0619202207010102--NA.name: The basaltic lava from the volcano influenced the weapons and ceramics used by the local population. But there's more to the lava than precious metals...

0619202207010103--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(There's a story about the birth of the $npcName:22000005$ that lives within the mountain further down in the inscription...)</font>

0619202207010104--NA.name: Long ago, there was a lava eye named Round Eye. It was the runt of its clutch, and all the other lava eyes teased it for its size.

0619202207010105--NA.name: One summer, it dived into the lava river under Hotottot Mountain to try to prove that it was strong, but it was swept away in the lava flow. Rather than help Round Eye out of the river, the other lava eyes mocked their stunted sibling.

0619202207010106--NA.name: Round Eye couldn't take it anymore. It closed its eye and let the lava flow carry it away. "Nobody will miss me," it told itself...

0619202207010107--NA.name: As it drifted away, it prayed that one day it would be reborn as a big, powerful lava eye someday...

0619202207010108--NA.name: Round Eye wasn't seen for a long time after that. Soon, the other lava eyes began to realize that it was gone for good, and there was much fiery weeping at the $map:02000039$.

0619202207010109--NA.name: Then, one day, a gout of lava gushed forth from the mountain, followed by an earth-shattering roar.

0619202207010110--NA.name: The $npcName:22000005$ emerged from the chasm, shocking the rest of the lava eyes. And yet, this monster seemed somehow familiar to them... It was Round Eye!

0619202207010111--NA.name: Overjoyed, the other lava eyes asked it how it had survived. Hahoi, the guardian spirit of the $map:02000039$, had heard Round Eyes' prayer and shown pity.

0619202207010112--NA.name: From that day forth, Round Eye and its fellow lava eyes lived happily on the $map:02000039$, working together to lift each other up.

0619202207010113--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This fountain is built directly into the $map:02000046$. A steady supply of molten lava gushes from its basin.)</font>

0619202207010114--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This fountain is built directly into the $map:02000046$. A steady supply of molten lava gushes from its basin.)</font>

0619202207010115--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(A field journal's been left next to the fountain. It has Silver Wolf's name on it.)

0619202207010116--NA.name: For generations, we believed $map:02000046$ was a natural formation. However, I'm beginning to think otherwise...

0619202207010117--NA.name: While scouting out the area, I noticed that the lava flows in a precise circular path. I scouted out the nearby cave systems, and I can find no source of the lava underground.

0619202207010118--NA.name: This must be the work of powerful magic. If that's the case, then whoever did this must be trying to protect something within the Hourglass.

0619202207010119--NA.name: I still don't know why the lava is circling the mountain, but whatever the reason, I'm sure it's important. And perhaps valuable...

0619202207010120--NA.name: There's a lost temple that was used as a tomb for the great chieftains in ages past. Could this actually be the site of that temple? And how does one get inside...?

0619202207010121--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This big, beautiful sculpture spans the lake at $map:02000038$. There's a plaque bearing an inscription on top.)</font>

0619202207010122--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This big, beautiful sculpture spans the lake at $map:02000038$. There's a plaque bearing an inscription on top.)</font>

0619202207010123--NA.name: The "Rainbow Bridge" is the final work of Mandy, the genius architect responsible for the design of numerous famous buildings. Its purpose, and the significance of its design may never be known, as construction didn't start until after her death.

0619202207010124--NA.name: The fact that the arch was constructed with such unusual materials—and that it is called a bridge despite functioning more as an obstacle than a pathway—are hallmarks of Mandy's famed eccentricity.

0619202207010125--NA.name: Local legends tell of a portal to a magical land on the shore below the bridge's construction site.

0619202207010126--NA.name: Whether you find this portal or not, we hope you enjoy the beautiful scenery here on the Rainbow Bridge.

0619202207010129--NA.name: Tch! Don't tell me I got caught... Your senses are sharp, I'll give you that.

0619202207010131--NA.name: This place, the $map:02000262$, was created by us, the luditionists. I'm taking a quick peek to ensure everything is running smoothly. And by smoothly, I mean with lots of exciting incidents.

0619202207010132--NA.name: A world without incidents is boring, hmm? We don't want a boring world.

0619202207010134--NA.name: Hush, now. Don't ask too many questions or you'll get hurt. Let's just say that we're trying to make things more fun.

0619202207010135--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(You see a message that appears to be written in chalk.)</font>

0619202207010136--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(You see a message that appears to be written in chalk.)</font>

0619202207010137--NA.name: (The writing is barely legible.) Ah, my love, my love! Your blue eyes and wavy golden hair haunt me! There's no way you could know my feelings, but my heart will explode if I don't write them down!

0619202207010138--NA.name: Are you an angel? I heard a tale that you were born from the goddess of light, but to me, you are the goddess of light!

0619202207010139--NA.name: Can you blame me if I despise F? He is the only one who can be near you. Although I'm just one of many guards right now, one day I will be at your side!

0625110307010359--NA.name: <font color='#909090'>(This could be trouble for the empress...)</font>

0619202207010140--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(The bubbling water behind this statue is just the right temperature. There's a plaque on the totem.)</font>

0619202207010141--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(The bubbling water behind this statue is just the right temperature. There's a plaque on the totem.)</font>

0619202207010142--NA.name: Dealing with aches? Pains? Fatigue? Skin blemishes? Then take a soak at these world-renown hot springs! A five minute soak in these naturally heated waters is all you need to feel like a new person!

0625111007010361--NA.name: The people of Perion know that nothing is better after a long day of hunting than a dip on the springs. And best of all, it's free to use!

0619202207010147--NA.name: That's too bad. $npcName:11000367$ and I were meant for each other. It was fate.

0619202207010149--NA.name: How is that any of your business? Let's just say that Skittle saved me from a really tough situation.

0619202207010150--NA.name: You should just wish us happiness, okay?

0619202207010151--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This statue marks the final resting place of a great warrior from Perion.)</font>

0619202207010152--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This statue marks the final resting place of a great warrior from Perion.)</font>

0619202207010153--NA.name: Even on the darkest night, the great Guardian of Wolfclaw Canyon fought without a hint of fear in his heart.

0619202207010154--NA.name: Oh, brave warrior of Perion! Death is not the end. Though you are no longer in this world, your heart will be with the tribes always.

0619202207010155--NA.name: Woe is me, woe is me...

0619202207010156--NA.name: Woe is me, woe is me...

0619202207010159--NA.name: Just hear me out, okay? I'm actually a noble from Tria! A mage cursed me to become a frog, until... Well, perhaps you could help me break the curse.

0619202207010160--NA.name: Don't tell me you want me to kiss you.

0619202207010161--NA.name: But it's the only way to break the curse!

0619202207010162--NA.name: Has anyone else tried breaking the curse yet?

0619202207010163--NA.name: Of course. Obviously, I haven't found the right human to break the curse...

0619202207010165--NA.name: That's what my ma used to tell me when I wouldn't eat my flies. The old frog must've taken me in when I was really little.

0619202207010166--NA.name: Ah. Well, I'll pass. Thanks, though.

0619202207010167--NA.name: Don't be so picky. I'll shower you with riches when I'm back in my rightful form! I just know in my guts that you can break this curse.

0619202207010168--NA.name: You keep telling yourself that. I'm out of here.

0619202207010169--NA.name: Where, oh where will I find someone to break my curse? Woe is me!

0619202207010177--NA.name: Huh. I didn't know trees could scream.

0619202207010178--NA.name: Well obviously I'm not a tree! How did you even spot me? I'm here on a secret mission!

0619202207010182--NA.name: I'm trying to keep a low profile here. Can't you pretend you didn't see me and just move along?

0619202207010183--NA.name: You aren't worthy to even speak of her!

0619202207010184--NA.name: Stop blathering. I'm on duty. Get out of here now, before you regret it.

0619202207010185--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(These are the remains of a dragon. They appear to be very old.)</font>

0619202207010186--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(These are the remains of a dragon. They appear to be very old.)</font>

0619202207010187--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(Judging from the skeletal structure, you can tell that this was a distant cousin to the modern girant breed of dragon. It wasn't very big, but its thick jaw suggests it had a powerful bite.)</font>

0619202207010188--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(You've also noticed that the fire dogs are steering clear of these remains. Did this dragon once prey on those mutts?)</font>

0625131207010362--NA.name: <font color='#909090'>(One particularly long bone tells you that this dragon was male. Its 10-meter-long horn bone, to be precise.)</font>

0620224307010272--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(As you examine the snout of the skull, you note a lack of flame canals present in the dragons of today. While it was obviously flame resistant, this dragon did not actually breathe fire.)</font>

0619202207010189--NA.name: Ah, it's hot... Even hotter than yesterday...

0619202207010190--NA.name: Ah, it's hot... Even hotter than yesterday...

0619202207010191--NA.name: Another human? Phew. You guys really don't mind this heat?

0619202207010193--NA.name: Don't laugh! I've got heatstroke. I think. I came up here because it's cooler, and now I can't go back down because it's too hot.

0619202207010194--NA.name: You... do realize you're a fire dog, right?

0619202207010195--NA.name: You think I don't know how weird it is that I hate the heat? Maybe it's because I was born in winter...

0619202207010196--NA.name: I thought you guys needed fire to stay alive.

0619202207010197--NA.name: No, no more fire! I can't go back down there. I gotta shake this heatstroke...

0619202207010198--NA.name: Eating something spicy might take your mind off the heat.

0619202207010199--NA.name: You're just like all those people napping down there. No help. No help at all...

0619202207010202--NA.name: Okay, I'm just gonna do it. I'm going to ask. Hey, human! Tell me something...

0619202207010204--NA.name: What am I? I mean, what do you think I'm gonna be when I grow up?

0619202207010206--NA.name: Am I gonna be a moth? A butterfly? Maybe a beetle?

0619202207010210--NA.name: R-really? I guess beetles are pretty cool...

0619202207010211--NA.name: Wow... A moth? So the butterflies were telling the truth... I might as well just end it now. Sniff...

0619202207010212--NA.name: That's a relief! The butterflies said I was a moth, but I want to become a beautiful butterfly!

0620194007010253--NA.name: I will too grow up to be a butterfly!

0619202207010215--NA.name: You see that fat little bug over there? Do you think he can become a butterfly?

0619202207010218--NA.name: Pssh! You think that's how a real caterpillar looks? You must have a tiny brain.

0619202207010219--NA.name: Yeah, exactly. Yet that poor creature actually think it's gonna be a butterfly. Can you believe that?

0619202207010220--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(Pressing your ear to the door, you hear some Blackstar gangsters talking.)</font>

0619202207010221--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(Pressing your ear to the door, you hear some Blackstar gangsters talking.)</font>

0619202207010222--NA.name: <font color="#f45342">The big party's tomorrow. You get that cake for Haren yet?</font>

0619202207010223--NA.name: <font color="#41f441">I'm workin' on it! That bakery ya sent me to ain't exactly quick. You know they take orders years in advance?</font>

0619202207010224--NA.name: <font color="#41f441">Wait a sec. This is for Haren? I told 'em to put Min's name on the cake!</font>

0619202207010225--NA.name: You what?! Chen's gonna smash my head in when he sees we messed up Haren's birthday bash!

0619202207010226--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(A teeny-tiny scribble written so small, it almost appears to be shy.)</font>

0619202207010227--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(A teeny-tiny scribble written so small, it almost appears to be shy.)</font>

0619202207010228--NA.name: $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s secret, exposed! She actually has a boyfriend! We've been betrayed!

0619202207010229--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(Is the person who wrote this... angry? $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s fans can be scary sometimes...)</font>

0619202207010230--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(Wait. There's another note written here!)</font>

0619202207010231--NA.name: Interesting rumor. If you happen to meet my boyfriend, bring him to me. I want to know what he looks like. - $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$

0620203007010255--NA.name: Rain, rain, go away. Go away forever.

0620203007010256--NA.name: Rain, rain, go away. Go away forever.

0620203007010257--NA.name: Oh, a passing adventurer. Why don't you take a break and chat with me?

0620203007010259--NA.name: Well, I can tell you your story, if you like. You've been pushing forward without rest. But do you really know where you're going?

0620203007010261--NA.name: I've been here for over a century. I know many things, including things about you. What would you like to know?

0620203007010263--NA.name: Will I ever find true love?

0620203007010264--NA.name: How did Maple World come to be?

0620203007010265--NA.name: I tell you I know things, and you assume I'm a darned prophet. Ha! Okay, I'll play along. I see much potential in you, my friend. Your future holds many great things.

0620203007010266--NA.name: And what would I know about love? I've been alone my entire life...

0620203007010267--NA.name: Why are you asking me? Didn't someone fill you in when you first started your adventure? Something about two goddesses and the birth of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$.

0626201407010374--NA.name: Live long enough, and you begin to lose perspective on good and evil—right and wrong. The hero of yesterday can become the villain of tomorrow.

0626201407010375--NA.name: I can't say whether the future will be good or bad, but now... for now, you are magnificent.

0626201407010376--NA.name: I like to think that everything will work out for people who live their lives with conviction and purpose. You may not believe me now, but someday you'll think back on this old turtle's words and understand.

0626201407010377--NA.name: That's not to say I've never been in love. There was someone in my life... but she passed away in an accident. I never mustered up the courage to tell her how I felt...

0626201407010378--NA.name: Sorry. I didn't mean to stir up bad memories.

0626201407010379--NA.name: Oh, it's all in the past now. Perhaps, when I leave behind this mortal coil, I'll see her again. It's something that gives me hope, anyway.

0626201407010380--NA.name: I'm sure you'll see her again.

0626201407010381--NA.name: That's kind of you to say. If I were to give you any advice, it would be this—don't follow in my footsteps. When you find someone you love, tell them how you feel. Don't live your whole life wondering what could have been...

0626201407010382--NA.name: The goddess of light may be gone, but the remnants of her power permeate this world. It is up to you to help the empress carry that blessed light on into the future.

0626201407010383--NA.name: How'd you know I'm helping the empress?

0626201407010384--NA.name: Oh, you don't get to my age without learning how to keep your ears open.

0620203007010270--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(Many weapon parts are scattered across the top of the bench. Everything on it is coated with a fine layer of onyx dust. It appears Ophelia's skill is the result of countless hours of practice.)</font>

0620203007010271--NA.name: (On the corner of the workbench, there's a fancy business card that seems out of place. "Unload Your Unused Trash! Ophelia's Hardware Store! We Buy All Scrap Metal. Call Us! 902-555-3959")

0625140507010368--NA.name: <font color='#909090'>(Is the enchanting business not working out? What a strange turn of events...)</font>

0619202207010249--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(You faintly make out the cries of a woman. She somehow sounds far away and close at the same time.)</font>

0619202207010250--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(You faintly make out the cries of a woman. She somehow sounds far away and close at the same time.)</font>

0619202207010251--NA.name: My child... My child... Where are you...?

0619202207010252--NA.name: Come back to me... Come out of the cold... Your mama is waiting...

0622133907010273--NA.name: Sigh... Will I ever get to leave this house again?

0622133907010274--NA.name: Sigh... Will I ever get to leave this house again?

0622133907010275--NA.name: I don't dare set foot outside!

0624134507010358--NA.name: They can't hang around here forever... can they?

0622133907010276--NA.name: Hm... The schedule's tight, but we should be able to finish sector B today.

0622133907010277--NA.name: Hm... The schedule's tight, but we should be able to finish sector B today.

0622133907010278--NA.name: Ah, a new face. What do you want?

0622133907010280--NA.name: Ah, I see you've got an inquisitive mind. Good. I like it!

0622133907010281--NA.name: We're building a geothermal plant here. Just you wait. In a few years' time, we'll be providing all the power to the nearby towns!

0622133907010282--NA.name: The old... erm, tenants used this place to build a smelting furnace, but they didn't have the know-how to handle this much heat.

0622133907010283--NA.name: Anyway, since this place is basically abandoned, we decided to take things over. If you want to lend a hand, we can always use another strong back or two!

0622133907010284--NA.name: Shh! You'll wake up the other fireflies. No loud noises allowed.

0622133907010285--NA.name: Shh! You'll wake up the other fireflies. No loud noises allowed.

0622133907010286--NA.name: Quietly, now... You're here looking for a quiet place to rest, aren't you?

0622133907010288--NA.name: Humans always come here when something's on their mind. Our pretty light helps them feel better! I figured you might be the same.

0622133907010289--NA.name: I can't do a danged thing to actually help you. But hey, if staring at our sparkly heinies brings you peace, then stare away!

0622133907010290--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This enchanted marker has been warded against the ages. Ancient writing has been etched into it.)</font>

0622133907010291--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This enchanted marker has been warded against the ages. Ancient writing has been etched into it.)</font>

0622133907010292--NA.name: When our world was young, the goddess of light faded away. It became the responsibility of us fairfolk to carry what remained of her work into the future.

0622133907010293--NA.name: The taint of the darkness remained. Without our goddess, it fell to us to seal it away.

0622133907010294--NA.name: Someday, we believe that our goddess will return to us in mortal form. Until then, we wait and stand watch against the shadows.

0622133907010297--NA.name: Ribbit ribbit... Here we go again... Ribbit ribbit!

0622133907010300--NA.name: Ribbit ribbit! I might be under a spell, too!

0622133907010301--NA.name:
A cold and rainy day, like when we met.
His eyes, his love, I never will forget...

0622133907010302--NA.name:
A cold and rainy day, like when we met.
His eyes, his love, I never will forget...

0622133907010303--NA.name:
I see a wand'rer, hail! Be welcome here.
This is Ellosylva, the Fairy's Tear.

0625134307010363--NA.name: Once a fairy falls in love, she never forgets her lover, even after they've gone to the place where we cannot follow...

0625134307010364--NA.name: I broke the rules and fell in love. I first met him here in $map:02000042$. It still smells like him...

0625134307010365--NA.name: We were happy together, but it couldn't last. And now, I can never see him again...

0622133907010309--NA.name: He told me that my song made him think of the rain. That is why I sing here—to remember him. But, no matter how cheerfully I try to sing, it always comes out sad...

0622133907010305--NA.name:
We fairies oft wear smiles bright and hale,
but in this rain, I share my pain, my tale.

0622133907010308--NA.name:
A human's heart I held in hand, and mine
in his. But human lives are short and I
was left behind when it came to be his time.

0625134307010367--NA.name: Thank you, traveler. I like to think that he's out there, somewhere, still listening to me. Come see me again whenever you want to hear me sing.

0622133907010312--NA.name: Hello. Have you come here to rest, too?

0622133907010314--NA.name: I see... It's quiet here, isn't it? I love it. All of the hustle and bustle of city life just melts away...

0622133907010315--NA.name: You must have been through a lot.

0622133907010316--NA.name: Everyone has their challenges in life, no? I love my job, but sometimes it gets to me.

0622133907010318--NA.name: I'll be here for a little while longer, just soaking in the scents of the forest. I'm going to get plenty of rest before I go back.

0622133907010320--NA.name: You, too! I bet you could use the break even more than I could. Everybody needs some rest now and then.

0622133907010321--NA.name: <font color='#909090'>(This giant snowflake reflects the brilliant sun. No matter how brightly it shines, it never seems to melt.)</font>

0622133907010322--NA.name: <font color='#909090'>(This giant snowflake reflects the brilliant sun. No matter how brightly it shines, it never seems to melt.)</font>

0622133907010323--NA.name: <font color='#909090'>(Tourists come from all over the world to see the local "Santa" who makes presents for good boys and girls. Taking your picture in front of the snow crystal is a trendy thing to do.)</font>

0622133907010324--NA.name: <font color='#909090'>(They say that the snow crystal is a reflection of the goodness and kindness that lives in the hearts of Santas everywhere.)</font>

0622133907010325--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This mascot is the unofficial guardian of $map:02000377$.)</font>

0622133907010326--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This mascot is the unofficial guardian of $map:02000377$.)</font>

0622133907010327--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(The local fishermen consider this whale lucky. They say that you'll catch a huge fish if you kiss the whale's cheek before heading out.)</font>

0622133907010328--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(It's also lucky for the villagers. If you have a dream about this whale, buy a lottery ticket the next day and you'll surely win. At least, that's what they tell you.)</font>

0622133907010329--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(Some people assume that this whale's name is Coco, given the name of the island. However, the creator of the whale insists that it isn't true.)</font>

0622171707010343-LapentaFrontierQuest-.name: Prove that I made the right decision, $MyPCName$.

0623132607010349--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This chocolate waterfall puts off an overwhelmingly sweet aroma.)</font>

0623132607010350--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(This chocolate waterfall puts off an overwhelmingly sweet aroma.)</font>

0623132507010346--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(The rich chocolate of this waterfall is enough to drive some children sugar-crazy.)</font>

0623132507010347--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(The chocolate found in $map:02000257$ is favored by dessert chefs everywhere. Some say it's even Empress $npcName:11001969[gender:1]$'s favorite chocolate.)</font>

0623132507010348--NA.name: <font color="#909090">(In fact, rumor has it the empire's vaults are full of the stuff...)</font>

0720125407010455-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I am dutybound to protect the young mistress.

0720125407010456-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: For the lady, I would sacrifice anything.

0720125407010457-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hah... Well, that opened up a can of worms.

0720125407010460-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll do whatever I can to aid you.

0720125407010462-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The Green Hoods are always ready.

0720125407010463-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Talk to me whenever you need assistance.

0720125407010464-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Our knights always do their utmost.

0720125407010468-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If you have something to say to me, say it now.

0720125407010469-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I am ready to leave at a moments notice.

0720125407010470-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Guidance has been retasked toward the recovery of Lapenshards.

0720125407010472-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Sounds like you've got an important mission! I'm sure you'll succeed!

0720125407010473-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I have no time for nonsense.

0720125407010474-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Isn't there someone else you could be bothering?

0720125407010478-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: To suddenly appear in a place like this...

0720125407010479-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: If I see anything unusual, I'll report in right away!

0720125407010480-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The blast area was pretty big...

0720125407010481-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I've got a mission to complete.

0720125407010484-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'd say you yourself are worth studying, after surviving an explosion of this magnitude.

0720125407010485-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'll let you know if I detect any unusual movement inside the blast radius.

0720125407010487-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What an ominous place... If $npcName:11004110[gender:1]$ didn't need us, I'd keep my distance.

0720125407010488-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Just how big was the explosion?

0720125407010489-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What an ominous place... If $npcName:11004110[gender:1]$ didn't need us, I'd keep my distance.

0720125407010490-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Just how big was the explosion?

0720125407010491-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The road to victory is paved with good intel.

0720125407010492-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I've never seen anything so spooky.

0720125407010494-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Have you seen anything out of the ordinary?

0720130407010497-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hmph... To think I'd be stationed in a place like this in my twilight years...

0720130407010498-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: So... tired... When's the next shift change?

0720143007010499-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm sorry I made you worry...

0720143007010500-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I'm not sure how I can face everyone...

0720143007010504-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Just what did we see in the darkness...?

0730132107010532-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I was worried about you. Let's get out of here.

0730132107010534-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: There's nothing more to talk about.

0730132107010536-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: All this power... I want to test it on something...

0730132107010537-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Your aura is one of virtue.

0730132107010538-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: All that lifeforce... will you give it to me?

0730132107010542-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: And just who's going to treat my injuries?

0806025707010550-SurvivalContents03-.name: It is all well and good to forget one's troubles in a cheerful place such as this, but we cannot lose sight of what's real. A dark storm gathers over Maple World. Now more than ever, we need heroes. Will you answer the call?

0806100607010683-SurvivalContents03-.name: The world beyond this park is full of wonders. You should see it for yourself.

0806025707010552-SurvivalContents03-.name: Sometimes I wish I wasn't so amazing at everything...

0806102807010696-SurvivalContents03-.name: Think you have what it takes to be a hero?

0806025707010554-SurvivalContents03-.name: I wish he wore glasses. He's so intelligent and sensitive... It would be perfect...

0806102807010697-SurvivalContents03-.name: I came to see the prof—erm, I mean, to recruit heroes!

0806025707010558-SurvivalContents03-.name: $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$ likes to frighten us with scary stories, but now that I know better, I don't believe a word he says!

0806025707010559-SurvivalContents03-.name: Wanna split a nice glass of milk?

0806025707010562-SurvivalContents03-.name: An all-expenses paid trip to Mushtopia? Count me in!  I feel like dancing!

0806025707010563-SurvivalContents03-.name: Mm? Are you here to see little old me?

0806025707010564-SurvivalContents03-.name: Hello! It's another beautiful day in Royale Park, wouldn't you say?

0806025707010566-SurvivalContents03-.name: This place is gonna make me rich! I've just gotta figure out how, first...

0806102807010699-SurvivalContents03-.name: Heehee... This place is going to make me a lot of money.

0806025707010568-SurvivalContents03-.name: Ever since we were little, it's always been me, $npcName:11004149$ and the sea, hehe!

0806025707010569-SurvivalContents03-.name: Hm hm hmmm, hm! Those marching songs always get stuck in my head.

0806025707010570-SurvivalContents03-.name: I've loved $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$'s books and the sea ever since I was a boy—probably a side-effect of growing up by the ocean. And now I'm on a voyage of my own, alongside my childhood friends.

0806025707010572-SurvivalContents03-.name: Are you here to participate in Mushking Royale too? I'm afraid we've already got a squad of four. I'll see you on the battlefield!

0806102807010703-SurvivalContents03-.name: I can do anything if I'm near the sea!

0806025707010574-SurvivalContents03-.name: $npcName:11004150$, $npcName:11004148$, $npcName:11004149$, and I are here in $map:02000499$ on vacation! Since we all grew up together, we've got some real synergy on the battlefield.

0806025707010576-SurvivalContents03-.name: The scenery here is breathtaking, but if you want the best view in $map:02000499$, you should try hanging from $npcName:11004165$.

0806110207010719-SurvivalContents03-.name: Hang onto $npcName:11004165$ for an aerial tour of $map:02000499$!

0806110207010720-SurvivalContents03-.name: To ride $npcName:11004165$, you'll have to watch for your chance and grab on quick!

0806025707010577-SurvivalContents03-.name: What seems to be the problem?

0806025707010578-SurvivalContents03-.name: There are chests hidden all over Maple World, but the ones in $map:02000499$ are... different. Hehe, you'll see!

0806110207010721-SurvivalContents03-.name: You're almost at the top, don't quit now!

0806025707010580-SurvivalContents03-.name: Wow, just look at that ocean! This place is so different from $map:02000051$. It really is nice to get out and explore the world once in a while.

0806110207010722-SurvivalContents03-.name: You can fly around on $npcName:11004165$ if you climb to the top of the overlook behind me.

0806025707010582-SurvivalContents03-.name: Ugh! I'm all stiff from standing around all day. I can't wait to get off work.

0806111207010730-SurvivalContents03-.name: If you want to train for Mushking Royale, do it here!

0806025707010584-SurvivalContents03-.name: Yawn... Boooring. I think I liked working in $map:82000000$ better, even with the occasional beatings.

0806111207010731-SurvivalContents03-.name: Yaaaawn... this is the practice area...

0806025707010586-SurvivalContents03-.name:
Nom nom nom nom!
<font color="#909090">(He flops his ears joyfully.)</font>

0806025707010587-SurvivalContents03-.name: It's so close, but I can't reach it. It comes to me in the night and vanishes at dawn.

0806025707010588-SurvivalContents03-.name: Many things shine, not all of them valuable.

0806110207010724-SurvivalContents03-.name: But it's all just a facade.

0730132107010545-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I am dutybound to protect the young mistress.

0730132107010546-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: For the lady, I would sacrifice anything.

0730132107010547-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Are you here to see the doctor? Do you have an appointment?

0730132107010548-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Sigh, no time to rest. Too many patients to get to.

0806025707010589-SurvivalContents03-.name: Is there something I can help you with?

0806025707010590-SurvivalContents03-.name: The Royal Guard protects the Empress and all of $map:02000001$. That is why we must never allow our skills to dull. So long as there are threats to peace in this world, we will not rest.

0806102807010704-SurvivalContents03-.name: It's time to commence our training!

0806102807010705-SurvivalContents03-.name: A true guardsman never stops training.

0806025707010592-SurvivalContents03-.name: Ohh gee, oh man... I don't know about this royale thing.

0806025707010593-SurvivalContents03-.name: What seems to be the problem?

0806025707010594-SurvivalContents03-.name: Guarding the armory is important work, but I'm glad Captain $npcName:11000119$ asked me to tag along.

0806025707010596-SurvivalContents03-.name: Actually, I'm on leave at the moment. The captain asked me to be in his squad for Mushking Royale!

0806025707010598-SurvivalContents03-.name: It's been too long since we've been together like this. Time to warm up!

0806100707010687-SurvivalContents03-.name: I'm feeling a bit under the weather, so I'm warming up with a little cardio.

0806025707010599-SurvivalContents03-.name: Order now or get a face full of burning oil. Your choice.

0806025707010600-SurvivalContents03-.name: Don't get the wrong idea. I'm not here selling churros because my restaurant is doing poorly, I'm just here to enjoy myself.

0806025707010601-SurvivalContents03-.name: So then why ARE you selling churros?

0806025707010603-SurvivalContents03-.name: Huh? Because I like to cook, obviously.

0806025707010604-SurvivalContents03-.name: Well... If I'm being honest, we all trekked all the way here to $map:02000499$ to take a vacation, but we ran out of money to pay for lodging.

0806025707010605-SurvivalContents03-.name: They're not done yet. Come back later.

0806025707010607-SurvivalContents03-.name: Blam, blam! Oh, hey. I'm just practicing my aim. I don't want to let my squad down.

0806025707010609-SurvivalContents03-.name: Sorry, I've already got a squad. See? There's the guy selling churros, the girl strutting around over there, and that guy shooting finger-guns.  I couldn't ask for better teammates.

0806025707010610-SurvivalContents03-.name: You don't have to look twice. I'm who you think I am.

0806025707010611-SurvivalContents03-.name: You're lucky to have run into me. I'm not sticking around, I've just popped in for a photo shoot. I can't really have a relaxing vacation with so many frenzied fans around.

0806100707010690-SurvivalContents03-.name: I guess I'm too handsome for my own good.

0806025707010612-SurvivalContents03-.name: Today is the best day of my life!!

0806025707010613-SurvivalContents03-.name: Eek! It's $npcName:11004174[gender:0]$! It's really $npcName:11004174[gender:0]$!! I can't believe it, I think I'm gonna die.

0806025707010615-SurvivalContents03-.name: When things get dicey, it's good to have somebody who's got your back.

0806025707010616-SurvivalContents03-.name: Yes? How may I help you?

0806025707010617-SurvivalContents03-.name: You want to join our squad? Listen, you seem nice, but I've already got two reliable partners. I don't think we need anyone else.

0806100707010692-SurvivalContents03-.name: The three of us are more than enough!

0806025707010619-SurvivalContents03-.name: If we want to win the next match, the two of you need to be more pragmatic.

0806025707010621-SurvivalContents03-.name: My greatest joy is seeing my daughter smile. I would have visited this place sooner if I had known it would make $npcName:11004180[gender:1]$ so happy.

0806025707010625-SurvivalContents03-.name: None of this makes any sense.

0806025707010627-SurvivalContents03-.name: Simply hiding is no strategy for victory. Especially up against the likes of an expert tracker like Arazaad.

0806102807010711-SurvivalContents03-.name: We can win this if we just remember Arazaad's teachings.

0806102807010712-SurvivalContents03-.name: This is our chance to show what we're made of.

0806025707010629-SurvivalContents03-.name: Arazaad, Arazaad, Arazaad. Hmph. $npcName:11004182[gender:0]$'s always going on and on about the old man.

0806025707010631-SurvivalContents03-.name: It's certainly reassuring to have these two at my side, but we have a lot of work ahead of us if we intend to come out on top.

0806025707010633-SurvivalContents03-.name: To reclaim all I have lost, I must find a champion in the greatest of games!

0806025707010635-SurvivalContents03-.name: I came here to get t-t-tougher, so I can chase off the w-wolves plaguing our farm.

0813101707010951-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: I am sorry for misleading you. But surely you must see that I had no choice.

0813101707010953-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: Hmmm... This is turning out to be pretty interesting.

0813101707010955-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: What happened? I'm having trouble remembering.

0813101707010957-EyeOfLapentaQuest-.name: The Green Lapenta... The flow of life... All these memories...

0806025707010639-SurvivalContents03-.name: You must always believe in yourself. Though the road is long and difficult, it is our duty to bring peace to this world.

0806102807010713-SurvivalContents03-.name: This place is one of splendor.

0806102807010714-SurvivalContents03-.name: Perhaps we should decorate $map:02000001$ like this? Hehe.

0806025707010641-SurvivalContents03-.name: The world relies on the strength of heroes like you. May the empress's blessing be with you.

0806102807010716-SurvivalContents03-.name: Is this a trial from the heavens?

0806025707010643-SurvivalContents03-.name: I'm wise enough to admit I've gotten too old to keep up with the youth of today. When you reach a certain age, you've just got to step out of the way and leave things to the next generation.

0806025707010645-SurvivalContents03-.name: Our yearly pilgrimage through the Vayar Mountains has made the warriors of Murpagoth mighty. Perhaps you will join us on our next journey? That is of course, after we have proven ourselves on the fields of Mushtopia.

0806025707010647-SurvivalContents03-.name: I'm delighted to be visiting $map:02000499$ with my mother. Of course, I won't be engaging in the tourney myself. Mother and I will be quite happy to cheer the contestants on from the sidelines.

0806102807010717-SurvivalContents03-.name: I'm happy I brought Mother here.

0806025707010649-SurvivalContents03-.name: My son is always thinking of me, and it makes me so very happy. He's such a good boy! I don't know how I'd get along without him.

0806102807010718-SurvivalContents03-.name: This place is so very lovely. I'm so glad my son brought me.

0806025707010651-SurvivalContents03-.name: Out of the way, buddy, you're in my shot.

0806110207010727-SurvivalContents03-.name: When I post these pics online, my friends will be so jealous!

0806025707010653-SurvivalContents03-.name: Y'know, I wasn't so sure about those mushfolk when I got the brochure, but I've gotta say this place is pretty great!

0806110207010728-SurvivalContents03-.name: Now this is one classy theme park!

0806025707010655-SurvivalContents03-.name: It's a bit hot out here, but spectating is such fun!

0806025707010657-SurvivalContents03-.name: Are you looking for friends, too?

0806045807010659-SurvivalContents03-.name: The mush before you is merely a facsimile of his mushyness. The real $npc:11004213[gender:1]$ is actually luxuriating inside the castle.

0806045807010661-SurvivalContents03-.name: Fake. A fraud. A phony. See the way he bounces around? It's really just an inflatable balloon rigged up to make noises.

0806045807010663-SurvivalContents03-.name: I know, right? You can touch him, if you want. Just don't pop him. These things are expensive.

0806045807010665-SurvivalContents03-.name: Hmm? Is that really the $npc:11004213[gender:0]$, you ask? Yep! Except this one is bigger. Otherwise, they're identical in every way! The real $npc:11004213[gender:0]$ is full of hot air, too, heh heh heh!

0806045807010667-SurvivalContents03-.name: You want to try out some high-caliber mushsplosives? Just pick up a bomb and throw it.

0806052007010672-SurvivalContents03-.name: Right... And how do I pick stuff up again?

0806052107010672-SurvivalContents03-.name: You don't know? Just stand next to a bomb and the words "Pick Up" will pop up in the air as if by magic. Just press the corresponding button and you're ready to unleash the cleansing power of fire!

0806052107010673-SurvivalContents03-.name: ...None of that seems strange to you?

0806052107010674-SurvivalContents03-.name: No stranger than the voices in my head that tell me to burn things!

0806052107010677-SurvivalContents03-.name:
♬I wanna be where the mushfolk are. I wanna see—wanna see 'em mushin'.
Bouncin' around on those stalks!♬

0806052107010680-SurvivalContents03-.name: It's my goal in life to one day be as shroomy as the $npcName:11004213[gender:0]$. Or failing that, at least to mush it up with the best of them.

0806052107010681-SurvivalContents03-.name: I want to be a shroomy mushroom, know what I mean?

0806130507010733-LapentaDungeon-.name: I've got just what you need to continue the search.

0808172007010849-GemStoneJewelBox_01-.name: <font color="#909090">(This $npcName:11004215$ can create gem dust to help you upgrade your gemstones.)</font>

0808172007010850-GemStoneJewelBox_01-.name: <font color="#909090">(Do you wish to create some $itemPlural:20301849$?)</font>

0808172007010856-GemStoneJewelBox_01-.name: <font color="#909090">(The process has been completed. The chest awaits your next command.)</font>

0808172007010860-GemStoneJewelBox_01-.name: <font color="#909090">(Your bag is full. Return after making some space.)</font>

0808172007010861-GemStoneJewelBox_01-.name: <font color="#909090">(Insufficient materials. You need 10 $itemPlural:30001187$ and 1 $item:30001188$ to begin the conversion process.)</font>

0808172007010859-GemStoneJewelBox_01-.name: <font color="#909090">(The process has been completed. The chest awaits your next command.)</font>

0809135407010882-GemStoneJewelBox_01-.name: <font color="#909090">(Insufficient materials. You need 100 $itemPlural:30001187$ and 10 $itemPlural:30001188$ to begin the conversion process.)</font>

0911140307011157-GemStoneJewelBox_01-NA.name: <font color="#909090">(After you reach level 50, you can use $itemPlural:30001187$ and $itemPlural:30001188$ on this chest to make materials for upgrading gemstones.)</font>

0806222707010773-SurvivalContents03-.name: Do you have business with me?

0806222707010774-SurvivalContents03-.name: Haha, let's get this party started! Pew pew! That's the sound of me blowing everyone away with the power of my cannon!

0806222707010775-SurvivalContents03-.name: If you want to be happy, there's one rule to live by: figure out what you wanna do, and do it! In my case, that's listening my cannon purr as it pumps out hundreds of rounds a minute.

0806222707010777-SurvivalContents03-.name: They're so lucky I can't use my cannon in the royale.

0806222707010779-SurvivalContents03-.name: This world is ruled by competition. Only the best win.

0806222707010780-SurvivalContents03-.name: If you wanna survive, you've got to win, and there's no right or wrong when it comes to winning. Somebody's got to go, you or them.

0806222707010781-SurvivalContents03-.name: If you want to win, you've got to be ready to do ANYTHING.

0806222707010783-SurvivalContents03-.name: There is power in anger, but you must never lose yourself in the heat of battle. When all that's left is devastation, there are no winners.

0806222707010784-SurvivalContents03-.name: Powerful, decisive action is the key to victory.

0806222707010786-SurvivalContents03-.name: Sorry, I don't have time for games... I'm here on a special mission. My partner said to meet him at the tables on the dock over by the balloons, but he's nowhere in sight.

0806222707010788-SurvivalContents03-.name: I can't really talk right now.

0806222707010789-SurvivalContents03-.name: Can't talk, secret mission. I told $npc:11004220[gender:0]$ to meet right here by the balloons. Where is he? You don't think they got to him first, do you...?
