1227192907012075-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No way. I don't have what it takes to be a hero! I just want to go hide under my bunk!

1227192907012076-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't tell Condor about this, by the way. If he hears I've been talking like this, I'm done for!

1227192907012079-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're doing our best to keep $map:02020041$ safe!

1227192907012082-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've been trying to get in this platoon for ages. They finally give me the transfer, and the whole platoon is shipped out to this crazy place. Man...

1227192907012084-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hearing those words from your mouth fills me with hope. Thank you, $MyPCName$! I'll fight my hardest!

1227192907012087-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Huh? You don't look like a refugee.

1227192907012086-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wave after wave. It's too much!

1227192907012088-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Huh? You don't look like a refugee.

1227192907012089-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have come from the distant land of Maple World.

1227192907012090-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Never heard of it. Look, just keep your head down and try not to get caught in the crossfire.

1227192907012091-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't they know when to quit?

1227192907012092-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sick of this never-ending battle...

1227192907012096-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm? Your clothes are strange, but you look like you can hold your own. You ever consider a career in freedom fighting?

1227192907012097-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sorry, but I've got other obligations.

1227192907012098-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tch... What a waste of talent. Well, if you change your mind, it's not like we can afford to be picky...

1227192907012103-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm worried about $npcName:11004472[gender:0]$. He's got his heart set on joining the rebellion...

1227192907012104-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm worried about $npcName:11004472[gender:0]$. He's got his heart set on joining the rebellion...

1227192907012106-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004472[gender:0]$'s family was expelled from Tairen during one of the purges, so they signed on with the freedom fighters. Then... they went missing.

1227192907012107-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ever since then, he spends all his time exercising so that he can join the fight and save his family.

1227192907012109-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I hope he never has to see the battlefield. We told him he could be a freedom fighter if he trained hard enough, but it was really to keep him from running off and getting himself killed.

1227192907012110-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And now I have to spend my free time babysitting him... Hey, you look free. Mind watching him for an hour or two?

1227192907012112-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmph. You don't look like it. Oh well! I'd probably get in trouble if I left him with a stranger, anyway.

1227192907012119-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That little cretin wants to go out and play...

1227192907012117-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Who would want to play in this chaos?

1227192907012118-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This disaster has to end sometime.

1227192907012120-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That little cretin wants to go out and play...

1227195007012417-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was playing hide-and-seek with my friends, but I just can't find them!

1227195007012416-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't find you! I give up!

1227195007012418-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was playing hide-and-seek with my friends, but I just can't find them!

1227195007012419-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Where did you go?! I give up! Please come out!

1227192907012127-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That snot-nosed brat went out to play and still hasn't come back.

1227192907012125-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Where did that troublemaker get off to...?

1228153007012427-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That snot-nosed brat went out to play and still hasn't come back.

1227192907012128-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is no time to play. There's a war going on out there! Ugh, what would our parents say?

0104110407012537-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Gotta get in shape if I'm gonna fight bad guys!

0104110407012540-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why're you dressed like that? You look like a big dummy with a side of dummy sauce.

0104110407012541-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You practicing for a marathon, kid?

0104110407012542-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is cutting-edge fashion where I'm from!

0104110407012543-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm training so I can join the resistance! I'm gonna beat up those Tairen doody-heads good.

0104110407012544-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But Humanitas only lets the strongest people ever join them. That's why I gotta run so much.

0104110407012545-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You look pretty strong, though. How do you do it?

0104110407012547-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was afraid you were gonna say that. Hey... If you see my ma and pa, could you rescue them from the bad guys?

0104110407012549-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wow, really? Okay! Then I gotta keep training so I can help you!

0104110407012550-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And where are you from? A butt?

1227192907012147-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wait, aren't you $MyPCName$? Wow! It really is you, in the flesh!

1227192907012149-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What, afraid of a little fame? How lame. This must be why they say you should never meet your heroes.

1227192907012151-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, do you see that huge ship? I'm not imagining it, am I?

1227192907012150-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No way something that big can fly...

1227192907012152-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, do you see that huge ship? I'm not imagining it, am I?

1227192907012153-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's so big... How can something that big float up in the sky like that?

1227192907012154-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Didn't you ride Sky Fortress to get here?

1227192907012155-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sure, but I couldn't exactly tell how big it is from the inside. Seeing it now, away from the buildings in Tria... It's unreal!

1227192907012156-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you know? How does it fly like that?

1227192907012157-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:24100101$ would tell you it's the power of science.

1227192907012158-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:24100101$? Is that the name of one of the Sky Fortress big wigs? She sounds intimidating...

1227192907012161-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You here for the big land grab?

1227192907012159-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So this is Kritias, the land of opportunity.

1227192907012160-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here's my chance to get a mansion of my own...

1227192907012162-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You here for the big land grab?

1227192907012163-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020041$ is the first city in the new world. This place is gonna be a hotbed of development once we kick the other riffraff off this continent!

1227192907012164-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sure, it seems like a shaky investment now, but just you wait! Any land you buy here today will be worth ten times as much a year from now!

1227192907012167-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sigh... I'm sick of these ration packs they have us all eating. I miss the gourmet restaurants of Tria!

1227192907012165-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll die if I have to eat one more ration pack!

1227192907012166-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I just want to taste something good for once...

1227192907012168-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They didn't warn us that Kritias doesn't have any proper eateries. What's a foodie supposed to do in a place like this?

1227192907012169-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would kill for a bowl of blue mushroom slime soup in cornelian cherry sauce...

1227192907012170-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ugh, talking about it just makes it worse! I'm going to be too hungry to sleep tonight...

1227192907012173-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Eee! It's him! It's really him!

1227192907012174-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Eee! It's him! It's really him!

1227192907012176-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't jump out at me like that. When I saw your ugly mug, I thought you were some kind of freaky monster.

1227192907012178-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't take it personally, uggo. Everyone is hideous compared to Blake!

1227192907012179-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You need to get your eyes checked.

1227192907012180-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A normie like you will never understand! Blake is beauty. Blake is the future!

1227192907012181-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just wait. Soon, everyone in Kritias will bow before Blake's handsomeness!

1228141007012420-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Blake is so... bedazzling! Don't you think so, too?

1228141007012421-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Blake is so... bedazzling! Don't you think so, too?

1228141007012423-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's like we're witnessing history. The day Blake set foot in the new world!

1228141007012424-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wanna join the new Blake Fan Club—Kritias Branch? I've got the paperwork right here!

1228141007012425-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh no, something urgent just came up. Bye.

1228141007012426-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really? Shoot... Well, come back soon, before we fill up!

1227192907012194-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But how do they make it float?

1227192907012195-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This could change energy production throughout Maple World.

1227192907012198-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm here to study aetherine. We're really just scratching the surface when it comes to possible applications!

1227192907012199-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What have you learned so far?

1227192907012200-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, aetherine can make objects spontaneously levitate for almost no energy expenditure. I've measured the amount of aetherine in the floating buildings here, and there's very, very little.

1227192907012201-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our own levitation technology requires massive amounts of energy to work. If we can switch to aetherine, it will be a technological revolution!

1227192907012202-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, I don't know how any of it works. But I will. Oh yes, I will...

1227192907012205-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yikes! You startled me. I... I didn't really expect another person to just walk up to me in a place like this.

1227192907012204-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've never seen anything like this before.

1227192907012206-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yikes! You startled me. I... I didn't really expect another person to just walk up to me in a place like this.

1227192907012207-Kritias_2018_12-.name: See this tree? I thought it was some kind of mechane at first. But all of my tests show that this is, in fact, a living plant.

1227192907012208-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Those cogwheels are actually leaves. Eventually they'll fall off and the tree will grow new ones. I'm still trying to wrap my head around the ecosystem here...

1227192907012209-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If my report is convincing enough, maybe Dr. $npcName:11004492[gender:0]$ will authorize a permanent research camp here.

0114163707012711-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I just want to lose myself in my research!

1227192907012212-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm? I didn't expect to see anyone outside the safety of the outpost.

1227192907012213-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm? I didn't expect to see anyone outside the safety of the outpost.

1227192907012215-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, well I was sent out to look for aetherine samples, but I found this weird machine. I'm pretty sure it's related to aetherine somehow, but I haven't quite worked it out.

1227192907012216-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's weak, but that ring is drawing aetherine power into its center. I took some initial scans, and I think it's actually capable of storing vast amounts of the stuff.

1227192907012218-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Isn't it? But I have theories!

1227192907012219-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Based on the data I've collected so far, I have two ideas. Either this device is gathering aetherine and transporting it somewhere...

1227192907012220-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Or it's a dimensional portal that's connected to a place far, far away.

1227192907012221-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What kind of people live here, that they can make all this wild technology?

0104110407012553-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've never seen such a place... Huh? Where'd you come from?

0104110407012552-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is Kritias inhabited solely by monsters?

0104110407012554-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've never seen such a place... Huh? Where'd you come from?

0104110407012556-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, you kidder. You know me. We boarded Sky Fortress together!

0104110407012557-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm pretty sure I've never met you before.

0104110407012558-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course! I'd never forget a face like yours.

0104110407012559-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You scatterbrain! I was the facility manager at the $map:52010059$. I can't believe you forgot about me...

0104110407012560-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, Bastet picked up this structure during a routine scan. I thought I'd check it out, but this place is thick with monsters...

0104110407012563-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course you didn't forget me! I'm unforgettable, as my mother always said.

0104110407012564-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, Bastet picked up this structure during a routine scan. I thought I'd check it out, but this place is thick with monsters...

0104110407012565-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've never seen such a building. The architecture is breathtaking...

0104110407012566-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh... Maybe this isn't the time for such chatter. I'd better get out of here while I still can.

0104110407012567-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not who, but what. Bastet is our cutting-edge surveillance satellite! There's nothing she can't spot. I think.

0104110407012568-Kritias_2018_12-.name: She's technically still a prototype. When Kritias showed up from out of nowhere, it seemed like a good chance to put her through her paces.

0104110407012569-Kritias_2018_12-.name: She can count your nose hairs from orbit!

0104110407012570-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Impressive! Who came up with that?

0104110407012571-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Who do you think? $npcName:11004437[gender:0]$, of course! At Captain $npcName:11004434[gender:0]$ command, of course.

0104110407012572-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The captain even came up with the name "Bastet," you see. I wonder what it means...?

0104110407012573-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm here to research structures and facilities here on Kritias, of course. Unfortunately, the going hasn't exactly been easy.

0104110407012574-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But it's definitely worth it! Look at this beauty of a building right here.

0104110407012575-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh... Maybe this isn't the time for such chatter. I'd better get out of here while I still can.

0114162107012707-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sure it means something. The captain isn't the sort to name things all willy-nilly.

1227192907012249-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hello! I'll be helping you explore Kritias. Nice to meet you.

1227192907012250-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hello! I'll be helping you explore Kritias. Nice to meet you.

1227192907012253-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's lots and lots of preparation to do. So that's what I'm doing... Preparing! Yep. Gotta prepare before you can go out into the wilderness...

1227192907012255-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm not scared! I'm c-cautious, okay? This is an important j-j-j-job. I'm definitely not stalling!

1227192907012258-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Keep quiet! Stay down! It's over if the enemy spots us!

1227192907012257-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just need to find my opening...

1227192907012259-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Keep quiet! Stay down! It's over if the enemy spots us!

1227192907012261-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Something wrong? Is something wrong?! Look at the chaos out here! I came here to discover new lands, not risk my life!

1227192907012262-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That so-called Daemon Army ambushed me, so I ran away... only to find myself in the middle of a Tairen raid!

1227192907012263-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At this rate, I'll get tombstoned before I discovery anything worthwhile. If you really want to help, then get rid of those bad guys for me!

1227192907012266-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Those clothes... You're from Maple World, like me! You must be the first friendly face I've seen in days.

1227192907012267-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Those clothes... You're from Maple World, like me! You must be the first friendly face I've seen in days.

1227192907012269-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's going... slowly. I can't stop thinking about this machine here...

1227192907012270-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In design, it resembles the noblest of tools, the humble drill. You can see why I've become obsessed with it.

1227192907012271-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But this is no ordinary drill, if it even is a drill at all. It seems like it can absorb energy of a certain wavelength. The same wavelength that aetherine resonates at, in fact.

1227192907012272-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps it is used to mine for aetherine, then transmit the energy somehow? That's my hypothesis, at any rate.

0104144307012586-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes, yes. I'm sure I've seen your face somewhere before. I'm really much too busy just now, though, so...

0104144307012588-Kritias_2018_12-.name: An amateur academic. Of course. I suppose I can spare a minute of my time to explain.

0104144307012589-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I am one of the premier mechanical engineers of Victoria Island! I snuck aboard—I mean, I legitimately boarded Sky Fortress in order to study the machines of Kritias.

0104144307012590-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And look! I have discovered the most wonderful drills!

0104144307012591-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At least, it looks like a drill. Technically speaking, that's not quite right.

0104144307012592-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The structure of this drill defies all known convention—it's no twist drill, nor straight shank drill, nor step drill, and so forth.

0104144307012593-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And this material! They've somehow found something better than cemented carbide. I can't even— I mean, it's just not—

0104144307012594-Kritias_2018_12-.name: GASP! Sorry... I got so excited, I forgot to breathe.

0104144307012595-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, it's all clear now, is it not?

0104144307012597-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You jest. I explained it clearly enough for a five-year-old to understand.

0104144307012601-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But what is this drill for...?

0114163707012714-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's no shortage of amazing things in Kritias. That's why I'm so busy with research!

1227192907012275-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, you're from Maple World, right?

1227192907012273-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want to go back to Tria...

1227192907012274-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How long must I stay here?

1227192907012276-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, you're from Maple World, right?

1227192907012278-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Everything's wrong! I loathe field work. Everything around here wants to tombstone me. And it's been days since I had a proper bath! This assignment must be a sick joke on the part of my boss.

1227192907012279-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I miss my lab in Tria. I hope this mission ends soon...

1227192907012281-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I hadn't thought of it that way. Thank you. You cheer up, too!

1227192907012284-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, the hero of Sky Fortress! You have many fans, you know.

1227192907012282-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Look at the size of it...

1227192907012283-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Where is all of this aetherine is going?

1227192907012285-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, the hero of Sky Fortress! You have many fans, you know.

1227192907012287-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't let it get to your head. You'll get sloppy.

1227192907012288-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, this looks to be some kind of aetherine mine. There must be a huge deposit of the stuff under here.

1227192907012289-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That would explain why there are so many enemy forces marshaled here. They want the aetherine.

1227192907012290-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think we ought to put our hat in the ring, so I sent a request for reinforcements. I'm trying to estimate the size of the aetherine deposit before they get here...

1227192907012293-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm so glad your here! I needed to share this with someone.

1227192907012294-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm so glad your here! I needed to share this with someone.

1227192907012296-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Look at that structure up ahead. Really look at it. You can use my telescope if you like.

1227192907012298-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The whole thing is made of some kind of porous material, and it's soaked in aetherine like a sponge!

1227192907012299-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The cylinder at the center looks like it draws aetherine directly from the ground. I think. I'm not exactly sure how it works...

1227192907012300-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think this terminal is connected somehow. I haven't managed to get it to do anything yet, though.

1227192907012303-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, hello. You must be here for my report. I'm afraid it's not very good...

1227192907012304-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, hello. You must be here for my report. I'm afraid it's not very good...

1227192907012306-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm looking into the soil contamination that started spreading around here not too long ago.

1227192907012307-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What do you know about the mechanical monster that roams this area?

1227192907012313-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then you're aware of how big a problem Gigantica is for us.

1227192907012314-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wherever Gigantica appears, the soil becomes tainted. We've actually had to abandoned a camp because the toxins got so bad!

1227192907012315-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's why I'm needed. If I can analyze the contamination, we may be able to counteract it—or, at the very least, predict where Gigantica will go next.

1227192907012310-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really? You must not read the crew newsletter. Our efforts to explore Kritias have been hindered by this giant robotic worm. We call it Gigantica.

1227192907012311-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wherever Gigantica appears, the soil becomes tainted. We've actually had to abandon a camp because the toxins got so bad!

1227192907012312-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's why I'm needed. If I can analyze the contamination, we may be able to counteract it—or, at the very least, predict where Gigantica will go next.

1227192907012318-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm? Oh, you're that $male:fellow,female:lady$ from Sky Fortress!

1227192907012317-Kritias_2018_12-.name: To think that such technology exists...

1227192907012319-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm? Oh, you're that $male:fellow,female:lady$ from Sky Fortress!

1227192907012320-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here to admire the architecture? It's breathtaking, isn't it?

1227192907012322-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Balderdash! Surely even a hardened adventurer like you is moved by such grandeur. There's nothing like this in all of Maple World!

1227192907012323-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why, this building is a testament to the power of science. Even though I'm standing here, I feel as if I'm witnessing some impossible dream.

1227192907012324-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Dr. $npcName:11004499[gender:0]$ will be over the moon when he sees this!

1227192907012326-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I never imagined such a place...

1227192907012329-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I stumbled upon this place quite by accident. I never imagined there might be a large robot factory here.

1227192907012330-Kritias_2018_12-.name: See there? The robots are made without any intervention from human factory workers. And with such speed, no less! This explains the endless forces that the Tairen army has managed to field.

1227192907012331-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Should I blow this place up, then?

1227192907012332-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm afraid this is but one small corner of the whole facility. What's more, if any part of the factory is destroyed, it's repaired automatically within minutes.

1227192907012333-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Any attempt to destroy this place would fail to put any sizable dent in their production capabilities. It would, however, mark our presence on Kritias as a clear threat. A threat that they would feel compelled to wipe out.

1227192907012334-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Instead of striking out blindly, we need to understand the full scope of this facility... and what it will take to destroy it once and for all.

0114164107012724-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need to learn more about this facility.

1227192907012337-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$! I'm here researching the plants of Kritias.

1227192907012338-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$! I'm here researching the plants of Kritias.

1227192907012340-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So much! All of the plants in Kritias have at least a little bit of aetherine in them.

1227192907012341-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And the plants react to each other's aetherine. It seems like they use the aetherine to communicate with each other!

1227192907012343-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not precisely, but the idea of plants being able to communicate with each other isn't exactly new. The ecosystem in Kritias may be the most concrete evidence we've ever seen.

1227192907012344-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The plants are all giving off the same aetherine wavelength. It's almost as if they're singing a chorus!

1227192907012347-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm here researching the fish of Kritias.

1227192907012348-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm here researching the fish of Kritias.

1227192907012350-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Every fish I've caught has had trace amounts of aetherine in their systems. The amount might be related to their place in the food chain...

1227192907012351-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If I were to cook and eat one of these fish, would the aetherine stay in my system? Until I figure this out, we're going to be reliant on food rations delivered from the mainland.

0114161207012703-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I hope you figure it out.

0114161207012704-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So do I, my friend. So do I.

1227192907012354-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This place was a dense forest when we first got here...

1227192907012355-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This place was a dense forest when we first got here...

1227192907012357-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We set up camp just a day after the Daemon Army arrived. This is all that's left of the forest. The stream is totally dead now, too.

1227192907012358-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've seen this kind of rapid transformation before. In the Land of Darkness...

1227192907012359-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As the Daemon Army expands, this massive die-off of nature will follow.

0114164607012725-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to stop them before they spread any further.

1227192907012362-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The gravity, erm, situation in this place is fascinating. Why, these huge structures look as though they might simply float away.

1227192907012360-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is this the power of aetherine?

1227192907012361-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Even gravity is nothing to it...

1227192907012363-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The gravity, erm, situation in this place is fascinating. Why, these huge structures look as though they might simply float away.

1227192907012365-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's early to say, but I think this could lead to a second energy revolution.

1227192907012366-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Think about it. The vast majority of Sky Fortress's power generation goes into keeping it in the air. How might we use that power if we had aetherine to lift the ship aloft, instead?

0114163707012716-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And that's why we've got to learn everything we can about aetherine.

1227192907012369-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah! You're that $male:fellow,female:lady$, from Sky Fortress. Are you here to ask about my research?

1227192907012368-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I suppose it isn't toxic, after all.

1227192907012370-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah! You're that $male:fellow,female:lady$, from Sky Fortress. Are you here to ask about my research?

1227192907012372-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Since we arrived in Kritias, I've been looking into the connection between the local wildlife and this miraculous "aetherine" substance.

1227192907012373-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No matter how big or small, every creature I've sampled has some amount of aetherine in it.

0114164607012727-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is there some connection between aetherine and life energy? I'll have to do more science to know for sure.

1227192907012376-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm part of the team researching the fish of Kritias.

1227192907012377-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm part of the team researching the fish of Kritias.

1227192907012378-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The water here is highly toxic. Just a sip would tombstone an ordinary person. But see in there? Fish.

1227192907012380-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't say anything conclusively just yet, but I think the aetherine in their bodies somehow protects them from the poison.

1227192907012381-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did the fish here evolve to use the aetherine to neutralize the poison?

1227192907012384-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Who's there? Oh, you're that... that $MyPCName$ hero!

1227192907012385-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Who's there? Oh, you're that... that $MyPCName$ hero!

1227192907012387-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm the foremost cultural anthropologist of Sky Fortress, here to study the cultures of Kritias. And I feel I've already made a great discovery!

1227192907012388-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've uncovered some ancient writings here, and the motifs and archetypes on display are similar to those in ancient Victoria Island literature. Uncannily so.

1227192907012390-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It begs the question: do our cultures share the same root? Of course, the higher-ups will only accept evidence that our culture came first, and that Kritias copied us...

1227192907012395-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I came here on Sky Fortress.

1227192907012396-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, you're that famous hero! An honor to meet you.

1227192907012397-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm part of the architectural research team. Take a look at this structure here! Incredible, isn't it? I've never seen such an elaborate design.

1227192907012398-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Each brick and pillar fits perfectly. I've never seen something like this before.

1227192907012399-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All of the buildings I've examined since we got here has been like this. I only wish I could see how they pulled this off!

0114163707012720-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's worth researching. This could revolutionize building techniques all over the empire.

1227192907012407-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You here to enlist? Fall in line, Recruit!

1227192907012408-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You here to enlist? Fall in line, Recruit!

1227192907012410-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is that so? Hmph. You have the look of a washed-up loser. Join my troop and I'll have you back on your feet in no time!

1227192907012411-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need all the help we can get to fight Tairen. We'll even take folks wearing... whatever that's supposed to be. You sure you don't want to sign on with us?

1228182607012432-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, you're that outlander. I read a report on you.

1228182607012433-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sorry if I seem on edge. Not all of the outlanders have been as... helpful as you.

1228182607012436-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I know your face. Road in on that primitive flying boat, didn't you?

1228182607012435-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Give me victory, or give me tombstone!

1228182607012437-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I know your face. Road in on that primitive flying boat, didn't you?

1228182607012439-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmph. You did good work in Richmonde, I'll give you that.

1228182607012441-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I haven't seen you before. You that outlander everyone's talking about?

1228182607012442-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I haven't seen you before. You that outlander everyone's talking about?

1228182607012443-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, watch yourself out there. Our enemy won't hesitate to shoot you down.

1228182607012446-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Zzz... N-no... I can't eat another bite...

1228182607012447-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Zzz... N-no... I can't eat another bite...

1228182607012449-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Aaaah! Don't hurt me! I-I mean... I'm awake. I'm awake!

1228182607012451-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Look what we have here. It's about time they sent us some reinforcements.

1228182607012452-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Look what we have here. It's about time they sent us some reinforcements.

1228182607012454-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tch... Figures. We don't have the numbers to hold this position for right now. Y'know, give a leshy a gun and I'd let it stand guard. That's how desperate we are!

1228182607012457-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What're you, a tourist? You wanna get tombstoned? This is a warzone! Not that $map:02020030$ is any better...

1228182607012455-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They have to let up some time...

1228182607012458-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What're you, a tourist? You wanna get tombstoned? This is a warzone! Not that $map:02020030$ is any better...

1228182607012461-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ugh... I'm ready to pass out on my feet...

1228182607012460-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need to get off my feet...

1228182607012462-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ugh... I'm ready to pass out on my feet...

1228182607012467-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is the hub of all of our mobile forces, by land and air. But ever since the enemy pushed to our doorstep, we haven't been able to secure a supply line for the life of us.

1228182607012469-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My bullets always hit their mark!

1228182607012470-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My bullets always hit their mark!

1228182607012472-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We'll be eating shoe leather at this rate...

1228182607012473-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We'll be eating shoe leather at this rate...

1228182607012474-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With all the land routes cut off, we've been relying on air drops for supplies. We don't have the spare planes to keep that up forever, though. If something doesn't happen soon, the fortress will fall.

1228182607012475-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We don't have enough fuel for our cars. We don't have enough ammo for our weapons. We just don't have enough...

1228182607012476-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We don't have enough fuel for our cars. We don't have enough ammo for our weapons. We just don't have enough...

1228182607012477-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, you aren't carrying any aetherine on you, are you? Ugh, as if it'd just fall into our laps like that...

0103163407012493-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating greeting protocol! The weather is nice today, is it not?

0103163407012495-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating reassurance protocol! We soldierettos are doing our best. You can count upon us.

0103163407012496-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating gratitude protocol! We are grateful to the humans who gave us new purpose.

0103163407012497-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating brusque farewell protocol! This time has been very pleasant, but I have over one hundred tasks remaining for today. Please excuse me.

0103163407012498-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll leave you to it, then.

0103163407012499-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Scanning records on aetherine air brake experiment... Scan complete.

0104140207012577-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating excitement protocols! Oh, I have uncovered records about Vanheim. Archiving now.

0107125907012630-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating industriousness protocol! Whistle while you work.

0107130907012635-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating procrastination protocol! Must this task be done today?

0107130907012636-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating glib observation protocol! Even machines need time to be oiled.

0103163407012501-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Mathematical query: why was six afraid of seven?

0103163407012502-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Answer: because seven ate nine. Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha!

0107125907012631-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Five out of four humans admit that they're bad at fractions!

0107125907012632-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I am a library knight, and this is my page!

0107125907012633-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I may be made of metal, but I never steel.

0110182807012671-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you tried the sobfish? They're salty.

0110182807012672-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My chassis may be bronze, but I'm actually well-read!

0103163407012505-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Feel free to refuel at our aetherine station.

0110182807012673-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating shushing protocol! Please be quiet.

0103163407012515-Kritias_2018_12-.name: V-very well. As you can see, I'm burning the midnight oil. Eheheh...

0103163407012516-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you could see our results, why, they'd knock your socks off!

0103163407012517-Kritias_2018_12-.name: S-so you go and tell $npcName:11004438[gender:0]$ that we're working hard, okay?

0103163407012518-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It doesn't look like you're working that hard.

0103163407012519-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I-I am, and I have the overtime sheets to show it! L-later. I'll have them later. You'll see...

0104140207012579-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Isn't this place lovely? I get to enjoy this wonderful nature while I work.

0104140207012580-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see the "enjoy" part, but what about the "work" part?

0104140207012581-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't help it if I have resting "relaxed" face. Trust me when I say that we're working hard over here.

0103163407012524-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm just checking in on things.

0103163407012525-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004437[gender:0]$ sent you, then. As you can see, nothing's changed.

0103163407012526-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're still getting shot at by wild robots. We're still dealing with these ridiculous dust clouds. And we're still getting motion sickness when that machine over there sends out tremors...

0103163407012529-Kritias_2018_12-.name: When you get back to the outpost, let them know we need reinforcements to help with the killer machines here.

0104140207012582-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't stand the noise here...

0104140207012583-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The dust here is unreal... I should have brought a face mask.

0104140207012584-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm going to get a lung disease from my time in this place. Hopefully it's all just in my head...

0103163407012533-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's gonna leave a scar. I just know it...

0103163407012535-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think I'm gonna be sick.

0104170807012603-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sick of fighting! Is there no end to them?! Oh...! Hello, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$! I didn't see you there!

0104170807012602-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Would it kill them to let up...?

0104170807012604-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sick of fighting! Is there no end to them?! Oh...! Hello, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$! I didn't see you there!

0104170807012605-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is the biggest road to and from $map:02020041$. Maybe that's why the enemy keeps hammering us here.

0104170807012607-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry. I've got my eye on the enemy movements.

0104170807012606-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahh, I want to go home.

0104170807012608-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry. I've got my eye on the enemy movements.

0104170807012609-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There are no signs of an enemy attack, but that can change in an instant. That's why we can't slack off on our patrols!

0104170807012611-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're doing our best to defend $map:02020041$!

0104170807012612-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're doing our best to defend $map:02020041$!

0104170807012613-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Send me to where the fighting's thickest! I'll crush any enemy in my path!

0104170807012614-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Umm... Would you mind taking a few of them out while you're here? N-not that I can't take them myself, of course!

0104170807012618-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wha? Huh? I'm defendin'... I'm defendin' the base!

0104170807012619-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here I figured I'd spend my last years of my service in the capital, then retire and spend the rest of my days on a little farm out by Evansville. But nooo, they had to ship me out to this light-forsaken place...

0104170807012620-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Who goes there? A bad guy?!

0104170807012623-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You better watch out who you sneak up on. I was two seconds away from tombstoning you!

0104170807012624-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you have time to chat, you have time to fight!

0110183907012677-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here to gawk at the soldierettos? Get a good look and then be on your way. I can't concentrate with all you... all you tourists hanging about!

0110183907012680-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This place is amazing! Just this morning alone, I discovered three new molecules and a new kind of superconductor!

0110183907012683-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Can't you see I'm on edge? Leave me alone!

0108105807012638-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is the soldieretto lab. Are you a robot researcher?

0108105807012639-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is the soldieretto lab. Are you a robot researcher?

0108105807012640-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you do not have any particular business with us, leave. Humans who come here tend to give us more work.

0108105807012641-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I am giving it my all today. As always.

0108105807012642-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The life of a soldieretto is not easy.

0111140307012685-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(The rafflesia is highly toxic. This one seems to be slumbering. Try not to wake it up.)</font>

0111140307012686-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(The rafflesia is highly toxic. This one seems to be slumbering. Try not to wake it up.)</font>

0109163907012665-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$'s office. I don't know what your business is, but you watch yourself around $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$.

0109163907012664-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My relief should be here soon...

0109163907012666-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$'s office. I don't know what your business is, but you watch yourself around $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$.

0109163907012668-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You! Outlander! You better not be here to bother $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$.

0109163907012667-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, I need to get off my feet...

0109163907012669-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You! Outlander! You better not be here to bother $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$.

0116132907012728--.name: Hey, do you need a Valentine chocolate box and some sprinkles? I've got some that I can give you. If you keep making chocolate every day, you'll get a special gift!

0116132907012729--NA.name: Hey, do you need a Valentine chocolate box and some sprinkles? I've got some that I can give you. If you keep making chocolate every day, you'll get a special gift!

0116132907012731--NA.name: Here you go! I hope you save some chocolate for me!

0116132907012732--NA.name: Oh! Your bag is full. Try again after you make some space in your bag.

0116132907012733--NA.name: The best chocolate tastes like a little nugget of love! You've still got some ingredients, so you're good to make more on your own for now. I'll give you more if you need them, of course, but keep in mind that you can only make 3 chocolates a day.

0203161007015990--NA.name: $MyPCName$! Do you feel it? Love is in the air!

0123111007012736-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I finally see this to its end.

0518100907008515--.name: The guild could use your help. You will be compensated!

0518100907008516--.name: My tasks are perfectly reasonable, I assure you.

0518100907008517--.name: No matter how hard, you can overcome any challenge with teamwork!

0518100907008518--.name: Complete this simple task, and you will get guild experience, funds, and some experience for yourself, too! Note that you can't start daily quests until you've been in the guild for a day, and you can't start weekly quests until you've been in the guild for a week.

0510165107009867--.name: Thank you for raising me well! Here is a gift from my heart!

0510165107009874--.name: Are you putting me on a diet? Hurry and FEEED MEEEE.

0510165107009875--.name: That's my secret, I'm always hungry.

0510165107009885--.name: Thank you for raising me well! Here is a gift from my heart!

0510165107009892--.name: Are you putting me on a diet? Hurry and FEEED MEEEE.

0510165107009911--.name: That's my secret, I'm always hungry.

0218154407014479-Colosseum01-.name: I'm MC Nagi, your host in the Queen Bean Rumble!

0218154407014480-Colosseum01-.name: Welcome to the rumble! You look like you're ready to get wild.

0218154407014481-Colosseum01-.name: So, what are we doing today?

0218154407014484-Colosseum01-.name: Taking it from the top, eh? Exciting! Now, let's get to it!

0218154407014485-Colosseum01-.name: You already beat everyone, ya goof! Why don't we start over, instead?

0226191507014580-Colosseum01-.name: Great! Keep up that fighting spirit! Now start!

0226191507014581-Colosseum01-.name: Here's your first challenge. Good luck!

0304150007014584-Colosseum01-.name: Welcome to the Queen Bean Rumble!

0304150007014585-Colosseum01-.name: Talk to me again once the tournament is over.

0220211107014490-Colosseum01-.name: Yeah, and I've seen you around.

0220211107014491-Colosseum01-.name: I suppose it would be weird if you didn't know who I am.

0220211107014492-Colosseum01-.name: So, you're here for the Queen Bean Rumble, right? Are you sure you're up to fighting me?

0220211107014493-Colosseum01-.name: I was about to ask you the same.

0220211107014494-Colosseum01-.name: Oh, you think you can take me on just because I dance all day? Well, I have news for you, $male:buddy,female:lady$. Dancing is fantastic exercise. I'm going to crush you like a teeny tiny bug!

0307173907014586-Colosseum01-.name: I may look cute, but I'm a killer! Tee-hee!

0220211107014497-Colosseum01-.name: I haven't seen you before, but you seem like a formidable opponent.

0220211107014499-Colosseum01-.name: Ahem! I am Rovey, drillmaster for the Royal Knights.

0220211107014500-Colosseum01-.name: I've trained many knights around your age. In fact, you remind me of one particular fool whom I once taught...

0220211107014501-Colosseum01-.name: Well, I shan't waste any more words on you. I will see you in the rumble.

0220211107014505-Colosseum01-.name: I'm surprised that foolish sense of justice hasn't gotten you killed. Why did you come here?

0220211107014507-Colosseum01-.name: It's been some time since we last sparred. I'm curious to see how you've grown.

0220211107014510-Colosseum01-.name: Didn't think I'd see you here.

0220211107014512-Colosseum01-.name: The Pink Beans dragged me out here to fight in their idiotic rumble.

0220211107014513-Colosseum01-.name: I don't know how they found out that I'm a decent fighter. What a hassle...

0220211107014514-Colosseum01-.name: If we end up facing off in the ring, I'll have to show you a thing or two.

0220211107014516-Colosseum01-.name: Ha! I should've known you'd be here. Someone like you can't resist a good rumble.

0220211107014518-Colosseum01-.name: That's the $MyPCName$ I remember! Hold on... This means we might have to fight each other.

0220211107014519-Colosseum01-.name: Well, well. Now I've got some real competition! Let's do our best, okay?

0220211107014522-Colosseum01-.name: I had a feeling I'd see you here.

0220211107014523-Colosseum01-.name: I didn't think you were into this kind of thing.

0220211107014524-Colosseum01-.name: Come now. I wouldn't pass up the chance to fight the hero of Tria.

0220211107014525-Colosseum01-.name: I look forward to our match.

0220211107014530-Colosseum01-.name: What are you doing here?! Oh, no. Don't tell me we're fighting, too...

0220211107014531-Colosseum01-.name: Listen up. The Pink Beans told me something. They said... they said if I win...

0220211107014532-Colosseum01-.name: ...then I'll get to interview $npcName:11004568[gender:1]$ herself! Could you imagine? That girl is practically a dragon, thanks to her adopted father!

0220211107014533-Colosseum01-.name: So if you get matched against me, throw the fight, okay?

0220211107014535-Colosseum01-.name: Fine, don't throw the fight. But I warn you, I'll give it everything I've got!

0220211107014537-Colosseum01-.name: No offense, but I'm not here on business, okay? You're gonna have to find someone else to enchant your gear.

0220211107014538-Colosseum01-.name: Relax. I'm just here to say hi.

0220211107014539-Colosseum01-.name: Huh? You mean... You're not just talking to me because I'm a genius blacksmith?

0220211107014540-Colosseum01-.name: There's more to you than that.

0220211107014542-Colosseum01-.name: Well, for example, your... Never mind.

0220211107014543-Colosseum01-.name: I know you're trying to cheer me up, but I feel oddly insulted...

0307173907014588-Colosseum01-.name: I'm gonna break you like a +14 legendary!

0220211107014546-Colosseum01-.name: I have nothing to say to you. We can work out our differences in the ring.

0220211107014549-Colosseum01-.name: You look strong. Almost as strong as someone I know...

0220211107014551-Colosseum01-.name: Hey, you ever hear of the Gray Wolf?

0220211107014552-Colosseum01-.name: I may have heard the name.

0220211107014553-Colosseum01-.name: I have a feeling the Gray Wolf will be here. We've got unfinished business...

0220211107014556-Colosseum01-.name: I knew you'd be here. A fighter like you can't resist the ring for long.

0220211107014557-Colosseum01-.name: That's why I signed up. Figured it's a good chance for us to duke it out.

0220211107014559-Colosseum01-.name: I hope you haven't slacked off in your training. I haven't.

0220211107014564-Colosseum01-.name: Good idea! There we go. You're here for the Queen Bean Rumble?

0220211107014565-Colosseum01-.name: Me too! I bet you didn't know I could fight.

0220211107014567-Colosseum01-.name: Well, I can, and I'm really good at it, too.

0220211107014568-Colosseum01-.name: In fact, I'm the very first fighter the Pink Beans invited. It wasn't easy for them, either. Karkar isn't exactly in their backyard.

0220211107014569-Colosseum01-.name: Anyway, I'll see you in the fight!

0220212507014571-Colosseum01-.name: You just might be up to the Queen Bean Rumble.

0220212507014572-Colosseum01-.name: I do think you shall be an amusement for Her Highness.

0502182807014668-Season1-.name: Are you here for the No Cost Shop event? Let me be your guide!

0828194707015119-Event-.name: Oh oh, what have I gotten myself into in my old age?

0828194607015109-Event-.name: Urgh! I'll get burned to cinders before I ever graduate to full witch!

0828194607015110-Event-.name: Guard the cauldron. Deal with customers. Deal with customers. Guard the cauldron...

0828194607015111-Event-.name: $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$, that dratted old bat! Well, at least I don't have to worry about getting lonely...

0828194607015114-Event-.name: She's only her exalted fancy-warts, the grand bossy-britches of all the witches! Oh, we were friends once, back in the day. But I wasted my time when she was mastering her grimoires, and... Well, no point regretting it now!

0828194607015116-Event-.name: This old thing? You see, once a year, a deep shadow covers the world, and all the demons and spirits rise from the netherworld to cavort and caper in the mortal realm. I think you humans call it Halloween.

0828194607015117-Event-.name: Anyway, this is the one time of the year when we can get all the ingredients for witch stew! And we witches, we've got to have our witch stew. It gives our magic that extra little OOMPH that makes us so wonderful.

0828194607015118-Event-.name: It's a long story. And an ugly one! Instead of nosing into my painful memories, why don't you help me with this cauldron?

1122135407015958-Event-.name: Travel to the festively-decorated <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000072$</font> using the <font color="#00a2ed">Go to Event Map</font> button!

0831180306000299--.name: They're so loud. Why do they think $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is handsome anyway? If they saw $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$, they'd never look at $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ the same way again.

0831180306000304--.name: You mean you really have seen $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$? I saw her once.

0831180306000305--.name: It was only for a moment, but it was like seeing a brilliant shooting star shining against the darkness of the sky. In that moment, $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$'s wondrous image became imprinted in my mind as if it were a photograph, and I was never the same again.

0831180306000306--.name: Since then, it's been my dearest wish to see $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$ again. I've reminisced with others about her and painted dozens of pictures of her based on that single, beautiful memory.

0831180306000307--.name: In these paintings, I strive to encapsulate even a small part of $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$'s celestial charm. The reflection of her soul is like an ever-changing sky, bright as a summer's day or stormy as the darkest winter's night...

0831180306000308--.name: I may have only seen her once, but I know the wonder of her soul. She appears as swiftly as the wind and disappears just as soon. Fleeting as my time with her has been, I know she's the woman of my dreams!

0831180306000309--.name: Until the day I can profess my true love for her brilliant soul, I shall paint and expound upon her many wonders to those who would share my appreciation.

0831180306000310--.name: You're just like the squealing girls over there. You'll change your mind if you see $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$ even once.

1016142906000512--.name: What's this? What business do you have with the Trophy expert? Are you interested in Trophies?

1016142906000514--.name: I don't have time for useless junk like Trophies.

1016142906000515--.name: Ah, another Trophy connoisseur like myself! If you aspire to be an expert in Trophies like me, you'd better work hard. It'll take you a long time to become as savvy as I!

1016142906000516--.name: What do I get if I have a lot of Trophies?

1016142906000517--.name: Hmpf! Collecting Trophies is about more than just what you can get! Of course, there are precious few who collect for the sheer joy of it anymore.

1016142906000518--.name: In any case, I have some Trophies, and I'm always looking for more. You can never have enough Trophies, you know! If you happen to find any, I'll trade something equally valuable for them.

1016142906000519--.name: Do you even have something equally valuable?

1016142906000520--.name: Of course I do! I've got all kinds of treasures from traveling around Maple World. I can't believe you doubt me.

1016142906000521--.name: How dare you call my beautiful Trophies junk! Insulting my trophies is like personally insulting me, the Trophy expert! You should be ashamed of yourself for being so insulting!

1016142906000522--.name: All right! All right! I'm sorry! I shouldn't have called them junk.

1016142906000523--.name: Hmpf! I suppose I'll forgive you this time. Not everyone understands the true beauty of Trophies, after all. But don't let it happen again! Trophy experts demand respect, I tell you!

1022122006000530--.name: Feel free to browse. I've got products you can't find anywhere else.

1022122006000531--.name: That's a unique accent. May I ask where you're from?

1022122006000532--.name: Ah, you've certainly got keen ears. You're the first to notice since I arrived.

1022122006000534--.name: Nowhere you've heard of. Just a faraway place across the ocean. Actually, have you met anyone from the Allicari Merchant Society in $map:2000064$? The people who can't stop yelling yalario!

1022122006000537--.name: Ah, lucky you! If you do, be careful. They can be pretty heartless.

1022122006000539--.name: They called me a stowaway and kicked me off their ship just because I couldn't afford the fare. It's not like the ship would sink just because of one extra person. How could they be so cruel?

1022122006000540--.name: But if you couldn't afford the fare...

1022122006000541--.name: Can you believe how heartless they are? You know they called me a stowaway and kicked me off their ship just because I couldn't afford the fare? They're so mean!

1022122006000542--.name: But if you couldn't afford the fare...

1022122006000543--.name: WHAT?! You're taking their side! You're as heartless as they are!

1118145206000544--.name: Do you have any $itemPlural:90000014$? I'll trade you some amazing fairy treasures for them!

1118145206000546--.name: If you have $itemPlural:90000014$, please bring them to me.

1118145206000547--.name: There's not much to talk about. You got $itemPlural:90000014$, I've got treasures to trade. It's pretty simple, 'cause I just LOVE those fruits!

1118145206000550--.name: Can you really exchange fairy treasure for $itemPlural:90000014$?

1118145206000551--.name: They're fruits that grow in the $map:2000350$. They also call them the Fruit of Darkness, since they grow rich off the intense darkness of the Shadow World. That's what makes 'em tasty!

1118145206000552--.name: Well, $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ and the guard fairies have been battling back the darkness pouring out of the $map:2000350$. Some of them got poisoned from $itemPlural:90000014$, and $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ said they need the same poison to recover.

1118145206000553--.name: I'm collecting $item:90000014$ extract to make antidotes from. It, uh, also happens to be super tasty... so I need a lot. A LOT.

1118145206000554--.name: Sure! No treasure is worth more than a life. My friends were hurt while protecting our forest, so I'll do whatever it takes to make them better!

1206032906000556--.name: I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Blue Stars hold.

1206032906000557--.name: If you find Blue Stars, please bring them to me.

1216150106000601--.name: I'd love to learn to play music!

1216150106000602--.name: If you want to play music, just click an instrument. Isn't that easy? You can improvise or use music scores.

1216150106000604--.name: It's easy to use music scores. You can buy preset music scores or buy empty music scores and record music in them. It's a convenient method to play concerts from music you composed. Doesn't that sound like a blast?

1216150106000605--.name: No matter where you are, music is there! Take a look at the items I have for you, and give music a try!

0118163406000700--.name: How may I help you look amazing?

0118163406000701--.name: How may I help you look amazing?

0302204206000707--.name: Want to catch a prize fish?

0302204206000708--.name: Nothing's quite as exciting as catching a prize fish!

0318211806000714--.name: Doesn't dancing make you thirsty? Have some juice!

0318211806000715--.name: Doesn't playing games make you thirsty? Have some juice!

0319195006000716--.name: Are you here to see me?

0319195006000717--.name: Psst! Hey, you. I've got some good stuff here. Interested?

0319195006000718--.name: Just, uh... keep this to yourself, got it?

0322171106000719--.name: Looking for quality equipment? I've got stuff you can usually only get in dungeons. Take a look if you're interested.

0322171106000721--.name: Where do you get all of this from?

0322171106000722--.name: Is it really good quality stuff?

0322171106000723--.name: I'm selling boxes with items from different dungeons. If you mainly explore dungeons to find good equipment, you'll definitely like what I sell. Buy from me, and you don't have to risk your neck exploring dungeons.

0322171106000724--.name: What exactly is in these boxes?

0322171106000725--.name: Beats me. They've got everything from highly valuable equipment to useless junk. What you get depends on your luck.

0322171106000726--.name: Oh, I nearly forgot the most important thing. Every time you open a box, your reward count for the corresponding dungeon decreases.

0322171106000727--.name: What a brazen way to ask for all of my trade secrets! Adventurers have all kinds of reasons to explore dungeons, like discovering the rare treasures they contain. I suppose you could call them treasure hunters, and they're good at what they do.

0322171106000728--.name: Naturally, some of them do business with merchants like me. Beyond that, all you need to know is that I have my own supply routes.

0322171106000729--.name: Good quality? What do you take me for, a cheat? I swear on my reputation as a businessman, I don't know what's inside these boxes any more than you do. If I did, you can bet I'd have priced each box according to its value.

0322171106000730--.name: But as you can see, I'm selling them at set low prices. It's not about my capacity for swindling. It's about your luck. So don't blame me if you do get junk from your box.

0421100406000731--.name: This is my home away from home.

0421100406000732--.name: Cities can start to feel a bit crowded, you know? Feel free to stop by anytime.

0421100406000733--.name: Today's the day I catch a prize fish!

0219154106000893--.name: What does it take to be happy every day?

0219154106000894--.name: How'd you like to take part in an exciting event?

0219154106000895--.name: Howdy, $MyPCName$! I'm $npcName:11001003[gender:0]$. Do you want to learn more about the events we're running today?

0219154106000896--.name: Who's the woman standing next to you?

0219154106000897--.name: You mean $npcName:11001002[gender:1]$? That's my twin sister. She's also a dang good event guide, if you don't mind my saying. Whenever you're curious about any events in Maple World, we're the folks to talk to!

0925121506000918--.name: A special Monday deal for a special for adventurers who have $itemPlural:30000750$! What a wonderful way to start the week!

0925121506000920--.name: $itemPlural:30000750$ are given to special adventurers level 50 or higher!

0920165106000916--.name: ((China Only)) How'd you end up coming here?

0920165106000917--.name:
((China Only)) Global MapleStory 2!
I came to meet the Korean adventurers in celebration of MapleStory 2's launch in China!
I'm glad to be able to meet Korean adventurers for Korea's biggest holiday, Chuseok!

1003143806000927--.name: Parkour through the big city in a thrilling game of Shanghai Crazy Runners!

1003143806000929--.name: I'm selling a wide selection of food, outfits and other goodies from a distant land!

1007162606000939--.name: A genius scientist once said that the only way to teach others is to lead by example.

1007162606000940--.name: Become a mentor to new adventurers today!

1007162606000941--.name: I've got some great stuff for good mentors.

1007162606000943--.name: I've got all kinds of goods to help mentees.

1007162606000944--.name: Why don't you say a word of thanks to your mentor?

1007162606000945--.name: I was a mentee once, too, you know.

1110150406000967--.name: Ooh... Everything here is so interesting!

1110150406000968--.name: How can one land be so full of wonders?

1110150406000969--.name: I'm hungry. Is it safe to eat the food here? I want to know how it tastes...

1110150406000970--.name: This place seems so peaceful. And everyone has such strange clothes! What's that person eating? I have so many questions!

1110150406000971--.name: ...Ah! Yalario! Are you from around here? It is nice to meet you.

1110150406000973--.name: You sure have a lot of questions.

1110150406000975--.name: Hehe... Yalario is a greeting in my language. It means awaited stranger! Although, the literal translation is more like "well-groomed beard."

1110150406000976--.name: How could I not? Visiting a new place is so exciting! I can't wait to learn more about this land and its people.

1110150406000977--.name: There are so many different types of people here! You must have lots of festivals and holidays of your own. I can't wait to see them!

1110150406000978--.name: Mm... It is a distant land. You probably haven't heard of it. We traveled a great distance by ship to get here. Our village was not at all like this Town of Queens.

1110153306000979--.name: Hello, hello, hello! I'm triple happy to see you!

1110153306000981--.name: Where there are people, there is money to be made.

1110153306000982--.name: Amazing that such a glorious city can thrive here, don't you think?

0907150706001006--.name: Welcome. How can I help you?

0123221606000987--.name: To have a chance again $npc:23000090[gender:0]$, you'll need $itemPlural:20000762$ and $itemPlural:20000763$.

0123221606000988--.name: Our last hope is firing the particle cannon. $MyPCName$, I leave it to you!

0123221606000989--.name: Since you might run into $npc:23000090[gender:0]$ on the deck, be prepared with $itemPlural:20000762$ and $itemPlural:20000763$.

1130175706001007--NA.name: I've got everything you need to take on $npc:23000090[gender:0]$.

1130175706001008--NA.name: The particle cannon is our last hope. $MyPCName$, I leave it to you!

0724165506000997-SurvivalContents03-.name: My clothes are so pretty. Wanna see?

0724165506000998-SurvivalContents03-.name: I can't leave until I sell my last outfit...

0724165506000999-SurvivalContents03-.name: Not all Sleepy Shrooms are lazy bums!

0724165506001000-SurvivalContents03-.name: Not all Sleepy Shrooms are lazy bums! ...But I am.

0724165506001001-SurvivalContents03-.name: I sell all kinda neat things. Take a look.

0724165506001002-SurvivalContents03-.name: Think anyone'd notice if I took a quick nap?

0827140306001005-SurvivalContents03-.name: Please let me know if you want to use the safe.

106135207015988-Wedding-null.name: I want to cancel the wedding.

106135307015989-Wedding-null.name: I want to cancel the wedding.

904141707015131-Wedding-null.name: Empress $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ also wishes the couple a happy future.

904141707015133-Wedding-null.name: Even as darkness approaches, our lives and dreams continue. I'm glad to be a witness to the oath of love.

904141707015135-Wedding-null.name:
No darkness and fear can beat the pure power of life and love. 
I hope you keep that beautiful power in your heart forever.

904141707015137-Wedding-null.name: The love pledged under the sacred Vayar Mountains will shine harder and more beautifully than anything else.

106135207015986-Wedding-null.name: I want to cancel the wedding.

102155907007619-null-null.name: We need to find their traces

904153507015138-Wedding-null.name:
Welcome, $MyPCName$.
Create the most shining and beautiful time in $map:84000015$.

904153507015140-Wedding-null.name:
Welcome aboard, $MyPCName$!
Today, a grand and splendid wedding like no other will be held right here! Look forward to everything that will happen on the ceremony deck!

904153507015141-Wedding-null.name: Greetings from MC $npc:11004711[gender:0]$ of $map:84000016$! Do you need my help?

905092307015216-Wedding-null.name: Okay, if both parties agree, then let's start the wedding right away.

905092307015217-Wedding-null.name: Alright, if the other person agrees, I'll help you completely finish the wedding and greet the guests as well.

905152307015220-Wedding-null.name:
When the wedding ceremony is over, both you and your guests will leave the wedding hall.
If you haven't finished the wedding ceremony or haven't had an post-wedding event, it's better not to apply for the end yet.
Because if I end the wedding ceremony, it will end in this state and cannot be reversed.

905152307015221-Wedding-null.name: If you really want to end it, you can end the wedding with the other person's consent. Would you like to do that?

905152307015224-Wedding-null.name:
Yes, $map:84000013$ is a beautiful place.
Then, relax and enjoy yourself. Come back to me when you need me.

905152307015225-Wedding-null.name: I want to start the wedding.

1022124907015276-Wedding-null.name: Hello, $MyPCName$. Do you need my help?

1023132807015279-Wedding-null.name:
The after-party is in full swing,
Let's talk a little later!

1023151407015284-Wedding-null.name: Wassup Man~ Let's enjoy the afterparty!

1023151407015287-Wedding-null.name: Check out the lights! You can dance!

1023151407015288-Wedding-null.name: Wassup Man~ MC Dayday here to help!

1101145407015395-Wedding-null.name: Ask how to get a divorce.

1101145407015396-Wedding-null.name:
Forced divorce is a divorce method that can be applied for when one of the couples who has been married for more than 31 days wants to divorce without the other party's consent. It requires a fee and a deliberation period.
I will now inform you of the precautions for divorce. Please be careful because the fee will not be refunded after the decision.

1101145407015397-Wedding-null.name:
If you get a divorce, all the intimacy and other rewards you have accumulated through your current relationship with your spouse will be deleted.
In addition, you will not be able to propose to other characters or make wedding reservations for 48 hours after the divorce is completed.

1101145407015398-Wedding-null.name:
When a forced divorce application is filed, the other party will be notified.
If the other party agrees to the forced divorce during the 7-day divorce deliberation period, the fee paid by $MyPCName$ will be refunded, but if the other party does not agree, no refund will be made.
Once the divorce deliberation period ends, the divorce of both parties will be completed.

1101145407015399-Wedding-null.name: Now then, would you like to proceed with the forced divorce? The forced divorce fee is 1,000,000 mesos.

1101145407015400-Wedding-null.name: I understand the terms of the forced divorce and will proceed.

1101145407015401-Wedding-null.name: I want to think about this more.

1101145407015402-Wedding-null.name:
I have confirmed your choice and will file for forced divorce.
If the forced divorce application is filed normally, the other party will be notified, and a confirmation email will be sent whenever the progress changes, so please check.

1101145407015403-Wedding-null.name: Okay, think about it carefully, and come to me if you need help.

1101145407015404-Wedding-null.name:
If you visit this place with your partner and want to get an immediate divorce, the lawyer $npcName:11004712[gender:1]$ is in charge.
Go to the room on the left.

1101145407015405-Wedding-null.name: This is attorney $npcName:11004713[gender:0]$ of $map:84000002$. Do you have any business with me?

1101145407015406-Wedding-null.name: I received a request for forced divorce and came to negotiate.

1101145407015407-Wedding-null.name:
If you agree to a forced divorce, the divorce will be completed immediately and the fees paid by the other party will be refunded to the other party. 
The divorce will be processed immediately. You do not have to wait until the end of the cooling-off period.

1101145407015408-Wedding-null.name: I want to reach an agreement.

1101145407015409-Wedding-null.name: I want to think about this more.

1101145407015410-Wedding-null.name:
I have received your decision. I accept the forced divorce agreement between the two people.
Once the divorce process is completed, you will receive a confirmation mail, so please check it.

1101145407015411-Wedding-null.name: Okay, think about it carefully, and come to me anytime you need help.

1101145407015412-Wedding-null.name: This is attorney $npcName:11004713[gender:0]$ of $map:84000002$. Do you have any business with me?

1101145407015413-Wedding-null.name: I received a request for forced divorce and came to negotiate.
